courses.title: The Accounting Interview: Stand Out & Get Hired
courses.bio: Master accounting interviews with resume tips, Excel prep, behavioral strategies & real-world examples.
objectives: Prepare confidently for accounting interviews with proven strategies and tips.
Answer technical and behavioral questions with clarity and professionalism.
Showcase your resume, experience, and skills to impress hiring managers.
Tackle Excel assessments with confidence using hands-on practice tools.
Avoid common interview mistakes and stand out from other candidates.
Build a compelling story that highlights your strengths and value.
requirements: No prior interview experience is required—this course is designed for all levels.
Basic accounting knowledge is helpful but not mandatory.
Access to Microsoft Excel or Google Sheets for practice exercises.
A willingness to reflect, practice, and improve your interview skills.
courses.description:
Are you preparing for an accounting job interview and wondering how to stand out from the crowd? Whether you’re applying for your first internship, re-entering the workforce, or aiming to level up in your finance career, The Accounting Interview: Stand Out & Get Hired is designed to give you a competitive edge.
This course goes beyond generic interview advice. You’ll learn how to present your skills, experience, and personality in a way that resonates with hiring managers in the accounting and finance world. We’ll cover how to polish your resume and LinkedIn profile, prepare for common technical and behavioral questions, and demonstrate your Excel skills with confidence. You’ll also learn how to avoid common pitfalls and navigate the full interview process—from first impressions to follow-up emails.
You'll gain access to downloadable templates, an Excel practice file with answers, a behavioral interview workbook, and more helpful tools and resources. Whether you're preparing for a Big Four interview, a mid-sized firm, or an internal accounting role, this course gives you the knowledge, tools, and confidence to succeed in today’s competitive job market.
Join now and walk into your next accounting interview with clarity, confidence, and a strategy that helps you stand out and get hired.
target_audience: This course is designed for accounting and finance professionals at all stages of their careers. Whether you’re a student preparing for your first job, a recent graduate entering the workforce, a career changer re-entering the field, or a seasoned professional seeking a new opportunity, you’ll find practical strategies and tools to help you stand out in today’s competitive job market. If you want to improve your interview performance, polish your resume, and gain confidence with Excel and behavioral questions, this course is for you.

courses.title: CSRD-Kompakt Kurs für Einsteiger im Nachhaltigkeitsbericht
courses.bio: Ein erster Einblick in die umfangreiche Welt der Nachhaltigkeitsberichterstattung nach CSRD
objectives: Grundlegendes zur neuen Nachhaltigkeitsberichterstattung
Erstes Verständnis der CSRD inkl. EU-Taxonomie
Welche Unternehmen wann betroffen sind
Übersicht der ESRS
requirements: Keine besonderen Vorkentnisse notwendig, es wird generell erklärt was CSRD ist
courses.description:
Dieser Kurs bietet einen kompakten Einstieg in das Thema CSRD (Corporate Sustainability Reporting Directive) und dient als wesentlicher Ausgangspunkt für Mitarbeiter, die sich in der Recherche-Phase zu CSRD befinden, oder auch für Mitarbeiter die eine erste Idee von dem Thema benötigen. Wir beginnen mit einer fundierten Erläuterung der historischen Entwicklung und führen dann zur rechtlichen Verpflichtung der Berichterstattung. Ein wichtiger Bestandteil des Kurses ist ein Exkurs zur EU-Taxonomie, der kurz und prägnant die Bedeutung und den umfassenden Einfluss dieses Themas verdeutlicht.
Im weiteren Verlauf bieten wir eine detaillierte Übersicht über CSRD und beleuchten insbesondere die European Sustainability Reporting Standards (ESRS). Alle relevanten Fachbegriffe werden im Verlauf des Kurses ausführlich erklärt, um ein solides Verständnis zu gewährleisten. Zudem wird die Wesentlichkeitsanalyse eingeführt und ihre Bedeutung für die CSR-Berichterstattung erläutert.
Zum Abschluss des Kurses werden einige offizielle Dokumente präsentiert, um den Teilnehmern einen realen Einblick in die praktische Umsetzung von CSRD zu geben. Dieser Kurs bietet somit eine solide Grundlage für die weitere Auseinandersetzung mit CSRD und vermittelt ein umfassendes Verständnis für die wichtigsten Konzepte und Anforderungen in diesem Bereich.

Viel Spaß mit dem Kurs und viel Erfolg bei der Umsetzung der CSRD. Weitere Kurse zu dem Thema der Nachhaltigkeitsberichterstattung sind noch in Diskussion.
target_audience: Mitarbeiter von Unternehmen aus dem Bereich FI und Rechnungswesen aber auch Nachhaltigkeit die einen ersten Überblick gewinnen möchte, was mit CSRD auf sie zukommt

objectives: Você será capaz de educar financeiramente crianças e adolescentes.

Você também terá a oportunidade de refletir sobre a sua própria educação financeira.

Acreditar no valor que a Educação Financeira tem quando ela começa desde a infância
Acesso a internet
courses.description:
Olá. Seja bem-vindo(a).
Você sabe como falar sobre dinheiro com crianças e adolescentes?
A maioria das pessoas não sabe, ou não utilizam as ferramentas apropriadas. Se for esse seu caso, você não está só! Saiba que muitas pessoas não tiveram educação financeira, não tiveram alguém para lhe ensinar como lidar com o dinheiro.
Pensando nisso, construí o curso COMO FALAR SOBRE DINHEIRO COM CRIANÇAS E ADOLESCENTES que foi elaborado para você que é pai/mãe,  educador(a) ou que tem alguma criança que você ama tanto que quer ensiná-la, desde a mais tenra idade, como ela deve lidar com o dinheiro para ter uma boa saúde financeira e uma vida próspera.
Este curso também é uma oportunidade para VOCÊ refletir e aprender mais sobre: crianças, jovens, família, dinheiro, sonhos, prosperidade, bem-estar. Ao longo das aulas, eu ensino TÉCNICAS LÚDICAS, conversando com você sobre dinheiro e família, tudo pautado nos ensinamentos da Educação Financeira, da Psicologia Econômica e da Psicologia aplicada a crianças e adolescentes.


O que você vai aprender com o curso:
- A importância da Educação Financeira
- O que é Educação Financeira?
- Educação Financeira na infância
- Quando começar a educação financeira com as crianças?
- Quais as estratégias usar?

- Os cofrinhos e os sonhos
- Os adultos podem complementar o cofrinho?
- Juros e poupança
- O tempo e os sonhos
- Autocontrole
- O poder do Não
- Criança, consumo e publicidade

- Tipos de mesada
- Erros mais comuns na implementação da mesada

courses.description:
In today’s complex financial environment, managing credit risk and ensuring regulatory compliance are critical skills for any finance professional. This course, Portfolio Management and Regulatory Frameworks in Credit Analysis, is designed to equip learners with advanced tools and strategies used in professional credit risk and portfolio management roles.
Over the span of four hours, you will gain a deep understanding of key topics such as bond pricing, yield analysis, credit spreads, and the use of credit derivatives like Credit Default Swaps (CDS) for risk mitigation. The course offers a balanced mix of theoretical foundations and hands-on applications, including case studies, real-world contract reviews, and Excel-based exercises.
You’ll also explore the Basel I, II, and III regulatory frameworks, understanding how financial institutions calculate and manage credit risk capital, implement stress testing, and respond to changing compliance requirements. The course concludes with comprehensive coverage of credit portfolio management techniques, including diversification, hedging, and credit risk transfer mechanisms.
This course is ideal for credit analysts, risk professionals, finance students, and banking executives looking to advance their expertise in managing credit portfolios and navigating regulatory landscapes. Whether you're preparing for a role in credit risk or enhancing your strategic decision-making capabilities, this course will give you the knowledge and tools to succeed.
target_audience: This course is for finance professionals, credit analysts, and aspiring risk managers seeking to master portfolio-level credit analysis, regulatory frameworks, and risk mitigation strategies.

courses.description:
My name is Andrew Reddick and I've worked professionally in the Insurance industry for over 7 years. During this time I've held several roles from selling life insurance over the phone to working auto fire and theft claims for stolen Lamborghini's and by far the most rewarding role personally, professionally and financially has been that of an Auto Insurance Adjuster.
Working as an Auto Insurance Adjuster is a career path that people often overlook because it isn't talked about much and I designed this course to serve as an introduction into this fast paced, rewarding and constantly growing industry.
In this course you'll learn from start to finish what an Auto Insurance Adjuster position and completing an auto claim successfully looks like on a day to day basis. You will also have a step by step guide explaining in detail where to apply to these positions online upon completion of the course.
Additionally, you will learn how to format your resume to apply for these jobs and will know what questions you will be asked in the interview and how to answer these behavioral based questions.
Deciding to work as an Insurance Adjuster in the auto industry has been the best decision I've made for my career and has led to several promotional opportunities and this course will serve as a guide for you to achieve these same results and more.


With the purchase of the How to Become an Insurance Adjuster Course, you will receive the following:
- Two Modules with audio full of information you will not find anywhere else explaining Insurance claims and the Auto Adjuster role in detail to demonstrate proficiency when interviewing for these positions.
- Adjusters Handbook containing a Course Synopsis and Quiz with 25+ questions to test knowledge covering first two modules.
- Detailed explanation on how to perform at a high level as an Insurance Adjuster to set yourself apart from your peers.


FAQ'S
What is the Salary Range for an Adjuster Role?
The typical salary range for an auto adjuster positions can range from as low as $50,000 starting to over $70,000 per year starting.
Will I need a license to become an Auto Insurance Adjuster?
No license is needed and anyone can apply to these roles.
How long does it take to become an Auto Insurance Adjuster?
Part 1, 2 and 3 of this course can be completed in a 6 hour span. From there you can apply to Auto Insurance Adjuster Positions that same day and potentially hear back from interested employers within 72 hours of applying to schedule an interview.
Will I need to go into an office or do any in person work as an Auto Insurance Adjuster?
Most insurance companies have work from home remote positions available that they are actively hiring for. You have the option of looking into in person office positions where you may go in once or twice a week or work from home positions where you will work from the comfort of your home 100% of the time, the choice is yours.
Where do I apply for a job as an Auto Insurance Adjuster?
There are several places to apply for a job as an auto insurance adjuster ranging from Insurance Carrier sites to job boards. This course includes specific links containing Auto Adjuster Roles that will streamline the application process.
What type of Auto Insurance Positions are available?
There are countless entry level positions within insurance carriers that this course will provide you a baseline understanding of. This ranges from Bodily Injury Adjusting to Auto Fire and Theft Adjusting but in this course, we will focus on Auto Damage Adjusting.
Do I need a degree to become an Insurance Adjuster?
A college degree is not required to become an Insurance Adjuster, some of the best adjusters I've worked with have not had college degrees.
Do I need to have prior insurance or business related experience to become an Insurance Adjuster?
Absolutely Not, I've seen people become successful Insurance Adjusters after working in the restaurant industry, retail, education, sales, banking, fast food, just about every industry you can think of.
Can I work part time as an Insurance Adjuster?
This depends. Most Adjuster positions are full time requiring a full 40 hours a week but this isn't to say that some Insurance Carriers will not have part time positions listed. You must specify this search criteria during your job search if you are looking for part time employment after completing this course.
Is Insurance Adjusting a stable industry?
Absolutely, This is a stable and rapidly growing industry that has been around since 1897.
When will Part 2 be available?
Part 2 and Part 3 will be available momentarily and will cover how to complete Claim process and successfully apply for and interview with Insurance Companies to receive job offer.
target_audience: Students

Underwriting Beginner

Les charges externes - Autres services extérieurs
Quiz sur les autres services extérieurs
Quiz sur les impôts et taxes

requirements: Tout public
courses.description:
Le compte de résultat est un document comptable issu des comptes (bilan, compte de résultat et annexe) d’une société permettant d’apprécier la performance de l’entreprise pour une période donnée.
Le compte de résultat traite de l’ensemble des opérations réalisées durant cette période. Il permet notamment de savoir si au cours de la période, l'entreprise a réalisé un bénéfice ou un déficit.
L’analyse de ce document permet de comprendre l’articulation de la composition du résultat entre les produits et les charges.
Comprendre la structuration du compte de résultat et savoir le lire à travers l’analyse des postes et des ratios permet d’évaluer la santé financière de l’entreprise, de connaître la rentabilité de l’exploitation. Et plus précisément de connaitre les points faibles et les points forts de l’exploitation afin de mettre en place les mesures adéquates.
Cette formation va permettre de savoir analyser le compte de résultat d’un restaurant. Chaque secteur d’activité a ses spécificités et une bonne connaissance des ratios et des particularités permet de mieux apprécier les chiffres issus de l’exploitation.
Cette formation est structurée en quatre parties :
Dans la première partie, il est prévu de faire une prise de connaissance du secteur de la restauration, et un point sur les principaux chiffres du secteur.
La deuxième partie est dédiée au rappel de la structuration et de l’articulation du compte de résultat en grandes masses, ainsi que la décomposition des soldes intermédiaires de gestion, afin de comprendre les bases.
La troisième partie, est un rappel des bases pour bien pratiquer une analyse d’un compte de résultat
La quatrième et la cinquième parties, passe en revue des postes de charges principaux du compte de résultat d’exploitation, et leur analyse au regard des ratios du secteur de la restauration.
Puis un paragraphe est destiné à la revue des autres résultats.
Enfin une dernière partie, traite de la capacité d’autofinancement, notion indispensable pour connaître la capacité de l’entreprise à dégager suffisamment de trésorerie pour faire face au remboursement de ses dettes.
Cette formation est destinée aux créateurs, repreneurs, exploitant, conseils dans la restauration. En fait, toutes personnes souhaitant pouvoir lire et analyser le compte de résultat d’un restaurant.
target_audience: Repreneur, restaurateurs et conseils

courses.description:
Este curso  proporciona a los estudiantes una comprensión integral de los diversos conceptos económicos y financieros aplicados a la evaluación y financiación de proyectos de capital. El estudiante será capaz de evaluar la viabilidad económica de sistemas, productos y servicios, comprender los aspectos económicos de proyectos de capital y evaluar propuestas de inversión en términos de valor y costo.


¿Por Qué Este Curso es Esencial?
La Ingeniería Económica es una herramienta fundamental para evaluar la viabilidad financiera de proyectos y tomar decisiones empresariales rentables. Ya sea que estés involucrado en el desarrollo de productos, proyectos de infraestructura o gestionando un negocio, comprender los principios de la Ingeniería Económica es esencial para maximizar el valor de cada inversión y asegurar el crecimiento sostenible.


Beneficios del Curso:
Expertos en la Industria: Serás guiado por instructores con experiencia práctica en la aplicación de la Ingeniería Económica en diversos sectores industriales.
Certificación de Dominio: Al completar el curso, recibirás una certificación que valida tu comprensión profunda de los conceptos clave de la Ingeniería Económica.
Aplicabilidad Global: Las habilidades que adquirirás son universales y aplicables en una variedad de industrias y entornos económicos a nivel mundial.


Prepárate para tomar decisiones financieras fundamentadas y estratégicas que impulsen el éxito de tus proyectos y negocios. ¡Únete a nosotros ahora y transforma tu capacidad para tomar decisiones inteligentes y rentables con Ingeniería Económica!
target_audience: Estudiantes y profesionales de ingeniería, finanzas y afines.
Cualquier persona interesada en aprender a evaluar económicamente sus proyectos.
Cualquier persona interesada en tomar decisiones basadas en análisis económico.

courses.title: TRADING DE FOREX: DE CERO A EXPERTO SMART MONEY 2025
courses.bio: Curso de trading forex de 0 a 100 donde aprenderás las estrategias más efectivas de entrada al mercado 100% probadas
objectives: Aprenderás conocimiento preciso y funcional acerca de la teoria de oferta y demanda en los mercados financieros
Dominaras los distintos mercados de forex y criptomonedas con las estrategias enseñadas
Aprenderás sobre la gestión de riesgo y manejo de capital y psicotrading
Serás capaz de tomar decisiones independientes en tu trading, sin depender de nadie
Estrategias compatibles con cualquier par de forex, indices, stocks, metales y criptomonedas
Conocerás los errores comunes del trading y como evitarlos

Modulo 1: Introducción a los mercados: Introducción a la liquidez, Tradingview, Zonas de oferta y demanda e imbalances
Modulo 2: Patrones de velas, Acción de p: Modulo 2: Patrones de velas, Acción de precio y temporalidades
Modulo 3: Estructura de mercado, líneas: Modulo 3: Estructura de mercado, líneas de tendencias, imbalances, zonas de O/D
Modulo 4: Patrones de continuación, curv: Modulo 4: Patrones de continuación, curvas sobreextendidas, picos y valles
Modulo 5: Liquidez interna y externa, es: Modulo 5: Liquidez interna y externa, estructura, fractales y temporalidades
Modulo 6: Como operar e identificar imba: Modulo 6: Como operar e identificar imbalances, bloques de alta probabilidad
Modulo 7: Estructura de mercado, Bos Cho: Modulo 7: Estructura de mercado, Bos, ChocH y Fractales pt2
Modulo 8: Dirección del precio, inducció: Modulo 8: Dirección del precio, inducción y reversión, fractales pt3
Modulo 9: Arrival zone, zonas de reversi: Modulo 9: Arrival zone, zonas de reversión, zonas mensuales, semanales y diarias

requirements: No necesitas conocimientos previos para realizar el curso, está pensado para que te resulte sencillo y fácil de comprender. Esta destinado a cualquier persona de cualquier edad sin conocimientos previos para que pueda comenzar a operar en los mercados financieros
courses.description:
¡Hola!, ¿Interesado en aprender trading en el 2025? Has llegado al lugar correcto donde aprenderás como operar los mercados financieros (incluyendo criptomonedas) con la metodología de oferta y demanda.
El curso aplica para todos aquellos que quieran aprender a operar Forex, índices y criptomonedas, no es otro curso más de análisis técnico donde te enseñan a marcar soportes y resistencias, este curso se basa en oferta y demanda el cual te ayudará a comprender como realmente las instituciones financieras mueven los mercados y como siguiendo su paso puedes encontrar entradas óptimas y sacar un beneficio del mercado.
ESTO NO ES UN CURSO DE BINARIAS, Es un curso donde vas a aprender a operar los mercados de Forex, índices, acciones materias primas y criptomonedas mediante un análisis de oferta y demanda que es como se mueve cualquier mercado en la actualidad.
Si quieres aprender trading de forma profesional este curso es perfecto para ti. Fácil de aprender, apto para todas las personas indiferentemente de la edad que tengas. Este curso te servirá para : Índices, acciones, Materias primas, Forex y criptomonedas
La finalidad de este curso es que todo el mundo pueda aprender hacer trading profesional sin tener que pagar miles de dólares en cursos y tengan la oportunidad de mejorar su situación económica.
Este curso va dedicado para que cualquier persona sin conocimientos en bolsa pueda aprender a invertir su dinero y de esta forma tener un plan alternativo en su vida, una fuente de ingresos extra. La difícil situación económica que se está viviendo a nivel mundial dictamina la necesidad de aprender a ganar dinero a través de nuevas modalidades como lo es el trading.
Este curso es perfecto para todas aquellas personas que quieren conocer los mercados en profundidad y hacer un trading tranquilo sin perseguir al precio, acá también te enseñaremos a operar Swing trading, Day trading, Scalping y ya será tu decisión que tipo de trader decides ser.
Los pilares más importantes del trading que aprenderás en este curso:
1. Acción del precio
Entendiendo la ley de oferta y la demanda y la forma como el dinero institucional deja huellas gracias al volumen que genera su actividad. Entender la acción del precio es lo primero que aprenderás ya que es tal la importancia de este conocimiento que una vez tengas este conocimiento no necesitarás ningún indicador tradicional. Serás capaz de leer e interpretar lo que está haciendo el precio en tiempo real, sin indicadores retrasados.
2. Psicotrading es la correcta gestión de las emociones.
Para gestionar las emociones primero tenemos que identificarlas y saber como influyen en los resultados en el trading. No sirve que tengas una estrategia de trading ganadora si no sabes gestionar tus emociones. En este curso aprenderás identificar las principales emociones que se experimentan haciendo trading y su origen. Aprenderás técnicas de concentración y atención plena que te ayudarán a gestionar tus emociones y a lograr tus metas.
3. Gestión de Capital.
Con este importante pilar, aprenderás un plan concreto de gestión de capital porque será fundamental para que tengas éxito en el trading, si no haces una buena gestión de capital, no te convertirás en un trader profesional.
Una vez finalizado todos los módulos ya estarás capacitado para empezar con una cuenta demo y probar las habilidades aprendidas ya que, ¿Sabias que el 90% de las personas que realizan operaciones en los mercados no son rentables?
La mayoría de los conceptos que se explican en los cursos tradicionales de Trading, son inducidos por las grandes instituciones que controlan los mercados, dichos conceptos fueron insertados en la sociedad con el objetivo de impulsar a los operadores minoristas a tomar decisiones incorrectas en los mercados.
El objetivo de este curso es que comprendas como posicionarte a favor de las grandes instituciones comprendiendo conceptos relacionados a estructura y liquidez.
AL ADQUIRIR EL CURSO TENDRÁS ACCESO DE POR VIDA A LA COMUNIDAD DE TRADERS DONDE ESTARÉ AYUDANDO A TODOS EN SU PROCESO DESDE CERO Y QUE LOGREN LA RENTABILIDAD EN ESTE MARAVILLOSO MODELO DE NEGOCIO.
También te regalaré 4 libros en PDF que son indispensables para el desarrollo de cualquier persona que se está iniciando en el mundo de los mercados financieros.
target_audience: A todo aquel que quiera aprender sobre trading sin importad su edad.
Personas con interés en aprender a operar los mercados financieros, (forex, indices, criptomonedas) etc.

courses.title: Sage Intacct Fundamentals
courses.bio: Learn Sage Intacct fast—master GL, AP, AR, and reporting with this hands-on accounting software course.
objectives: Understand the Core Features of Sage Intacct
Master Essential Accounting Functions in Sage Intacct
Generate and Customize Financial Reports
Set Up and Manage Core Accounting Components in Sage Intacct
Manage Security and Administrative functions in Sage Intacct

Introduction: Make the most of this course

requirements: Basic accounting or bookkeeping skills
courses.description:
Sage Intacct Fundamentals is a comprehensive, step-by-step training course created for experienced bookkeepers and accounting professionals who want to build confidence and efficiency using Sage Intacct in a real-world setting. Whether you're new to the platform or preparing to support a company that uses it, this course will give you the skills you need to navigate the system, understand its structure, and perform essential financial tasks with clarity and precision.
Sage Intacct is a powerful, cloud-based financial management solution trusted by organizations across a wide range of industries—including nonprofits, construction, professional services, and healthcare. What sets it apart is its flexible dimensional accounting system, strong automation tools, and robust reporting capabilities. This course is designed to help you leverage those features effectively from day one.
Throughout the course, you’ll learn how to work within five of the most widely used functional areas in Sage Intacct:
General Ledger (GL)
Accounts Payable (AP)
Accounts Receivable (AR)
Cash Management
Financial Reporting
You’ll be guided through each module using clear, professional video walkthroughs that demonstrate how to create transactions, manage data, and generate reports. We’ll also cover key system settings and workflows that accounting teams interact with regularly.
To support your learning, you’ll also receive downloadable Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) for key functions. These SOPs provide step-by-step written instructions you can reference anytime, making it easier to follow along with the lectures or apply your skills outside the course.
This course assumes that you already have a working knowledge of accounting principles, so we won’t spend time explaining basic bookkeeping concepts. Instead, we’ll focus on helping you apply what you already know inside the Sage Intacct environment.
While the course does not include quizzes or assignments, you are encouraged to take notes, revisit the SOPs, and—if you have access—practice each workflow in a Sage Intacct sandbox or demo environment. Our goal is to give you a practical foundation you can build on, whether you're working as an in-house accountant, supporting clients as a consultant, or preparing for new career opportunities.
By the end of this course, you will be able to:
Confidently navigate Sage Intacct’s user interface and settings
Create and manage common financial transactions
Generate, customize, and save financial reports
Support your organization’s accounting operations using best practices
If you’re ready to strengthen your accounting software skills and learn one of the most in-demand financial platforms in the industry, this course is a great place to begin.
target_audience: Beginner users of Sage Intacct
Accounting professionals who are new to Sage Intacct.

courses.title: From Welfare to Wealth: Earn Online & Invest Wisely
courses.bio: Build Financial Independence on a Low Income with Legal Online Income and P2P Investing
objectives: Create a reliable online income stream using website testing, surveys, and basic creative tools — even with no prior experience.
Develop a sustainable savings system on a low income by cutting unnecessary expenses, tracking money, and using free financial tools.
Understand and implement peer-to-peer (P2P) lending strategies to grow small amounts of money into long-term passive income.
Build a realistic, step-by-step financial independence plan tailored to life on benefits or low wages in the UK or U.S., with legal and strategic safety.
requirements: Basic computer or smartphone access with an internet connection (for online work and platform access). Comfortable reading and understanding English, as most platforms and tasks are in English. Willingness to learn, take notes, and apply advice gradually — no need to rush or be perfect. No prior financial knowledge needed — this course is beginner-friendly and explains everything step by step.
courses.description:
If you're living on a low income, receiving benefits, or stuck in survival mode — this course is for you.
“Financial Independence on a Low Income” is a realistic, step-by-step guide designed to help you take control of your money, earn from home, and grow your savings using safe, legal methods — even if you're starting from rock bottom.
Whether you're in the UK or US, receiving Universal Credit, PIP, ESA, or SSI, SSDI, SNAP, EBT, or Medicaid, this course will show you how to build a quiet path to stability, independence, and freedom — without scams, burnout, or breaking the rules.
What You’ll Learn:
How to earn £50–£300/month (or more) from trusted online work platforms
How to legally earn while on benefits using permitted work rules
How to save even on a tight budget using zero-waste, minimal living strategies
How to invest safely with peer-to-peer (P2P) lending platforms starting with as little as £10/$10
How to compound your money over 2–3 years to create real passive income
How to avoid common traps, document your work clearly, and stay fully within legal boundaries
How to build your own simple, repeatable weekly system for financial control
Who This Course is For:
People living on low income or benefits in the UK or US
Individuals facing mental health challenges, disability, or long-term unemployment
Single parents, carers, digital nomads, and minimalists
Anyone tired of feeling stuck in the system and ready to build slow, quiet power
Anyone looking to escape payday loans, dead-end work, or housing stress
People who want to work smarter, not harder — from the comfort of home
You Don’t Need:
A degree
A big savings account
Fancy tools, a laptop, or expensive software
To hustle 24/7 or work 40 hours a week
To risk your benefits or your sanity
You Do Need:
Basic internet access
A smartphone or computer
A willingness to start small and stay consistent
An open mind and a quiet determination
This is a no-fluff, no-hype course designed for people who want real results over time. If you're ready to take your first steps toward financial freedom — without waiting for a miracle — then let’s begin.
target_audience: Low-income individuals in the UK or US who want to build financial independence step by step.

courses.description:
Seja muito bem vindo ao curso Planejamento tributário + Análise de Balanço/DRE, eu sou o professor Antônio Marteson e estarei com você do começo ao fim do seu aprendizado.
Decidi colocar 2 cursos no mesmo lugar pois acredito que muitas pessoas iriam gosta de ter juntos duas disciplinas relevantes no mundo dos negócios.
O curso é dividido em duas partes: 1 - Planejamento tributário 2 - Análise de Balanço e DRE.
No curso de Planejamento Tributário o foco será conhecer profundamente os regimes tributários e fazer comparações entre eles com estudos de casos complexos e cheios de detalhes para os alunos realmente aprenderem.
No curso de Análise de Balanço e DRE o foco será conhecer as demonstrações Balanço Patrimonial e DRE e aplicar técnicas de análise para chegar a conclusões assertivas sobre a posição financeira e patrimonial das empresas.


Antes de decidir por se matricular, peço que você leia abaixo, gostaria de responder algumas dúvidas frequentes.


Tem certificado?
R: Tem sim. Após o fim do curso você pode baixar.
Tem material para baixar?
R: Tem sim. Apostilas serão disponibilizadas para baixar.
Posso acessar por quanto tempo?

requirements: Bu eğitimi almak için herhangi bir ön koşul bulunmamaktadır.
courses.description:
2023 Yılında Asgari ücret ve Vergi indirimleri değişiklikleri ile Ücret Bordrosu Hazırlanması ile ilgili  tüm aşamaların sunumlar ve bordro örnekleri ile anlatımı kapsayan bir eğitimdir.
62 Konu başlığı ve 97  Video, 100 civarında Oransal Hesaplamalar  ile yapılmış örnek bordrolar,
Manuel Bordrolar ve Hazırlanan Excel bordroları, Brüt ve Net ücret bazında her türlü ek ödemler için örnek bordrolar yapılmış  ve tarafımdan anlatılmıştır.
Tüm katılımcıların İleri Bordro Uzmanı olarak kariyerlerini geliştirmesi için tüm konular ve açıklamalar yapılmaktadır.  Ayrıca Eğitim alan katılımcılar tarafından sorulacak sorular ile eğitimin tamamlanma kolaylığı sağlanmaktadır.
Eğitimin her aşamasında  Eğitmen ile temas kurulabilmektedir.
Eğitimde kolaylaştırıcı her türlü oranlama kullanıldığı için hafızanıza yerleşecek bilgiler bundan sonraki çalışma hayatınızda size kolaylık sağlayacaktır.
22.04.2021 tarihinde 7613 Sayılı Yasa ile SGK İstirahat parası ödemeleri ve işçiye ödenecek maktu ücret farkının hesaplanması için tüm bilgiler eğitimde yer almaktadır.
İleri Bordro Uzmanlığı Eğitimi, mesleki olarak tüm ihtiyaçlarınıza cevap verecek tarzda hazırlanmıştır.
Yazılımlar ile yapılan bordroları vergi indirimleri ve istisnalar ile ilgili konuları çalışanlara anlatılmasında önemli bir rehber niteliğindedir.
Her türlü vergi oranlarına göre yapılan örnek bordrolar, çarşaf bordro örnekleri, manuel (elle Bordro Hesaplama) bordro yapımları, kıdem ve ihbar tazminatı hesaplamaları, işe iadede örnek bordrolar, kümülatif gelir vergisi değişimleri ile ilgili örnek bordrolara yer verilmiştir. SGK istirahat paraları ile ilgili hesaplama ve bordroda gösterme ile ilgili örnek bordrolar sizlere yeni ufuklar açacaktır. En önemli konu ise bordro hatalarından arındırılmış kolay bordro yapma imkanı bulacaksınız.

courses.title: Aprenda a investir em IMÓVEIS e no MERCADO IMOBILIÁRIO
courses.bio: Aprenda a fazer uma análise assertiva para tomadas de decisão no Mercado Imobiliário (Aluguel, compra, venda, FII's)
objectives: Saber avaliar todas as variáveis para uma melhor decisão de compra ou aluguel de um imóvel
Princípios básicos de economia e mercado financeiro
Técnicas de negociação
Questões burocráticas ligadas a compra/venda de um imóvel
Simulação em excel de compra e locação
FII's - Fundos Imobiliários

O preço do dinheiro: Selic: a taxa básica de juros
Análises e estudos de caso: Compra a vista vs Aluguel: Análise no excel
Compra com financiamento vs Aluguel: Análise Excel
Compra com financiamento vs Aluguel: Análise Excel pt.2
Questões legais e burocráticas: Custos extras na aquisição de um imóvel
Precauções e estudos antes de comprar um imóvel
Precauções na venda de um imóvel
Conclusão do curso: Conclusão: Comprar ou alugar um imóvel?
Fundos Imobiliários (FII's): FIIs X Mercado Financeiro X Imóveis tradicionais
IFIX - Índice de Fundos de Investimentos Imobiliários

requirements: Vontade de aprender sobre o mercado imobiliário
courses.description:
Acreditamos que mais de 90% das pessoas que optam por comprar um imóvel não têm em mãos todas as variáveis necessárias para de fato efetivar uma boa compra. Além disso, uma dúvida constante é: O que é melhor? Comprar um imóvel ou viver de aluguel? Essa é uma pergunta bastante complexa de ser respondida, pois requer um conhecimento bastante abrangente sobre Economia, Mercado Financeiro e Mercado Imobiliário.
Pensando nisso, a ESFERA desenvolveu um curo exclusivo e único que ensina de maneira muito objetiva tudo o que você precisa saber para tomar a melhor decisão na hora de comprar ou alugar um imóvel. Além disso, traremos muito conteúdo a respeito de economia, questões legais e até mesmo investimentos em Fundos Imobiliários (FIIs)*.
O Curso é ministrado por Felipe Zangari, consultor Financeiro formado pela GV e com participação do Dr. Leandro Leandro Marino, advogado especialista em Direito Imobiliário.


Fundos Imobiliários (FIIs) são formas de investimento coletivo no setor imobiliário. Ao comprar cotas de um FII, o investidor se torna parte de um grupo que detém propriedades como shoppings, escritórios, galpões logísticos, entre outros. O rendimento vem do aluguel desses imóveis, distribuído periodicamente aos cotistas. FIIs oferecem a possibilidade de investir em imóveis de grande porte com liquidez e sem a necessidade de gestão direta do imóvel.
target_audience: Pessoas que têm um desejo de ter um imóvel próprio
Pessoas que desejam aprender a avaliar uma boa oportunidade de compra
Pessoas que querem aprender mais sobre investimentos em imóveis
Pessoas que desejam aprender sobre Fundos Imobiliários

courses.title: Elevating the Value of Variance Analysis
courses.bio: Facilitating better conversations about performance management
objectives: Adopt an audience-centric mindset when preparing and presenting variance analysis
•Apply best practices to variance analysis to elevate clarity and concision
Incorporate a visual sense to variances using charts, graphs, and images
Structure the analysis to facilitate a conversation about the actions management should take to address variances
requirements: Financial or accounting understanding
courses.description:
One of the most common criticisms of non-finance managers, executives, and directors is that they have difficulty understanding financial performance of their own organization. Often variance analysis is overwhelming, confusing, lacking in precision, begging more questions than it answers with superficial explanations. In this course, you will take a deep dive into how you can do variance analysis better. In the process, you will add significant value to management decision making. Variance analysis is about facilitating an active conversation among decision makers about the performance of the business. Success is achieved when issues are identified, understood, discussed and actions committed.
Using an audience centric view, you will learn best practices using examples and case studies to improve traditional variance analysis using numbers and descriptive explanations. You will also learn to make variance analysis more visual through charts, graphs and images. Finally, you will explore different structures that help facilitate a conversation about organizational performance using structuring and organized drill downs of various components of the business. This impactful course is relevant to any financial professional involved in the preparation, reporting, review, or presentation of variance analysis. Honing this skill elevates your own executive presence and the level of influence and persuasiveness inside your organization.
target_audience: Financial professionals responsible for reporting results

courses.title: Grant Writing 101: Learn the Basics for Grant Writing FAST!
courses.bio: Master the essential basics of grant writing in 5 quick and easy steps!
objectives: How to Find Grants, If You Have Money to Spare or Not! (AKA The PROSPECT)
How to Create a Go-To Master Document to Make Grant Writing a Breeze! (AKA The CASE STATEMENT)
How to Write a Grant (AKA The GRANT)
How to Write Whatever Report They Ask For (AKA The Report)
How to Engage with Funders (AKA The MONEY-MAKING RELATIONSHIP)
requirements: No skills or experience required. You will learn all the basics of what you need to know to become a grant writer!
courses.description:
Well, you've taken the plunge. You've started the project, finalized the 501(c)(3) status, formed an idea, whatever. You've got a plan and, well, in this capitalist society, you can't see it into fruition without funds. Amazingly, there are hundreds of thousands of wealthy people and organizations whose sole purpose on God's green earth is to give you free money. But HOW?! Quiet now, my dear eager learner, and listen to my tale.

I started out as a bookseller, and when the pandemic hit, the bookstore I worked at suffered. I gained my initial grant writing experience applying for pandemic relief funds. Shortly after, I was offered a grant writing job at a non-profit--with only a few months' worth of experience! With considerable ease and in no time, I was soon making them $600k+ each year in grants and became the best grant writer my 30-year-old non-profit ever had! I've applied to everything--small foundation grants, government grants, tribal grants, state grants, you name it. With my help, you'll quickly find your feet and soon will be able to write successful grants! Writing grants can be EASY--as long as you give yourself plenty of time, pay attention, and get organized. I'll give you some guidance and help you on your way to success!


What you have here is a quick, simple, and effective course to begin your grant writing journey! This course has no fluff or flourish and covers the basic essentials you'll need to start writing grants, no matter who you are! Consider this a crash course guide to grant writing, where you can learn on the go! I try to make this course as accessible and affordable as possible, with maximum discounts and minimum busy work, so anyone can learn to write and receive grants!


Note: This course has a brief overview video paired with a detailed, thorough PowerPoint presentation for each lecture. You must download the PowerPoint presentations and follow along with the videos.
target_audience: Beginner Grant Writers
Start-Up CEOs and Executive Directors
New Non-Profits
Any Organization or Group Trying to Make Ends Meet!

courses.description:
Title Curative Course – Detailed Description
The Title Curative Course is a comprehensive, industry-focused training program that prepares participants to effectively identify, analyse, and resolve defects or issues found in property titles. These title defects can disrupt or delay real estate closings, making the curative process a critical component of successful real estate transactions. The course provides learners with in-depth knowledge of title clearing procedures, legal frameworks, and document handling required to ensure clean, marketable titles.


Why This Course Matters
In today’s real estate market, title issues are common and can significantly impact property sales, refinancing, or development. Problems such as unreleased liens, missing signatures, incorrect legal descriptions, or conflicting ownership claims can derail transactions and result in financial loss or legal disputes. The title curative process involves resolving these problems quickly and accurately to allow closings to proceed without risk.


This course bridges the gap between title examination and transaction closing by teaching the "how-to" of curative work. Whether you're a new entrant to the field or an experienced professional, the course offers valuable insights that enhance your problem-solving ability and reduce liability risks for your company or clients.


What You Will Learn:
Throughout the course, learners will gain a detailed understanding and practical skills in areas such as:


Title Basics and Title Reports
Components of a title commitment (Schedule A, B-I, B-II)
Legal descriptions, vesting, encumbrances
Understanding preliminary title reports
Common Title Defects and How to Spot Them
Breaks in the chain of title
Name mismatches or misspellings
Marital status discrepancies
Undischarged mortgages or trust deeds
Forged or incorrect documents
Missing probate or estate filings
Invalid powers of attorney
Liens and Encumbrances
IRS and state tax liens
Mechanic’s liens
Homeowners Association (HOA) liens
UCC filings
Municipal code enforcement and utility liens
Judgment liens and bankruptcy notices
Legal Documents Used in the Curative Process
Corrective deeds
Affidavits (identity, heirship, death, etc.)
Releases and satisfactions
Subordination agreements
Powers of attorney
Probate documents (wills, letters testamentary)
Requesting and recording curative documents
Timelines for resolution and follow-up best practices
Finalizing and Clearing Title
Curative checklist and documentation review
Re-verification of public records
Updating title commitments
Approval from the title underwriters before closing
target_audience: Those studying real estate, finance, or related fields
Individuals considering a career switch to the mortgage industry
Mortgage Processors
Anyone seeking a career in title or escrow services
Title agents and examiners

courses.title: Peer To Peer Lending Revealed
courses.bio: Learn how peer-to-peer lending may be a source of short term funding to keep your business growing.

What Is \"P2P\" and Why is it Important?: What is P2P Lending? What does P2P Mean?
What Do You Gain From Peer-to-Peer Lending?
Best Practices, and Difference Between P: General Criteria to Attain a P2P Loan, and Your Image in the Loan Market
Traditional Bank Loans vs. P2P Loans
General Facts, Rates, and Options Concer: Fees Associated With P2P Loans, and Other Facts
Rates, Credit Scores, and How Your Reputation Relates to P2P Loans
What are the Options When it Comes to P2P Lending Platforms?
Platforms Among P2P Lenders, and Bank Lo: Is One P2P Leanding Platform Better Than Others? What's the Difference?
Pros and Cons of Banks vs Peer-to-Peer Opportunities and Why
Who Is Involved in the Process, and What: The 3 Parties: Borrower, Intermediary, and Lender
At What Point in Your Investment Journey Should You Seek Out Loans?

requirements: Student would benefit most by being a startup founder or an aspiring one
courses.description:
Peer-to-peer lending, also known as person-to-person lending, peer-to-peer investing and social lending, is a financial transaction that occurs directly between individuals without the assistance of a bank. What this model does is cut out the costs of a traditional intermediary, allowing you access to potentially cheaper loans. However, credit scores and other aspects of lending such as collateral are still important to the process.

While P2P lending might not be a source of funding to complete an entire capital round, it certainly might help complete one. It may also be a source of short term funding to keep your business growing if cash flow becomes a problem.
If you feel you need a bridge loan for a short period of time to cover operating costs, peer-to-peer lending could be utilized. Our course, "Bring Money in With P2P Lending" will give you an introduction to the way creative financing occurs. Think about how a P2P Lending site could be used strategically. Could this be a way for you to attract new followers, friends and fans? Sign up for the course today and learn from the INVESTyR DealTeam.
target_audience: Entrepreneurs and Small Business Owners

courses.title: Mastering Personal Finance
courses.bio: A Practical Guide to Confidence
objectives: Master Budgeting Skills
Build Savings and Emergency Funds
Invest with Confidence
Plan for Long-Term Financial Goals
Manage money more effectively

Investing & the Future: Life Events You Should Prepare For
The Emotional Side of Money: Quiz: The Emotional Side of Money

requirements: No prior knowledge of personal finance is required — this course is designed for beginners and intermediate learners alike.
courses.description:
Take charge of your financial future with this comprehensive, step-by-step personal finance course designed for adults at any stage of their financial journey. Whether you're just starting out or looking to strengthen your money management skills, this course provides the knowledge and tools you need to make informed, confident decisions.
We begin with the fundamentals—helping you understand your current financial snapshot, calculate your net worth, and set meaningful financial goals. From there, you'll build a solid foundation in budgeting, explore various budgeting methods, and learn practical strategies to improve your cash flow and grow your savings.
You'll gain insight into essential topics like debt management, credit scores, banking, and insurance, along with key planning tools such as estate planning, tax planning, and understanding personal finance ratios. As you advance, we’ll demystify investing, prepare you for retirement, and help you adapt your financial strategies through different life stages and events.
But personal finance isn’t just numbers—it’s also about mindset. You’ll explore how emotions, habits, beliefs, and behavioral biases influence financial decisions. Special topics like managing money as a couple, teaching kids about money, consumer awareness, and online safety bring real-life relevance to the course.
By the end, you’ll be equipped with the confidence and clarity to manage your finances and plan for a secure, empowered future.
target_audience: Adults who want to take control of their finances and build better money habits.
Young professionals, students, or anyone preparing for the financial life ahead.
Beginners with little or no prior knowledge of budgeting, saving, or investing.
Intermediate learners looking to deepen their understanding of credit, debt management, and long-term financial planning.
Couples or families seeking to manage money together effectively.

courses.title: 会計の考え方－【ビジネスパーソンの基礎教養】財務・経理部門所属ではない方がざっくりと会計の本質を学ぶ講座
courses.bio: 「売上」「利益」「コスト」「原価」　このあたりは仕事でも使うので馴染みがあるけれどそれ以上の会計の知識は・・・という方にお勧めの財務会計と管理会計をまずは大まかにとらえるための講座です。財務分析や数式はほとんど出てきません。
objectives: 売上、費用、利益、だけでなく、もう少し多面的に企業活動をとらえることができるようになる
経営陣や財務部門が発表している会社の数字の意味が分かるようになる
財務会計と管理会計の考え方の違いが分かる
財務会計上の利益と現金の動きの違いを説明できるようになる
儲けを出すためにはどうすればよいか、管理会計の視点で考えることができるようになる
会計の本質的な概念をつかむことができる
自分の仕事に置き替えて考え、自分の仕事に会計の考え方を取り入れることができるようになる

はじめに: Udemy視聴のコツ（慣れている方はスキップしていただいて構いません）
[ワーク]自分はなぜ会計を学ぶのか
テキストダウンロード

ゴーイングコンサーンのイメージ

キャッシュフローの典型的なパターン
フリーキャッシュフロー

経営のための会計の必要性

スループットで社内の費用をまかなう
スループットのイメージ
スループットの計算例
直接原価計算のポイント
[解答]and[クイズ]-儲けを出すには
日常の管理会計マネジメント
確認テスト: 【確認テスト】コースの理解度をチェックしよう

requirements: 商品を仕入れて売る、材料を買って商品を作って売る、という企業活動にイメージがわく
売上、費用、利益は分かる
courses.description:
コース説明をご覧いただきありがとうございます。
この講座内容をお読みになっているということは、あなたは少なからず「会計」について問題意識がおありなのではないかと思います。


こんな方に特にお勧めします
もし下のうちの１つでも当てはまるものがあれば、ぜひこの講座を検討ください。
自分は財務や経理などの部門ではないので数字のことには苦手意識があるけど、今後のために少しは学んでおかないとと思われている方
「売上」「利益」はなじみがあるけれど、「バランスシート」「限界利益」などはちょっとよく分からないので意味を理解したいと思われている方
管理職やリーダーとして仕事をするうえで、ビジネススキルを高めたい方
どんぶり勘定ではなくどの製品がどれだけの利益を生み出しているかをみたい事業部門・製造部門の方
これからキャリアアップしていきたいので、まずは教養として会計を学び今よりも視座高く考えることができるようになりたい方


このコースでは、あまり細かいところには立ち入らずに大まかに会計の考え方をつかむことができます。
非会計部門の方が中堅・マネジャークラスにステップアップするときに必要になってくる会計知識のレベルを想定して作りました。
財務・経理の専門職として仕事として決算書類をつくったり、投資判断に必要なスキルを得るためというよりは、専門ではないけれどもビジネスパーソンとして会計の基本や用語は押さえておきたいという方に向けた講座です。


このコースをお勧めしない方
次のような方はこのコースから得られるものが少ないかもしれませんので、受講はお勧めしません。
簿記検定試験の勉強のために学びたい方
財務や経理部門の業務のために専門的で正確な知識を身につけたい方
財務分析や財務シミュレーションを行いたい方


厳密さよりも大意をつかむことを重視していますので、正確な会計知識を求める方には不向きな講座です。
(注)考え方（概念）をつかむために一部オリジナルの用語を使って説明しているところや、イメージを誇張して細かい部分を省略しているところがあります。そのため、法やルールに基づいた正確な用語の定義や計算方法を学びたい方にはお勧めできません。申し訳ありません。


また、このコースでは財務分析やシミュレーションは扱っていませんので、それらをお求めの方は他の講座をお探しいただきますようお願いいたします。


このコースで何ができるようになるのか
このコースを受講すると、
会計や数字に苦手意識を持っていたり、「売上」「利益」以外のことはほとんど見ていないという状態
から
PL（損益計算書）だけでなくBS（貸借対照表）やキャッシュフロー計算書も読み取ることができるようになります。
利益を生み出すにはどうしたらよいのか、本当にこの打ち手は会社の利益を増やすのかといった会社全体の目線で考えることができるようになります。


コースの内容
1.はじめに
そもそも会計を学ぶことにどのような意味があるのかを考えます
2.財務会計
財務三表の読み取り方と、そこに書かれていることの意味が分かるようになります
3.管理会計
なぜ財務会計とは別の会計があるのかが分かります。損益分岐させるための打ち手が自分で導き出せるようになります。
4.終わりに
講師からの受講のお礼です
5.理解度確認テスト
この講座の理解度を確認できます


このコースはどのように進めるのか
細かい点に入らずにざっくりと会計の考え方をとらえていきます。
2時間で財務会計と管理会計の両方の大事なポイントが学べます。
一方で、財務分析や財務シミュレーション、簿記資格試験対策はこの講座には含まれていません。


最後にもう一度このコースを終えるとあなたは
非会計部門の中堅・マネジャークラスに必要なレベルの会計の基礎知識を身につけることができます。
自分の仕事に活かすことで、売上・利益だけでなくもう少し多面的に仕事をとらえることができます。
どの製品のコストを下げると会社全体の利益を一番増やすことができるのか、といった本当に仕事に直結する会計の考え方を身につけることができます。


コースご登録お待ちしております。
target_audience: これまでの仕事で会計に関わってこなかったので数字に苦手意識があるけど、これから会計の知識も必要だと思われている方
管理職やマネジャー、リーダーになるにあたってPL（損益計算）だけでなくもう少し広く会計の考え方を身につけたい・学ぶ必要があると思われている方
財務分析をすることはないけれど、財務会計や管理会計の考え方は知っておきたい方
教養として「会計の考え方」を学びたい方
中堅社員
管理職

courses.title: Art of Personal Finance
courses.bio: Learn to simply create, implement and manage your own financial reality & future.
objectives: Manage their Personal Finances and Budgets
requirements: No
courses.description:
Learn how to become a better, more accountable, responsible and financially stable version of YOU through learning to implement simple tools and creating healthy financial habits, budgets and an outlook into your financial future.
You will be guided through the process step by step, learning how to use the tools provided, why they matter, and who you are trying to become in the process.
At each step connections with other fields like art, architecture and psychology will be made to facilitate a deeper understanding of the message. We live in an interconnected world, and what we learn needs to resonate within us; otherwise a change for the better is not possible. Managing your finances, and in a way your own life, if viewed as an isolated act may feel like a chore - and it does not have to be.
Approaching this topic from multiple directions, but in a simple and coherent fashion, will improve the chance of the material actually having a positive impact in your life.
There are three main parts.
Situations & Dreams
Actions & Reality
Reflect & Spoil
The first part will teach you how to budget your year based on what matters to you. The second part will spur you to take action and show you the necessary steps and tools to take action in reality. The third part will use both of the previous parts to reflect, adjust and look forward using all that you learned. You will be able to identify steps for improvement based on your own actions, which makes this course highly actionable and personal!
target_audience: Everyone who wants lean an easy way to manage their personal finances and future

courses.title: 【腹落ち＆感動！財務諸表は感覚で理解できる】Accounting&Finance入門講座「財務三表の本質をつかむ」
courses.bio: 細かい経理の知識はなくても財務諸表のエッセンスをつかむことで会計思考を持ったビジネスパーソンになることができます。財務三表（貸借対照表・損益計算書・キャッシュフロー計算書）が有機的に連動していくのを体感することで会計の本質に迫っていきます。
objectives: 会計の基礎知識
財務三表の有機的連動
財務諸表の本質
貸借対照表の読み方・考え方
損益計算書の読み方・考え方
キャッシュフロー計算書の読み方・考え方
ケーススタディで理解する財務諸表

会計の種類と目的: 会計は大別すると３種類
損益計算書（P/L）の読み方: ３つの"率"から業界や企業の構造が見えてくる
P/Lから企業の強みや課題を見出す
ケーススタディ　解答
貸借対照表（B/S）の読み方: 企業の安全性を見る　計算
流動資産が多い会社の特徴と留意点
固定資産が多い会社の特徴と留意点
ケーススタディ　解答

投資キャッシュフロー
財務キャッシュフロー

企業のステージとキャッシュフローの関係
財務三表のつながり: 財務三表をどのように見ていくか
おわりに: 財務三表の読み方（振り返り）

requirements: 特にありません
courses.description:
財務諸表を読み解くためには仕訳などの専門的な技能は必要ありません。
会計、特にその中でも中心的なテーマとなる財務三表の本質をイメージでとらえます。
会計の本質とちょっとしたコツをつかむことで真の会計思考を持ったビジネスパーソンを目指しましょう。


★こういうことに悩んでいませんか？★
〇ビジネスパーソンの"三種の神器"の一つと言われる会計・財務について勉強してみたい
〇会計の本を読んでも全く頭に入ってこない
〇本やセミナーで表面的な理解はできているが、いまひとつ腹落ちしない
〇株式投資のために財務諸表を読めるようになりたい
〇財務三表という言葉は聞いたことがあるが、それらの詳細やつながりが分からない
〇仕事で財務諸表を見る必要が生じたのでエッセンスのみおさえておきたい
〇会計思考を身に着けたいが何から始めたらいいかわからない


これらに該当する方がおられたらぜひ受講をご検討ください。


この講座では、財務諸表（決算書）の中核となる「財務三表」のエッセンスを会計初心者にもわかりやすく説明いたします。
会計を専門としないビジネスパーソンでも真の会計思考を身につけることは可能です。
財務三表の理解を通じて、会計の本質が分かる数字に強いビジネスパーソンになりましょう。


財務三表とは
・貸借対照表
・損益計算書
・キャッシュフロー計算書
の３つをさします。

これら財務三表を作成するためには経理の専門知識が必要となりますが、活用するだけであれば特別な知識や技能は必要ありません。
必要となるのは会計の本質を見抜く力とちょっとしたコツだけです。


ここで一人有名な経営者を思い浮かべてみてください。
例えばソフトバンクの孫正義社長は独自の哲学をもとに大型企業買収を進めていますが、仕訳などの経理の細かい知識はおそらく持っていないと思います。
彼が持っているのは、会計やファイナンスに対する本質的な理解と深い洞察。そしてそれをビジネスに転用できる応用力でしょう。
孫さんのような経営者に限らず数字に強い方は総じて会計やファイナンスの本質を深く理解しています。
そして誰でも適切なトレーニングを積むことによって会計の本質を理解することは可能です。


当コースは、会計の本質を理解し数字に強くなりたいと願うあなたの伴走者になります！


このコースでは財務三表の細かい枝葉の知識はバッサリ切り落とし、本質理解に必要なエッセンスに絞って説明します。
ご受講いただくことで会計の本質が理解でき、財務三表を武器として活用できるようになります。
また、財務三表がどのように連動して動くかを時系列的に追っていくことで、それぞれの関係性や役割について
腹落ちする感覚を得られるような工夫をしております。

財務三表が互いに連携しながら動いていくのを初めて実感した時にはある種の感動を覚えます。
それは「核心の一端をつかんだ」という感動であり、それが本質理解への第一歩となります。


このコースを通じて、会計の本質と会社を数字で表現することの楽しさを皆さんと共有できればと願っております。
target_audience: 財務諸表を理解したい非会計職のビジネスパーソン

courses.title: Borsa takas analizi ile hisse seçimi
courses.bio: Teknik analiz bilgisi olanlar için takas analizini kullanarak hisse seçimi yapabileceği düzeyde bilgi içerir.
objectives: Teknik analizi verimli kullanın.
Takas analizi mantığını kavrayın.
Teknik ve Takas verilerini kullanarak işlem stratejileri oluşturun.
Eldeki verileri kullanarak doğru hisse seçimini yapabilecek seviyeye gelin.

Eğitime Başlamadan Önce: Eğitim Öncesi Ön bilgi Ve Gereksinimler
Veriler İçin Kullanılabilecek Platformlar ve Alternatifleri
Takas Analizinde Dikkat Edilecekler: Takas Analizini Teknik Analiz İle Birlikte Kullanmak
Takas Odaklı Yatırım Adımları: Tarama Sonucu Ulaşılan Hisselerin Excel Üzerinden Detaylandırılması

requirements: Eğitimden maksimum fayda sağlayabilmeniz için minimum orta düzeyde teknik analiz bilginizin olması gerekiyor.
Teknik analiz yapabileceğiniz bir platform.
Takas verilerini elde edebileceğiniz bir veri sağlayıcı.
courses.description:
Hisse seçiminde sosyal medyayı takip etmek, konuşulan hisselere göz atmak, fiyat izlemek, teknik analiz kullanmak yeterli değildir. Bundan dolayı eğitimde takas analizi ile arka planda neler döndüğünü görmemizin hisse seçiminde ne kadar önemli bir rol oynadığını uygulamalı olarak göreceğiz. Bu eğitimde teknik analizi verimli kullanmak için gereken kritik noktalara ve indikatör seçimine değindikten sonra takas analizi hakkında detaylı bir bölümle devam edeceğiz. Son olarak tüm bilgileri birleştirip hisse seçimi nasıl yapılır, bundan bahsedeceğiz. Eğitim içinde ders içeriği dışında hacim, yatırımcı psikolojisi, periyotlar, strateji gibi konulara da değinilecektir.

Eğitim sonunda tüm öğrencilerin, hiç kimseye bağlı kalmadan kendi kararıyla sağlıklı hisse seçimi yapabilmesi amaçlanmıştır.

Burada anlatacaklarım tamamen teknik analiz, Takasbank ve KAP'a açıklanmış verilere dayalı içeriklerdir.
SPK kuralları gereği kurs sırasında ve kurstan sonra kesinlikle al - sat - tut şeklinde yatırım tavsiyesi verilmeyecektir.

YASAL UYARI:
Burada yer alan yatırım bilgi, yorum ve tavsiyeleri yatırım danışmanlığı kapsamında değildir. Yatırım danışmanlığı hizmeti, aracı kurumlar, portföy yönetim şirketleri, mevduat kabul etmeyen bankalar ile müşteri arasında imzalanacak yatırım danışmanlığı sözleşmesi çerçevesinde sunulmaktadır. Burada yer alan yorum ve tavsiyeler, yorum ve tavsiyede bulunanların kişisel görüşlerine dayanmaktadır. Bu görüşler, mali durumunuz ile risk ve getiri tercihlerinize uygun olmayabilir. Bu nedenle, sadece burada yer alan bilgilere dayanılarak yatırım kararı verilmesi, beklentilerinize uygun sonuçlar doğurmayabilir.
target_audience: Borsa yatırımcıları.

courses.title: Crea Bots de Ninjatrader 8 para Cuentas de Fondeo
courses.bio: Desarrolla estrategias automáticas para NinjaTrader 8 especialmente adaptado a las cuentas de fondeo
objectives: Crear estrategias de Trading en Ninjatrader 8
Adaptar estrategias de trading para cuentas de fondeo
Evaluar tu estrategia discreccional a través de código en ninjascript
Pasar evaluaciones y conseguir ganar dinero a través de trading algorítmico
Hacer Backtesting y Optimización de tu estrategia automática

Que son Cuentas de Fondeo: Que son las cuentas de fondeo
Las Reglas de las cuentas de fondeo
Los errores más habituales del trader
Patrón Básico para Cuentas de Fondeo: Revisando las Reglas de las cuentas de fondeo en el patrón
Optimización y Backtest: Optimización de la estrategia segunda parte
Psicología: Consejos para pasar las evaluaciones y sacarle rendimiento a las cuentas

requirements: No es necesario experiencia en programación. Conocer sobre trading e indicadores será positivo. Manejar la plataforma Ninjatrader 8 será muy positivo.
courses.description:
En este curso serás capaz de programar tus propias estrategias intradía a través de la plataforma Ninjatrader 8 y adaptarlas a las cuentas de fondeo para financiarte.  Partiremos del builder de NT8 con el cual se pueden desarrollar estrategias sin programar y desde esa herramienta abriremos el código y podremos hacer las adaptaciones necesarias para que la estrategia se comporte cómo nosotros deseamos.
Es un curso pensado para principiantes, aquellas personas que se inician en el mundo del fondeo y del trading algoritmico y está pensado para dar los primeros pasos. Es de nivel iniciación, aunque no por ello fácil. No está pensado para crear estrategias muy complejas, eso depende ya del trader y hasta donde quiera llegar, para ello deberá tomar formación adicional a este curso.
Este curso además esta especialmente adaptado a las reglas de las cuentas de fondeo las cuales hay que cumplir sin excepción tanto para pasar las pruebas cómo para hacer los retiros. Con una estrategia automática, a la cual se le llama también bot, desarrollado de esta manera, podrás tener ganancias consistentes donde el esfuerzo lo pondrás en el desarrollo, optimización y testeo de la estrategia, más no tendrás que tener toda tu atención en el mercado cómo ocurre en el trading discreccional.
Trataremos los indicadores más habituales de modo práctico y por último hablaremos sobre la psicología del trader la cual es importante siempre tanto seas algorítmico cómo discrecional si bien en el algorítmico las emociones no son tan evidentes. Con el curso se te proporcionará un patrón que yo mismo uso para codificar mis estrategias además de ejemplos sencillos de estrategias con código abierto con la cual podrás hacer modificaciones y pruebas para evaluar tu nivel.
Dicho todo esto sólo aconsejar práctica y práctica, no hay otro camino a la maestría del trading en general y del algorítmico en particular.
target_audience: Traders que quieran automatizar su estrategia para futuros en cuentas de fondeo ó en sus cuentas personales
Traders que se inicien en el mundo de la creación de estrategias automatizadas en Ninjatrader 8

requirements: Excel: Beginner
courses.description:
Nine out of ten healthcare administration employees report that they wish they had learned more about revenue cycle management, healthcare finance, and big data analytics during their graduate studies. Rev Cycle Ready was created to bridge that gap. Whether you're new to the field or already working in a healthcare setting, this course equips you with the practical knowledge and tools needed to thrive in today’s data-driven, financially complex healthcare landscape.
This course takes a deep dive into the fundamental components of the healthcare revenue cycle—including RVUs, denials, write-offs, accounts receivable (AR), and reimbursement workflows—helping students understand how money flows through a healthcare organization. You’ll gain insight into how financial decisions impact operations and how revenue cycle performance ties directly to patient care quality and organizational sustainability.
In addition, students will explore the role of big data in the revenue cycle, using analytics to identify areas of opportunity, improve KPIs, and drive smarter decision-making. Through case studies, real-world examples, and hands-on exercises, you'll build confidence in key concepts that are often overlooked in traditional coursework.
By the end of this course, you’ll be better prepared to add immediate value to your organization and pursue roles in healthcare revenue cycle, operations, finance, or data analytics.
target_audience: Healthcare Administration Students
Practice Managers
Department Directors
Healthcare Administrators
Healthcare Professionals
Healthcare Leaders

courses.description:
Uma empresa é formada por profissionais das mais variadas áreas que precisam trabalhar em conjunto para que todo processo operacional e administrativo consiga atingir um determinado objetivo. E um destes papéis que precisam ser desempenhados na empresa é o de Assistente Financeiro, que acaba se tornando basicamente o responsável por auxiliar e monitorar as atividades financeiras de uma determinada empresa, instituição ou uma determinada organização.
O Assistente Financeiro auxilia em atividades da área financeira, de controle bancário e de contas, cuida do fluxo de caixa, das cobranças e investimentos, emissão de relatórios e de contas a pagar e receber, lançamento de cheques e organização de documentos. Ele também geralmente se torna o responsável por fazer transações financeiras, registros, lançamentos de valores a pagar e a receber, entre outras atividades relacionadas ao fluxo financeiro da empresa.

courses.description:
あなたは医療保険やがん保険に加入していますか？
もし加入しているなら、自分の加入している保険は自分の望む通りの保障でしょうか？
営業マンが言ったことを鵜呑みにしていませんか？
2011年に保険加入者が民間保険会社に支払った医療保険やがん保険の保険料は約5兆円。うち、保険加入者に支払われたのは『約1兆円』と言われています。
また保険会社では医療保険やがん保険は『ドル箱保険』とも言われているそうです。


この動画では公開されている統計データを使用し、感情を除いた事実だけを見て実際にはどれくらいの費用が必要なのかを計算しています。
つまり、この動画を見ることで自分に医療保険が必要なのか、どれくらいの医療保険に加入すればいいかを知ることができます。
保険会社が作成するパンフレットや資料は意図的に費用が多くかかるような印象を持たせます。
例えば、日本には健康保険制度があり、高額療養費制度があるのにも関わらず、その部分はあまり見せようとはしません。
つまり、消費者が賢くなければ保険会社が見せたいデータのみを鵜呑みし、過剰な保険に加入する結果となります。
僕は過去に200人以上の保険相談を受けてきましたが、多くの方が過剰な保険に加入し、無駄な保険料を払い続けていました。
あなたはどうでしょうか？
医療保険やがん保険について正しい知識を持つことはそれほど難しくありません。
ほんの数時間学ぶだけで正しい知識をつけることが可能です。
もし、あなたが自分の加入している保険が正しい保障かどうか自信がないのであればこの動画をみてください。
まだ保険に加入していないのであれば、自分に保険が必要なのかを学んでください。


【セクション1】
このセクションでは医療保険に加入する以前に知っておくべき健康保険の保障内容について解説しています。
健康保険をしっかりと理解することで医療保険が必要か不必要かを判断する基準を持つことができます。
また健康保険では保障されない差額ベッド代などがどれくらい必要なのかを統計データで確認します。


【セクション2】
このセクションでは日本人は平均してどれくらい入院しているのかを統計データを使いながら確認していきます。
そのデータから必要な費用を割り出し、1入院あたりどれくらいの費用を見積もっておくべきかを計算します。
このセクションで入院に対する必要な備えがどれくらいかを理解することができるようになります。


【セクション3】
このセクションでは医療保険に加入するべきなのかを今までデータを元に考えていきます。
また現状主流の医療保険である「終身医療保険」のメリットデメリットもお伝えします。
【セクション4】
このセクションではがん保険について考えてもらいます。
統計データを使いながら年齢別にがんになる確率を確認していきます。このセクションであなたはがんになる確率がそれほど高くないことを知ることになるでしょう。
【セクション5】
このセクションでは複数の統計データを使い、がんになった際の負担費用を確認していきます。
このセクションを見ることでがんになった人はどれくらい負担しているのか、平均額を知ることができます。


【セクション6】
このセクションでは医療保険やがん保険とどのように付き合っていくべきなのかを確認していきます。
医療保険やがん保険がないと治療ができないわけではありません。事実、保険に入らず治療をしている人はたくさんいます。
また見落としがちな病気以外のリスクにも触れ、どのように付き合うべきか、講師である井上はどんな医療保険に加入しているかをお伝えします。
target_audience: 医療保険に興味がある人
がん保険に興味がある人
保険を見直したいと思っている人
適切な保険に加入したいと思っている人

courses.title: Manual das Milhas: As Estratégias para Viajar de Graça
courses.bio: Aprenda como acumular pontos e milhas de forma gratuita para trocar por passagens aéreas, produtos e serviços.
objectives: Entender a estrutura básica e as funcionalidades do universo das milhas.
Conhecer diferentes programas de fidelidade e como eles se interligam.
Utilizar compras em shoppings parceiros, pagamentos de contas, abastecimento de veículos, entre outros para ganhar mais milhas.
Dominar as técnicas de transferência de pontos para milhas.
Aproveitar promoções de transferência bonificadas para maximizar os benefícios.
Analisar se é mais vantajoso acumular pontos ou milhas.
Escolher o melhor cartão de crédito conforme o perfil de gastos e benefícios.
Decidir entre compras à vista ou parceladas baseado em vantagens de acumulação de milhas.
Emitir passagens aéreas usando milhas para si e para terceiros.
Transformar milhas em dinheiro, produtos ou serviços.
Explorar benefícios adicionais dos cartões, como salas VIP, seguros de viagem, compra protegida e mais.
Aprender a obter cartões de crédito premium sem anuidade.
Acesso a um grupo exclusivo de alertas para ficar por dentro das melhores promoções e oportunidades em tempo real.
Planejar viagens utilizando estrategicamente milhas acumuladas para obter o máximo valor.
Seguir um guia passo a passo desde o início do acúmulo de pontos até a efetiva emissão de passagens e resgate de serviços.
requirements: Não há a necessidade de conhecimento prévio.
Não precisa ter conhecimentos de pontos e milhas aéreas, pois o curso aborda os fundamentos necessários para dominar as estratégias do básico ao avançado.
courses.description:
Descubra o fascinante mundo das milhas aéreas com o curso "Manual das Milhas: As Estratégias para Viajar de Graça". Neste curso completo, você aprenderá a acumular pontos e milhas de forma gratuita, explorando estratégias e técnicas para maximizar seus benefícios.


Começaremos com uma introdução ao universo das milhas, onde você entenderá a estrutura e as possibilidades que esse sistema oferece, como voar internacionalmente de graça ou com grandes descontos. Você aprenderá como acumular milhas através de suas atividades diárias, seja fazendo compras em shoppings parceiros, abastecendo seu carro, pagando contas ou usando seu cartão de crédito de forma estratégica.


Além disso, dominará a arte de transferir pontos para milhas, aproveitando promoções bonificadas e maximizando cada ponto acumulado. Também abordaremos estratégias para analisar se é melhor optar por pontos ou milhas, escolher o melhor cartão de crédito, e decidir entre compras à vista ou parceladas.


No decorrer do curso, você também aprenderá a utilizar suas milhas para emitir passagens aéreas para você e terceiros, e como transformar milhas em dinheiro, produtos ou outros serviços através de shoppings parceiros. Um roteiro detalhado do acúmulo à emissão te guiará em cada passo, garantindo que você faça o melhor uso de suas milhas.


Finalizaremos com um módulo dedicado aos cartões de crédito, onde exploraremos benefícios como salas VIP, seguros de viagem, compra protegida e como adquirir seu primeiro cartão Black sem anuidade.


Incluído no curso, você terá acesso a um grupo exclusivo de alertas, garantindo que você esteja sempre atualizado com as melhores promoções e oportunidades disponíveis.


Ao entrar no curso, você terá direito:
- Acesso vitalício ao curso e todas as futuras atualizações;
- Suporte e respostas às suas dúvidas;
- Certificado do curso;
- Garantia incondicional de 100% do valor pago no curso caso não tenha gostado do curso no intervalo de até 30 dias.


Inscreva-se agora e transforme a maneira como você viaja com o Manual das Milhas!
target_audience: Pessoas que viajam regularmente, seja por lazer ou trabalho, e desejam reduzir significativamente seus gastos com passagens aéreas.
Indivíduos interessados em maximizar os benefícios dos programas de fidelidade aérea, buscando otimizar cada ponto e milha acumulados.
Pais ou responsáveis que organizam viagens em família e querem aproveitar as melhores formas de estender seus orçamentos de viagem usando milhas.
Pessoas que desejam viajar mais, mas têm um orçamento limitado e procuram maneiras de fazer isso de forma econômica.
Profissionais que desejam entender profundamente os programas de fidelidade e cartões de crédito para aconselhar clientes ou otimizar seus próprios gastos e recompensas.
Indivíduos que estão começando a usar cartões de crédito e desejam aprender como maximizar os benefícios, como acumulação de milhas, sem cair em armadilhas financeiras.
Empreendedores e freelancers que podem aproveitar despesas comerciais para acumular milhas e reduzir custos de viagem.
Qualquer pessoa que tenha interesse em aprender mais sobre como as milhas e pontos podem ser usados para não apenas viajar, mas também para adquirir produtos e serviços.

courses.title: Writing a Winning Scholarship Application - DAAD Scholarship
courses.bio: Learn how did I won 3 Scholarships and how to prepare a competitive scholarship application
objectives: Understand the system of scholarships and choose the right scholarship program
Prepare the application documents: Motivation letter, CV, and recommendation letter
Explain the DAAD scholarship programs and the application procedure
Provide examples for the application documents

Find the right scholarship program: Find and list the suitable DAAD programs

requirements: Computer or cellphone with an internet.
courses.description:
In this class, we're going to be crafting together how to prepare a competitive scholarship application from the beginning to the end (DAAD scholarship as an example). During my journey in preparing applications for scholarships, I did not find a course that focused on all the details of applying for a scholarship. Not only the motivation letter but also all other fundamental steps that certainly make a difference such as the recommendation letters, the CV, and the procedure of the application. This course will be elaborate and supported by an example, which will be applying for one of the most prestigious scholarships worldwide, which is the DAAD scholarship. By the end of this course, you will be able to prepare a competitive scholarship application and be willing to apply properly to the program that fits your desires and existing requirements.

Lesson 2: Find the Right Scholarship Program
In this lesson, the steps of the whole process of applying for scholarships will be illustrated. This includes writing a list of the target scholarship programs, investigating the programs, and reviewing eligibility requirements. After that, we will learn how to understand the DAAD scholarship database and the different programs there. In this lesson, the difficulty that many applicants face which is to distinguish these programs and choose the right one to apply will be overcome.

Lesson 3: Find the University Program
In this lesson, we will learn how to select the right scholarship program by refining the selection. Many programs will be reviewed. There are programs that are associated with particular Universitas where no need to find a university. On the other hand, other programs are open for all disciplines and here we will learn how to find the proper University for such programs. Also, the requirements of different programs will be reviewed.
Lesson 4: The Application Documents – CV
In this lesson, we will learn how to write a professional academic CV. Many important tips, that make a difference while the assessment process, will be explained. Also, many points for professional technical writing will be highlighted. Finally, we will see the required CV for the DAAD scholarships.
Lesson 5: The Application Documents – Motivation Letter
In this lesson, we will learn how to write a motivation letter which represents a crucial step in the application process. The structure of the motivation letter will be explained. Then, writing a winning motivation letter will be elaborate in five main steps which are: Write an outline, write an introduction, expand your outline for your body, conclude your motivation letter, and proofread your motivation letter. This lesson will be supported by an example of a motivation letter that clearly illustrates the mentioned steps.
Lesson 6: The Application Documents – Recommendation Letters
In this lesson, we will learn what elements should be included in strong recommendation letters. We will also learn what questions should be answered in the recommendation letter. Then, we will have a look at what files should be sent to the recommender in order to help him/her write an excellent letter. Finally, a real example of a recommendation letter will be elaborated to make sure how all steps in the lesson should be applied.
Lessons 7 and 8: The Application Procedure
In these lessons, we will learn how all prepared documents should be submitted and the different ways of submission in different programs. Applications for the two programs that we have determined in lesson 2 will be explained as practical examples. Finally, some crucial points will be highlighted to make sure that the application we are submitting is professional and complete.
target_audience: Students who look for scholarships

courses.title: Accounting Information Systems, ERP system & Data Governance
courses.bio: Professional Development Course. Also,CMA LO's Deep Dive-Part 1- F1 Information Systems &F2 Data Governance -15% of exam
objectives: Master the Power of Accounting Information Systems: Unlock their critical role in driving value and efficiency across the business value chain.
Navigate Accounting Cycles with Confidence: Gain expertise in accounting information system cycles and general ledger processes streamline financial operations
Harness the Potential of Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP): Discover the benefits and strategic considerations of ERP systems to boost organization sucess
Drive Business Success with Enterprise Performance Management (EPM): Learn cutting-edge EPM strategies to optimize performance and achieve strategic goals.
Command Relational Databases and Management Systems: Build a strong foundation in database technologies to manage and leverage data like a pro.
Lead with Data Governance Expertise: Master essential data governance concepts to ensure data integrity, compliance, and strategic decision-making.

Introduction to Accounting Information S: Module 1 - Overview of Accounting Information Systems (AIS)
Module 3- ERP Systems and Their Integration into AIS
Case study on AiS and ERP
Accounting Information System Cycles and: Module 4 : Revenue to Cash Cycle and Expenditures Cycle
Test Your Understanding Revenue and to cash
Module 5- Production, HR, and Payroll Cycles
AI tools used in EPM: AI tools used in ERP and EMP systems

requirements: This course is for people interested in professional development credits and CMA candidates
courses.description:
Dive into the dynamic world of Accounting Information Systems & Data Governance, where cutting-edge technology meets the precision of financial management. This course is designed for professionals and learners eager to understand how modern accounting systems integrate with robust data governance to drive organizational success. Explore the critical role of Accounting Information Systems (AIS) in collecting, processing, and reporting financial data with accuracy and efficiency, while ensuring compliance with regulatory standards.
Gain a deep understanding of how AIS enhances decision-making through real-time data analysis, automates workflows, and mitigates risks in financial reporting. You’ll learn to leverage tools and technologies that streamline processes like transaction recording, auditing, and budgeting, all while maintaining data integrity. The course also delves into the essentials of data governance, equipping you with strategies to establish policies, secure sensitive financial information, and ensure data quality across systems.
With a focus on practical applications, you’ll tackle real-world challenges such as cybersecurity threats, data privacy regulations, and the ethical use of financial data. Discover how to design governance frameworks that align with organizational goals, fostering trust and transparency in an increasingly digital landscape. Through case studies and interactive exercises, you’ll develop the skills to implement AIS solutions and governance practices that future-proof your organization.
Whether you’re an accountant, IT professional, or business leader, this course empowers you to bridge the gap between technology and finance. By the end, you’ll be ready to transform financial operations, safeguard data, and lead with confidence in an era where information is power. Join us to unlock the potential of accounting systems and governance, and take your career to the next level!
