courses.title: Probability-The Engine of Inference
courses.bio: Mastering Uncertainty and Decision-Making through Probability and Statistics
objectives: Define key concepts of probability, including randomness, sample space, and event probabilities.
Explain the relationship between probability and statistics and how probability is used to make inferences about populations.
Apply probability principles to solve real-world problems, such as calculating expected outcomes and making decisions under uncertainty.
Analyze situations involving risk and uncertainty, and determine the likelihood of various outcomes.
Evaluate different probabilistic models and assess the validity of inductive reasoning in various contexts.
Create structured decision-making processes that incorporate probability to manage uncertainty in practical scenarios.

ON - Practice Problems: 1811 Coin Flip Expected Value-Even & Uneven Odds & Coin

requirements: Basic Math Skills: Students should have a foundational understanding of algebra, including working with fractions, percentages, and solving simple equations.
Logical Thinking and Problem-Solving Skills: Students should be comfortable analyzing problems and thinking critically to apply mathematical concepts to real-world scenarios.
Interest in Data and Decision-Making: A curiosity about how probability and statistics apply to everyday situations and decision-making processes will enhance the learning experience.
courses.description:
Dive into the world of probability and statistics in this dynamic course that explores the mathematical foundations behind decision-making under uncertainty. Beginning with the basics, we define probability as a measure of likelihood and its relationship to statistics. The course delves into key concepts like inductive reasoning, where generalizations are made from specific data points, and introduces probability as the driving force behind statistical inferences.
Through engaging with real-world examples and thought experiments, students will uncover how our intuition can mislead us in situations involving randomness and learn the significance of experiments and trials in estimating probabilities. The course also introduces Pascal’s Wager, using it as a springboard to explore expected value, and guides students through concepts such as complementary, independent, and mutually exclusive events.
A major focus is placed on understanding sample spaces and event probabilities to predict outcomes, and the role of the expected value in evaluating risks. Finally, the course explores the central limit theorem, showing why larger sample sizes yield more reliable results in both theory and practice. By the end of the course, students will be equipped with the tools and confidence to apply probabilistic thinking and statistical analysis to complex, real-life problems, offering a fresh perspective on how numbers drive the future. This course is ideal for those seeking to understand how probability informs decisions in everything from games of chance to critical life choices.
target_audience: Students and Lifelong Learners: Anyone curious about understanding how probability and statistics shape decision-making and predictions in everyday life and various fields.

Professionals in Data-Driven Fields: Individuals working in industries such as finance, business, economics, marketing, or healthcare who want to improve their ability to assess risk, forecast outcomes, and make data-driven decisions.
Aspiring Data Scientists and Analysts: Those looking to build a strong foundation in probability as a key component of statistical analysis, machine learning, and data science.
Educators and Teachers: Teachers and educators who want to deepen their understanding of probability to improve their teaching methods and explain complex concepts to students.

General Enthusiasts: People interested in mathematics, logic, and problem-solving who want to explore the fascinating world of probability and how it informs everything from games of chance to critical decisions.

courses.description:
Indian Banking Fundamentals: Your Ultimate A-Z Guide (2025 Edition)
In today's fast-paced world, understanding the banking sector is more crucial than ever. Yet, most traditional education systems fail to equip individuals with practical knowledge of how banking works, leaving many unaware of their financial rights, banking services, and regulatory frameworks.
This course changes that.
Welcome to “Indian Banking Fundamentals: The All-in-One A-Z Guide (2025)”, your comprehensive learning path to understanding the Indian Banking System from scratch. Whether you are a customer, aspiring banking professional, business owner, or preparing for banking exams, this course is tailored to equip you with in-depth insights and practical knowledge of the banking ecosystem in India.
We’ll cover everything from the role of banks, customer-bank relationships, and deposit products to business loans, RBI regulations, digital banking, and more. By the end of this course, you will confidently navigate banking operations, financial products, loan procedures, regulatory policies, and digital banking innovations with ease.
Why Should You Enroll in This Course?
1. Learn from a Banking Industry Veteran with 40+ Years of Experience
Your instructor, Murali Krishna Vepachedu, is a retired Assistant General Manager from State Bank of India (SBI) with over 35 years of core banking experience and 15 years of experience as a banking trainer. His vast expertise spans Retail Banking, Treasury Operations, Audit, Forex, and Banking Compliance, making him the perfect mentor to simplify complex banking concepts for you.
You’ll gain real-world insights, industry best practices, and practical banking knowledge directly from someone who has spent a lifetime in the banking industry.
2. Real-World Case Studies and Practical Examples
The course is enriched with real-world examples, case studies, and practical illustrations to make banking concepts easy to understand and apply. Whether it’s understanding RBI regulations, opening bank accounts, retail loans, business loans, or digital banking, you’ll gain first-hand knowledge on how banks actually operate.
3. Updated Curriculum Reflecting Current Banking Trends (2025 Edition)
The Indian Banking System is rapidly evolving with new technologies, digital banking, fintech partnerships, and policy changes. This course is constantly updated to reflect the latest changes in banking regulations, RBI guidelines, fintech services, and emerging trends, ensuring you stay ahead of the curve.
4.  Structured Learning with Practical Insights
The course is carefully structured into 18 easy-to-understand sections, allowing you to systematically build your knowledge from fundamentals to practical applications. Every module contains:
Practical Tips for dealing with banks.
Hands-on insights from real banking operations.
Downloadable resources to enhance your learning. (Section-wise comprehensive writeups totaling over 400 pages and 104 website URLs of Websites of various organizations connected to Indian Banking.
Real-world examples for practical understanding.
5.  Comprehensive Support and Q&A Sessions
We understand learning complex banking concepts can be challenging. That’s why you’ll have access to personalized feedback, Q&A sessions, and active discussion forums where you can ask questions, connect with fellow learners, and get direct guidance from the instructor.
What Will You Learn in This Course?
By the time you complete this course, you’ll gain:
1. Clear Understanding of the Indian Banking System
Learn the structure and functioning of Public Sector Banks, Private Sector Banks, Regional Rural Banks, Cooperative Banks, Small Finance Banks, and Payment Banks.
Understand the pivotal role of the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) in regulating the banking sector.
Learn how the banking system supports India’s economic growth and financial inclusion.
2. Banking Operations and Account Handling
Learn deposit products like savings accounts, fixed deposits, current accounts, NRI accounts, and special deposit schemes.
Understand the step-by-step process of opening bank accounts and the documentation required under KYC (Know Your Customer) guidelines.
Learn how banks manage cash deposits, withdrawals, cheque clearing, unclaimed deposits, and operational aspects of banking.
3. Retail and Business Loans
Master the concepts of Home Loans, Vehicle Loans, Education Loans, and Personal Loans.
Learn the regulatory requirements and practical steps for securing Business Loans, Working Capital Loans, Loans Against Property, and MSME loans.
Understand the loan sanctioning process, loan terminology, and security requirements.
4. Non-Fund-Based Banking Facilities
Explore essential products like Bank Guarantees, Letters of Credit, and Foreign Exchange Services.
Learn how businesses use these facilities for trade finance, exports, and cross-border transactions.
5. Customer Rights and Grievance Redressal
Understand your rights and responsibilities as a banking customer.
Learn the process of grievance redressal, dispute resolution, and escalation mechanisms in banks.
Discover how to lodge complaints with Banking Ombudsman and other regulatory authorities.
6. Digital Banking and Fintech Innovations
Learn how digital banking services like internet banking, mobile banking, and UPI (Unified Payments Interface) are revolutionizing banking in India.
Understand the growing role of fintech companies, digital wallets, and banking aggregators in today’s financial ecosystem.
7. Government-Sponsored Schemes and Agricultural Finance
Gain knowledge about PMEGP, Mudra Loan Scheme, SHG-Bank Linkage, PMJDY, and other government schemes aimed at financial inclusion.
Learn about Agricultural Loans, Crop Loans, Kisan Credit Cards, and financing opportunities for farmers and agribusinesses.
Who Should Take This Course?
This course is perfect for:
Banking Aspirants: Preparing for banking exams, interviews, and certification programs like CAIIB, JAIIB, IBPS PO, IBPS Clerk, or SBI PO.
Working Professionals: Those working in the financial sector who wish to deepen their understanding of banking operations and regulations.
Entrepreneurs & Business Owners: Looking to understand banking products like business loans, working capital, forex services, and credit facilities.
General Public/Customers: Those who want to become financially literate, deal confidently with banks, and understand their banking rights.
What Sets This Course Apart?
Practical Knowledge: Instead of just theories, you’ll get real-world insights based on the instructor’s 40+ years of banking experience.
Industry Best Practices: Learn how banking really works in day-to-day operations.
Simplified Learning: Complex banking terms and regulations are broken down into easy-to-understand language.
Q&A Support: Get direct guidance and answers to your questions from the instructor.
Up-to-Date Content: Stay updated with the latest trends in digital banking, RBI guidelines, fintech partnerships, and financial regulations.
Course Outcomes
By the end of this course, you will be able to:
Confidently interact with banks for personal or business needs.
Understand financial products, loans, and deposit accounts in-depth.
Prepare effectively for banking exams and interviews with practical knowledge.
Leverage digital banking and fintech services to improve your banking experience.
Navigate regulatory frameworks, RBI guidelines, and customer service mechanisms with ease.
This is not just a theoretical course — it’s a transformational learning experience that will empower you with practical banking knowledge, career-building skills, and real-world applications.
So don’t wait — enroll today and take your first step towards mastering the basics of Indian Banking System!

courses.title: Mastering Statistical Tools for Financial Analytics
courses.bio: Unlock the power of data analysis with statistical tools that turn numbers into insights, enhancing your decision-making
objectives: Understand and apply key statistical tools, including trimmed mean, geometric mean, mode, and standard deviation.
Gain proficiency in using functions like sum product and sum if to aggregate data under conditions.
Learn how to apply mathematical transformations such as exponential, absolute, and logarithmic functions.
Develop practical skills in analyzing and interpreting data using real-world examples and exercises.
requirements: No prior experience with statistical tools is required for this course. However, students should be comfortable with basic data manipulation and have a general understanding of Excel or a similar tool for performing calculations.
courses.description:
Course Introduction:
In the world of data analysis, understanding and applying the right statistical tools is key to drawing meaningful insights. This course, Mastering Statistical Tools for Financial Analytics, will equip students with the fundamental statistical concepts and techniques needed to process and interpret data. Whether you are working with large datasets or trying to make sense of smaller data sets, this course will provide you with practical tools to help you summarize, analyze, and visualize your data. From central tendency measures like mean and mode to advanced statistical methods like standard deviation and logarithmic calculations, you'll gain a solid foundation in using statistical tools for effective data analysis.
Section-wise Write-up:
Section 1: Introduction to Statistical Tools
The course begins with an introduction to essential statistical tools. Students will learn the importance of statistical analysis in understanding data and decision-making. The first lecture focuses on the role of statistical tools and how they are applied to real-world problems. This section sets the stage for deeper exploration of specific statistical measures and their relevance to analyzing data.
Section 2: Getting Started with Statistical Tools
In this section, students will dive into specific statistical tools used to summarize and analyze data:
Trimmed Mean: This lecture covers how trimmed means help in removing outliers from the data to provide a more accurate representation of the central tendency.
Geometric Mean: Learn how the geometric mean is used to find the average rate of growth or return over time, particularly in finance or growth data analysis.
Mode: Students will explore the mode, the measure of the most frequently occurring value in a dataset.
Max and Min Value: An essential part of any dataset is knowing the maximum and minimum values. This lecture explains how these are used to summarize data and assess ranges.
Standard Deviation: Learn how to calculate and interpret standard deviation, which measures the spread of data around the mean.
Sum Product and Sum If: These tools are used for aggregating data under specific conditions. This lecture demonstrates how to apply these functions in spreadsheets and statistical software.
Exponential, Absolute, and Log Functions: Students will gain an understanding of these mathematical functions and how they can be used to transform data, analyze growth patterns, and handle skewed distributions.
Section 3: Example Applications
This section takes the concepts learned in the previous lectures and applies them through examples:
Example 1: A practical example using trimmed mean to clean data and find central tendencies.
Example 2: Applying the geometric mean to calculate the average growth rate over multiple periods.
Example 3: Using the mode, max, and min values to analyze a dataset of survey results.
Example 4: Demonstrating the use of standard deviation and sum product in a real-world business scenario to assess variability and aggregate data under conditions.
Conclusion:
By the end of this course, students will have mastered essential statistical tools that can be applied to a wide range of data analysis tasks. From understanding basic concepts like mean and mode to using more advanced techniques like standard deviation and logarithmic functions, students will be prepared to handle diverse data challenges in professional settings.
target_audience: Finance and Accounting Students: Those pursuing a career in finance, accounting, or taxation. The course provides a foundational understanding of a key area in tax law, essential for anyone considering a career in these fields.
Data analysts looking to build foundational skills in statistical tools.
Business professionals and managers who need to interpret data effectively.
Students or beginners in the field of data analysis or statistics.

courses.title: SMMM - SGS Video Serisi 1 - Muhasebe Denetimi
courses.bio: 1- Muhasebe Denetimi
objectives: Kapsamlı ve kaliteli bir video eğitim setine sahip olacaksınız.
Gerek görüntü kalitesi gerek geniş konu anlatım içerikleriyle tüm konulara dair bilgi birikiminiz artacaktır.
Özellikle eğitmenlerimizin yazarak yaptığı anlatım sizlerde yüz yüze eğitim hissi yaratacak.
SMMM - SGS- Muhasebe Denetimi Alanında Tam Donanımlı Bir Bilgiye Sahip Olacaksınız.

Muhasebe Denetimi: Denetimde belirli kalemler için dikkate alınması gereken özel hususlar

requirements: Finansal Muhasebe - Muhasebe Denetimi - Maliyet Muhasebesi - Mali Tablolar Analizi derslerinde bilgi sahibi olmasanız bile SGS için tüm bilgileri eksiksiz bir şekilde sizlere açıklayıcı anlatımlarla sunacağız.
courses.description:
SMMM - SGS Video Serimizin Konu Anlatım Paket İçeriği;
Muhasebe Denetimi - 23 Video Ders
Finansal Muhasebe - 36 Video Ders
Maliyet Muhasebesi - 21 Video Ders
Mali Tablolar Analizi - 15 Video Ders
Muhasebe Standartları - 26 Video Ders


İş Hukuku - 11 Video Ders
Meslek Hukuku - 11 Video Ders
Borçlar Hukuku - 29 Video Ders
Ticaret Hukuku - 44 Video Ders
Vergi Hukuku - 33 Video Ders
Ekonomi ve Maliye - 22 Video Ders


Toplam 275 Video Dersten oluşan ve SMMM - Staj Başlatma Sınavı (SGS) için eksiksiz konu anlatım setinin ilk serisi Muhasebe Denetimi video kursunu sunuyoruz.
Genellikle bir (1) ders saati ortalama 40- 50 dakika uzunluğundadır. (Bazı dersler 30-35 dakika bazı dersler 60-75 dakika aralığında olabilir. Konu bütünlüğü bozulmaması için kısa ve uzun çekimler yapılmıştır.)
Derste anlatılan notlar ya da ek kaynaklar pdf olarak sisteme yüklenecektir.
Video dersler ile ilgili bir problem yaşadığınız anda bizlere sitemiz üzerinden canlı destek alanımızdan ya da yine anasayfamızda yer alan whatsapp destek hattımızdan ulaşabilirsiniz. (İster sorubankasinet ister smmmuzemcom üzerinden bizlere ulaşabilirsiniz.)
SGS Hazırlık sürecinizde kaliteli ve kapsamlı bir içeriğe sahip konu anlatım video eğitimlerimizle kısa sürede eksiklerinizi kapatabilecek ve özel ders niteliğinde 4K SGS Video Eğitim Derslerimizle sınavda başarıya daha yakın olacaksınız.
Eğitmenlerimiz 15 yılı aşkın süredir SMMM - SGS alanında Türkiye'nin belirli illerinde eğitim verdikleri için uzman ve sınav sistemine hakimdirler.
target_audience: SMMM - SGS alanında sınava hazırlanan adaylar için çok güzel nitelikli bir eğitim.

How your unconscious mind dictates your: How to recognize your own patterns

Living your live with natural flow for money - audio
What you will notice during your success: What you will notice and what you will feel
Getting the most from your audios

requirements: Download audio training's
Follow specific instructions
Dedicate time to listen to audios
courses.description:
If you would like to unblock your limitations , clear old thinking and super charge your success ( yes even if you are learning hypnosis and want to master it ) this 60 day challenge is the start !
Maybe this is you or you know someone like it . You strive for success in anything , you get so far and something happens ..... You hit a wall or you lose the motivation . Yes its unfair isn't it , you have all the hope and attitude to do great then this happens .
So what is this . Let me introduce you to your imprint stage
This is the stage as a child where everything is up for grabs ( goals and aspirations ) . Your environment ( inducing your parents ) put into motion what the world is like , and in a round about way , imprint their beliefs and how they view the world on you .
Then essentially you become this . Now I'm sure you have heard this before so lets move onto how this sabotages you NOW...
Your unconscious mind develops your inner thoughts around this : maybe you heard from your dad “ money is hard to come by “ “ money doesn't grow on trees “ maybe from your mum she said “ stick with a 9-5 job and be safe” . All of these stick inside your mind . You could probably think of statements you often heard and i invite you to think of your issue in your life now and notice that they reflect these statements you have heard before.
So what is the solution ? YOU NEED TO CLEAR THESE !
How do we clear them ? Its actually quiet simple . We use the language that can instantly erase these ideas .
Here's the kicker you don't even have to know exactly what they are , you just have to be aware that something isn't exactly the way you want it , maybe finances , love , confidence etc .
target_audience: For any students wanting to understand the mind
Students who want to have a flow of success in life
Students wanting to increase success and income
Students ho want to overcome hurdles in life

I have been told over the years these techniques or ritual, whatever you want to call it, by women who have been practicing them long before the Law of Attraction was even mentioned. I have learned about those techniques at times when I was in financial worries, knee deep in debts and stressed from counting every penny.
I didn't learn about all of the rituals all at once. This happened over a few years and this is what happened over those few years:
I did start to never run out of money even when I was absolutely sure that this is it - I have hit rock bottom
Money always happen to find its way to me whenever I need them
I found out that money is just a number after money became just a number
I sleep well at night, worry-free about my finances
I found out that gratitude is felt with tears of gratitude in your life and I found that out while playing the blessing game
This is why I am here today to teach you how to take care of your money so that they take care of you.
The techniques you'll learn about are very easy to do, yet they send a powerful message to the Universe and the Universe listens. Let's get started.

courses.description:
Description


Take the next step in your career! Whether you’re an up-and-coming professional, an experienced executive, aspiring manager, budding Professional. This course is an opportunity to sharpen your working capital management capabilities, increase your efficiency for professional growth and make a positive and lasting impact in the business or organization.
With this course as your guide, you learn how to:
All the basic functions and skills required for working capital management.
Transform planning of working capital, financing of working capital needs. The financing mixes. Credit risk management. Cash management and cash planning, cash flow forecasting and treasury management.
Get access to recommended templates and formats for the detail’s information related to Working capital management
Learn useful case studies, understanding receivables management, factoring, inventory management. Integration of working capital and capital investment process, Working capital management practices in India.
Invest in yourself today and reap the benefits for years to come.


The Frameworks of the Course
Engaging video lectures, case studies, assessment, downloadable resources and interactive exercises. This course is created to Learn about Working capital Management, planning of working capital, financing of working capital needs. The financing mix. Credit risk management.
Inventory management and the cash management and cash planning will help you to understand the details about the different aspects of the cash management. Factors determining the cash balances. Cash balance and the futures and options.
The course includes multiple Case studies, resources like formats-templates-worksheets-reading materials, quizzes, self-assessment, film study and assignments to nurture and upgrade your Working capital management.
In the first part of the course, you’ll learn the details of the Working capital management, planning of working capital, Financing of working capital needs, the financing mix. Credit risk management.
In the middle part of the course, you’ll learn how to develop a knowledge managing collection and the disbursement of working capital, cash management, cash planning. Cash flow forecasting and Treasury management. Receivables management.
In the final part of the course, you’ll develop the knowledge related to the factoring, Inventory management. Integration of Working capital and Capital investment Process. Working capital management practices in India.

Working Capital Management Process
Working Capital Management case study
Working Capital Management templates


Working Capital Management
Working capital management involves overseeing a company's operational liquidity, ensuring that it has enough short-term assets to cover its short-term liabilities. The goal is to maintain a balance between current assets and liabilities to support the day-to-day operations efficiently. Here are some key aspects of working capital management:
Components of Working Capital:
Current Assets: These are assets that are expected to be converted into cash or used up within one year. Examples include cash, accounts receivable, and inventory.
Current Liabilities: These are obligations that are due within one year, such as accounts payable and short-term debt.
Key Metrics:
Current Ratio: It's the ratio of current assets to current liabilities. A ratio above 1 indicates that a company has more assets than liabilities in the short term.
Quick Ratio (Acid-Test Ratio): This ratio excludes inventory from current assets to provide a more conservative measure of a company's ability to meet its short-term obligations.
Cash Management:
Efficient management of cash is crucial. This involves optimizing cash inflows and outflows, monitoring daily cash positions, and having effective cash forecasting.
Accounts Receivable Management:
Balancing credit terms with customers to ensure timely payments.
Implementing effective invoicing and collection processes.
Inventory Management:
Balancing the costs of holding inventory with the need to avoid stockouts.
Employing techniques like just-in-time (JIT) inventory management to minimize holding costs.
Accounts Payable Management:
Negotiating favorable payment terms with suppliers without harming relationships.
Ensuring timely payments to take advantage of any available discounts.
Working Capital Financing:
Identifying appropriate short-term financing options to cover any shortfalls.
Balancing the cost of financing with the benefits of having enough liquidity.
Risk Management:
Identifying and managing risks associated with working capital, such as currency risk or interest rate risk.
Continuous Monitoring and Improvement:
Regularly reviewing and adjusting strategies based on changes in business conditions.
Utilizing technology and automation to streamline processes and enhance efficiency.
Industry and Seasonal Variations:
Recognizing that working capital needs may vary by industry and can be influenced by seasonal factors.
Efficient working capital management is crucial for the smooth day-to-day operations of a business. It ensures that a company can meet its short-term obligations while also having the necessary resources to invest in growth opportunities. Striking the right balance is key to maintaining financial health and sustaining long-term success.
target_audience: Professionals with working capital management knowledge and also having the knowledge of cash management and cash planning. who wants to see themselves well established in the Working capital management

courses.title: Oil and Gas Operations Accounting in Canada
courses.bio: Oil & Gas Accounting Essentials: A Guide for Non-Industry Accountants
objectives: Understand the life cycle of the upstream oil and gas industry and how its organizational structures are designed to support each phase of exploration and p
Identify and differentiate the main sources of revenue in the upstream oil and gas industry.
Explain the different types of royalties in the upstream oil and gas sector.
Understand how operating expenses are calculated in the oil and gas industry, including the importance of cost allocations, 13th month adjustments, and netback
Explain capital expenditures in the upstream oil and gas industry, including how AFEs, tax pools, and performance metrics are managed.
Grasp the fundamentals of joint venture accounting, including the sharing of costs, revenues, and financial responsibilities between partners in oil and gas ope
Explain the unique characteristics and challenges of oilsands production, including its environmental, financial, and technological considerations.
requirements: It is recommended that learners have basic accounting skills
courses.description:
Despite its controversial reputation, oil and gas remains one of the world’s most vital industries – and Canada, home to the world’s third-largest oil reserves, plays a significant role in this sector. In any business, key decisions are often driven by operational factors. Therefore, to effectively contribute to the decision-making process, it’s crucial for all participants – including accountants – to understand the operational aspects of the business.
This course is designed primarily for accountants transitioning from other industries, though it’s also valuable for non-accountants who want to gain a foundational understanding of the upstream oil and gas industry. To effectively navigate oil and gas operations accounting, it’s essential to comprehend the flow of revenues, royalties, expenses, and capital, all of which will be covered in this course.
The course is organized into seven lessons:
Lesson 1: An introduction to the oil and gas business, including its life cycle and organizational structures.
Lesson 2: A dive into the various types of revenue common to oil and gas companies, such as production revenues, royalty income, and other sources of income.
Lesson 3: An overview of royalties, including crown, freehold, and gross overriding royalties.
Lesson 4: A detailed look at operating expenses, covering cost allocations, 13th month adjustments, and netback calculations.
Lesson 5: A focus on capital costs, including AFEs, penalties and payouts, tax pools, and performance metrics.
Lesson 6: An introduction to joint venture accounting within the oil and gas industry.
Lesson 7: A specialized lesson on the oilsands, offering insights into the unique aspects of this sector.
target_audience: This course was designed primarily for accounting professionals from other industries who want to gain an understanding of upstream oil and gas operations accounting

Neste curso você aprenderá técnicas para desenvolver o seu Trabalho de Conclusão de Curso (TCC). Por meio de vídeos rápidos e unidades fundamentais, o estudante estará apto a escolher um tema de pesquisa, desenvolver uma introdução, referencial teórico, procedimentos metodológicos, resultados e a conclusão. O curso traz várias dicas e ferramentas que irá facilitar esse processo, por meio de vídeos rápidos que podem ser assistidos em seu celular, laptop, computadores desktop e demais aparelhos tecnológicos. courses.title: Payrolling Benefits – Get Ready for the 2026 Mandate
courses.bio: A Step-by-Step Guide for Employers to Transition to Mandatory Payrolling of Benefits and Stay HMRC Compliant
objectives: Understand the UK’s 2026 payrolling benefits mandate.
Learn the advantages of payrolling benefits compared to P11D reporting
Gain practical knowledge on implementation, compliance, and payroll software compatibility
Be equipped with templates and best practices for employee communication and HMRC compliance

Introduction to Payrolling Benefits: The Difference Between Payrolling Benefits & P11Ds
Getting Your Business Ready for Payrolli: Registering for Payrolling Benefits with HMRC
Impact on Tax Codes & National Insurance

requirements: Basic understanding of UK payroll
courses.description:
Starting April 2026, the UK government is making payrolling benefits mandatory, replacing the traditional P11D reporting for most taxable benefits. This major change will require employers to process taxable benefits through payroll in real-time, ensuring that tax is deducted at the point of payment rather than being adjusted at year-end.
This course is designed to help payroll professionals, HR managers, accountants, and business owners successfully transition to payrolling benefits while maintaining full HMRC compliance. Whether you're managing payroll in-house or on behalf of clients, this course will provide you with step-by-step guidance, practical tools, and expert insights to navigate this transition smoothly.
What You’ll Learn:
Understand the 2026 Mandate – What’s changing and why payrolling benefits is becoming mandatory.
How to Register for Payrolling Benefits – Step-by-step guidance on enrolling with HMRC.
Payroll Software Requirements – Ensuring your payroll system is compliant and ready.
Employee Communication Best Practices – How to inform staff and handle common concerns.
Handling Adjustments & Corrections – Managing benefit changes mid-year and correcting errors.
Compliance & HMRC Audits – Record-keeping and preparing for inspections.
This course is structured for practical learning, providing downloadable templates, checklists, and real-world examples to help you implement payrolling benefits with confidence and efficiency.
By the end of this course, you’ll have a clear roadmap for compliance, reducing administrative burdens, preventing costly errors, and ensuring a smooth transition to payrolling benefits before the April 2026 deadline.
target_audience: employers and payroll professionals

courses.title: Investment Appraisal / Capital Budgeting (CIMA P2 / ACCA FM)
courses.bio: Investment appraisal (especially focusing on net present value)
objectives: Apply the following for decision-making: a. Relevant cash flows b. Non-financial information
Explain: a. Investment decision making process b. Discounting c. Capital investments as real options
Apply the following to evaluate projects: a. Payback b. Accounting rate of return c. IRR d. NPV e. Discounted payback f. MIRR
Apply capital rationing, sensitivity analysis and asset replacement cycles

Investment Appraisal: Time value of money and discounted payback period
NPV question with relevant cash flows
NPV and working capital, Pros and cons of NPV
Annual equivalent cash flow and asset replacement cycle
Sensitivity analysis and Monte Carlo Simulation
Post completion audit, perpetuities and changing discount rates

requirements: Basic knowledge of compounding and discounting
courses.description:
In this comprehensive course, participants will delve deeply into the realm of capital budgeting, also known as investment appraisal. Through a structured curriculum, learners will gain proficiency in a range of essential techniques crucial for effective financial decision-making in business ventures. This course is ideal for candidates pursuing CIMA subject P2 or ACCA subject FM.
The course begins by elucidating fundamental concepts such as the payback period, which measures the time required for an investment to recoup its initial outlay. Participants will then progress to more advanced methodologies, including the discounted payback period, which adjusts for the time value of money, and the accounting rate of return, which evaluates profitability based on accounting profits relative to the initial investment.
A central focus of the course is the thorough exploration of net present value (NPV), a cornerstone of capital budgeting that factors in the time value of money to determine the present value of future cash flows. Participants will learn to calculate NPV and its variations, understanding how to incorporate adjustments for tax implications, inflationary pressures, and fluctuations in working capital.
Moreover, the curriculum extends beyond basic techniques to encompass nuanced topics such as capital rationing, wherein investment opportunities are evaluated and prioritized within budget constraints. Learners will also gain insights into asset replacement cycles, essential for optimizing capital allocation and maintaining operational efficiency.
Furthermore, the course equips participants with the analytical tools for conducting sensitivity analysis, enabling them to assess the impact of changing variables on investment outcomes and make informed strategic decisions.
In addition to mastering traditional capital budgeting techniques, this course provides participants with a valuable introduction to real options theory—a cutting-edge approach to investment analysis that accounts for the flexibility and strategic decision-making inherent in uncertain environments. Real options theory extends beyond traditional discounted cash flow models by acknowledging the value of managerial flexibility to adapt and capitalize on future opportunities or mitigate risks. Participants will explore how real options theory applies to various business scenarios, such as the option to expand operations, defer investment, or abandon projects based on evolving market conditions. By integrating real options theory into their analytical toolkit, participants will be empowered to make more robust investment decisions that not only optimize financial returns but also position their organizations to thrive amidst uncertainty and volatility in today's dynamic business landscape.
target_audience: Management Accounting and Financial Management students. Primarily for CIMA P2 and ACCA FM students.

courses.description:
中小企業診断士試験において、財務・会計は絶対に避けて通ることが許されない超重要科目となります。
一方で、非常に範囲が広いことや、暗記だけでは対応できないことから、苦手とする受験生が多い科目でもあります。


「財務・会計を制する者は、診断士試験を制する」と言われることもあります。


この講座は、そんな財務会計科目への苦手意識をとりはらうことで、多くの受験生が中小企業診断士へのパスポートを手に入れてほしい。
そんな想いで作成しました。


■講座のコンセプト
この講座のコンセプトは、基本事項の徹底的な反復学習です。


この科目で、得点を安定させるために必要なことはとてもシンプルです。
それは「基本事項をしっかりと理解したうえで、定着するまで何度も繰り返し学習すること」。


中小企業診断士試験においては、会計士試験や税理士試験で問われるようなマニアックな問題は少ないとはいえ、数年に一度しか出題されないような些末な論点も少なからず出題されます。


思い切って、そのような論点は放置しましょう。
そして、出題頻度の高い基本事項をしっかりと理解して、何度も何度も繰り返してください。


それだけで、財務・会計試験は軽く6割を超えることができるようになります。


■このような方にご受講いただきたいです
・短期間で財務・会計をモノにしたい方
・模試や過去問を解いても、解ける時と解けないときの得点の振れ幅が大きく、本試験で確実に得点できるか不安な方
・2次試験をみすえて会計分野の足腰を強化したい方
・診断士受験予定はないが、経営に必要な財務・会計知識を習得したい方


このような悩みを抱えている方はぜひご受講ください。

courses.description:
Kursun öncelikli amacı bu meslek hakkında hiçbir bilgisi olmayan ve bu meslekte hiçbir tecrübesi olmayanların zorlanmadıkları bir başlangıç yapabilmesidir. Bu nedenle ilk etaplar mesleğin giriş düzeyindeki bilgilerinden oluşur. Kademe kademe konular da içeriklerde seviye artacak ve sonunda ileri düzey konularla tamamlanacaktır. Zamanla bunu sizde hissedecek ve eğitimi izlerken keyif alacaksınız. Eğitimden keyif almanız öğrenmenizi de garanti altına alacak en önemli teminattır. Daha kolay öğrenebilmeniz için farklı tekniklerde deneyeceğim. Umarım güzel bir eğitim olur ve sizlere şans getirir.


Eğitim içeriği nasıl olacak?


ÖN MUHASEBE EĞİTİMİ
Ön Muhasebe Eğitimleri 2 kur üzerinden yapılmaktadır.
A1 Seviyesi (Sıfır Bilgi-Temel Düzey )
A2 Seviyesi (İleri Düzey)
EĞİTİMDE HANGİ PROGRAMLAR KULLANILIYOR?
Zirve
Logo Start
Paraşüt
Mikro
Luca
* Programlar zaman içerisinde her hangi bir sıralama gözetmeksizin peyderpey yüklenecektir. Eğitimi satın alırken içeriklere lütfen göz atın. Örneğin Logo için satın almak istediniz, eğitim içeriğinde videoların yüklenip yüklenmediğine lütfen göz atınız. Zamanla tüm videolar yüklenecek ama eğitim programımın yoğunluğu nedeniyle videoları birden çekmem mümkün değil. Sizleri fazla bekletmemek adına elimden geleni yapacağımdan emin olabilirsiniz.


A1 SEVİYESİ


Ön Muhasebe hakkında hiçbir fikrim yok sıfırdan başlamak istiyorum diyenler için hazırlanmış olan seviyedir. Bu seviyede ön muhasebe hakkında genel bir bilgilendirme yapılmaktadır. Ön muhasebe hakkında bilgi sahibi olmayanlar muhasebeye karşı önyargılıdır. Birçok kişi ön muhasebenin zor bir meslek olduğunu ve bununla ilgili bir tecrübesi olmadığı için öğrenmesinin zor olduğunu düşünür. Bunun aslında öyle olmadığını ve isteyen herkesin muhasebe yapmayı öğrenebileceğini bu seviyede yaşayarak öğrenirsiniz. En temel konular bile detaylı bir şekilde anlatılır. Konular anlatılırken teorik tanımlamalar değil akılda kalıcı örnekler verilir. Böylece kursiyerler aslında bu mesleğin zor bir meslek olmadığını zorlanmadan anlar. Ayrıca seviye başlangıç seviyesi olduğu için bu konuları bir an önce geçelim diyen bir başka kursiyerde olmaz. Katılımcıların tamamı aynı düzeyde olduğu için derslerde bilgi ve tecrübe açısından dengesizlik olmaz.
Bu mesleğe ilk kez adım atan herkesin bilmesi gereken konular sohbet havasında anlatılır. Dinlerken not alma ihtiyacı bile hissetmezsiniz. Bu seviye tamamlandıktan sonra A2 seviyesine gönül rahatlığı ile başlayabilirsiniz.


A1 Seviyesi Kurs İçeriği Şu Şekildedir:
Kasa İşlemleri
Banka İşlemleri
Stok İşlemleri
Cari hesap işlemleri
Çek senet işlemleri
Gelir/Gider işlemleri
E Fatura işlemleri
Personel ücret ödemeleri ve takibi
Cari mutabakat işlemleri
Resmi muhasebe ile koordinasyon


A2 SEVİYESİ


A1 seviyesini başarı ile tamamlamış olanlarla, bu alanda tecrübeye sahip meslek mensuplarının başlaması gereken seviyedir.


Eğitim içeriği de şu şekildedir:


Cari mutabakat işlemleri ve hataları düzeltme
Stok tespit işlemleri ve düzeltmeler
Resmi muhasebe ile entegrasyon
İleri düzey raporlama
Banka kredi işlemleri ve limit takibi
BCH Kredi işlemleri
Teminata verilen çek işlemleri
Faktoring işlemleri
Personel işe giriş çıkış işlemleri
Bordro işlemleri
EĞİTİM SONRASINDA SERTİFİKA ALABİLİR MİYİM?

courses.title: 2024's Tech Fiascos: A Review of What Went Wrong
courses.bio: Learning from the mistakes in recent tech failures
requirements: There are no special requirements for taking this course. Ideal for beginners seeking a basic understanding of risk and risk management in areas of technology in fintech, banking, and finance.
courses.description:
2024 was a year of significant tech advancements, but also a year of notable setbacks. From the widespread disruption caused by the CrowdStrike security update to the challenges faced by Tesla's autonomous driving ambitions, these incidents underscore innovation's inherent risks and complexities.
The CrowdStrike debacle is a stark reminder of the critical importance of robust testing and quality assurance in software development.
Google AI's missteps highlighted the ethical considerations and potential biases that can arise when AI systems are trained on vast amounts of online data.
The underwhelming reception of devices like the Humane Pin and Rabbit R1 underscored the importance of market validation and user experience in bringing innovative technologies to market.
Intel's processor woes and Tesla's autonomous driving challenges serve as reminders that even industry leaders face setbacks and the need for continuous innovation and adaptation.
These events offer valuable lessons for the tech industry, emphasizing the need for a focus on user safety, data privacy, ethical considerations, and rigorous testing throughout the entire development lifecycle. They also underscore the critical importance of prioritizing user safety and data privacy throughout the entire development lifecycle in terms of user safety, data privacy, ethical considerations, testing, and transparency, and communications.
target_audience: Beginners seeking to understand some of the practical basics in risk and risk management in technology in fintech, banking, or finance.
Current staff who may need a refresher regarding the dangers lurking in untested/unapproved ideas.

courses.title: CMA Part 1: Full Preparation
courses.bio: Master the CMA exam and earn your Certified Management Accountant designation with our complete, hands-on practice tests
courses.description:
The Certified Management Accountant (CMA) certification is a globally recognized professional standard for management accounting, validating expertise in financial management and strategic decision-making. CMAs are strategic thinkers who leverage analytical skills to enhance overall company success. They commonly hold leadership roles such as financial analyst, corporate controller, or CFO across various sectors including corporations, non-profits, and government organizations. CMAs provide crucial support in areas like performance management, cost management, risk management, financial analysis, and decision-making.


Why Pursue CMA Certification?


Investing in a CMA certification offers several compelling benefits:
Higher Earning Potential: CMAs consistently earn more. A recent IMA survey showed CMAs median compensation was 58% higher than non-CMAs.
Competitive Edge: As a top designation, the CMA sets you apart by verifying your expertise in accounting and financial management, giving you an advantage in the job market.
Global Recognition: The CMA designation is recognized worldwide, making it highly valuable for accounting professionals seeking international career opportunities.


Understanding the CMA Exam Structure


The CMA exam consists of two parts, which can be taken in any order. Each part is a four-hour exam, comprising 100 multiple-choice questions and two 30-minute essay questions. Candidates must answer at least half of the multiple-choice questions correctly to proceed to the essay section. The essay section features 10-12 written response or calculation questions based on two business scenarios.


This practice test is covering the CMA Part 1:
Financial Planning, Performance, and Analytics
This section covers:
Section A: External financial reporting decisions (15%)
Section B: Planning, budgeting, and forecasting (20%)
Section C: Performance management (20%)
Section D: Cost management (15%)
Section E: Internal controls (15%)
Section F: Technology and analytics (15%)


Scoring and Exam Windows


To pass the CMA exam, a total score of 360 out of 500 is required across both parts, as passing depends on the cumulative score rather than individual sections. Scores are weighted for consistency and fairness.
The exam windows for both Part 1 and Part 2 are:
January/February
May/June
September/October


Essential Exam Day Tips


To ensure a smooth exam experience, test-takers should:
Arrive at the Prometric testing center 30 minutes early.
Sign the log book and provide a fingerprint.
Bring a valid, accepted ID (e.g., passport, driver's license, military ID).
Remember to bring a calculator.


Boost Your Chances with Our Preparation Course!


Our preparation course offers the latest, exclusive, and most frequently recurring questions, along with two case studies and detailed explanations. This new material, added in 2025, is designed to help you master accounting language and professional terminology, increasing your chance of passing your exam on the first try.


We recommend taking both mock exams, complete with essays, in the 10 days before your official exam. This will help you feel more confident and manage your time effectively within allowed time limit.


Good Luck!
target_audience: Intermediate / junior employees who are interested for senior positions in their accounting and finance jobs or advanced knowledge in accounting and finance
Finance and accounting students who are interested in the CMA Program
Senior positions in accounting and Finance who are searching for managerial positions

İşletme sahiplerinin ve özellikle de yöneticilerin ihtiyaç duyduğu bilgileri üreten maliyet muhasebesi kapsamında, başta üst yönetim olmak üzere işletme içi kullanıcılar için raporlar hazırlanır. Hem uygulamacılar hem de bu alanda bilgi edinmek isteyen kişiler için zaman zaman zorluklar ortaya çıkaran maliyet muhasebesinin temel prensiplerinin başlangıçta doğru şekilde özümsenmesi, zorlukların ortadan kaldırılmasına önemli katkılar sağlayacaktır.
Değişen sınav sisteminde Staja Giriş sınavında Maliyet Muhasebesi soruları, birden fazla aşamadan geçerek çözülecek şekilde sorulmaktadır. Bunun için de hem konulara, hem de test tekniğine hakim olmak gerekmektedir. Sınavda çıkan 8 maliyet muhasebesi sorusu, bilgi ve bu bilgiyi yorumlama yeteneğini ölçen sorulardan oluşmaktadır. Derslerimizde Maliyet Muhasebesi ile ilgili tüm bilgiler sorular üzerinden ve test teknikleri kullanılarak verilecektir. Konuların sorular üzerinden anlatılacağı derslerimizde başlangıçtan ileri düzeye kadar gerekli tüm bilgiler verilecektir. Derslerde sadece soru çözümü olmayacak, her konu ile ilgili sorulabilecek alternatif soru türlerine de yer verilecektir. Dersleri izledikten sonra bölüm sorularında verilen soruları çözmeniz konuları pekiştirmenize önemli katkı sağlayacaktır.
Konuyla ilgili örnek soru ve bu soruların çözümlerinde izlenen yol kesinlikle ezberden uzak, sorulardaki incelikleri göstermeye yöneliktir. Sorular, Staja Giriş sınavındaki son yıllardaki değişiklikler dikkate alınarak hazırlanmıştır. Kursumuzda bilgi ve bilgiyi kullanma/yorumlama yeteneğinizi her bölümde bir basamak üste taşıyarak, sınavları sorun olmaktan çıkarmayı amaçlamaktadır. Eğer anlatılan yöntemleri uygularsanız, sınavda başarılı olabileceksiniz.

Ne plus se soucier de l'argent grâce à la méthode des enveloppes
Il se peut qu’à l’heure actuelle vous n'ayez encore jamais créer de budget mensuel. Ou bien au contraire, vous avez déjà tenté plusieurs fois de mieux gérer votre argent mais malgré toute votre bonne volonté, votre budget n'a encore jamais atteint l'équilibre. Pire encore, vous ne parvenez toujours pas à épargner pour vos projets personnels. Quoi qu'il en soit, ne vous découragez plus !
Bien que démarrer la gestion de budget avec les enveloppes budgétaires semble compliqué au début et que les informations que l'on trouve en ligne sont souvent confuses voire incorrectes, vous devriez être capable de mettre en place ce système correctement dès le mois prochain grâce à une préparation minutieuse et à un petit travail d'analyse dans lequel vous serez guidé étape par étape.
En participant à ce cours, vous effectuerez tout le travail de préparation nécessaire au bon fonctionnement de la méthode à l'aide de petites fiches d'activités à compléter après chaque session.  Vous serez en mesure d'analyser avec précision vos revenus, vos dépenses, vos habitudes et de mettre en place quelques petits changements afin d’éviter le découvert, de rembourser vos dettes et peut-être même d'économiser pour les projets qui vous tiennent à cœur.
En suivant ce cours pas à pas, vous serez en mesure de calculer très facilement votre reste à vivre et le montant à répartir dans vos enveloppes au début de chaque mois. Ainsi vous serez prêts à démarrer votre premier mois avec les enveloppes budgétaires sans commettre d'erreur et à reprendre le contrôle de vos finances rapidement.
Aussi, vous comprendrez très vite comment et pourquoi votre situation financière n’est pas toujours aussi stable que vous le souhaiteriez et vous serez capable de mettre en place des solutions adaptées à votre situation personnelle pour y remédier.
Avec ce cours, la mise en place de la méthode des enveloppes budgétaires se fait de manière amusante et efficace.
Plus de place au doute ! Votre budget est sous contrôle tout au long du mois et la gestion de vos finances personnelles devient enfin un moment agréable.
Être capable d’équilibrer son budget de manière amusante, c'est désormais possible alors lancez-vous et rejoignez tout de suite les nombreux adeptes de cette méthode en participant activement à cette formation !

courses.description:
Exam P is a three–hour multiple–choice examination and is offered via computer–based testing (CBT). It's the first step toward being an actuary.


The syllabus for Exam P develops the candidate's knowledge of the fundamental probability tools for quantitatively assessing risk. The application of these tools to problems encountered in actuarial science is emphasized. A thorough command of the supporting calculus is assumed. Additionally, a very basic knowledge of insurance and risk management is assumed.


Candidates are expected to spend more than 300 hours studing and practice on this exam. The pass rate is around 45%


This course is taught by Yodharin Monplub. Professor Yodharin Monplub has an almost ASA qualification from the SOA, with only FAP left. The following are his exams qualification:
SOA: P FM IFM SRM STAM LTAM
CAS: 1 2 3/F MAS1 MAS2
At a young age of 22, he is now a full time teacher with over 4 years of teaching experience.


There are 7 sections on this exam.
This will cover all of exam P syllabus
Exam P Section 1 Basic probability, Conditional probability, Independence, Combinatoric and Permutation
Exam P Section 2 Random variable, PDF and CDF
Exam P Section 3 Expectation and Variance
Exam P Section 4 Frequently use discrete distribution
Exam P Section 5 Frequently use continuous distribution
Exam P Section 6 Joint, Marginal and Conditional distribution
Exam P Section 7 Transformation of variable

Many practice questions to prepare students for exam P. The difficulty is similar to the real exam P sitting.

En el tercer modulo están los diferentes tipos de inversiones, como la inversión en títulos de renta fija, en acciones y demás. Adicionalmente, veremos los riesgos financieros y como se valoran las empresas y los proyectos de inversión.
Finalmente, tenemos el módulo de Economía en donde veremos los conceptos más importantes del mundo económico como los aranceles, la inflación, la tasa de cambio, entre otros, todos ellos explicados paso a paso para su fácil comprensión.

courses.description:
It's no secret that buying solar reduces your power bills and can generate tax free, passive income for decade. While this way of earning Passive Income is often overlooked by many, there are already millions around the world earning thousands of extra dollars every year, all while helping to fight Climate Change
The biggest problem with solar is that buying it isn't a very straight forward process, no matter what solar installers might advertise...
Every year thousands get ripped off, have poor quality solar equipment installed or have things go wrong. Things that could have been avoided saving them multiple thousands of dollars if they'd only known what to look out for.
If this course helps you avoid a bad solar install, it will have paid for itself 100 times over!


This is the current reality when buying solar: A ridiculous web of trying to figure out which solar installers are solid... and which are slime. But how can you tell? Should you look at their reviews? It's been proven companies routinely fake them.
“The Federal Court has ordered WEMA, formerly trading as Australian Solar Panel pay combined penalties of $125,000, for publishing fake testimonials and making false or misleading representations about the country of origin of the solar panels they supply” Source: ACCC
Your friend Rex got his solar installed without an issue... but how do you know he wasn't over charged for cheap solar? How do you know the system that installer put in will last for decades (as it should)?
"Rex Leighton spent $8,000 installing a rooftop solar system in 2015, which he expected would last for at least 25 years. It only lasted four and a half years." Source: ABC News

requirements: Conhecimento básico em informática
courses.description:
2 áreas que possuem relação direta e indireta em qualquer empresa são os setores Financeiro e Fiscal, e por isso estamos trazendo pra vocês esse Pacote com 2 Cursos muito bem avaliados na Udemy, e com milhares de Alunos satisfeitos nas melhores condições pra você aproveitar e aprender muito.


Uma empresa é formada por profissionais das mais variadas áreas que precisam trabalhar em conjunto para que todo processo operacional e administrativo consiga atingir um determinado objetivo. E um destes papéis que precisam ser desempenhados na empresa é o de Assistente Financeiro, que acaba se tornando basicamente o responsável por auxiliar e monitorar as atividades financeiras de uma determinada empresa, instituição ou uma determinada organização.
O Assistente Financeiro auxilia em atividades da área financeira, de controle bancário e de contas, cuida do fluxo de caixa, das cobranças e investimentos, emissão de relatórios e de contas a pagar e receber, lançamento de cheques e organização de documentos. Ele também geralmente se torna o responsável por fazer transações financeiras, registros, lançamentos de valores a pagar e a receber, entre outras atividades relacionadas ao fluxo financeiro da empresa.
Já o Assistente Fiscal é o profissional responsável por controlar e executar trabalhos relacionados com a área contábil, sendo eles: registro de documentos, escrituração de livros fiscais, classificação de despesas, análise e reconciliação de contas.
Um Assistente Fiscal auxiliar na elaboração de balancetes e outros demonstrativos.
Está sob as responsabilidades de um Assistente Fiscal exercer balancetes, calcular impostos (PIS, COFINS, ICMS etc.), verificar impostos retidos, classificar a contabilidade, contatar o cliente, analisar contas patrimoniais e lançar folhas de pagamento, fechamentos fiscais, executar baixas de recebimento, revisar as movimentações bancárias e solucionar pendências, organizar documentações referentes à contabilidade da empresa, atuar no lançamento e validação de notas fiscais, análise de documentos fiscais, apuração de impostos federais, estaduais e municipais, retenções na fonte, substituição tributária e controle de arquivos XML, realizar a classificação e lançamentos contábeis, fazer a análise e conciliação de contas, realizar a conferência de relatórios contábeis, atuar com a classificação, conciliação contábil de contas patrimoniais e resultados, elaborar o balanço patrimonial, balancetes, demonstração de resultados, demonstração de origens, aplicações e depreciações de ativos imobilizados, cuidar dos tributos diretos, indiretos, obrigações acessórias federais, estaduais e municipais, atuar com lançamento de importações, emissão de notas fiscais de venda, conciliação bancária, contas a pagar e contas a receber, realizar o fechamento mensal com contador, elaborar relatórios gerenciais, receber pedidos, fazer embalagem, indo para correios e fazer entregas.


Nestes 2 Cursos você vai aprender:


1 - Curso de Assistente Financeiro
Introdução - O que faz um Assistente Financeiro

requirements: Students should be familiar with Professional and Ethical Considerations (section B of the ACCA AAA syllabus).
courses.description:
This is a question practice of past exam B section question, where I will show you how to plan, execute and pass this type of question.
Ethical and professional considerations are examined very frequently - either as a separate question or part of the long A section Case Study, therefore students should be familiar with addressing complex ethical and professional issues.
The question is named Cobra from Sep/Dec 2017 exam paper. Note, currently exam question would be 25-mark rather than 20-mark, however this is a great study example.
The Advanced Audit and Assurance (AAA) exam is around a third knowledge-based and a sixth application-based question, that test a candidate's ability to apply knowledge and concepts. For this reason students should predominately focus on question practice as they prepare for their exam session.
Past exam rates show that AAA exam pass rate is between 30% and 35% - you need to make sure you are one of those three out of ten people who succeed. And by practicing with me you can achieve it.
The exam lasts 3h 15 min, which means you have 1.95 min per point, therefore 20 mark question should take you maximum of 39 minutes.
Lets get started!
target_audience: ACCA students preparing for Advanced Audit & Assurance (AAA) exam

courses.title: Auditoría interna ágil - AGILE
courses.bio: Optimizando la prestación de Auditoría Interna
objectives: Conocer la filosofía y fundamentos de la metodología Agile y su aplicación a la Auditoría Interna
Vincular la agilidad de los procesos de Auditoría Interna con el cumplimiento normativo y la calidad de la labor
Identificar barreras a la agilidad en Auditoría Interna y acciones para superarlas
Optimizar el proceso de Auditoría Interna para mejorar el Gobierno Corporativo
requirements: Interés por la auditoría interna
courses.description:
El mundo de los negocios está acechado por amenazas y riesgos cada vez mayores (cambio climático, pandemias, terrorismo, guerras). Y, en consecuencia, debe responder con cada vez mayor celeridad y AGILIDAD a esas demandas.
Los desarrolladores informáticos han desarrollado la metodología AGILE (ágil), para responder a esta demanda y entregar sus aplicaciones más rápidamente y más alineada con las necesidades de los clientes que las aplicarán.
Esto impone una demanda similar sobre otras funciones de la organización, entre ellas la Auditoría Interna. Con la dificultad que impone la diferente naturaleza de ambas actividades.
En este curso analizaremos la filosofía Agile, los principios que la guían, las metodologías que aplica, y las posibilidades de aplicación de ellas a la Auditoría Interna.
Identificaremos las barreras a la agilidad que generan demoras, lentitud, reprocesos y ejecución de tareas sin valor.
Para que nuestra labor como auditores internos enfoque rápidamente los aspectos vitales de la gestión y se concentre en ellos.
Diagnosticando, con tanta celeridad y precisión como resulte posible, los aspectos que requieren mejora.
Localizando la causa raíz de los problemas, identificando y seleccionando las mejores soluciones y comunicándolas también con precisión y celeridad para lograr el objetivo final de la labor de auditoría interna: la adopción de sus recomendaciones en el más alto porcentaje y con la mayor velocidad posible
target_audience: Auditores internos de todos los niveles

requirements: 0基础
courses.description:
不论是对财务人员，还是对中高层管理者来说，在企业成本管控的流程与操作落地上都会遇到不少难题。近年来全球企业，尤其是中国企业面临前所未有的成本上涨压力：原材料、人工费持续上涨，而产品价格却一降再降，企业利润空间日渐缩小！在竞争加剧的背景下，企业面临诸多问题：成本居高不下，企业利润空间在哪里?如何生存?如何打造企业的竞争优势?资源浪费现象依旧严重，这就需要企业必须重视成本分析和控制，全面把握成本构成要素，跳出传统成本控制框架，从经营战略角度出发，整体制定成本控制与管理体系，寻求改善企业成本的有效方法。


课程导师——林一斌
财务管理实战专家；工商管理学硕士；厦门市高级会计人才信息库成员；畅销书《初创公司财务管理》作者；美国注册管理会计师协会CMA认证讲师；福建省人文社科研究基地-财务与审计研究中心研究员。

courses.title: 【M&Aで必須】いちばんわかりやすい「のれん」の仕組みと会計処理
courses.bio: M&A・企業買収・会計実務に必須の「のれん」知識を図解と事例で最短習得！PPA・減損・IFRS対応も解説
objectives: 「のれん（Goodwill）」とは何か、M&Aにおける意味と会計上の位置づけを理解できる
買収価格の決定プロセスや、のれん発生の仕組みを図と事例で説明できるようになる
PPA（Purchase Price Allocation：取得原価の配分）の基本と実務上の処理方法を習得できる
のれんの償却・減損処理の方法、および日本基準とIFRS（国際会計基準）の違いを理解できる
有価証券報告書からのれんや関連注記情報を読み取り、リスク分析ができるようになる
「負ののれん」が発生するケースや会計処理のポイントを説明できる
M&A後の会計処理に必要な知識を習得し、PMI（統合プロセス）や財務分析に活かせる
実際の企業事例（アサヒ・キリン・RIZAPなど）を通じて、実務的な視点でのれんを理解できる
requirements: 簿記3級程度の会計知識
貸借対照表と損益計算書の関する基本的な知識
courses.description:
新聞やニュースなどで「のれん」という言葉を目にすることが多いと思います。
M&Aの実務や企業の決算資料にも「のれん」という言葉が頻繁に登場します。


しかし、その実態はつかみにくく、「よくわからない」という声をよく聞きます。


本コースでは、図解と事例を用いながら、M&A実務に不可欠な「のれん」の会計処理を最速・最短で学べる構成としました。
・ のれんの意味と仕組みをざっくり理解したい！
・会計実務やM&Aに役立つ知識を体系的に学びたい！
・のれんの減損やPPAといった応用論点も押さえたい！
そんな方々のためのコースです。
アサヒやキリンの実例、RIZAPの「負ののれん」計上など、有名企業の事例をもとに、「なぜのれんが発生するのか」「どのように償却・減損を行うのか」といったテーマを、実際の財務諸表やグラフとともにわかりやすく解説します。


のれんというと、「難しそう」「実務で触れることはない」と感じる方も多いかもしれません。
しかし実は、企業の価値を見抜くうえで極めて重要なポイントであり、 決算書を読み解くのに必須の知識です。
本コースでは、難解な会計基準の文言や言い回しを極力避け、 実務で必要なポイントだけを効率的に学べる ように、内容に絞って解説します。


＜本コースのポイント＞
のれんの意味・役割を最短距離で理解！
PPA（取得原価の配分）や負ののれんも図解でスッキリ！
日本基準とIFRSの違い、償却と減損の考え方を比較！
有価証券報告書からの読み解き方も丁寧に解説！


資格試験のための暗記ではなく、M&A実務や経営分析に活かせる知識を、会計のプロが豊富な図と事例で丁寧にナビゲートします。
経理・財務部門の方はもちろん、経営者、投資家、スタートアップ関係者にも役立つ内容です。
この機会に、「のれん」の基礎知識と実務での活用法をしっかり学び、自信をもって決算資料を読み解ける力を身につけましょう！
target_audience: M&A実務に携わっている方（これから携わる予定の方）
経理部門・財務部門・経営企画部門
経営者・経営幹部候補
個人投資家
出口戦略としてM&Aを視野に入れている起業家
決算書をより詳しく読み解きたいビジネスパーソン

courses.description:
Unlock the Power of Financial Ratios for Better Decision-Making!
Ratio analysis is an essential skill for accountants, finance professionals, investors, and students preparing for financial exams. It helps assess a company's profitability, liquidity, financial stability, and overall performance by analyzing key financial ratios. But simply calculating ratios isn’t enough—you also need to interpret them effectively to make informed business decisions.
This comprehensive course is designed to take you from the basics of ratio analysis to advanced interpretation techniques. You will learn:
Profitability Ratios – How well a company generates profits from its operations.
Liquidity Ratios – A company’s ability to meet short-term financial obligations.
Gearing Ratios – Understanding financial risk and debt dependency.
Working Capital Ratios – How efficiently a company manages its day-to-day finances.
Investor Ratios – Key metrics used by investors to evaluate a company's financial health.
Limitations of Ratio Analysis – Avoiding common pitfalls and misinterpretations.
We will break down real-world financial statements and show you how to apply these ratios practically. Whether you’re preparing for ACCA, CA, CPA, CFA, or simply looking to sharpen your financial analysis skills, this course provides step-by-step explanations, formula breakdowns, case studies, and exam techniques.
By the end of this course, you will be able to confidently interpret financial ratios, provide meaningful insights, and make sound financial decisions.
Enroll now and take your financial analysis skills to the next level!
target_audience: ACCA, CA, CPA, CFA, and finance students preparing for financial exams.
Accountants and auditors looking to enhance financial analysis skills.
Finance professionals and analysts evaluating business performance.
Investors and business owners who want to understand financial ratios for decision-making.

Common terms used in Derivatives Trade is also taken mention of, in this basic lesson as well as Non Performing Assets are taught to the Banking Enthusiast. In Priority Sector Credit, various basic topics are taught alongside the numerous Priority Sector Advances in aligned fields and topics.
In Industrial Loans and Conventional Loans, Capital Market Exposure is discussed along with Exposure Norms and Selective Credit Control as basic topics of discussions.
Overall this course provides banking related concepts and terminologies which are very much in usage in the Indian Banking Industry in its different circles of its Executive Functions.

courses.description:
このコースは、新入社員や内定者のための「財務会計」に関する超基本的な講座です。


あなたが勤めている会社がどんな業種であっても、
すべての会社に共通してる目的というのがあります。


それは「利益」を獲得することです。


会社があなたを採用したのは、より多くの利益を獲得するために必要だからです。


そのことを理解せず、ただのうのうと毎月お給料をもらうのは、会社に対する裏切りです。




会社から与えられた業務は社員によってさまざまですが、
すべての業務は、直接的であれ間接的であれ「利益」というものに向かっている、

courses.description:
Данный курс предназначен для тех, кто хочет знать,как вести складской учет в ресторанном бизнесе на базе передовой ERP системы iiko


Почему iiko?


iiko является лидирующей ERP системой в сфере учета ресторанного бизнеса и общепита. Немного статистики:


Россия 33 000 ресторанов
Казахстан 4000 ресторанов
Узбекистан 1000 ресторанов
Азербайджан 400 ресторанов
Беларусь 200 ресторанов
Армения 200 ресторанов
Таджикистан 140 ресторанов
Кыргызстан 140 ресторанов


Среди ресторанов, которые работают на iiko следующие гиганты:


Papa John’s (Казахстан,Кыргызстан,Азербайджан)
Pizza Hut (Азербайджан)
Вкусно и точка (Россия)
Ташир груп (Россия)
Сеть кофеен “Кофе лайк” (Россия)
Сеть кофеен “Cofix” (Россия)
Сеть ресторанов ABR (Казахстан)
Сеть “Salam Bro” (Казахстан)


Чему вы научитесь на этом курсе?


Вы научитесь работать с системой iiko в разрезе складского учета.
Мы вас научим:
Как формировать справочники номенклатуры товаров, блюд, заготовок и полуфабрикатов.
Как составлять технологические карты блюд и какие есть подводные камни при их составлении.
Как формировать складские документы типа приходных/расходных накладных, актов списания,актов разбора,актов приготовления и т.д
Как формировать документ инвентаризации в  iiko
Как просматривать складские отчеты и проводить анализ излишков/недостач


Ну и в бонусном разделе  мы расскажем вам про популярные схемы воровства и махинаций в сфере общепита.
Данный курс содержит задания для самоконтроля после каждого видео.
Будем рады вас видеть на нашем курсе и надеемся ,что вы найдете ответы на свои вопросы! В случае наличия вопросов, будем рады вам помочь более подробно.

courses.title: Get Paid to Own Stocks: Work From Home & Get Paid
courses.bio: Learn how to sell secured put options to generate income on a monthly or yearly basis with no prior knowledge of options
objectives: Learn how to add another source of income while working from home.
Learn how to get paid to own stocks.
Learn how to generate passive income in the stock market.
Increase your investments by selling cash secured puts.
Understand how options are priced and traded.
Learn the best investment strategies to increase your chances of success in the stock market.
Develop the knowledge necessary to trade options.
requirements: You'll need access to a computer or smartphone.
Basic knowledge of the stock market.
courses.description:
Learn one of the best kept secrets in the stock market. Taught by Joe Correa, who owned and managed an investment advisory firm and was series 65 licensed and has traded options for years. Selling cash secured puts is profitable and is one of the investment strategies with the highest probabilities of success in the stock market. You don't need prior knowledge of options to complete this course and can start making money right away.
If you want to start generating passive income on a monthly basis and have the drive to learn a new investment strategy, then this is the course for you. For people who are constantly looking for deals and want to own great stocks at a discount, this is your chance. By selling cash secured put options contracts you'll be able to have the opportunity to own stocks at a deep discount and if the stock doesn't go down enough for you to buy it, you get to keep the premium payments.
Imagine that. Getting paid to own a stocks and even getting it at a deep discount. When you sell cash covered puts, you have three ways to profit.
1. If the stock goes up, you make money.
2. If the stock moves sideways, you make money.
3. If the stock goes down but not enough for you to have to buy it, you make money.
If in the worst case scenario, the stock reaches the price you offered to buy it at, you will end up owning the stock but still get to keep the profits made by offering to buy it at that price. "So what's the catch" you ask? You'll have the same risk as owning stock but profit if it goes up, down, or sideways. Invest with very little money and make great returns. Even if you are ultra conservative and chose to make a low profit of 3% per month, this would be a 36% per year! Buying options can be a low probability trade but selling cash secured puts can be of much higher probability from 56% to a 98% chance of profit.
In this course, you'll learn:
- How to invest without paying any fees through Robinhood Financial and Webull
- How to get stocks for free by using my referral code.
- How to sell cash secured puts.
- Become an expert at finding great opportunities.
- Discover the "Best options selling plan", which you can copy and start making profits.
- How to practice selling cash secured puts through paper trading accounts.
- How to create passive income on a weekly or monthly basis.
- Automate your trades so you can enjoy the day while you wait for your position to be executed at the price you want.
- Increase your chances to profit by using probabilities to take advantage of trades.
- Limit your risk by choosing great stocks and offering to buy them much lower than they're currently trading at.
You can even start your trading account with no money at all by referring friends and family and getting free stock for doing so. You can sell that stock after that and keep the money or reinvest it to sell cash secured puts to generate monthly passive income.
In the first part of the course, I will go over what selling cash secured puts is and what the benefits are. You will also learn how to get your first free stock and start creating your investment portfolio. Besides that, you will learn how to calculate your maximum profit potential and what the risks are (which are the same as owning stock, but slightly less since you'll get paid anyway).
In the second part of this course, you'll the basics of what options are and why selling cash secured puts is such a profitable and high probability strategy. I will go over some live trades so that you can copy my strategies and my approach towards investing in the stock market. You will understand why options lose value over time which will increase your profits much faster as they get nearer to the expiration date.
Your instructor
Joseph Correa was the founder and CEO of Trust Investment Advisors, and was series 65 licensed. He owns and manages other financial and educational businesses that require savvy decision making and smart investment strategies. Having invested hundreds of thousands of dollars, he knows what investments are profitable and how to maximize their potential.
* This course does not cover options technical analysis.
target_audience: Any one who is looking to add another source of income.
Any one who is looking to invest in the stock market and wants to learn one of the best strategies.
Any person who are interested in buying stocks at a discount.
Complete beginners in the stock market and options trading in general.
Experts in the stock market that want to learn to invest in options and have the highest probabilities of trading.
Investors who want to learn a new to generate income and increase their assets, while getting paid to do so.
Any one who is will to learn and take advantage of seldom known investment strategy.

courses.bio: Ratios o razones financieras: Liquidez, gestión, endeudamiento y rentabilidad. Análisis vertical y horizontal.
objectives: Aprender a realizar análisis vertical y horizontal de Estados Financieros

Aprender a calcular y analizar ratios o razones de endeudamiento y rentabilidad

Unidad 3: Análisis Vertical: Ejercicio análisis vertical Estado de Resultado
Unidad 4: Análisis horizontal: Ejercicio análisis horizontal estado de resultado
Unidad 5: Ratios financieros de liquidez: Ejercicio de ratios de liquidez sin industria
Ejercicio de ratios de liquidez con industria
Ejercicio de Ratios de Gestión sin industria
Ejercicio de Ratios de Gestión con industria
Unidad 6: Ratios financieros de endeudam: Ejercicio ratios de endeudamiento sin industria
Ejercicio ratios de endeudamiento con industria
Unidad 7: Ratios financieros de rentabil: Ejercicio Ratios de rentabilidad sin industria
Ejercicio Ratios de rentabilidad con industria

requirements: Conocimientos básicos de Estados Financieros.
courses.description:
El curso de Finanzas: Análisis de Estados Financieros tiene como objetivo que el alumno aprenda a analizar los estados financieros de una empresa y, con lo anterior, poder determinar cuál es la “salud” financiera de la misma. Para esto, el curso comienza explicando qué es el Balance General y el Estado de Resultado. Teniendo claridad en cómo funcionan estos estados financieros, comenzaremos a realizar el análisis vertical y horizontal. Cada uno de estos análisis tendrá un ejercicio aplicativo.
Posteriormente, se explicarán los ratios de liquidez, de gestión, endeudamiento y rentabilidad. Cada uno de los grupos de ratios tendrá un ejercicio para aplicar la materia vista. Estos ejercicios se dividirán en tres partes: Primero se realizarán los cálculos de cada ratio, segundo se analizarán los resultados de la empresa y tercero se analizarán los resultados de la industria con la empresa. Cabe destacar, que no hay un solo análisis correcto. Las variables a controlar son numerosas, por lo que en estos casos no existe una única respuesta correcta.
Por último, y para finalizar el curso, se analizará el modelo Dupont. Este modelo se estudiará bajo dos visiones, lo que permitirá conocer y entender de forma completa el modelo Dupont.
Cada unidad tendrá a disposición del estudiante la presentación y el Excel (cuando corresponda).
target_audience: Para quienes quieran aprender a analizar las finanzas de una empresa: Estudiantes, emprendedores o personas que simplemente quieren aprender de finanzas.

Bullekon olarak  yüz yüze eğitimlerimiz ve online eğitimlerimiz ile binlerce kişiyi para piyasalarıyla buluşturduk. Eğitimlerimiz şimdi de Udemy platformunda.

Ömür boyu kullanım şansınız ile birlikte sürekli karşınızda bir muhattabınız olacak ve aklınıza takılan tüm soruları bizlere sorabileceksiniz. Kendinizi geliştirmekte ve korkunuzu yenmekte sizlere ömür boyu yardımcı olacağız.
