requirements: Hiçbir teknik bilgiye gerek yoktur. Kurs, hem yeni başlayanlar hem de sektörde çalışan profesyoneller için uygundur. Tek yapmanız gereken öğrenmeye açık olmak.
courses.description:
Finansal teknolojiler, yani FinTech, günümüzün en hızlı büyüyen ve en çok yatırım alan sektörlerinden biri haline gelmiştir. Özellikle ödeme sistemleri, dijital ekonominin kalbinde yer alırken, e-ticaretin sürdürülebilirliği için de kritik bir rol üstlenmektedir. Bu kurs, ödeme ekosistemini derinlemesine anlamak isteyen girişimciler, yazılımcılar, ürün yöneticileri ve finans profesyonelleri için özel olarak tasarlandı.
Eğitim boyunca, FinTech kavramının tanımını, tarihsel gelişimini ve yıkıcı inovasyonlarla nasıl dönüşüm yarattığını öğreneceksiniz. Türkiye ve dünyadaki düzenlemeler, 6493 sayılı kanun, PSD2 ve açık bankacılık gibi önemli regülasyonlar detaylı şekilde ele alınacak. Kartlı ödeme sistemlerinin yapısı, kart şemaları, BIN numaraları, kredi, debit ve ön ödemeli kartların farkları açıklanacak. Ayrıca sanal kartların kullanım mantığı ve avantajları üzerinde durulacak.
Sanal POS akışından işlem türlerine (Satış, Ön Otorizasyon, Son Otorizasyon, İptal ve İade) kadar tüm süreçleri adım adım inceleyeceğiz. Bunun yanı sıra, hata kodları, red durumları ve retry mekanizmaları gibi operasyonel açıdan kritik konular da örneklerle aktarılacak.
Kursun sonunda, ödeme sistemlerinin genel ve işleyiş boyutunu kavrayacak, gerçek senaryoları analiz edebilecek ve FinTech dünyasında sağlam bir temel kazanacaksınız. Ayrıca öğrendiklerinizi günlük iş hayatınızda, ürün geliştirme süreçlerinizde veya kariyer yolculuğunuzda uygulayarak rekabet avantajı elde edeceksiniz. Bu kurs, hem teori hem de pratik açıdan sizi bir adım öne taşıyacak. Öğrendiklerinizi hemen iş ortamında kullanabilecek ve FinTech alanında daha bilinçli kararlar alabileceksiniz.
target_audience: FinTech sektörüne ilgi duyan girişimciler
Ödeme sistemleri alanında kariyer hedefleyenler
Sanal POS, ödeme geçidi, kartlı ödeme gibi konuları öğrenmek isteyen yazılımcılar
Ürün yöneticileri, iş analistleri ve ödeme operasyonda çalışan profesyoneller

courses.title: A Brief Overview of Insurance Investigation
courses.bio: Explore the qualification requirements, job description and actual cases of an insurance investigator
requirements: Interest in insurance investigation
courses.description:
Welcome and thank you for joining me this free talk! I provide you with an understanding of the field of insurance investigation by sharing some of the cases I have dealt with in the past and these include examples of individuals who abuse insurance products or commit fraud as well as how both new and sophisticated syndicates operate and what weaknesses they exploit for the purpose of fraud. These examples included examples of medical or health related fraud as well as those related to motor vehicle accident or theft claims.
We discuss what qualifications are required of investigator and while having studied into the field of forensics and/or criminology is beneficial, it is not the only way to get into the field. Experience and being willing to learn as you go are also ways to get into this exciting line of work.
I share with you the day to day work of an insurance investigator and this includes verification and validation of information as well as gathering of evidence to prove or disprove a specific rea of concern.
The talk is presented in a conversational way, so please grab a cup of coffee or tea and sit back and have a listen. It is my passion to teach all I have learnt and to share my findings and insights from actual investigations I have worked on. I know you will enjoy the talk and hope that if you are an assessor or investigator and want to broaden your knowledge base, you will check out the courses I have developed to help you grow professionally.
target_audience: Assessors
Loss adjustors
Investigators
Insurance investigators

courses.title: Masterclass in Forensic Accounting
courses.bio: Covering Fraud Prevention, Fraud Detection, and Fraud Examination
objectives: Explain the underlying concepts and functions of forensic accounting and fraud examination
Evaluate approaches to preventing and detecting fraud and fraud schemes
Critically assess financial statement fraud
Evaluate fraud against organisations, consumer fraud and fraud in the e-commerce environment

Week 5 - Recognizing the Symptoms of Fra: Recognizing the Symptoms of Fraud - Part 1
Recognizing the Symptoms of Fraud - Part 2

requirements: No programming skill needed. You will be taught the basics as well as advanced fraud prevention strategies
courses.description:
Forensic accounting is a specialized field that combines advanced accounting knowledge with investigative techniques to support legal proceedings and uncover fraudulent activities. It plays a critical role in detecting, preventing, and investigating financial fraud, misconduct, and economic crimes. This subject focuses specifically on the fraud examination aspects of forensic accounting, equipping students with the necessary theoretical and practical skills to analyze fraudulent behaviors and financial irregularities.
Throughout this subject, you will gain a comprehensive understanding of the nature of fraud, including its underlying motivations, risk factors, and economic consequences. You will explore various types of fraud, such as financial statement fraud, asset misappropriation, and corruption, as well as the methodologies used by fraud examiners to identify and prevent these deceptive practices. The subject will also introduce key fraud prevention strategies, emphasizing the importance of internal controls, ethical corporate governance, and regulatory compliance.
Additionally, you will examine fraud detection techniques, including forensic data analysis, digital forensics, and investigative interviewing. The course also delves into the essential components of fraud investigations, covering evidence collection, documentation, and legal considerations. By the end of this subject, you will be equipped with the skills and knowledge necessary to contribute effectively to fraud risk management and forensic accounting investigations.
target_audience: All management, accounting, finance and legal professionals working in services and production organizations.

requirements: Basic knowledge of financial statements (income statement, balance sheet, cash flow), spreadsheet proficiency (e.g., Excel or Google Sheets), and general understanding of corporate finance concepts is recommended. No programming or prior credit risk modeling experience is required.
courses.description:
Understanding credit risk is essential for financial decision-makers, analysts, and investors. This course, Advanced Financial Analysis and Credit Risk Modeling, is designed to equip learners with the analytical tools and modeling techniques used by top-tier credit professionals, rating agencies, and investment firms.
Throughout the course, you will develop practical skills in ratio analysis, cash flow forecasting, and quantitative modeling to assess an organization’s creditworthiness. You’ll start with a deep dive into financial ratios—including liquidity, leverage, and profitability—and learn how these indicators reveal critical insights into a company’s ability to service debt. Next, you’ll analyze cash flow statements using advanced techniques like EBITDA coverage, free cash flow modeling, and scenario analysis.
The course then moves into the domain of quantitative credit risk modeling. You will learn how to estimate the probability of default (PD), calculate expected losses, and apply credit scoring techniques using Excel-based tools. Through interactive exercises, you’ll gain hands-on experience in applying structural and reduced-form credit risk models for both sovereign and corporate credit evaluations.
This course is ideal for finance professionals, credit analysts, and students preparing for roles in banking, investment, or risk management.
By the end, you’ll be equipped to make informed credit decisions based on robust financial and quantitative analysis.
target_audience: This course is for finance professionals, credit analysts, and advanced business students seeking to master credit risk modeling and financial analysis.

courses.description:
Welcome to this course on CAIIB Advanced Bank Management (Part I)
CAIIB is the short form for Certified Associate of Indian Institute of Bankers. It is an examination conducted by Indian Institute of Banking and Finance (IIBF) twice a year. Once in May and once in November. In order to be eligible for award of CAIIB, candidate must pass both the compulsory papers and any one of the electives of the candidate's choice. This course teaches you one of the compulsory paper called Advanced Bank Management.
This course covers only one part of the paper Advanced Bank Management.

courses.title: An Abundance Mindset: How to Craft Yours
courses.bio: Abundance is a specific mindset characteristic & habit. Learn the art of creating abundance today.
objectives: Discover the top 3 things that are going to stop you from achieving your goal and what to do about it.
Utilize 16 rich habits to get on the right abundance track.
Establish calm, clear, confident decision making skills allowing you to be more productive and focused in a 24 hour, 30 or 90 day period.
Learn how tiny habits create big changes and how to create your own, bolstering your monetary success.
Become more consistently hopeful, appreciative, and trusting about your current money path in life instead of always feeling fear, doubt and anger.
Distinguish whether or not, using two simple questions, you've altered your limiting beliefs about money. You'll know what steps to take if you haven't.
Become more consistent in your ability to create more abundance based outcomes you want in life.
Shift from feeling worried about money to feeling easier about it.

Welcome!: PLEASE READ FIRST!! Purpose, design and transformation of this course.
BEFORE YOU BEGIN THIS COURSE, ANSWER THESE QUESTIONS!
How do I make the information I'm about to learn work for me?
What mindset is and how it works. DO NOT: Resource for the science behind changing your mindset.
What is the structure, or mathematical equation, of mindset?
What do I do with the personal data I've collected?
What are top 3 things keeping me from my goal?
How do I shift from feeling worried about money to feeling easy about it?
How do I take clear, confident action increasing my productivity in 30-90 days?
How do tiny habits create big results?
How can I become more consistently hopeful and trusting about my desires?
How do I uncover my innate ability to see past what is and invoke what's coming?
How to establish calm, clear decision making skills.
What are the two questions that will reveal if I've changed my limiting beliefs?
How do I become unstoppable in creating the monetary outcomes I want?
Answers to common questions, concerns an: A tale of two sisters: one wealthy, one poor.
What does a stuck money mindset look like and how to change it if you have one.
How does anything, including money, turn from a thought to a thing?
Economy is an individual thing. What's yours?
Money is the manifestation part, the end result.
Additional ways to change your money min: The daily mirror exercise—Why reality CAN'T change before you do.
Resilience is an essential quality of abundance. Are you resilient?
How to rewrite the story you're telling yourself about money.
Why self-esteem, self-image and self-confidence matter with regard to money.
Why do I feel scared about actually acting on this information?
How do I get my results and how long will it take?
A sample action plan to shift your mindset.

requirements: Ask yourself, "What it's worth to me to create the change in my life I desire?" and "What's the cost (emotionally) of me waiting another 6 months, 1, or 2 years before I make the changes I want?"

Please understand that creating anything, including greater abundance, takes TIME, ENERGY and the fine-tuned ability to FOCUS regardless of distractions. It takes a willingness to do something different, even when that something is challenging thoughts, feelings, and actions. This course is a behind the scenes look at what MY FAMILY does to cultivate an abundance and success mindset that enables us (using a partnership from the start approach) to earn a 6 figure income. This is NOT a get rich quick scheme. (Those methods are shady. Don't fall for them.) This course is about HOW to set the necessary mental foundation to create increasing wealth, over TIME. I'm thrilled to be sharing the tips and and strategies to our PERSONAL abundance mindset with you, here.
courses.description:
Welcome to An Abundance Mindset where you'll learn the mental strategies I believe are essential to experiencing abundance in all it's forms, from health, to relationships and even finance.
This course was formerly called: Mindset of a 6 Figure Income Earner: How to Craft Yours
Examine the course image more closely. Notice how there are many different emotions?
How you feel about money is a clue regarding your current mindset.
Your mindset is effecting your results ... for better or worse.
This course covers:
1) how (I believe) an abundant mindset looks and feels. I'm giving you a pictorial representation of mindset (mindset is normally invisible) that's easy to work with, understand, and use to foster your mental changes.
2) how to craft your own abundance mindset.
3) what to do, and how to tell, when you don't know if you're mindset is changing.
PLEASE LOOK OVER THE COURSE OBJECTIVES FOR MORE SPECIFICS ABOUT WHAT THIS COURSE COVERS.

The information in this course is practical and applicable, immediately. I'm giving you the structure for our family money mindset— which contains the same components, the same structure, that I've discovered to be among many wealthy individuals.
I explain the "wealth money mindset" in a simple way so you can see HOW it takes shape just by living a normal, everyday life. I teach you how an abundant mindset looks and FEELS.
TAKE A FEW MINUTES AND WATCH THE FREE PREVIEWS RIGHT NOW TO GET AN IDEA REGARDING THE STYLE AND CONTENT OF THIS COURSE.
Everything in this course can be applied immediately to help get on the abundant path you desire. It's specifically tailored for individuals with families—how I speak in the lessons and how I approach this topic—because this is how my husband and I work: partnership from the start.
This is how I'm inviting you to enter this course ... as a partnership from the start (between you and I). If you're willing to put in the time and effort to create the results you want, I will be here to help you along the way. I am truly dedicated to your success!
Consider this:
A healthy, structured mindset is to success as teeth brushing is to nice smelling breath: ridiculously necessary. You're going to learn how to craft your strong, healthy and abundant mindset in this course.
***I realize money is a sensitive topic for many people. I want you to know upfront that this course is not about spouting doctrine I do not follow myself. It's also not a promise that you'll earn six figures ... or any figures for that matter. It's about abundance and abundance isn't only about money.***
It's about coaching you to a strong mental foundation, on a very practical level, so you can progressively move toward earning the income you desire. Earning a six figure income, which my husband and I have achieved for over twelve consecutive years, takes time and dedication. It takes being patient with yourself as you work out the kinks in your thinking, feeling, and actions.
I know you understand when I say I make no promises of what you will ever earn. It's not up to me; it's up to you.

Get excited you've found this course, if you're looking to create new outcomes this year for yourself and your family. You will love the simplicity of the ideas and exercises as you see the results in your own life unfold.
I'm very glad to have you in class! Enroll today! What do you have to lose?
***This course is unique in that it's not just about earning a certain level of income. It's about learning to be the best version of yourself you can be in all areas of your life ... which translates to happy, health, and wealthy ... not JUST wealthy. Once you understand mindset in general, you can build a strong foundation around any topic you choose.***
target_audience: This course is for the person who's taking lots of action and not seeing the monetary results they want. They are deeply frustrated by that fact and would prefer it changed.

This course is for the person who struggles with money: getting it to come in, keeping it flowing, or holding onto it once (s)he gets it to come it, or spends for emotional reason and then has problems because of it. Learn to break the pattern for good starting at the ground level by shifting your mindset, rendering actions more effective.
This course is for the person who wants to move away from chronic fear and anxiety regarding money and into a state of ease and flow.

This course is NOT for the person looking to get rich quick. Earning a (honest) 6 figure income takes TIME, ENERGY, FOCUS and the ability to craft a particular type of MINDSET. This course is not for someone looking for money management, financial advice, or industry specific financial training information. This course is 100% about the MINDSET behind our family's results and how, using the proposed ideas, to craft your own.

courses.description:
KerzzPOS sayesinde ürün bazında satışlarınızın kontrolünü yapabilir, Hammadde ya da ürünlerinizi reçete içerisinde iç içe kullanabilirsiniz. Bu sayede hızlı, hatasız reçeteler tanımlayarak stoklarınızı kontrol altında tutarsınız.


Bu eğitimden sonra  KerzzPos' u kullanarak aşağıdaki işlemleri gerçekleştirebiliyor olmanızı hedefliyoruz;
Ürün, varyasyon ve stok tanımlamalarını yapabileceksiniz.
Reçete, yarı mamul ve üretim stoklarının tanımlanmasını yapabileceksiniz.
Tedarikçilerden alınan veya iade edilen malzemelerin girişlerini yapabileceksiniz.
Harici olarak satışını yaptığınız ürünlerinizin girişini yapabileceksiniz.
Depolar arası transferler, Fire zayi girişleri, Personel Yemeği girişlerini yapabileceksiniz.
Dönemsel sayım girişlerini yapıp, dönemsel kontrol edilen raporların analizi yapabileceksiniz.
Kurs içeriğinde Restoran ürün ve stok yönetimi konusunda uygulamalı olarak tüm konular işlenecektir. Bir işletmede ürün ve stok tanımlamasından başlayarak tüm süreçlerde işlemlerin nasıl yapıldığını adım adım görecek ve  yapılan tüm hareket kayıtları inceleyip raporlamada dikkat edilmesi gereken ayrıntıları da görebileceksiniz.
Eğitimin son bölümlerinde yar alan raporlama eğitimi sayesinde ( fatura raporları, fire zayi personel raporları, transfer raporları envanter raporları  ve reçete raporlarını kullanarak)  işletmeniz için kullanabileceğiniz raporların içerikleri de anlatılacaktır. Bu raporları kullanarak işletmenizi daha verimli bir şekilde analiz edebiliyor olacaksınız.
En son dersimizde ise Envanter raporundan bir depo ve bir ürün grubu için detaylı envanter incelemesi yapıp oluşan farklarla ilgili yapabileceğimiz kontrolleri adım adım işliyor olacağız.
Eğitimde anlatılan konularda uygulama yapabilmeniz için aktif bir KerzzPos kullanıcısı olmanız gerekmektedir. Ayrıca kursun sonunda yer alan sınavı tamamlayarak başarı oranınızı görebilirsiniz.
Keyifli ve Verimli bir eğitim olması dileklerimizle.
Kerzz Eğitim Departmanı

EĞİTİM İÇERİĞİ
Eğitimimiz 2020 yılında Ankara SMMM odasına kayıtlı SMMM ve stajerlerden oluşan 2 farklı ekibe yönelik olarak hazırlanmış olup daha sonra daha geniş bir kitleye de hitap etmesi amaçlanmıştır.
Eğitim temel olarak 5 ana video ve 1 adet sayfa inceleme videosundan oluşmaktadır.
Mevcut videolar;
1. KGK sayfa incelemesi (Anasayfa üzerinden güncel duyuruların incelenmesi)
2. Bağımsız Denetime Giriş ve Müşteri Kabulü (Bağımsız denetim nedir, hangi şirketler tabidir, bağımsız denetime tabi olmakla birlikte denetim yaptırmamanın sonuçları nelerdir, müşteri kabulünde hangi noktalara dikkat etmek gerekir?)
3. KAP sayfa incelemesi, örnek bağımsız denetim raporu incelemesi, genel ders programının tanıtılması ve büyük çalışma kağıdı üzerinden kıdem tazminatı VUK-BOBİ FRS dönüşümü yapılması
4. Büyük çalışma kağıdı üzerinden, amortisman VUK-BOBİ FRS dönüşümü yapılması
5. Amortisman dönüşümüne bazı eklemeler, büyük çalışma kağıdı üzerinden reeskont VUK-BOBİ FRS dönüşümü, önceki videoya diğer bazı eklemeler ve BOBİ FRS formatı üzerinden Bilanço (Finansal Durum Tablosu) ve Gelir Tablosu (Kar Zarar Tablosu) hazırlanması
6. Önceki videoya yapılan bazı eklemeler, büyük çalışma kağıdı ve BOBİ FRS formatı üzerinden Nakit Akış ve Özsermaye değişim tablolarının hazırlanması
Bağımsız Denetim Nedir, Bağımsız Denetime Tabi Olma Şartları, BOBİ FRS Nedir, BOBİ FRS VUK Karşılaştırma Yöntemleri nelerdir? sorularına cevap arıyoruz.

* "Bağımsız denetim+Firma değerlemesi+Finansal Check Up" ve/veya "Firma değerlemesi+Finansal Check Up" eğitimleri indirimli paket fiyatları için lütfen iletişime geçiniz.

courses.description:
The agile internal audit methodology and application course seeks to provide sustainable insights on how modern internal audit departments can effectively apply agility and lean management concepts in their daily audit projects. Agile Internal Audit has been touted to be a mindset that an Internal Audit function adopts to focus on real stakeholder needs, expedite internal audit projects, provide timely insights, reduce project costs and efforts, and maximize team and corporate resources.
This course has been designed in a simple-to-understand and yet very practical way to ensure that even beginners would easily understand the agile concept and apply it in their upcoming audit projects. The course has also leveraged the extensive consulting and in-house experience of the trainer to offer practical insights to Chief Audit Executives and Senior Internal Audit Team Members on how they can navigate this 'new' concept and be able to share their knowledge with the rest of the audit team members.
Many progressive internal audit teams have provided encouraging feedback on how their teams have managed to create better working relationships among the audit staff, and also with process owners and management, through the collaborative approach recommended in the agile methodology. Teams have also experienced credible returns on investment through timely execution of projects, insightful business recommendations, less friction with process owners, and supporting management in the timely implementation of internal audit recommendations.
target_audience: Both experienced and beginner internal auditors
Internal audit leaders with a desire to adopt and implement agile methodology in their practice
Experienced internal auditors who want to optimise internal audit value in the organisation
Internal audit trainers who require fundamental knowledge of lean concepts and agile internal audit methodology

courses.title: Basic Course on Financial Intelligence
courses.bio: Financial Intelligence with insights of Guru Chanakya

Art of Finance: Art of Finance - Principal of Conservatism
Art of Finance- Full Disclosure Principal
Setting the Objectives: Goal Setting and Tracking them till the completion
Conclusion: Inspiring Story of the Author of this Course Mr. Rahul Jain

requirements: No
courses.description:
Financial intelligence is required in all fields of the business. Most decisions taken by various managers/executives are in fact financial decisions. Sales manager should have awareness about the financials so that she can make decisions about discounts, credit terms etc. A decision as to the levels of stock to be maintained by the stores manager is a financial decision. Marketing manager should know about the product profitability to decide about the marketing campaigns. An HR decision as to the kind of people to recruit as per
the business priorities is also a financial decision.
So what is financial intelligence ?
Financial intelligence for business is understanding of how financial success is measured and how they have an impact on the company’s performance. For example we need to know the difference between profit and cash. Need to know why the balance sheet balances. The numbers neither scare nor mystify us.
Do you know that one of the major reasons of failure of the organization is
lack of financial intelligence ?
It may sound strange but probability that a company listed in Fortune 100 in 1960 is still listed is just 17%.  Greater financial intelligence, we’ve learned, helps people feel more involved and committed. They understand better what they are a part of, What the organization is trying to achieve, and how they affect results. Trust increases, turnover decreases, and financial results improve.
target_audience: Business Finance students or Non Finance Students who wants to enhance their knowledge about the subject.

requirements: Basic Accounting Knowledge: A foundational understanding of accounting principles and practices is necessary to grasp the course's applied AI concepts.
Openness to Technology: While no prior experience with AI is required, a willingness to embrace and learn about new technologies will be crucial for getting the most out of this course.
courses.description:
Welcome to "AI Revolution in Accounting: Navigating the Future," the definitive course designed for accounting professionals eager to master the transformative power of artificial intelligence in their field.
As the financial world becomes increasingly complex, accountants and accountancy practices face a barrage of challenges that can hinder their efficiency and competitiveness. This course offers a deep dive into the top five challenges currently shaking the world of accounting and presents AI-driven strategies and tools to turn these challenges into opportunities for growth and innovation.
Through a blend of theoretical knowledge and practical applications, you'll learn how AI can streamline operations, enhance decision-making, and provide a competitive edge. Whether you're an individual accountant looking to future-proof your career or a practice aiming to lead the industry, this course will empower you to leverage AI to your advantage.
Taking the "AI Revolution in Accounting: Navigating the Future," course will provide students with a multitude of benefits and outcomes that will enhance their professional capabilities and career prospects. Here are ten excellent benefits and outcomes that students can expect:


1. Enhanced Analytical Skills: Students will learn to use AI for sophisticated data analysis, helping them to interpret complex financial information more accurately and efficiently.


2. Increased Efficiency: By automating routine tasks, students will be able to focus on higher-level strategic work, thereby increasing their productivity and the efficiency of their practice.


3. Improved Accuracy: AI reduces human error in financial reporting and tax preparation, leading to more accurate outcomes and increased reliability of financial statements.


4. Strategic Decision Making: With a better grasp of predictive analytics and AI-driven forecasting, students can provide more strategic advice to their clients or employers, supporting better business decisions.


5. Competitive Edge: Understanding and implementing AI solutions will set students apart from their peers, positioning them as forward-thinking professionals in a competitive job market.


6. Innovation Leadership: Students will be equipped to lead innovation within their organizations by championing AI integration and digital transformation.


7. Risk Management: Knowledge of AI tools for fraud detection and compliance monitoring will enable students to better manage risks and protect their organisations from financial anomalies.


8. Client Satisfaction: By providing more insightful, timely, and personalized financial advice with the help of AI, students can enhance client satisfaction and retention.


9. Adaptability to Change: The course will prepare students to adapt to the rapidly evolving technological landscape of the accounting industry, ensuring long-term career viability.


10. New Service Offerings: Armed with AI expertise, students can develop new service lines for their firms, such as AI-driven financial analysis, predictive modelling, and intelligent automation consultancy.


The transformation for students taking this course will involve moving from traditional accounting practices to becoming innovative professionals who are well-versed in cutting-edge AI technology.
They will transition from reactive to proactive roles, using AI to anticipate and address challenges before they become issues. This proactive approach will not only increase their value within their current roles but also open up new career opportunities in the realm of financial technology and business advisory services.
target_audience: Accounting students, qualified accountants and accountancy practice managers along with those interested in understanding the top challenges that accountants face and how AI can be used to solve these challenges.

Bienvenidos!
Este curso esta realizado para personas que estén trabajando en Veterinarias, puede ser Desde un dueño de una veterinaria que no sea veterinario, una persona que se encargue de la venta en mostrador o un Veterinario que nos realiza las consultas a nuestros pacientes.
Hace mas de 12 años que me dedico a la gestión de Veterinarias y anteriormente trabaje en lugares donde pude tener conocimientos de diferentes materias como Marketing, Manejo de personal, etc.
Esto con los años me ha ayudado a crear un grupo de personas que trabajan de una forma eficiente y aplican los conocimientos de forma constante. Lo cual nos ha dado sus frutos a lo largo de los años.
Hoy en día que vivimos una crisis mundial es necesario mejorar día a día de la forma que podamos, todos tenemos cosas que podemos mejorar, pero lo mas importante del curso es mejorar para la atención a nuestro paciente, aumentar la confiabilidad del propietario y sobre todo aumentar nuestras ganancias.
Espero que les agrade la propuesta y los espero en el curso!.
Saludos.


Luis Terra.

MODULE 1- MEANING AND IMPORTANCE OF FINA: Understand meaning and importance of financial management
MODULE 2: UNDERSTANDING CAPITAL, TYPES O: UNDERSTANDING CAPITAL AND TYPES OF CAPITAL
MODULE 3: MEANING AND IMPORTANCE OF CAPI: Meaning and importance of Capital Budgeting

requirements: It will be useful if some prior knowledge of accountancy is possessed by the learner. However it can be even useful to a person who does not know much of it. Basic English is required as the course is designed in that language
Basic knowledge of accounting is recommended
courses.description: If you wish to undertake a new business or are looking for expanding the existing business this course is meant for you. This course will help you do the same. So owners of current business or the budding entrepreneur of startups can gain immensely from the understanding and financial knowledge given in this course.  Also students of MBA, BBA, BCom MCom, management students, CA, CWA, Financial analysts all can benefit from this course. Every business requires financial planning and checking its profitability. In other words financial feasibility should be checked before undertaking the project. The course will help you understand in detail how to do the capital budgeting of the business as well as take care of the various financial management issues arising in projects. The course has basic to advanced knowledge about the related subject and hence you will not necessarily require any commerce background for this. The course covers meaning and importance of financial management, time value of money, various techniques of capital budgeting including the payback period that is the most basic to the most important NPV method of capital budgeting. There are numerous illustrations that are solved in this course to give you a through understanding of the course. A handbook of the notes is also given in this.

courses.bio: Domine os números do negócio e conquiste o sucesso! Curso Prático!
objectives: Preparar um orçamento empresarial a partir do zero utilizando exemplos práticos.

Aprender e aplicar conceitos de FP&A no dia a dia dos negócios.

Introdução: O Excel na modelagem financeira para negócios

requirements: Nenhuma experiência prévia é requerida. Vamos avançando gradualmente nos conceitos e você pode ir no seu ritmo.
Você vai precisar do Microsoft Excel 2010, 2013 ou 2016. O mesmo conceito pode ser aplicado em outros aplicativos de planilhas, porém, ajustes serrão necessários (fórmulas).
courses.description:
O planejamento financeiro é o segredo para o sucesso empresarial, mas sabemos o quão desafiador pode ser para empreendedores, analistas financeiros e gestores.


Se você já se viu perdido no meio de metas de vendas, custos obscuros e lucratividade em baixa, tenho uma solução definitiva para você.


Apresento o Curso Prático de Planejamento e Modelagem Financeira para Pequenas e Médias Empresas.


Nunca mais perca noites de sono com planejamentos que não funcionam. Com o meu curso exclusivo de planejamento e modelagem financeira, você será capaz de trilhar o caminho do sucesso com segurança e confiança, como um verdadeiro profissional da área.


O que você vai aprender:
Construa uma simulação completa de uma estrutura de Demonstração do Resultado do Exercício (DRE) do absoluto zero.
Preveja com precisão as receitas, lucro bruto, EBITDA, EBIT, lucro líquido e todos os demais componentes.
Projeções financeiras para uma empresa fictícia ao longo de 5 anos, abordando cenários realistas.
Domine uma metodologia para distribuir metas mensais e até mesmo metas diárias para orientar o time comercial.
Todos os modelos são explicados passo a passo e disponibilizados para download, tornando o aprendizado simples e prático.
Por que fazer este curso:
Este curso foi desenvolvido sob medida para empresários, gestores, coordenadores e analistas que buscam um controle financeiro rigoroso e eficaz para o negócio. As aulas são estruturadas para que você possa tomar decisões embasadas nos números, garantindo o crescimento sustentável da sua empresa.


A porta de entrada para o mundo de FP&A:
Se você almeja uma carreira de sucesso na área de Financial Planning and Analysis, saiba que os modelos que são utilizados são os mesmos que empresas globais utilizam e você aprenderá as melhores práticas do mercado. Construa cenários com layouts limpos e formatação específica para negócios, tornando a leitura das informações fácil e objetiva.


Não deixe o sucesso financeiro da sua empresa para depois!


Aproveite esta oportunidade única para transformar seu planejamento financeiro e decolar seus resultados. Chegou a hora de tomar as rédeas do seu negócio e trilhar o caminho da prosperidade. Não perca mais tempo, inscreva-se agora mesmo e torne-se o mestre das finanças do seu empreendimento!


Lembre-se: O conhecimento é o maior investimento que você pode fazer para o seu negócio!
target_audience: Empreendedores de qualquer ramo de atuação e que queiram ter sucesso em seus negócios.
Gestores de todos os níveis e áreas, tendo em vista que planejamento e modelagem financeira é uma necessidade para qualquer atividade.
Profissionais que queiram dar os primeiros passos em Modelagem Financeira e FP&A.
Pessoas que queiram entender como se estrutura um orçamento empresarial.
Tomadores de decisão com base em números estatísticos.
Analistas e planejadores financeiros.

- 본서의 특징 -

6. 별도로 삽입된 「연말정산 흐름도」는 본서의 연말정산 세액계산 과정을 요약 정리한 내용으로 연말정산 과정을 한 눈에 이해할 수 있도록 작성

طريقة تاسيس شركة في امريكا بأقل ثمن، فتح حساب بنكي  امريكي و الحصول على رقم ضريبي لغير المقيمين


هل ترغب في التسويق دوليًا لمنتجاتك أوخدماتك ولكنك محظور بسبب القيود الدولية؟

يعتبر  سترايب أحد أكبر وأشهر البنوك الاليكترونية العالمية، حيث يمكنك من خلال القيام بتحويلات كبيرة من وإلى حسابك على  سترايب في بضع ثواني فقط، كما يمكنك أن تقوم بتحويل الأموال من سترايب الى حسابك البنكي .


يعتبر إنشاء حساب على  سترايب مهم للغاية في وقتنا الحالي، وهو ليس أمرا صعبا كما تعتقد بل امر في غاية السهولة، و اليك خطوات إنشاء حساب سترايب بالشكل الصحيح.


يمكن أن تأسس الشركة المحدودة المسؤلية في الولايات المتحدة الامريكية، مما يمنحك القدرة على فتح حساب تجاري معتمد وقبول المدفوعات الدولية مع إعفاء ضريبي لأنك لست مواطن أمريكي.


في هذه الفيديوهات المبسطة سوف تتعلم كيف تأسس الشركة المحدودة المسؤلية في الولايات المتحدة الامريكية بنفسك ودون الحاجة لوسيط ، هكذا ستوفر الكثير من المال وستحافظ على بياناتك الشخصية امنة

courses.title: Advanced Financial Management of Non Profit Organanisations
courses.bio: Financial Management of Non Profit Organanisations and Charities
objectives:  Understand the evolving nature of non-profit organisations and charities landscape including compliance aspects
 Apply financial management principles in a non-profit context and use the four facets of financial management to build stronger non-profit organisation
 Appreciate the importance of financial sustainability and the five facets of sustainability needed to remain a strong organisation
 Understand how to craft a robust financing strategy including an analysis of self-financing options and their limitations
 Learn to develop strategies to identify and manage risks faced by non-profit organisations
 Learn how to build a high performing non-profit organisation, understand the practicalities of introducing efficiency focus where social bonding is most value
Effective Governance process for non-profit organisations

Performance Management: Efficiency Vs Effectiveness and their Measures
Efficiency Focus and Management Controls: Challenges and Strategies for NPOs
Effective Governance: Role of Board of Directors in Sustainability
Conclusion: What have we learnt so far?

requirements: Understanding of finance and accounting concepts at intermediate level
courses.description:
Social injustice, income disparity, refugee crisis and natural disasters are on the increase in Australia. Hence the demands for the services provided by non-profit organisations are increasing as never before. However, funding these demands is becoming a concern for many organisations. The amount of money that people worldwide give to charity is growing but the rate it is growing has slowed down – 4.9% in 2015 compared to 7.8% a year ago (Probono:2015). Changing government policy, rising cost of living, elevated unemployment, and uncertain economic outlook are seen as some of the factors contributing to low growth in charitable giving. A resulting consequence is that non-profit organisations now have to do more with much less!
This is where sound financial management can help. Finance teams must step up their game, become proactive and build sustainable business models for these organisations in tough times. But are the finance teams ready? It is therefore timely that we upskill ourselves to meet the ever growing expectations placed on the finance function.
We shall begin our discussion with an overview of Non-Profit Organisations where we define what they are, what they do and how they resonate with private sector organisations needing them to be managed.
This course will enrich your financial acumen so you are better placed to lever on your skills to lead the organisation positively to deliver better social and financial outcomes
target_audience: Finance professionals working in, or new to, Non-profit organisations and charities
Program managers wanting more financial literacy

requirements: No se necesita conocimiento previo de la contabilidad, es un curso de contabilidad para principiantes
courses.description:
¿Quieres aprender lo más básico de la contabilidad?
Aprende desde cero qué significa la contabilidad y por qué se considera un servicio para sus usuarios; en más de seis horas de contenido teórico y práctico aprenderás:
- Concepto de contabilidad
- Ciencias afines a la contabilidad
- Tipos de contabilidad
- IASB - Normas Internacionales de Contabilidad (NIC`s)  y Normas Internacionales de Información Financiera (NIIF)
- ¿Qué es el Método Contable?
- ¿Cuándo se reconocen las operaciones en los Estados Financieros?
- ¿Cuál es la diferencia entre una Gran Empresa (GE) y una PYME en la contabilidad?
- Cuáles son los Principales Usuarios de la Contabilidad
- ¿En qué puedes trabajar si eres contable? ¿Cuánto gana un contable?
- Principios de Contabilidad: Comprensibilidad, relevancia, Materialidad o Importancia relativa, Fiabilidad, Esencia sobre la forma, Prudencia, Comparabilidad, Oportunidad, Negocio en marcha, Frecuencia de la Información Contable.
- Base de acumulación / Causación o Devengo vs Contabilidad Base Efectivo
- Cuentas Contables: Activo, Pasivo, Patrimonio, Ingresos y Gastos
- ¿Cómo elaborar un Plan de Cuentas Contable?
- Mayor Analítico / Cuentas T
- Balance de Comprobación ¿Cómo detectar errores al realizarlo?
- Teoría del Cargo y el Abono ¿Quién la creó? ¿Cómo se realiza en la práctica? ¿Qué es un asiento de diario?
- Ecuación Patrimonial / Ecuación Patrimonial Ampliada
- Libro Diario ¿Cómo se elabora? ¿Cuántos tipos existen?

courses.title: Gestión Integral de Riesgos
courses.bio: Aprende a identificar, medir y controlar los principales riesgos.
objectives: Identificar y definir los principales tipos de riesgos, comprendiendo su impacto en las organizaciones y el entorno económico.
Desarrollar habilidades para analizar, evaluar y mitigar riesgos a través de herramientas y otros enfoques metodológicos para diferentes tipos de riesgo.
Diseñar y aplicar procesos estructurados de gestión de riesgos, asegurando el cumplimiento normativo y la sostenibilidad organizacional.
Analizar tendencias emergentes, para anticiparse a los desafíos futuros en la administración de riesgos empresariales.

Introducción a la Gestión de Riesgos: Funciones de la administración de riesgos
Riesgos financieros: Riesgo de mercado: Riesgo de precio de instrumentos
Riesgo de mercado: Riesgo de tasa de interés
Riesgo de mercado: Riesgo de tipo de cambio
Riesgo de mercado: Valor en Riesgo (VaR)
Riesgo Legal, Riesgo de Documentación, Riesgo de Legislación
Riesgos no financieros: Gestión de Riesgos Ambientales y Sociales
Tendencias futuras: Tendencias futuras en la gestión de riesgos

requirements: No se requieren conocimientos previos avanzados, pero una actitud abierta y ganas de explorar conceptos clave de riesgos empresariales son fundamentales para aprovechar el curso al máximo.
courses.description:
En un mundo empresarial cada vez más complejo, la gestión de riesgos es clave para garantizar la estabilidad y el éxito de las organizaciones. Este curso te proporciona una formación integral sobre la identificación, evaluación, y mitigación de riesgos en diversos contextos financieros, operativos y estratégicos.
Comenzaremos explorando los fundamentos: ¿Qué es el riesgo y por qué es crucial gestionarlo? A lo largo del curso, profundizaremos en el proceso de administración de riesgos, aprendiendo cómo diseñar y aplicar estrategias efectivas para minimizar el impacto de eventos adversos.
Analizaremos los principales tipos de riesgos, incluyendo el riesgo de crédito (mayoristas y minoristas), de mercado (precios de instrumentos, tasas de interés, tipo de cambio y valor en riesgo - VaR), de liquidez, operativo, legal, normativo, reputacional, y de inflación. También abordaremos la creciente relevancia de la gestión de riesgos ambientales y exploraremos tendencias futuras en el campo.
Este curso combina teoría con prácticas reales, proporcionando herramientas como razones financieras y metodologías de análisis de riesgo. Está diseñado para profesionales, estudiantes y emprendedores interesados en fortalecer sus conocimientos en este ámbito.
Al finalizar, serás capaz de identificar riesgos potenciales, implementar soluciones estratégicas y contribuir a la sostenibilidad de cualquier organización. Prepárate para llevar tus habilidades al siguiente nivel y marcar una diferencia en el panorama empresarial. ¡Inscríbete ahora y comienza a gestionar riesgos con confianza!
target_audience: Ideal para profesionales que deseen aprender sobre cómo identificar, evaluar y mitigar riesgos en organizaciones, así como para estudiantes de administración, economía, finanzas o carreras afines.

courses.title: AI-Driven Carbon Accounting: Tools for Large Corporations
courses.bio: Tools to Offset and Inventory Carbon Calculations for Large Corporations
objectives: Understand AI’s Role in Carbon Accounting
Understand AI’s Role in Carbon Accounting
Optimize Carbon Reduction & Offsetting Strategies with AI
Implement AI-Driven Carbon Accounting in Organizations

AI Course Module: I: Introduction to AI in Carbon Accounting
AI Tools & Software for Carbon Accounting
AI Course Module: II: AI in Carbon Credit Markets & Offsetting
Implementing AI-Driven Carbon Accounting in Your Organization

requirements: There are no strict prerequisites for taking this course, making it accessible to professionals from various backgrounds. However, a basic understanding of corporate sustainability, carbon accounting principles, or ESG reporting will be beneficial. Familiarity with AI concepts, data analytics, or environmental policies can help learners grasp technical aspects more quickly, but these topics will be introduced in a beginner-friendly manner.
courses.description:
As global regulations tighten and corporate sustainability commitments grow, businesses must adopt advanced technologies to measure, report, and reduce their carbon footprint effectively. This course provides a comprehensive introduction to AI-driven carbon accounting, equipping professionals with the tools and strategies needed to automate emissions tracking, enhance reporting accuracy, and optimize carbon offsetting.
Throughout this course, you will explore how artificial intelligence, machine learning, and automation are revolutionizing carbon accounting for large corporations. You will learn how AI-powered tools can streamline data collection, emissions calculation, and regulatory reporting, ensuring compliance with global standards such as the GHG Protocol, CDP, and SEC Climate Disclosure Rules. The course also covers how AI enhances carbon credit trading, energy efficiency analysis, and predictive sustainability modeling.
By the end of this course, you will be able to:
Understand the role of AI in corporate carbon accounting and sustainability.
Use AI-powered tools to measure Scope 1, 2, and 3 emissions with high accuracy.
Automate carbon footprint reporting to meet regulatory and stakeholder expectations.
Apply AI-driven insights to reduce emissions, optimize energy use, and invest in carbon offset projects.
Implement AI-based carbon accounting systems in a corporate environment.
This course is designed for corporate sustainability professionals, business executives, environmental consultants, data analysts, and finance officers seeking to integrate AI into their carbon management strategy. Whether you are new to AI-powered sustainability or looking to enhance your existing approach, this course will provide practical knowledge and real-world applications to drive meaningful environmental impact.
target_audience: Corporate Sustainability & ESG Professionals – Those responsible for tracking and reducing carbon emissions within large organizations.
Business Executives & Decision-Makers – Leaders looking to implement AI-driven sustainability strategies and ensure compliance with carbon regulations.
Environmental Consultants & Carbon Market Analysts – Professionals working in climate finance, carbon offsetting, and sustainability consulting.
Data Scientists & AI Enthusiasts – Those interested in applying machine learning and AI to environmental challenges.
Finance & Compliance Officers – Individuals ensuring adherence to corporate carbon reporting regulations and managing carbon-related financial risks.

Course Overview:
Unlock the complexities of fund accounting with our specialized 3-hour course, "Fund Accounting: Mastering Journal Entries in Mutual Funds, Hedge Funds, and Private Equity Funds." This intensive program is meticulously crafted to provide in-depth insights into the accounting intricacies associated with capital, subscriptions, expenses, incomes, and redemptions in the context of various funds.
Module 1: Introduction to Fund Accounting (30 minutes)

Module 2: Capital and Subscription Journal Entries (45 minutes)

Module 3: Expenses: Accruals and Prepaid Journal Entries (45 minutes)

Prepaid expenses in the context of fund accounting.
Practical examples and case studies on managing expenses.
Module 4: Incomes - Dividends/Interest Journal Entries (30 minutes)
Recording dividend and interest incomes.
Distinguishing between different income sources.
Special considerations for income recognition in fund accounting.
Module 5: Redemptions/Distributions Journal Entries (45 minutes)
Comprehensive understanding of redemptions and distribution processes.
Journal entries related to fund returns and distributions to investors.
Handling tax implications and regulatory considerations.
Module 6: Practical Applications and Case Studies (30 minutes)
Application of learned concepts through real-world case studies.
Practical scenarios to reinforce understanding.
Q&A session for participant engagement.
Benefits:
Gain a profound understanding of fund accounting journal entries.
Navigate the unique challenges of Mutual Funds, Hedge Funds, and Private Equity Funds.
Enhance your skills in accurately recording capital, subscriptions, expenses, incomes, and redemptions.
Learn from industry experts with hands-on experience in fund accounting.
Practical insights applicable to the real-world fund management environment.
Enroll now to elevate your fund accounting expertise and master the art of recording precise journal entries in the books of Mutual Funds, Hedge Funds, and Private Equity Funds.

courses.description:
We are glad to bring you a preparation course for the Part 2 of the Institute of Internal Auditor’s (IIA) Certified Internal Auditor (CIA) certification.
This teaches the new syllabus of the CIA and includes a 402 page slide deck given to download in the course.
You can start with any part of the CIA, and starting with the CIA Part 2 will give you the knowledge and tools necessary to perform, supervise and eventually manage internal audits.
This course aims to decrease the time you need to prepare for the exam. It includes instructor support for your questions.
It will review the key notions necessary for the exam and includes practice questions in each section and tips on exam strategy.
The course will help you learn how to perform internal audit, starting from how to plan them, to how to perform and report on engagement results.
You will learn tricky concepts such as how to perform risk-assessments and how to evaluate information.
Most importantly, it aims to help you ‘think’ like an internal auditor, which I find is essential for scoring highly on the exam as well as being a great internal auditor.

C. Engagement Supervision and Communication

courses.bio: Hotel management and operational expense accounting
objectives: The profit- and loss statement
Understanding the cost- and profit centers

How to allocate operational expenses

requirements: Basic understanding of the hospitality market
Basic understanding of hotel operations
courses.description:
This course 'Cost accounting for the hospitality industry' is based towards students who are somewhat new to hospitality industry or small business owners who want to learn more about cost management, budgetting and optimizing hotel revenue.
Cost management is an important strategy to apply to increase or maximize profits. While setting up a costing system is not an easy task, it is important to have such a system in place. In this course we will discuss some elements and how to incorporate these into a system to increase accuracy in cost accounting.
If you have little to no experience when it comes to cost management this course will help you understand what it is and how Full costing, Variable costing and Activity based costing contribute to your business. In this course we will try to break some complex techniques down into smaller more easy to understand parts, so you can start implementing these in your hotel. And even in other businesses.
Together we will discuss all the basics of cost accounting and go over some of the steps needed to set up a simple system. By the end of this course you will have a solid foundation and basic understanding of, what cost accounting is, why it is important to have such a system in place and what elements are involved.
In this course we'll go even a step further and incorporate market segmentation as well to define what markets are profitable for our hotel.
When you've finished this course you'll understand what cost accounting is and how it might benefit your business. We will discuss  profit centers, service centers, cost centers, activity centers and allocation keys. We set up a system with first-stage cost drivers and second stage cost drivers.  You will learn how to determine the profitability for each activity center and market segment. To finish course by calculating the actual cost price for guests within market segments and figure out what the actual cost of a service or product is.
target_audience: Hotel managers

courses.title: Mastering IFRS 17: Comprehensive Guide to Insurance Contract
courses.bio: Understand IFRS 17 in Depth: GMM, PAA, VFA, Reinsurance, CSM, and Practical Illustrations
objectives: Understand the core objective and scope of IFRS 17.
Identify what constitutes an insurance contract and distinguish it from financial contracts.
Understand separation of non-insurance components from insurance contracts.
Learn how to aggregate insurance contracts into portfolios and groups.
Apply the General Measurement Model (GMM) to measure insurance contracts.
Analyze the concept of Contractual Service Margin (CSM), fulfilment cash flows, and risk adjustment.
Use the Premium Allocation Approach (PAA) for short-duration contracts.
Account for reinsurance contracts held and recognize gains/losses appropriately.
Implement the Variable Fee Approach (VFA) for contracts with direct participation features.
Explore practical illustrations and journal entries for each model.

Introduction: Separating Non-Insurance Components from an Insurance Contract
Level of Aggregation of Insurance Contracts
General Measurement Model (Building Bloc: Illustration on Subsequent Measurement with No Change in Estimates
Illustration on Subsequent Measurement with Favorable Change in Estimates
Illustration on Subsequent Measurement with Unfavorable Change in Estimates

requirements: Basic understanding of accounting and financial reporting concepts.
Familiarity with IFRS principles is helpful but not mandatory.
No actuarial background required — concepts are explained from an accountant’s perspective.
courses.description:
IFRS 17: Insurance Contracts is one of the most transformative and complex standards introduced by the IASB, redefining how insurance contracts are recognized, measured, and disclosed. In this comprehensive course, you will master the entire framework of IFRS 17: Insurance Contracts through clear explanations, real-world examples, and step-by-step illustrations.
We begin by laying a strong foundation—explaining what qualifies as an insurance contract and how to identify insurance risk. From there, we move into the core measurement models:
1) The General Measurement Model (GMM), the standard approach applicable to most contracts.
2) The Premium Allocation Approach (PAA), a simplified model ideal for short-term contracts.
3) The Variable Fee Approach (VFA), applicable to contracts with direct participation features.
You’ll also learn about Contractual Service Margin (CSM), fulfilment cash flows, discounting, and risk adjustments, ensuring you grasp the technical intricacies.
The course also covers Reinsurance contracts held, separation of non-insurance components, level of aggregation, and annual cohorts. Each topic is supported by journal entries, real-life examples, and practical illustrations—making complex concepts easy to digest.
Whether you're an accounting student, a financial reporting professional in the insurance industry, or an auditor, this course gives you the tools and clarity to navigate IFRS 17 with confidence.
target_audience: ACCA, CA, and CPA students preparing for professional financial reporting exams.
Insurance company accountants, finance professionals, and auditors.
Professionals involved in financial reporting, actuarial services, and regulatory compliance.
Anyone interested in gaining a deep understanding of IFRS 17 and insurance contract accounting.

Te gustaría adquirir una de las habilidades más solicitadas por las empresas en la actualidad o tal vez te gustaría ampliar tus conocimientos para mejorar tu éxito laboral o quizás quieres aprender Excel desde cero desde lo más básico hasta el nivel avanzado para convertirte en un experto en usar esta herramienta , si tu respuesta fue que si a alguna de estas preguntas , déjame comentarte que estas en el lugar y en el curso correcto , este curso es ideal para todos aquellos que deseen aprender desde cero esta herramienta pero también es perfecto para aquellos que ya poseen cierto conocimiento de Excel y quieran o necesiten perfeccionarse aún más , mi nombre es rodrigo soto y seré tu profesor en este curso de Excel .
El dominio de Microsoft Excel es una de las habilidades más buscadas por los empleadores, de hecho, un gran porcentaje de anuncios de trabajos las empresas piden como requisito saber utilizar Excel al menos hasta el nivel intermedio.
En este curso te enseñare varios ejercicios donde podrás poner en práctica los conocimientos adquiridos , mucho de estos ejercicios los explico en video por lo que tendrás la posibilidad de desarrollarlos conmigo y si usted tiene alguna duda podrás consultarnos directamente mediante esta plataforma cuando culmines el curso tendrás la posibilidad de recibir un certificado de Udemy , este certificado es un documento que podrás imprimir y mostrar como evidencia que empezaste y terminaste con éxito este curso de Excel online.
En este curso se te enseñara las funciones más destacadas de Excel las cuales son las más utilizadas hoy en día empezaremos conociendo un poco sobre la interfaz de Excel para después empezar a crear nuestras primeras tablas pero también aprenderemos a juntarlas con gráficos dinámicos , veremos cómo podemos utilizar las funciones condicionales la herramientas de Solver , Power View y Power pivot , también veremos cómo podremos crear gráficos interactivos los cuales nos serán de gran ayuda a la hora de realizar presentaciones , también aprenderemos a manejar las funciones de textos necesarias para modificar a nuestro gusto los datos , finalmente aprenderemos a manejar macros de una manera muy sencilla y haremos una introducción al lenguaje de programación de Excel que es VBA para poder crear un formulario , ventanas emergentes . automatizar procesos y también aprenderemos a insertar botones a nuestras hojas de Excel que serán de mucha ayuda.

Este curso está organizado en 4 áreas o etapas:

Intermedio: Aquí tocaremos temas como las funciones Si y BuscarV. También hablaremos de herramientas como las Tablas Dinámicas.
Avanzado: ¿Qué temas vemos acá? Listas Desplegables Dependientes, Validación y Protección de Hojas, Escenarios y Macros….por nombrar algunos.


Si todo esto es como música para tus oídos, si te hace sentido….estás en el lugar correcto. ¡Aprende hoy Excel para no quedar fuera de mercado y aumentar CONSIDERABLEMENTE tu confianza, tu tranquilidad económica y tus posibilidades de lograr ese tan ansiado éxito laboral! Presiona el botón “COMPRAR AHORA” que está en la pantalla.

Funciones del Gerente Administrativo y Financiero - Parte 2

courses.description:
El curso de Gerente Administrativo y Financiero está meticulosamente diseñado para equipar a los profesionales con competencias avanzadas en la gestión eficiente de las operaciones administrativas y financieras de una organización. A través de una estructura modular, el curso abarca aspectos cruciales que van desde la administración estratégica hasta el dominio financiero.
Contenidos del curso:
Funciones del Gerente Administrativo y Financiero: Claves para liderar en roles de gestión administrativa y financiera con competencia y confianza.
Administración y Finanzas: Fundamentos sólidos en prácticas administrativas y estrategias financieras para una gestión efectiva.
Organización Empresarial: Técnicas para estructurar una empresa eficientemente, incluyendo la elaboración de organigramas y manuales.
Manejo de Tesorería: Estrategias para la administración óptima de efectivo y bancos, incluyendo la gestión de caja chica y general.
Manejo de Cuentas por Cobrar: Métodos efectivos para optimizar el crédito y cobrar deudas.
Manejo de Almacenes: Estrategias para una gestión de almacén eficaz que contribuya a la cadena de suministro.
Sistemas de Control Interno: Implementación de sistemas de control para la integridad financiera y operativa.
Análisis e Interpretación de Estados Financieros: Habilidades para examinar y entender los estados financieros para guiar la toma de decisiones.
Presupuesto: Desarrollo de habilidades para la creación y gestión de presupuestos acordes a los objetivos empresariales.
Flujo de Caja: Estrategias para la proyección y gestión del flujo de efectivo, esencial para la liquidez y la planificación financiera.
Recursos Humanos: En este apartado aprenderás a medir el clima laboral y cómo seleccionar al mejor personal para tu empresa.
Balanced Scorecard: Herramienta de gestión empresarial, que sirve para alinear y controlar las estrategias de la empresa con indicadores clave en finanzas, clientes, procesos y aprendizaje.
target_audience: Empresarios, emprendedores, gerentes, jefes, ejecutivos, administradores, y público en general, que tenga ganas de aprender como ser un excelente Gerente Administrativo y Financiero.

courses.title: 【会計力アップに！】いちばんわかりやすい「粉飾決算」の見破り方
courses.bio: 会計不正は意外に身近で起こっています。粉飾を行うと財務諸表に”歪み”が生じます。あなたはその”歪み”に気づけますか？本コースでは、会計不正発見に有効な7つの分析手法をお伝えするとともに、実際に起きた６つの粉飾事例をご紹介します。
objectives: 会計不正が起きるメカニズム
よく使われる粉飾の手口
効率的かつ効果的に数値をチェックする方法
粉飾決算を発見するための7つの分析手法
粉飾発見に必要な財務諸表の基礎知識
粉飾を行うと財務諸表のどこに歪みが生じるのか

はじめに: このコースのテキストはこちらからダウンロードできます。
会計不正の仕組み: このセクションで学ぶこと
上場企業における会計不正の公表会社数の推移
会計不正の類型と公表件数の割合
不正のトライアングル
財務諸表の特徴と粉飾の目的: このセクションで学ぶこと
在庫を増やすとなぜ利益が増えるのか？
粉飾発見のための財務分析手法: このセクションで学ぶこと
財務諸表の”歪み”を察知する7つの方法
①営業利益の推移と営業CFの推移の比較
③財務項目と非財務項目との相関関係
⑥売上債権回転期間の活用方法
⑦棚卸資産回転期間の活用方法
事例問題（実際にあった粉飾決算を題材に、粉飾の兆候を発見してみよう！）: このセクションで学ぶこと

requirements: 『いちばんわかりやすい決算書の読み方講座』の事前受講を推奨します。
『いちばんわかりやすい簿記の基本』の事前受講を推奨します。
courses.description:
売上ノルマを達成するために、不正に手を染める営業担当者
業績不振を隠蔽するために、P/Lの数値をいじってしまう事業責任者
株価下落を避けるために、赤字を黒字に見せかける経営者
会計数値を不正に操作する「粉飾決算」が後を絶ちません。
粉飾された決算を信じて株式投資をしてしまったら、大きな損失を被ってしまいます。
会社の数値を管理する役職者であれば、報告を受けた数値に嘘やごまかしが潜んでないか、チェックする責任があります。


会計不正を行うと、財務諸表のどこかに”歪み”が生じます。
あなたはその”歪み”を察知できますか？
ただ漫然と数字を眺めていたのでは、まんまと騙されてしまいます。


本コースでは、不正が起こるのメカニズムと、不正が起きやすい財務諸表の特徴、粉飾発見のための財務分析手法などを体得することができます。
私がかつて、監査法人や証券会社、コンサルティング会社時代に培った知識・ノウハウを本コースに詰め込みました。
そして、コース最後には、実際に起きた粉飾の事例を使った、粉飾発見問題に取り組んでいただきます。


一定の会計リテラシーがないと、粉飾の兆候を発見できません。
裏を返せば、本コースで粉飾決算の見抜き方をマスターすると、あなたの会計リテラシーは飛躍的に向上します。


ぜひ本コースを通じて、会計力を向上させましょう！
target_audience: 株式投資を行っている個人投資家
事業部責任者、プロジェクト責任者、子会社管理担当者
内部監査担当者、経理担当者
会計監査の裏側を知りたい方
会計リテラシーをさらに高めたい方

courses.title: Mente Próspera
courses.bio: Desenvolva um MindSet no sucesso, na abundância financeira e na prosperidade com propósito
objectives: Ao concluir este curso, você será capaz de lidar com as finanças pessoais de uma forma mais tranquila, gerando riqueza e atraindo a paz e o conforto que o dinheiro pode oferecer.

Não é um curso que vai simplesmente lhe ajudar a organizar suas finanças pessoais, é muito mais do que isso! É um curso que vai mudar a sua visão sobre prosperidade. Ganhar dinheiro não é pecado é uma virtude.
Você aprenderá como transformar sonhos em resultados financeiros. Aprenderá ainda como mudar o seu MindSet para prosperar tanto na sua carreira profissional como na vida pessoal.

Na prática você terá aprendido o que não deve mais fazer com relação ao seu dinheiro. Aprenderá novos comportamentos e atitudes que criarão novos hábitos e novas crenças para o tão sonhado crescimento pessoal. Desenvolverá enfim a mentalidade da abundância e não da escassez!
requirements: O pré-requisito é um desejo enorme de ter uma vida mais próspera
courses.description:
O QUE ESTE CURSO PODE ME OFERECER?
Uma nova mentalidade! Um MindSet focado no sucesso e na prosperidade. Uma nova maneira de lidar com as suas crenças sobre o dinheiro.
A maior parte das pessoas querem ganhar dinheiro, mas quando ganham SOFREM mais do que imaginam. A tão sonhada FELICIDADE que o dinheiro pode trazer vira um pesadelo quando as pessoas se inundam em contas, dívidas e sonhos que nunca chegam.
UMA NOVA ABORDAGEM!
“Criei um curso totalmente prático e repleto de dicas para que você possa desenvolver uma nova mentalidade financeira. É possível eliminar a ‘mente pobre’ e dar lugar a ‘mente rica’, para depois prosperar.” (Marco Meda)
Prosperidade não significa apenas ganhar dinheiro, mas principalmente desenvolver uma relação positiva com os presentes que universo pode lhe oferecer.
O QUE FAREI NA PRÁTICA?
Ao concluir este curso, você será capaz de lidar com as finanças pessoais de uma forma mais tranquila, gerando riqueza e atraindo a paz e o conforto que o dinheiro pode oferecer. Não é um curso que vai simplesmente lhe ajudar a organizar suas finanças pessoais, é muito mais do que isso! É um curso que vai mudar a sua visão sobre prosperidade. Ganhar dinheiro não é pecado é uma virtude. Você aprenderá como transformar sonhos em resultados financeiros. Aprenderá ainda como mudar o seu MindSet para prosperar tanto na sua carreira profissional como na vida pessoal.
Na prática você terá aprendido o que não deve mais fazer com relação ao seu dinheiro. Aprenderá novos comportamentos e atitudes que criarão novos hábitos e novas crenças para o tão sonhado crescimento pessoal. Desenvolverá enfim a mentalidade da abundância e não da escassez!
Primeiro é necessária uma mente prospera para depois conquistar a prosperidade.
SERÁ QUE EU CONSIGO?
Se você se dispor a se livrar das velhas crenças que seus antepassados lhes ensinaram sobre dinheiro e estiver aberto a entender como funciona a mente dos ricos e assim aprender com eles, sim você também conseguirá.
Não é auto-ajuda, é prosperidade mesmo!
target_audience: Todos aqueles que buscam prosperidade!

courses.title: Master Global Taxation for a Borderless World
courses.bio: Become a Certified International Tax Specialist in DTAs: STEP, CIOT, IFA, CPA, CIOT, ADIT and More.
objectives: Comprehend Core Principles of International Tax Law: Learners will be able to explain and apply fundamental concepts of international taxation, including reside
Interpret and Apply Tax Treaties: Learners will develop the ability to analyze and interpret the articles of bilateral tax treaties based on the OECD Model Tax
Navigate Key International Tax Regimes and Issues: Learners will gain a working knowledge of significant international tax regimes and contemporary issues, such
Identify and Analyze International Tax Planning Opportunities and Risks: Learners will be equipped to recognize potential international tax planning strategies
Identify Relevant International Tax Certifications and Their Requirements: Learners will be able to research and identify prominent international tax certificat
Develop a Strategic Approach to Certification Preparation: Learners will gain insights into effective study techniques and resources specifically tailored for i

Structure and Key Provisions of DTAs: Structure and Key Provisions of DTAs
Structure and Key Provisions DTAs & Methods to Eliminates Double taxation
Interpreting & Applying Double Taxation: Interaction between Domestic and Tax laws & DTAs
Interaction Between Domestic Tax Laws and DTAs
Case Studies and Deeper Analysis: Case Study: Individual Tax residency Determination
Case Study: Dividends, Interest and Royalty Payments under DTAs
Navigating Double Taxation: Real-World Role Play in International Tax Strategy & Compliance
OECD's Base Erosion and Profit Shifting: OECD's Base Erosion and Profit Shifting (BEPS) project
OECD's Base Erosion and Profit Shifting (BEPS) project

requirements: Recommended Skills and Knowledge: Basic Understanding of Domestic Taxation: Familiarity with the fundamental principles of income tax in at least one jurisdiction would be beneficial. This includes concepts like taxable income, deductions, and tax rates.

Recommended Skills and Knowledge: Basic Business Acumen: A general understanding of how businesses operate, including different organizational structures and common types of transactions, will be helpful in grasping the context of international tax issues.

Recommended Skills and Knowledge: Analytical and Problem-Solving Skills: The ability to analyze complex information, interpret regulations, and solve problems based on given scenarios will be valuable in understanding and applying international tax concepts.

Recommended Skills and Knowledge: Comfort with Legal and Regulatory Texts: International tax often involves interpreting laws and treaties. Being comfortable reading and understanding legal-style documents will be an advantage.
courses.description:
In today’s globalized economy, international tax expertise is no longer optional—it's essential. Whether you're a tax advisor, finance professional, lawyer, or student aiming to specialize in cross-border taxation, this all-inclusive course equips you with the knowledge and practical skills needed to excel in the dynamic world of global tax compliance and international tax planning.
This meticulously crafted program delves into the fundamental building blocks of international taxation, guiding you through intricate concepts such as residency rules, the definition of permanent establishment, and the globally significant principles of transfer pricing. You will gain a robust understanding of how different jurisdictions tax cross-border income flows, including dividends, interest, and royalties, and learn to navigate the crucial interplay between domestic tax laws and the vast network of international tax treaties.
A core focus of this course is equipping you with the skills to interpret and apply bilateral tax treaties effectively. Based on the widely recognized OECD Model Tax Convention, you will learn to decipher treaty articles, determine taxing rights between contracting states, and understand the mechanisms designed to prevent the detrimental effects of double taxation. Furthermore, we will navigate the evolving landscape of international tax, exploring key regimes and contemporary issues like the OECD's Base Erosion and Profit Shifting (BEPS) project, the taxation of the burgeoning digital economy, and the far-reaching implications of ongoing global tax developments for multinational enterprises.
Beyond theoretical understanding, this course emphasizes practical application. You will develop the critical ability to identify and analyze international tax planning opportunities, while also gaining a keen awareness of potential risks and the ever-important aspects of compliance. Through real-world examples and insightful case studies, you will learn to evaluate the tax implications of diverse cross-border transactions and intricate business structures from a truly international perspective.
This course is an optimal starting point for whos is willing to obtain the following certifications


STEP (Society of Trust and Estate Practitioners)
CIOT (Chartered Institute of Taxation)
IFA (International Fiscal Association)
IBFD Advanced Professional Certificate in International Taxation (APCIT)
IBFD Advanced Professional Certificate in International VAT/GST (APCVAT)
IBFD Advanced Professional Certificate in Transfer Pricing (APCTP)
ADIT (Advanced Diploma in International Taxation)
U.S. International Tax Certificate (AICPA & CIMA)
Certified International Tax Analyst (CITA) (GAFM)
Diploma in International Tax (The Association of Taxation Technicians - ATT)
Chartered Professional Accountant (CPA)


Keywords & Tags for SEO (Udemy metadata optimization):
international tax, global taxation, cross-border taxation, transfer pricing, OECD model, tax treaty interpretation, BEPS, multinational tax planning, ADIT, international finance, global tax certification, U.S. international tax, OECD tax rules, digital economy taxation, international VAT, international corporate tax, tax residency, permanent establishment
target_audience: Aspire to obtain professional certifications in international taxation: This includes those preparing for exams offered by organizations like STEP (Society of Trust and Estate Practitioners), CIOT (Chartered Institute of Taxation), IFA (International Fiscal Association), or other relevant local or international bodies. The course content is structured to cover key concepts and principles frequently tested in these certifications.

Are tax professionals seeking to specialize in international taxation: This includes tax advisors, accountants, lawyers, and consultants who want to expand their expertise beyond domestic taxation and develop a strong understanding of cross-border tax issues.

Work in multinational companies and need to understand international tax implications: This includes finance managers, in-house tax counsel, and other professionals involved in cross-border transactions, transfer pricing, and global tax compliance.

Are students or recent graduates in finance, accounting, or law: This course provides a comprehensive introduction to international taxation, equipping them with valuable knowledge and skills for future careers in the globalized economy.

Are individuals with a foundational understanding of domestic taxation who want to expand their knowledge into the international arena: If you have a grasp of basic tax principles and are curious about how taxation works across borders, this course will provide a clear and structured pathway to understanding international tax.

Seek a practical understanding of international tax treaties and their application: Anyone who needs to interpret and apply bilateral tax treaties in their professional role or for personal interest will find this course highly valuable.

courses.title: How to Get Out of Foreclosure with a Loan Modification
courses.bio: Your step by step guide to get out of foreclosure with a loan modification
objectives: How to Get Out of Foreclosure with a Loan Modification

Loan Modification

How to Get Out of Foreclosure with a Loa: Part 3: Discussing Loan Modification with Your Lender
Part 6: Staying in Contact with Your Lender During the Review Process
Part 8: Getting Back on Track with your Home Mortgage Loan

requirements: No experience necessary - All levels welcome - Beginners, Intermediate, & Advanced
courses.description:
If You Want To Learn How to Get Out of Foreclosure with a Loan Modification, Then Get This Potentially Life Saving Guide!
A home loan remodification is a method you may qualify for that allows you to get current again. If you are behind several payments, you may be in fear of foreclosure. Perhaps that process has already been started and you are afraid you will lose your home. A loan remodification can allow you to re-age your loan and get a payment you can afford with your current financial circumstances.
Instead of trying to come up with a lump sum of money to save your home, you only have to focus on being able to meet that monthly mortgage payment. The process to qualify for a home loan remodification takes time and you have to follow the steps or you can be denied for failure to comply.
Once your application is in motion, the foreclosure process will be put on hold. This gives you and the mortgage company time to go through all of the paperwork and see what can be done. Most lenders want to extend a remodification loan to you rather than foreclosure on the property. With that in mind, it is to your advantage to see if you qualify.


About the Expert
I didn’t know about loan remodification until my home was already in foreclosure. I was trying to explore my options and came across the details. I was frustrated that my mortgage company hadn’t taken the time to share that with me as a possibility. They had no trouble calling me at least twice per week to ask for the full amount I was due. They refused to take payments and didn’t seem to care about the reason why I was getting behind.
Armed with information, I called them and asked for a loan remodification application. I am glad I did as it got me back on track with my home loan. I am hopeful this process can do the same for you. If you are facing foreclosure, you definitely want to look into home loan remodification as an opportunity.
target_audience: Anyone interested in research about foreclosures and loan modifications.

courses.title: Accounting For Material
courses.bio: UK ACCA FMA/MA Chapter 3
objectives: Students who wish to study ACCA FMA/MA subject
Students who wish to study Accounting for Material
requirements: None
courses.description:
ACCA is one of the fastest growing association, of Chartered Accountants of UK. In this course, we are providing one of the subject, (Management Accounting) of its first level called as Knowledge Level. Management accounting helps managers within a company make decisions. Also known as cost accounting, management accounting is the process of identifying, analyzing, interpreting and communicating information to managers to help achieve business goals. You'll develop knowledge and understanding of management accounting techniques to support management in planning, controlling and monitoring performance in a variety of business contexts. Overall aim is to develop knowledge and understanding of management accounting techniques to support management in planning, controlling and monitoring performance in a variety of business contexts. The syllabus for Management Accounting (MA)/(FMA), introduces candidates to elements of management accounting which are used to make and support decisions. The syllabus starts by introducing the nature, the source and purpose of management information followed by the statistical techniques used to analyse data. Then the syllabus addresses cost accounting and the costing techniques used in business which are essential for any management accountant. The syllabus then looks at the preparation and use of budgeting and standard costing and variance analysis as essential tools for planning and controlling business activities. The syllabus concludes with an introduction to measuring and monitoring the performance of an organisation.
On successful completion of this exam, candidates should be able to:
A Explain the nature, source and purpose of management information
B Explain and analyse data analysis and statistical techniques
C Explain and apply cost accounting techniques
D Prepare budgets for planning and control
E Compare actual costs with standard costs and analyse any variances
F Explain and apply performance measurements and monitor business performance.


You will study in this course Chapter 5 - Accounting for Material
target_audience: Students who wish to study ACCA FMA/MA subject
Students who wish to study Accounting for Material
