courses.description:
The mortgage loan application process is a great time to get to know the borrower. This has two benefits, uncovering tricky details early and building a relationship for future referrals.
This class will give you familiarity with the application and pointers to make the conversations flow smoothly. You will gain confidence in the process and structure quality loans. You will have answers to your borrower's many questions.
The class informs you about various documentation required to verify the data on the application. The goal is to teach you to think logically about what type of documentation would suffice in each instance since each borrower’s profile is different – no two loans are alike.
You will learn to set expectations with the borrowers from the beginning and establish a relationship, so they are eager to help and willing to obtain the documentation necessary for their specific situation.
Your processors, underwriters, and closers will enjoy your pipeline and trust the quality of your submissions.

courses.description:
The insurance industry is undergoing a radical transformation, driven by artificial intelligence, blockchain, and IoT. Whether you're a student, professional, or entrepreneur, this course will equip you with the knowledge to navigate this evolving landscape.


In this comprehensive course, you’ll explore the fundamental principles of insurance, including utmost good faith, insurable interest, and indemnity, backed by real-world cases like the Wells Fargo scandal and NFT insurance disputes. You’ll dive into traditional insurance products like life and property coverage, as well as cutting-edge solutions such as cyber insurance, parametric policies, and gig economy coverage.


Discover how AI is revolutionizing underwriting—Allianz’s system processes 15,000 data points per applicant, reducing approval times by 70%. Learn how blockchain enables instant payouts for flight delays and natural disasters, eliminating traditional claims processing. Understand the role of IoT sensors in preventing losses, from water leaks to auto accidents.


We’ll also examine emerging career paths, including Cyber Risk Analysts, Insurtech Product Managers, and AI Underwriting Specialists, with insights into required skills and salary benchmarks.


By the end of this course, you’ll have a practical understanding of how technology is reshaping insurance, along with the tools to leverage these changes for career growth or business innovation.


Enroll now to master the future of risk management!
target_audience: Insurance professionals adapting to digital disruption
Students pursuing careers in risk management or insurtech
Entrepreneurs exploring insurance-related startups
Anyone curious about the intersection of finance and technology

This course offers finance professionals and accountants a comprehensive introduction to the world of microfinance, with a strong emphasis on digital transformation. Beginning with the historical evolution and foundational principles of microfinance, learners will gain insight into how these financial services empower low-income individuals and small businesses in underserved communities. The course also explores the structure and operation of various microfinance institutions (MFIs), including regulatory frameworks and organizational models.
In today’s rapidly evolving financial landscape, digital technologies are revolutionizing microfinance delivery. This course delves into the adoption of online and mobile banking platforms, the rise of digital payment systems, and the integration of fintech solutions within microfinance models. Learners will examine case studies on mobile wallets, digital lending platforms, and digital savings tools, understanding how these innovations enhance financial access and inclusion.
Additionally, the course addresses critical issues such as cybersecurity in digital microfinance, sustainable business models, and the use of data analytics for impact assessment. Participants will explore emerging technologies like AI and blockchain, evaluating their transformative potential in the microfinance sector. By the end of the course, learners will be equipped with the knowledge and tools to support and lead digital microfinance initiatives that are secure, scalable, and socially impactful.
In this master course, I would like to teach the major topics:

Module 4: Digital Payment Ecosystems in Microfinance

Limitations and Challenges in Stress Testing
Stress Testing and Scenario Analysis in Credit Risk Management
Hands-On-Learning: Conducting a Stress Test on a Credit Portfolio
Project: ESG in Credit Risk Assessment

requirements: **Answer:** No prior credit experience needed. Basic finance familiarity helps, but all tools and concepts are taught in the course.
courses.description:
Credit Analysis in Action: Economic and Industry Essentials is an advanced, hands-on course designed for professionals and students seeking to deepen their understanding of credit risk through macroeconomic, industry-specific, and ESG lenses. Over four focused hours, learners will gain critical insights into the drivers of credit risk and how to apply professional analysis techniques in real-world scenarios.
The course begins with a comprehensive exploration of macroeconomic factors—such as interest rates, inflation, and business cycles—and their direct impact on credit quality. Industry-specific risk dynamics are also examined to help learners assess sector vulnerabilities throughout market cycles.
In the second module, we dive into specialized credit markets, including high-yield and distressed debt. You’ll learn how to evaluate the risks and rewards of speculative-grade instruments, understand restructuring and recovery processes, and compare them to investment-grade bonds.
The third module integrates ESG (Environmental, Social, and Governance) factors into credit analysis, covering how these non-financial elements affect credit ratings and decision-making. Real-world examples and evolving trends provide a practical ESG framework.
The capstone module pulls everything together through stress testing, debt covenants, and a complete credit analysis case study. By course end, you will be equipped to conduct holistic credit assessments using professional tools and methodologies.
target_audience: **Answer:** Finance professionals, credit analysts, and business students looking to deepen their credit analysis skills with real-world applications.

courses.description:
A calendar spread is an options strategy established by simultaneously entering a long and short position on the same underlying asset but with different delivery dates.
In a typical calendar spread, one would buy a longer-term contract and go short a nearer-term option with the same strike price. A calendar spread is most profitable when the underlying asset does not make any significant moves in either direction until after the near-month option expires. Thus taking advantage of the exponential time decay on the nearer month option contract.
The purpose of the trade is to profit from the passage of time and/or an increase in implied volatility in a directionally neutral strategy.
In this course you'll learn-
-The rationale, outlook, net position, effects of time decay, appropriate time to trade, selecting the stock, selecting the option, risk profile, advantages/ disadvantages, exiting the position etc. for a calendar spread.
-The steps in and out to be taken while creating a the time spread.
-How to execute a calendar spread with the correct technique.
- How to read the pay off chart correctly by using tools available online.
-How to adjust the trade when it goes against you.
-Live examples of trades on Indian stocks.
Looking forward to seeing you in this exciting journey and helping you achieve your financial dreams.
target_audience: This course is for advance traders who are well versed with option selling and buying and the concept of time decay
If you want to make consistent income or beat the banks yearly interest rates
For people who want to make the most out of their capital
For traders looking to understand the art and tricks of trade adjustments

requirements: The learner should have understanding of concept of carbon accounting, organization and operational boundaries, IPCC, UNFCCC and requirement of calculating carbon footprints.
My first course on decoding GHG emissions for beginners covers them all. Learners may opt to complete that first and then coming to this course.
courses.description:
This course provides a practical and comprehensive introduction to calculating financed emissions using the globally recognized PCAF (Partnership for Carbon Accounting Financials) standard. You’ll learn how to categorize financial assets into asset classes as defined by PCAF, apply attribution factors, and use available emissions data to quantify the greenhouse gas (GHG) impact of loans and investments.


Understand the fundamentals of financed emissions and their relevance to climate risk and net-zero goals.
Learn the PCAF standard framework and how it applies to financial institutions globally.
Classify financial assets into PCAF’s asset classes (e.g., listed equity, corporate bonds, business loans, mortgages).
Apply attribution factors to allocate emissions accurately to financial institutions.
Source and use GHG emissions data (actual or estimated) from investee companies or borrowers.
Calculate emissions at the asset and portfolio level using standard PCAF formulas.
Interpret results to inform ESG reporting, regulatory compliance, and investor communications.
Gain practical experience with emission estimation tools and Excel-based models.
Along with the course structure, you will also be able to access the financed emissions case studies, methodologies used by some banking and financial institutions during the course of these video lectures.  Access to the video series also enables you to discuss your own queries and real-time case scenarios for more in-depth command over the topic.
target_audience: This course is tailored for early-career professionals, accountants, consultants, and sustainability practitioners, in the field of finance, sustainable/climate finance, green bonds, ESG funds, and including but not limited to financial institutions like banking, NBFC, insurance agencies etc.

requirements: La premisa de este curso es la motivación y el deseo de comprender la corrupción para aportar las mejores ideas de toma de decisiones en la lucha contra este fenómeno.
courses.description:
La corrupción es una de las amenazas sociales más graves y peligrosas, que afecta directamente la estabilidad, la seguridad y la democracia, la política, la economía y los sistemas sociales de un país. Además de estas consecuencias, la corrupción conduce a una disminución de los valores morales y la pérdida de la confianza en las instituciones públicas, amenazan el funcionamiento normal de cualquier mercado, aumentan la desigualdad y violan el principio de igualdad de oportunidades.
Existen diversos antecedentes históricos y culturales, se puede decir que, desde la antigüedad, la sociedad humana ha tenido una tendencia a destruir el buen comportamiento a expensas del provecho personal o ahora se conoce "corrupción". La corrupción no respeta las fronteras y no distingue entre nacionalidades. El impacto de la corrupción en cualquier sociedad es un problema mundial que debe resolverse a nivel global.
La corrupción es un fenómeno social que rara vez es visible y es difícil de medir. Dado que es una amenaza social, las discusiones teóricas abordan este fenómeno pero, debido a la falta de datos de primera mano, rara vez puede producir resultados sustanciales. Aunque se discute cada vez más en la literatura, Todavía no existe una teoría original y completa sobre la corrupción. Al final de este curso, comprenderá mejor los patrones de la corrupción lo que le permitirá tomar mejores decisiones. El curso ha sido desarrollado como recurso de aprendizaje para el apoyo de profesionales en la lucha contra la corrupción en el sector empresarial.
target_audience: Directivos
Gerentes
Jefes de Áreas
Coordinadores
Administradores de riesgos
Auditores
Investigadores
Especialistas en Cumplimiento
Estudiantes

courses.description:
羅勃特‧T‧清崎  Robert T. Kiyosaki 是誰？
出生於夏威夷的第四代日裔美國人。1982年，他創辦一家國際教育公司，向遍及全球的學員講授商業和投資課程。1994年，47歲的清崎賣掉自己的公司，實現了財務自由，提早退休。退休後，清崎出版了《富爸爸，窮爸爸》、《富爸爸，有錢有理》、《富爸爸投資指南》、《富爸爸財富執行力》、《富爸爸理財IQ》、《富爸爸商學院》、《富爸爸辭職創業》等書。

《富爸爸，窮爸爸》已翻譯成51種語言版本，在109個國家銷售。富爸爸系列叢書已經在全球售出超過2,800萬冊，攻佔亞洲、澳洲、南美洲、墨西哥和歐洲等地的暢銷書排行榜。2005年，清崎以前25大頂尖暢銷書作者的身分，名列亞馬遜書店名人堂。

◎《富爸爸，窮爸爸》一書已翻譯成51國語言，銷售109個國家。
◎《紐約時報》、《華爾街日報》、《商業周刊》、《今日美國》最佳暢銷書。
◎《紐約時報》暢銷書排行榜第一名，在榜長達七年。
◎長踞國內各大書店暢銷排行榜，熱銷超過50萬本。
◎被全世界讀者公認、推薦、迴響，並譽為「每個人都應該有一本」的好書。

財富是一種力量，但更有力量的是「理財教育」。

如果你為錢工作，你就把力量給了雇主；
如果錢為你工作，你就能保有力量、掌控全局。

富爸爸說：「窮人和中產階級為金錢而工作，富人讓錢為他們工作。」
富人買入資產，窮人只有支出，中產階級買他們以為是資產的負債。

當你懂了「金錢不是真實的資產」的道理，你就會更快富有；
金錢是一種思想，如果你想要更多錢，請先改變你的思想。
因為，我們唯一的、最重要的資產，就是我們的「頭腦」。

如果你想致富，就需要學習財務知識。
★先明白為何富人不為錢工作。
★懂得資產與負債的差異。
★提高財務智商，學習會計、投資、瞭解市場及法律。
★除了勤奮努力之外，持續打造你的資產欄。
★克服對金錢的恐懼與懶惰，打造富人的腦袋。

《富爸爸，窮爸爸》的架構圍繞在作者羅勃特‧T‧清崎童年時，兩位爸爸教他面對財務應該要有的想法和體悟。窮爸爸是清崎的親生父親，他跟我們大多數人的爸爸一個模樣：「努力讀書，找一個穩定的好工作！」但是，換來的是鎮日與金錢拚搏，為了錢而工作，最後卻留下一些債務。而清崎的富爸爸告訴他，要成為有錢人的方法，就是讓錢為他工作，並指導他面對財務應有的IQ。

羅勃特清崎倡導的「現金流」概念，至今仍影響著許許多多人，甚至商業界、金融界也將現金流的遊戲概念運用在組織發展中。誠如書中所言，我們應該告訴我們的孩子，真正財務IQ能讓他們在受學校教育之餘，更懂得財務的現實。該是選擇富爸爸致富捷徑的時候了！
富爸爸教導什麼是「資產V.S.負債」
羅伯特清崎教導「資產就是將錢放進你口袋裡的東西，而負債則是把你口袋的錢拿走的東西。」資產和負債不同的現金流向，會造成不同的財富結果。窮人只通過工作獲取收入，通過消費將掙來錢花出去，沒有任何資產。中產階級通過工作獲取收入，再去購買一些他們認為是資產的負債，然後通過償還負債，花光他們的錢，他們同樣也沒有資產。而富人則通過購買資產來產生收入，再用收入來購買資產，不斷地循環下去，最終獲得大量的財富，實現無需工作也能不斷獲得收入的財務自由狀態。同時，羅伯特清崎分享，真正讓人達到財務自由的，不是工作，也不是金錢，而是能帶來源源不斷現金流的資產。
另一方面，羅勃特清崎也教導「房產必定等於資產」的普遍觀念，一般人所認知的資產，實際上是負債——如房屋透過出租，以租金抵消成本費用，並產生出業主的正向現金流，才可算是「資產」，但大部份人並無這樣的理財知識，他們除了每個月要支付供款以外，尚要支付水費、電費、物業管理費、維修保養費等支持，不會產生正向現金流收入的房屋，充其量只是負債。
富爸爸教導什麼是「現金流象限」
Employee（受僱者、僱員）：為他人工作而賺取薪金，追求安全、穩定，畏懼風險的一群人。
Self-employed（自僱者、專業技能者、自由職業者、小企業主）：擁有某一專長而能為自己工作而賺錢，重視完美，不輕易將職責交託予人，如：醫生、律師……等等。
Business owner（企業所有人、僱傭者、僱主、老闆）：擁有一個能夠良好運轉的企業系統，視風險為挑戰、歡迎問題並樂於透過解決問題而致富的一群，信奉以別人的時間(OTHER PEOPLE'S TIME，OPT)以及別人的金錢(OTHER PEOPLE'S MONEY，OPM)為他們工作，收入來源是企業的收益。
Investor（投資者）：讓錢為他們工作，收入來源是各種投資，用錢來產生出更多的錢，即是「富爸爸」一書中所強調「讓金錢為你工作」。
富爸爸教導提到：許多人身處E、S兩種象限，是無法令自己達到財務自由。我們應該透過成為B、I象限，來能達到財務自由的目標。除了上述概念外，富爸爸羅勃特清崎強調，任何想要財務自由的人，必須清晰以下的觀點。
富爸爸教導的「財務教育」
覺察自己的語言，許多人對自己說「我沒時間」、「這太貴了，我沒錢」等等藉口，富爸爸羅勃特清崎要你能更誠實思考「對目前的狀況我可以做點什麼?」、「我要如何支付這筆費用？」「我要如何才能擁有」...等。藉由覺察自己的語言，改變自己的語言，你就能改變自己的財務未來。
「成為、做、擁有」、「不是怎樣做，而是為何要做」：有願景，再實行，你最後才能達到財務自由的目標。
你需要認清晰各種意見，同時你也要有具備獨立思考能力，而不是隨波逐流，讓恐懼的情緒控制自己。例如：電視中的股票名嘴或老師，經常藉由控制人們恐懼的心裡，來鼓吹股市行情的起落，而導致許多人追逐著股市行情的起落，而喪失了自己需要擁有的判斷能力，最後許多人賠錢出場，甚至錢被套牢。而這樣的現象其原因就是人們讓恐懼控制了自己，也控制了自己的財務未來。
學習新的語言是免費的：如果你想要改變你所處象限，你首先需要學習你需要學習的名詞，從中適應這種轉變。例如：你想要從E象限，轉移到S象限，成為自雇主或老闆，你就需要瞭解從商創業的語言，什麼是成本？什麼是毛利？...等。藉由學習新的語言，讓你在新的象限可以更快的適應。
這堂課程和坊間提供的現金流課程有什麼不同？
坊間有許多的現金流課程可學習。然而由富爸爸羅勃特清崎，親自指導的富爸爸課程已為絕版的課程。我們很榮幸的能夠代表富爸爸集團與更多人分享理財知識，協助更多人達到財務自由的目標。
富爸爸課程將持續的更新

Who is Robert Kiyosaki?
Robert Kiyosaki, author of Rich Dad Poor Dad - the international runaway bestseller that has held a top spot on the New York Times bestsellers list for over six years。 Robert Kiyosaki is an investor, entrepreneur and educator： His perspectives on money and investing fly in the face of conventional wisdom. He has, virtually single-handedly, challenged and changed the way tens of millions, around the world, think about money.In communicating his point of view on why 'old' advice - get a good job, save money, get out of debt, invest for the long term, and diversify - is 'bad' (both obsolete and flawed) advice, Robert has earned a reputation for straight talk, irreverence and courage.
Rich Dad Poor Dad ranks as the longest-running bestseller on all four of the lists that report to Publisher's Weekly -
The New York Times, Business Week, The Wall Street Journal and USA Today - and was named "USA Today's #1 Money Book" two years in a row. It is the third longest-running 'how-to' best seller of all time.Translated into 51 languages and available in 109 countries, the Rich Dad series has sold over 27 million copies worldwide and has dominated best sellers lists across Asia, Australia, South America, Mexico and Europe. In 2005, Robert was inducted into Amazon Hall of Fame as one of that bookseller's Top 25 Authors.
There are currently 26 books in the Rich Dad series.In 2006 Robert teamed up with Donald Trump to co-author Why We Want You To Be Rich - Two Men - One Message.
It debuted at #1 on The New York Times bestsellers list.Robert writes a bi-weekly column - 'Why the Rich Are Getting Richer' - for Yahoo! Finance and a monthly column titled 'Rich Returns' for Entrepreneur magazine.Prior to writing Rich Dad Poor Dad, Robert created the educational board game CASHFLOW 101 to teach individuals the financial and investment strategies that his rich dad spent years teaching him. It was those same strategies that allowed Robert to retire at age 47.Today there are more that 2,100 CASHFLOW Clubs - game groups independent of the Rich Dad Company - in cities throughout the world.
Born and raised in Hawaii, Robert Kiyosaki is a fourth-generation Japanese-American.
After graduating from college in New York, Robert joined the Marine Corps and served in Vietnam as an officer and helicopter gunship pilot. Following the war, Robert went to work in sales for Xerox Corporation and, in 1977, started a company that brought the first nylon and Velcro 'surfer wallets' to market. He founded an international education company in 1985 that taught business and investing to tens of thousands of students throughout the world.  In 1994 Robert sold his business and, through his investments, was able to retire at the age of 47. During his short-lived retirement he wrote Rich Dad Poor Dad.
The Rich Dad Program will continue to update.
What's the difference between Rich Dad's Program and Other's Cash Flow Program?
This Cash Flow Program is taught by Robert Kiyosaki, which is also the limited version of Cash Flow Program. We are really honored to share this Cash Flow Program, teaching by the Robert Kiyosaki in person, without any other interoperation by other's, helping the student  have the best learning experience.

courses.title: What does an actuary actually do?

objectives: A practical overview of the work of an actuary in a traditional insurance environment.

requirements: No
courses.description:
Whether you are an actuarial student, someone who works with actuaries, or just interested in what an actuary actually does, you may be surprised to hear that the every day work of an actuary may be quite different from what you've studied in your course notes or read online.
We can all probably visualise what the work of a doctor, lawyer or teacher entails, but the actuarial profession remains shrouded in mystery.  Even for those who have completed an actuarial degree, there is often a huge gap between one's theoretical studies and the work one actually does in the corporate world.
This course aims to bridge that gap, providing a practical, intuitive and conversational overview of the typical processes actuaries are involved in, current hot topics in the industry and challenges those in the profession face - all the things they don't teach you at university or in actuarial exams.
For aspiring actuaries this course will provide a head-start going into an insurance-based job, allowing you to feel a lot more comfortable with real-life actuarial concepts and language, confident enough to join in conversations and  able to express questions you have with more clarity.  It will also help you answer questions like "Is this really the kind of work I want to be doing?  Is the actuarial profession really for me?"
target_audience: Anyone interested in becoming an actuary or studying actuarial science
Anyone who works with actuaries or in the insurance industry
Anyone who is curious about the actuarial profession

Hello everyone, my name is Yvonne M. Dantzler, M.B.A., M.S.L,. Thank you for previewing this Mini Course.
If you’re thinking about filing for Chapter 7 Bankruptcy, here's an overview of what you'll need to do.
Filing for Chapter 7 Bankruptcy is a major decision, but the process is usually predictable. If you would like to ease the fear of the unknown process, then you look no further as this mini course can be your solution.
There is a lot of fear and shame associated with filing for Chapter 7 Bankruptcy but it is more common than you think. *According to the United States Courts website, "The total bankruptcy filings rose 13 percent, and business bankruptcies rose nearly 30 percent, in the twelve-month period ending Sept. 30, 2023. So understand that if you are contemplating a Chapter 7 Bankruptcy filing, you are not alone.
In conclusion, if you are considering filing for Chapter 7 Bankruptcy, then this mini course is for you.
Disclaimer(s)
This course does not cover how to fill out Chapter 7 Bankruptcy forms. It only covers the steps if you decide to file as a Pro Se or In Pro Per Debtor. Remember that every bankruptcy district varies slightly in the steps process.
This course is for educational purposes only and is not to be taken for legal advice.
Source;
*Bankruptcy Filings Rise 13 Percent. (n.d.). United States Courts

Why This Program Delivers
Designed to Eliminate Repeat Attempts: We understand that retaking the exam strains both finances and mental resilience. This program was co‑created and peer‑reviewed by professionals who have sat, faced, and passed the exam. Every mocks have been prepared to replicate real exam pattern, cognitive load, and sustainability decision-making style—so you internalize exam logic before test day and maximize your probability of a first‑attempt pass.
What This Program Delivers
A rigorously exam-aligned preparation sequence that strengthens conceptual clarity, analytical application, ESG judgment, and overall investment confidence across the CFA ESG/Sustainable Investing curriculum.
05 Real Exam-Style Mock Tests (100 questions each)
Each mock contains a calibrated internal progression to mirror a realistic testing curve:
40 Core / Fundamentals Questions: Build your foundational understanding.
40 Applied / Intermediate Questions: Deepen your grasp with applied scenarios.
20 Advanced / Integrative Questions: Challenge yourself with in-depth, expert-level problems.
Why You’ll Succeed
1. 100% syllabus alignment: Content maps directly to the current exam blueprint, building the knowledge, skills, and practical fluency needed to integrate ESG into investment decision-making and portfolio construction.
2. Free access to chapter-wise summary notes: Enroll in the chapter-wise Qbanks (both parts) to unlock/receive chapter-wise summary notes — your essential “secret sauce” for quickly grasping key points from each chapter. (Pls visit our profile page and email us to receive the chapter-wise summary notes).
3. Realistic exam style: Questions replicate the certification’s format—concept recall, scenario-based evaluation, “best action” choices, and applied judgment in investment contexts.
4. Structured learning progression: Qbanks move from foundational concepts to advanced analytical integration, sharpening both speed and investment-grade insight.
5. Lean explanations: Concise, retention-focused rationales highlight what matters for applying ESG factors in real-world investing—no fluff.
6. Clear corrective insight: Every question includes a breakdown of the right answer so you can diagnose gaps, learn from mistakes, and reinforce sound investment reasoning.
Your Next Steps
START your CFA ESG/ Sustainable Investing exam today—tackle every question with confidence, sharpen your expertise, and ACE the exam on your first attempt.
Also, level up your preparation with our 2025 CFA ESG/ Sustainable Investing Exam Prep: Chapter-Wise Q-Banks (Part I & II).

courses.description:
Economic feasibility is the process of collecting information about a proposed project and then analyzing it to find out the feasibility of implementing it, reducing risks and profitability of the project. Therefore, it is necessary to know the extent of the success or loss of this project compared to the local market and its needs, and then anticipate the ability of companies to remain as a profitable business during a specified period of time.
Good preparation for economic feasibility is one of the most important steps for the success of projects. The success and effectiveness of projects depends primarily on proper planning. Accurate planning is the main pillar on which the expected financial return from the project depends. Hence the need for what is known as economic feasibility.
The economic feasibility study is considered one of the most important branches of the feasibility study in general, and the economic feasibility study is known as a scientific method for estimating the possibilities of success of an investment idea before actual implementation, in light of the ability of the project or investment idea to achieve certain objectives for the investor, and therefore the economic feasibility study is a practical tool The project avoids risks and bears losses, as the study precedes making any investment decision, and the study precedes operations.
Accordingly, the economic feasibility study is the means by which the appropriate investment decision is taken that achieves the desired goals
Therefore, any businessman or student in the field of accounting or management must study how to prepare economic feasibility studies because of their great importance in making the decision to establish a project or making a differentiation between several projects to choose the optimal investment from them.
target_audience: Finance Managers / المدراء الماليين
Accounting and management students / طلاب الادارة و المحاسبة
Engineers / المهندسين
Strategic and planning Managers / مدراء التخطيط الاستراتيجي
Owners / مالكي الشركات
Financial Studying department in banks or companies / قسم الدراسات المالية في البنوك أو الشركات
(PMP) Project managers / مدراء المشاريع
Financial Analysts / المحللين الماليين

courses.description:
This course delves into the core criticisms leveled against modern Islamic banking practices and provides a comprehensive understanding of the scholarly and practical responses developed to address these concerns. While Islamic banking has emerged as a significant and rapidly growing sector of the global financial system, it has also faced scrutiny regarding its adherence to Sharia principles and its practical implementation. Designed based on the lectures and books of renowned IsDB award winning Islamic Economist Professor Dr. Monzer Kahf, this course aims to equip students with a balanced perspective, enabling them to critically analyze these debates and understand the nuances of Islamic Banking.

By the end of this course, you will be able to:
•Understand aspects of Islamic banking and common contracts used
•Learn about common criticisms of Islamic Banking and Response to those criticisms
•Critically evaluate arguments for and against Islamic banking.

This course is suitable for students and professionals in finance, economics, Islamic studies, law, and anyone interested in gaining a deeper understanding of the complexities and controversies within the field of Islamic banking. No prior knowledge of Islamic finance is strictly required, although a basic understanding of financial principles would be beneficial. Join us to explore the dynamic discourse surrounding Islamic banking and its quest to provide a truly Sharia-compliant and ethically sound financial system.
target_audience: People interested in Islamic Banking: This could include Muslims seeking Sharia-compliant financial products, or those curious about alternative banking systems. Understanding criticisms can help them make informed decisions.
Critics of Islamic Banking: The course can offer a platform to understand the criticisms more deeply and explore the responses from Islamic finance proponents.
Finance Professionals: Bankers, investment advisors, and financial analysts who want to expand their knowledge of Islamic finance and better serve Muslim clientele.
Sharia Scholars and Regulators: Those involved in developing and overseeing Sharia-compliant financial instruments can benefit from understanding and addressing criticisms.
Policymakers and Academics: Those interested in the role of Islamic finance in the global economy and potential areas for improvement.

objectives: Understand the core components of audit administration, from planning to reporting.

requirements: None
courses.description:
Gain practical audit skills in this intermediate course covering audit administration, planning, fieldwork, and reporting. Learn risk-based methodologies, internal controls, and audit documentation standards with real-world examples and walkthroughs.
This course provides a comprehensive overview of audit administration, focusing on real-world application across the full audit lifecycle. Designed for CPAs, CPA candidates, and entry-level audit professionals, the course covers key concepts such as audit planning, risk assessment, internal controls, and audit reporting. You'll explore industry standards including GAAS and PCAOB guidelines, and learn how to document audit work, conduct sampling, and communicate findings effectively.
Through practical examples, document walkthroughs, and case-based instruction, you'll gain the tools and confidence to manage and execute high-quality audits in both financial and non-financial contexts. Whether you're supporting a traditional financial audit or preparing for SOC or ISO engagements, this course bridges technical knowledge with real-world execution.


How You’ll Apply These Skills

Assess Client Risk Profiles: Perform risk-based evaluations to identify high-risk areas and tailor audit procedures accordingly.
Evaluate Internal Controls: Analyze control design and effectiveness to determine testing needs and reliance levels.
Document Audit Evidence: Create clear, cross-referenced workpapers that meet professional standards and support audit conclusions.
Execute Sampling Strategies: Apply techniques like random, stratified, and judgmental sampling to test financial data efficiently.
Communicate Audit Findings: Deliver audit results to stakeholders using structured write-ups that align with compliance requirements.
target_audience: Accountants
Certified Public Accountants (CPAs)
Finance Professionals

Module 1 Inleiding: Hoe beïnvloedt je money mindset jouw financiën?

Relatie tussen money mindset en je onderbewustzijn

requirements: Geen vereisten of voorwaaarden voor deze custus
courses.description:
Hoe we over geld denken bepaalt voor een groot gedeelte hoe succesvol we zijn op financieel gebied.
95% van ons brein werkt onbewust. We hebben beperkende geldovertuigingen en gedragingen die ons heel veel geld kosten.
In deze cursus leg ik je uit wat een money mindset is. Hoe we die mindset kunnen verbeteren en hoe we door doelen te stellen grote stappen hierin maken.
De inhoudt van de cursus is als volgt:
1. Module 1: Inleiding waarin uitgelegd wat een money mindset is. We kijken hoe jouw money money mindset jouw financiën beïnvloedt en geven enkele voorbeelden van money mindset.
2. Module 2: In deze module gaan we bespreken hoe we jouw money mindset kunnen verbeteren. Stap 1 zal bewustwording zijn van je mindset. Er zit een test bijgevoegd om hier meer inzicht in te krijgen. Daarnaast is het belangrijk om je money blocks te leren kennen en je emoties aan te gaan pakken met betrekking tot geld.
3. Module 3: Om meer focus te gaan krijgen is het cruciaal om doelen te gaan stellen. In deze module is een stappenplan en concrete template bijgevoegd om tot jouw doelen te komen en een actieplan om ze te gaan halen.
4. Module 4: Deze module gaat erover hoe je het in praktijk kunt brengen. Ook bespreken we hoe je met de money mindset van andere mensen om kunt gaan.
Onze money mindset is bepaald door onze opvoeding en omgeving maar dat wil niet zeggen dat je die niet kunt verbeteren. Juist dat leer ik je in deze cursus
target_audience: Voor als je je money mindset wilt verbeteren en niet ongemerkt financiële keuzes maken die negatieve invloed op je hebben

requirements: Students will need to record themselves speaking using a cellphone camera or webcam
courses.description:
Media Training. Imagine you are appearing on CNBC and you are the perfect image of confidence and insight, or a profile of you is on the front page of the Wall Street Journal and every quote is exactly as you planned. Wouldn't it be great to know you can speak to the financial media and get the message you want into the final story?
In this Media Training for Financial Service Professionals course, you will learn how to do the following:
* Look your best on TV
* Create media messages
* Answer financial reporters' questions
* Speak in sound bites
* Get the quotes you want in the final story
This course is delivered primarily through spoken lectures. Because the skill you are learning is speaking related, it only makes sense that you learn through speaking.
The skill you will learn in this class is not primarily theoretical or academic. It is a skill that requires physical habits. That is why you will be asked to take part in numerous exercises where you record yourself speaking on video, and then watching yourself. Learning presentation skills is like learning how to ride a bicycle. You simply have to do it numerous times and work past the wobbling and falling off parts until you get it right.
This course contains numerous video lectures plus several bonus books for your training library.
TJ Walker has been coaching and media training people on their presentation skills for 30 years. Now, through the power of Udemy's online platform, he is able to give you the same high quality training that he gives in person to CEOs, Fortune 500 executives, and Presidents of countries. Only you can now receive the training at a tiny fraction of the normal fee for in-person training.
How long this course takes is up to you. The longest part of the course involves you speaking on video, critiquing yourself, and doing it over until you like it. But if you get to the point where you love how you look and sound when you present it will be well worth the time spent. And having this skill will save you time for all future media presentations in your life.
You can begin improving your media presentation skills right now. You may have an opportunity to speak out as soon as tomorrow, so why waste another day worried that your media presentation skills are not up to high standards. Enroll in this course today.
TJ Walker has more than 100,000 courses enrollments from more than 14,000 online students around the globe.

What others say:
“TJ Walker's single-minded devotion to presentation has made him the #1 expert for executives seeking guidance on speaking to the public and media." Bob Bowdon, Anchor/Reporter, Bloomberg Television
“TJ Walker is the leading media trainer in the world." Stu Miller, Viacom News Producer
(TJ Walker's Media Training Worldwide) “The world's leading presentation and media training firm."Gregg Jarrett, Fox News Channel Anchor
target_audience: Financial service professionals who wish to speak to the news media

requirements: Néant, juste de la bonne volonté
courses.description:
Bonjour et Bienvenue,
Les Assurances apparaissent souvent comme un monde opaque et mystérieux pour qui n'est pas un initié. Pourtant, c'est un domaine passionnant qui mérite d'être compris, ne serait-ce que pour son rôle fondamental qui est la protection des personnes qui y ont recours. C'est pourquoi, il nous a paru opportun de présenter des cours simples et clairs, qui permettront à ceux qui les prendront, d'avoir une meilleur compréhension du monde de l'Assurance et de son fonctionnement.
Ce cours fait partie d'un bloc que nous présentons sur les Assurances en général, et sur les Sinistres en particuliers. Ce sont des formations riches et denses qui transmettent aux auditeurs, un condensé d'informations claires.
Il arrive en toute fin de chaîne après les modules "Comprendre les Assurances IARD", " Comprendre les Sinistres en Assurance", et " Le processus de réclamation sinistres en Assurances". Nous abordons les sujets suivants :
- Les grands principes d'indemnisation tels que la notion de vétusté, le principe indemnitaire, la franchise, la règle proportionnelle etc...
- Les délais d'indemnisation et leurs exceptions ...
et plusieurs autres notions qu'il est bon de comprendre pour cerner au mieux l'indemnisation des sinistres selon les risques concernés.


À qui ce cours s'adresse-t-il ?
Cette formation est à destination des :
Etudiants
Acteurs clés de l'Assurance. En particuliers aux Gestionnaires et rédacteurs Sinistres
Acteurs des services Production et techniques d'assurance IARDT
Toute personne projetant une reconversion professionnelle dans le domaine de la Gestion du sinistre ou de l'Assurance IARD en général
Toute personnes désirant comprendre l'indemnisation sinistre


Y a-t-il des exigences ou prérequis pour ce cours ?
Aucune - juste une volonté d'apprendre !
Merci et j'espère vous voir participer à cette formation dès maintenant !

courses.title: Cash Vouching and Audit in Banks
courses.bio: Vouching and Auditing Cash Transactions in Banking Company Accounts for Auditors and Accountants
objectives: Learners get first hand exposure to Audit Topics, Vouching and Verification.
Explains about Cash Vouching from the perspective of Bank Audit
Explains clearly Final Accounts of Companies
Explains Final Accounts of Banking Companies
requirements: Learners are expected to have an Engineering, Management or a Commerce background and should have done a basic coursework on Auditing.
courses.description:
Cash Vouching and Audit in Banks is a condensed course on Cash Vouching and Verification as well as on Bank Audit, performed in the Indian Banking sector.
In India, Bank Audits are normally Statutory Audits that are undertaken once in an year or less frequently only by Chartered Accountants specifically nominated by ICAI and RBI.


Financial Statement Audit, usually conducted in Foreign Banks is usually conducted by CPA (Certified Public Accountants) who are qualified themselves in the USA.


Internal Audits in various banks are also conducted in Organizations by its Employee where the Employees (Financial Managers or Non-Financial Managers) carry on with internal audit upon nomination from the Management of their Organization.


In addition, Bank Audits (Internal Audit) are sometimes done by Bankers who may have credentials (CAIIB, CBA etc) whose curriculum gives enough knowledge on current developments and customization frameworks on Internal Auditing for most regular Bank Employee.


In order to prepare the Learners enter this into the Bank Auditing field, which is not a regular activity in Banks, and gain a better understanding of this vast topic, this course, Cash Vouching and Audit in Banks, gives a 1 hour exposure to the fine elements of Bank Audits, Vouching and Verification in general, and Auditing in the Indian banking sector in particular.


This enables Professional Engineers and Certified or Diploma Holders to gain a conceptual understanding of the Audit process in Banking, Financial Statements and Schedules that inherently a bank maintains as part of the General Book Keeping Process.


Once the learner gets enough exposure to the Bank Audit process, Vouching, Verification, Final Accounts, Presentation of Financial Statements and Schedules, they can take up an advanced course on the same field, thereby, get a better grip on this otherwise gruelling Banking & Finance topics.
target_audience: Engineers, Diploma Holders, Managers, Commerce graduates etc.

objectives: Excel'de Netten Brüte Ücret hesaplaması yapabileceksiniz.

Eğer, Çokeğer , ve fonksiyonları kullanarak uzun formüller yazabileceksiniz.
Kişisel ve işletme bütçesi yapabileceksiniz.

Excel'de netten brüte ücret hesaplamalar: Excel'de Netten Brüte Ücret Hesaplama Tablosu
Excel'de Brütten Nete Ücret Hesaplama Tablosu
Excel'de Netten Brüte Yıllık Personel Bütçe Video Kaydı

requirements: Bir miktar Excel bilmek önemlidir ancak ücret hesaplamaları ve bütçe yapabilmek için mevzuat da bilmek gerekecektir.
courses.description:
Excel'de Netten Brüte ve Brütten Nete ücret hesaplama çoğu insan için zor bir uygulamadır. Bunun nedeni, mevzuattaki teknik detayların çok olması ve bu detayların Excel'de formüle edilmesinin zorluğudur. Herkes bu detayları elbette bilmek zorunda değildir. Çoğu insan sadece bireysel ücretinin ne kadar olduğunu hesaplamak ister. Çok azı da bunun nasıl yapıldığını bilmek ister. Bilmişken işletmede kullanmak ise bu grubun isteyeceği son derece haklı bir istektir. İşte bu çalışma bir anlamda hem meraklısına hem de ticari olarak kullanmak isteyen meslektaşlarıma yönelik olarak hazırlanmıştır.


Ücret hesaplamaları neden karmaşıktır.


1 - Vergi tarifelerinin karmaşıklığı,
2 - SGK primlerinde çalışan durumuna göre farklı uygulamaların varlığı
3 - Asgari ücret uygulamasında yapılan sürekli değişiklikler
4 - Asgari ücret üzerinden hesaplanan istisnaların hesaplanmasında yorum farkları
5 - Excel'de döngüsel başvurular
6 - EĞER,ÇOKEĞER, VE (>,<,=) fonksiyonlarının birlikte kullanımının zorluğu
7 - İnternette son derece ciddi çalışan sitelerde yapılan hesaplama yanlışlıkları
8 - Hiçbir doğruluğu olmayan altın oran veya sabitlerin kullanılarak ücret hesaplamalarının yapılacağını ileri süren siteler ve içerik üreticilerinin hatalı anlatımları


Bizim çalışmamızda bu durumların tamamı doğru bir şekilde anlatılmıştır. Ayrıca tüm excel dosyalar veri koruma olmadan paylaşılmıştır.


Peki katılımcılar bu eğitimde neler öğrenecekler;


1 - EĞER, ÇOKEĞER + VE fonksiyonlarını iç içe ve =<> kısıtlamaları ile birlikte yoğun olarak rahatlıkla yapabileceklerdir.
2 - Döngüsel başvuru olmadan netten brüte hesaplamalar yapabileceklerdir.
3 - Kolaylıkla bir işletme bütçesi hazırlayabileceklerdir.
4 - Ücret üzerinden vergi hesaplamaları, SGK prim hesaplamaları ve Asgari ücret istisna hesaplamalarını yapabileceklerdir.
5 - Hücre sabitleme, referans veri kullanma, veri aralıklarında çalışma için gerekli pratik bilgilere sahip olacaklardır.
6 - Brüt ücret alan çalışanlar dönem sonunda ellerine ne kadar ücret geçeceğini bu çalışma sayesinde hesaplayacaklardır.
7 - Resmi ücretlerini bu çalışma ile teyit edebilirler. İlave gelirleri ile hesaplama yaparak net ücretlerini hesaplayacaklardır.
8 - Saatlik ücret alanlar bu çalışmayı revize ederek kendi sistemlerine uyumlu hale getirerek farklı ücret uygulama modelleri geliştirebileceklerdir.
9- Bordro hesaplamaları ve yasal mevzuat hakkında bilgi sahibi olacaklardır. Vergi tariflerinde değişim ve bunun ücretlere etkisini öğreneceklerdir.
10- Aynı çalışanın normal ve emekli olması durumlarında ve dönem içinde ücretinin değişiklik göstermesi durumunda puantajda ortaya çıkan değişikleri hesaplayabileceklerdir.
target_audience: Muhasebeciler, mali müşavirler, bütçe planlama uzmanları ve yöneticiler profesyonel olarak kullanabilirler. Ücretini merak eden herkes ise kişisel hesaplamaları için kullanabilirler. Excel bilenler ise vergi hesaplamaları konusunda uzmanlaşmak için yararlanabilirler.

requirements: 特になし
courses.description:
■はじめに


こんにちは！講師の「けい」と申します。


このコースに興味をもって下さりありがとうございます！




私は現在、税務会計事務所に勤務しており、
複数のクライアント様の会計処理を行うと同時に


ご自身で会計処理を行うクライアント様に対して
レクチャーもさせて頂いています。


今回この経験を活かして
会計処理のコースを出させていただくことになりましたが、


実は私はもともと会計にまったく縁のない人間でした。


新卒で入ったIT企業でシステムエンジニアとして勤務した後、
会計知識がほぼ無い状態で現在の税務会計事務所に転職。


最初は会計の専門用語に戸惑う毎日でしたが、
日々の学びと実践。


そして税理士からのフィードバックを受け続けた結果


今では「ゼロから会計処理に挑戦したい！」
という方に会計処理を教える立場になりました。


この講座では個人事業主やフリーランスの方向けに、
会計の基礎知識から会計ソフト上で実際にどのように処理を行うのか。


さらには会計ソフトの効率的な使い方まで、丁寧に解説します。


数字や専門用語に苦手意識がある方でも大丈夫です！


「分かりやすさ」と「ステップバイステップの実践」
を重視したこのコースで、


自信を持ってご自身で会計処理を
進められる知識とスキルをみにつけていきましょう。






■このコースの特徴


会計初心者でも無理なく始められるように、
この講座は「初心者目線」を大切にした構成になっています。


専門用語を極力排除し、
必要な情報に絞って直感的に理解しやすい言葉で解説。


さらに、
実際の会計ソフトの操作画面の実演で、
会計処理の作業手順を具体的にお見せします。


私の画面操作の実演を見ていただき
その後にワークでご自身で実践する流れで
会計処理のスキルをみにつけていけるのが大きな特徴です。


また、実務でよくあるミスや注意点も詳しく解説。


「ここを押さえればOK！」というポイントを厳選し、
最短ルートで効率的に必要なスキルを
習得していただける内容になっています。


クライアント様へ会計処理を
レクチャーする中で得た知見も活かし、


「挫折せずに会計処理を最短ルートでみにつけること」


を考え抜き講座を設計しています。


・前提知識から丁寧に伝えることで
初心者でも分かりやすい解説


・会計ソフトでの会計処理方法の実演解説の後に
ご自身でワークで実践の流れで学べるステップバイステップ形式


・クラウド会計ソフト（マネーフォワード確定申告）を使った
原則に即した会計処理方法


・日々の会計処理を効率化するコツ


これらの特徴を持つこのコースで
ぜひ一緒に会計処理のスキルをみにつけていきましょう。






■コースを受講することで得られる未来


・ご自身の事業の会計処理を自分でできるようになる


・日々の会計処理を効率化し事業により多くの時間を使えるようになる


・会計処理を習慣化しタイムリーに事業の数字を把握できるようになる


・会計処理に関する精神的ストレスから解放され
安心して事業運営に集中できるようになる


・会計処理入力代行（記帳代行）を依頼しなくてよくなり、
月数万円の経費が削減できる


・最大65万円の控除が可能な青色申告の条件である
複式簿記での会計処理ができるようになる


・会計知識ゼロからスタートしても
「自分でできる！」という自信を持てる






■こんな方が受講に向いています


・個人事業主として事業をされている方
（副業で事業をされている方も対象です）


・会計処理が一体何なのかわからない方
（会計処理と確定申告の関係性等）


・会計処理の具体的なやり方がわからない方


・自分の会計処理が合っているのか不安を感じている方


・会計ソフトの使い方が分からない方


・知識不足で税理士とのやりとりが難しく、
聞きたいことを聞けずにもどかしさを感じている方


・記帳代行を依頼していて費用面の負担が大きいと感じている方


・簿記の資格が欲しいわけではなく
自分の事業の会計処理を行う実践スキルが欲しい方


・会計処理も受注して業務の幅を拡げたいが、

objectives: Become familiar with odoo manufacturing and quality management modules
How to deal with odoo MRP system

Overview: Edit MO after confirmation access right (Flexible consumption)

requirements: No Programming Experience needed. You will learn everything, just be passionate with IT industry.
courses.description:
provide learners with the knowledge they need to use Odoo Material Requirements Planning (MRP) to manage production planning, supply chain management, and material requirements.
Learn to implement real world MRP Business solutions
There are countless videos out there that walk through menus and explain features but never tell you how to use Odoo to solve real world business problems.
This is a course for those who want to understand WHY you use specific MRP features and options to solve various business requirements. So each lecture builds on the one before adding more complexity. It introduces you to a method of setting up an MRP system from the very beginning. Yet before you know it you are comfortable building bill of materials and work orders as well as setting up sub-assemblies and more complex production rules. Odoo Manufacturing apps integrating with sales, Inventory. Also, I'll explain how to deal with Quality control points, quality checks and quality alerts in stock pickings and work orders at manufacturing order. The course will include definitions of stock promotion policies and it's relation with sales and manufacturing orders. We will go through work centers and routing. We will know what is process costing and what is job order and how to deal with it and how odoo MRP works.
target_audience: Beginner Odoo implementer
Accountants who intend to upgrade their career path to Odoo Consultation
IT specialist
Odoo partners, who seeks to strengthen their team knowledge
Software Companies, who intend to compete in ERP field with Odoo

courses.description:
This course is designed to provide you with a comprehensive understanding of basic and advanced accounting and financial terms and definitions. Once learnt, you are well-equipped in the realm of both accounting and finance. Both as a student and a professional or business owner, these terminologies will help you navigate ahead with confidence and clarity.


These 20 practical papers are well researched, encompassing the entire breadth and width of the subject matter. Learning these questions and answers will help you as a student in your academic excellence, and as a professional or business owner, these resources can help you handle the difficult a complex nature of your profession and business.


To master any subject is to master the basics of that particular subject, and this course intends to assist you in having a high-value understanding of various aspects of accounting and finance. Most of what is included in this course is not within the scope of any average academic curriculum, and those who enrol for this course will surely get the value for their money and time.


Since accounting and finance basics are universal, the topics included will never lose their relevance and meaning. Hence, committing to this course will surely help you all in your academic, career and entrepreneurial journey.
target_audience: Students, career professionals and entrepreneurial/business owners.

Bạn từng lo lắng, căng thẳng mỗi lần bước vào cuộc đàm phán quan trọng? Bạn luôn tự hỏi: Làm thế nào để chuẩn bị thật kỹ, lập luận sắc bén, và xử lý các tình huống bất ngờ một cách linh hoạt?
Khóa học "Ứng dụng ChatGPT trong đàm phán thương lượng kinh doanh" sẽ là trợ thủ đắc lực giúp bạn:
Nắm vững các nguyên tắc và kỹ thuật cốt lõi trong đàm phán thương lượng kinh doanh như BATNA, ZOPA, Anchoring, Reciprocity và SPIN Selling.
Xây dựng Working Outline và kịch bản đàm phán chuyên nghiệp chỉ trong thời gian ngắn nhờ ứng dụng hiệu quả công cụ trí tuệ nhân tạo ChatGPT.

Nâng cao khả năng tư duy chiến lược và kỹ năng giao tiếp để chốt các thỏa thuận có lợi, lâu dài và bền vững.
Khóa học kết hợp lý thuyết nền tảng, hướng dẫn sử dụng ChatGPT một cách hiệu quả nhất, và đặc biệt là các bài tập thực hành sát với tình huống kinh doanh thực tế tại Việt Nam.
Đừng bỏ lỡ cơ hội trở thành nhà đàm phán tài ba, tự tin xử lý mọi tình huống, đạt được những thỏa thuận chiến lược giúp bạn và doanh nghiệp tiến xa hơn!

في هذه الدورة يتعلم المتدرب العديد من المهارات الخاصة بنشاط المطاعم والكافيهات والتي منها تحديد نقطة التعادل اليومية و الشهرية والسنوية للنشاط بحيث يكون صاحب النشاط  قادرا وبشكل يومي على معرفه الوضع اليومي للنشاط من ربح أو خسارة ، كذلك نتناول فى الدورة طريقة حساب تكلفة المنتجات وتكلفة المواد المصنعة وكذلك طرق مطابقة المبيعات اليومية وكيفية أعداد الجرد اليومي والاسبوعي والشهري و اختيار اصناف محددة للجرد ومطابقتها مع المبيعات اليومية وسيتم تزويد المتدرب أيضا بفيديو عن أنشاء الملف بشكل كامل بحيث يكون لدية ملف أكسيل    يساعدة بشكل تلقائي في تسعير المنتجات ومعرفة مدى جدوى العروض او الخصومات التي يرغب المطعم او الكافيه في تقديمها وأيضا من خلال الملف يتم تقديم أقتراح لأسعار بيع المنتجات على تطبيقات التوصيل وكذلك طرق حساب الهدر وطرق مطابقة المبيعات اليومية حسب طرق الدفع وطرق معالجة العجز أو الزيادة ومعرفة أسبابة فضلا عن المزيد من المعلومات الوفيرة   التي تثري المتدرب سواء كان صاحب نشاط أو مستثمر يرغب بالدخول بالمجال أو محاسب بأحدى شركات المطاعم أو الكافيهات وهذه الدورة مقدمة من خلال خبرة تمتد الى أكثر من عشرة سنوات خبرة بمجال حساب تكاليف المنتجات  وأدارة المطاعم وتأسيس نظام التكاليف بشكل متكامل للعديد من شركات المطاعم  كذلك والكافيهات كذلك توضيح أهم النقاط الواجب متابعتها في تطبيقات التوصيل ومطابقتها وطرق متابعتها بشكل يومي

courses.title: Contabilidad Financiera Total
courses.bio: Aprende la contabilidad desde cero hasta llegar a un ciclo contable completo.
objectives: Aprenderás como es un ciclo contable completo
Veras los principios básicos de contabilidad y análisis de cada cuenta contable
Seguido por los métodos de depreciación / amortización
Continuando con los distintos métodos de registro de mercancía y la retención en la fuente
Y terminando con la realización de los estados financieros, Estado de perdidas y ganancias y balance general
requirements: No se requieren conocimientos previos, más que un celular o computadora para seguir la lección
De preferencia saber usar una calculadora o hoja de calculo, para seguir los ejercicios prácticos
courses.description:
Subtitles in: Spanish, English, Portuguese, French
Descripción del Curso de Contabilidad Financiera
Este curso de contabilidad financiera está diseñado para personas con pocos o ningún conocimiento previo en contabilidad. Ya sea que tengas curiosidad por el tema o necesites fortalecer tu comprensión por motivos laborales, este curso ofrece una base sólida y conocimientos prácticos en el campo de la contabilidad financiera.
A lo largo del curso, avanzaremos desde los fundamentos hasta completar un ciclo contable completo. Todos los conceptos se presentan de manera clara y simplificada, enfocándonos directamente en ejercicios prácticos y temas esenciales, sin incluir contenido innecesario.
Lo que aprenderás:
Fundamentos de la contabilidad: Comenzaremos con los principios básicos y la estructura de la contabilidad, incluyendo los estados financieros, el concepto y funcionamiento de las cuentas, reglas de cargos y abonos, y la clasificación de cuentas dentro del catálogo contable.
Análisis de cuentas de alto nivel: Explorarás las principales categorías contables como activos, pasivos, patrimonio, cuentas de resultados y registros de inventario. Cada tema incluirá ejercicios prácticos basados en distintos marcos legales y sistemas tributarios de América Latina. Los ejercicios irán desde lo sencillo hasta lo complejo para ayudarte a comprender cuándo y cómo aplicar cada tipo de cuenta.
Pérdidas de valor de activos: Abordaremos la depreciación y amortización, incluyendo cómo calcularlas y cómo registrar la venta de activos, ya sea con ganancias o pérdidas.
Retención en la fuente: Aprenderás sobre este impuesto particular utilizado en varios países latinoamericanos, con ejercicios prácticos para determinar cuándo se aplica y cómo calcularlo correctamente.
Métodos de valuación de inventarios: Analizaremos las distintas técnicas de valuación de inventarios, sus diferencias y cómo se calcula cada una.
Contabilidad de nómina: Un tema clave, aprenderás a calcular la nómina y a identificar las cuentas afectadas en el registro contable, considerando impuestos y prestaciones comunes en América Latina.
Métodos de registro de mercancías: Estudiaremos los distintos métodos para registrar mercancías, sus diferencias, ventajas y desventajas, y qué tipo de empresas se benefician más de cada uno.
Ciclo contable completo: Finalmente, recorreremos un ciclo contable completo, desde la apertura de la empresa hasta el primer mes de operaciones, incluyendo registros diarios, libro mayor, ajustes contables y elaboración de estados financieros. Esto se hará utilizando distintos métodos de registro de mercancías para una comprensión integral.
Acepta el reto. Te espero en clase.
Un saludo.
___________________________
Financial Accounting Course Overview
This financial accounting course is designed for individuals with little to no prior knowledge of accounting. Whether you're curious about the subject or need to strengthen your understanding for professional reasons, this course offers a solid foundation and practical insights into the field of financial accounting.
Throughout the course, we will progress from the fundamentals to the completion of a full accounting cycle. All concepts are presented in a clear and simplified manner, focusing directly on practical exercises and essential topics—without unnecessary filler content.
What You Will Learn:
Foundations of Accounting: We begin with the basic principles and structure of accounting, including financial statements, the concept and function of accounts, debit and credit rules, and the classification of accounts within a chart of accounts.
High-Level Account Analysis: You’ll explore key account categories such as assets, liabilities, equity, income statement accounts, and inventory records. Each topic includes practical exercises based on various legal frameworks and applicable tax systems across Latin America. Exercises will range from simple to complex to help you understand when and how to apply each account type.
Asset Value Losses: We’ll cover depreciation and amortization, including how to calculate them and how to record asset sales, whether they result in gains or losses.
Withholding Tax: You’ll learn about this unique tax used in several Latin American countries, with practical exercises to determine when it applies and how to calculate it correctly.
Inventory Valuation Methods: We’ll examine different inventory valuation techniques, their distinctions, and how each is calculated.
Payroll Accounting: A critical topic, we’ll teach you how to calculate payroll and identify the accounts affected in the accounting records, considering taxes and employee benefits common in Latin America.
Inventory Recording Methods: You’ll learn the various methods for recording merchandise, their differences, advantages, disadvantages, and which types of businesses benefit most from each.
Complete Accounting Cycle: Finally, we’ll walk through a full accounting cycle—from company setup to the first month of operations—covering daily entries, ledger posting, adjustments, and the preparation of financial statements. This will include different inventory recording methods for a comprehensive understanding.
Take on the challenge—I look forward to seeing you in class.
Warm regards.
target_audience: Personas que quieran aprender contabilidad desde cero
Estudiantes de contabilidad que deseen reforzar sus conocimientos
Emprendedores que deseen aprender contabilidad para sus negocios
Profesionales de la contabilidad que quieran reforzar estos conocimientos

courses.title: Curso de Trading Prime Elite Profesional
courses.bio: Maestría del trading real y eficaz. Curso Profesional para traders Elite
objectives: Aprende a leer gráficos, identificar entradas precisas y operar sin depender de indicadores ni señales externas.
Domina el análisis del mercado, mejora tu rentabilidad y protege tu capital con estrategias efectivas y profesionales.
Conoce los ciclos de ineficiencias, liquidaciones y cómo aprovechar las oportunidades clave en el mercado de manera precisa.
Aprende a operar en horarios clave, evitando el ruido del mercado y maximizando tus ganancias con decisiones certeras.
requirements: Tener conocimientos básicos de trading, coroner Trading View y Metatrader
courses.description:
Curso de Trading Prime Elite Profesional: Domina FTMO, MetaTrader, TradingView y las Estrategias Clave en Forex, Nasdaq y Acciones

La práctica real y eficaz del trading rentable, basada en un enfoque institucional, es una oportunidad única para aquellos que buscan un camino hacia el éxito en los mercados financieros. Con un enfoque disciplinado y estratégico, aprenderás a gestionar riesgos y maximizar tus ganancias de manera efectiva, todo mientras sigues los mismos principios que utilizan las instituciones financieras más grandes del mundo.
Conviértete en un trader con un promedio de rentabilidad entre el 45% y el 65%, una cifra que te permitirá generar ingresos consistentes a lo largo del tiempo. Aprenderás a operar cualquier cuenta de reto de fondeo, lo que te brindará la flexibilidad y las herramientas necesarias para comenzar a operar con capital real de forma segura. Además, podrás operar con capitales privados, lo que te abrirá las puertas a una mayor cantidad de oportunidades de inversión.
El enfoque de esta formación es aplicable a cualquier instrumento de FOREX, permitiéndote operar con divisas de todo el mundo. También podrás especializarte en índices como el NASDAQ, DAX y NIKKEI, mercados que presentan grandes oportunidades debido a su volatilidad y potencial de ganancias.
Este sistema es totalmente aplicable a mercados de futuros y commodities como el oro, la plata, el petróleo, y más. Gracias a este enfoque, podrás obtener beneficios diarios, alcanzando rendimientos del 1%, 2%, 3%, 4% o incluso más cada día, haciendo que tus esfuerzos en el trading sean rentables y efectivos a largo plazo.

requirements: Tidak ada syarat atau prasyarat khusus untuk mengikuti kursus ini.
courses.description:
Pajak merupakan iuran wajib kepada negara terhadap siapa pun yang sudah memenuhi persyaratan perpajakan, termasuk badan usaha. Terdapat beberapa macam pajak yang dikenakan kepada badan usaha, yaitu Pajak Pertambahan Nilai (PPN), Pajak Penghasilan (PPh) Potong Pungut, dan Pajak Penghasilan (PPh) Tahunan Badan. Pembahasan selanjutnya akan menitikberatkan pada PPh Tahunan Badan (Corporate Income Tax)
Kebijakan perpajakan di Indonesia menganut sistem self assessment di mana Wajib Pajak diberikan kewenangan untuk menghitung, membayar, dan melaporkan sendiri pajaknya. Namun, jika pelaksanaannya tidak sesuai dengan ketentuan perundang-undangan yang berlaku, Wajib Pajak berisiko terkena sanksi maupun denda. Karena itu, perlu bagi Wajib Pajak untuk mengetahui tata cara yang benar dalam menghitung, membayar, dan melaporkan pajak.
PPh Tahunan Badan adalah pajak penghasilan yang dikenakan atas penghasilan yang diperoleh badan usaha pada satu tahun pajak. Pajak ini wajib dibayar dan disetorkan paling lambat empat bulan setelah berakhirnya tahun pajak atau tanggal 30 April. Untuk menentukan besarnya pajak yang harus dibayarkan, perlu ditentukan terlebih dahulu jumlah penghasilan kena pajak. Undang-Undang Pajak Penghasilan No. 36 Tahun 2008 telah menetapkan komponen dalam penghitungan penghasilan kena pajak.
Dalam hal ini, terdapat pendapatan maupun biaya yang boleh dan tidak boleh dimasukkan dalam penghitungan. Pendapatan dan biaya yang boleh dimasukkan dalam penghitungan penghasilan kena pajak adalah penghasilan dan biaya dalam rangka mendapatkan, menagih, dan memelihara penghasilan. Dengan kata lain, penghasilan dan biaya yang boleh diperhitungkan adalah penghasilan dan biaya sehubungan dengan kegiatan utama perusahaan serta beberapa ketentuan lainnya.
Sementara, hal lainnya yang perlu diperhatikan dalam menentukan besarnya PPh Tahunan Badan adalah tarif yang berlaku. Mengenai tarif, pemerintah dapat melakukan penyesuaian mengikuti kondisi perekonomian saat ini. Selengkapnya mengenai penghitungan, pembayaran, serta pelaporan PPh Tahunan Badan akan dijelaskan pada kursus Corporate Income Tax ini.
target_audience: 1. Mahasiswa jurusan akuntansi dan perpajakan
2. Karyawan bagian akuntansi perpajakan
3. Orang umum yang ingin mempelajari pajak khususnya PPh Tahunan Badan atau Corporate Income Tax.

courses.title: Master Personal Finance: Budgeting, Debt & Investing
courses.bio: Master the essentials of budgeting, conquering debt, and smart investing to build a secure financial future.

Lesson 1: Introduction to Personal Finan: Overview of Budgeting, Saving, Investing, and Managing Debt
Lesson 2: Understanding Income and Expen: Introduction to Identifying Sources of Income
Tracking and Categorizing Expenses: A Key to Financial Success
The Importance of Distinguishing Wants vs. Needs
Lesson 3: Creating Your Budget: Step-by-Step Guide to Creating a Budget
Lesson 4: Understanding Debt: Interest Rates and Their Impact on Debt Accumulation
Lesson 6: Introduction to Investing: What is Investing and Why is it Important?
The Basics of Risk and Return

requirements: No experience needed. This course is meant for beginners.
courses.description:
Are you ready to take control of your financial future? In this comprehensive course, "Master Personal Finance: Budgeting, Debt & Investing," we will guide you through the core principles and actionable strategies to help you master your personal finances.
Whether you're just starting out or looking to refine your financial knowledge, this course will provide you with the tools, knowledge, and confidence to make smart money decisions and build a solid financial foundation.
What You'll Learn:
Budgeting for Success
Understand the essentials of budgeting. Learn how to track your income and expenses, create a budget that works for you, and discover simple tools to manage your finances effectively. You’ll gain the ability to plan for both short-term needs and long-term goals.
Managing Debt
Learn practical strategies to manage and reduce debt, whether it's credit card debt, student loans, or mortgages. You'll explore debt snowball and avalanche methods, how to prioritize payments, and how to avoid common mistakes that keep you trapped in debt.
Smart Investing
Take your financial knowledge to the next level by learning the basics of investing. Understand different asset classes, such as stocks, bonds, and real estate, and discover how to start building an investment portfolio. We’ll also dive into risk management, asset allocation, and how to grow your wealth over time.
Financial Planning & Goals
Develop clear financial goals and a roadmap to achieve them. From setting up an emergency fund to saving for retirement, we will teach you how to create a financial plan that adapts to your life and helps you meet your milestones with confidence.
Building Wealth & Financial Independence
Learn strategies to build long-term wealth and achieve financial independence. Explore passive income ideas, strategies for growing your investments, and how to make smart decisions to set yourself up for a financially free future.
Who This Course Is For:
Anyone who wants to take control of their personal finances
Beginners who want to learn the basics of budgeting, debt management, and investing
Those looking to improve their current financial situation or break free from financial stress
Anyone interested in financial independence and building wealth over time
Why Take This Course?
Practical, Real-World Lessons: Everything you learn is designed to be applicable to your life today.
Actionable Strategies: We focus on practical steps that you can take immediately to improve your financial health.
Expert Guidance: Learn from experienced instructors with years of knowledge in personal finance, budgeting, and investing.
Flexible Learning: Learn at your own pace with lifetime access to course materials.
By the end of this course, you’ll be equipped with a solid understanding of personal finance, from budgeting to investing, and have the confidence to make informed decisions that will transform your financial future. Whether you're aiming for debt freedom, financial security, or long-term wealth, this course will empower you to succeed.
Enroll now and start mastering your personal finances today!
target_audience: Anyone interested in personal finance, and financial concepts.

More exactly, I will explain the difference between the tick volume on decentralized markets or FOREX, and the real market volume on the centralized markets, like the Chicago Mercantile Exchange.
Most important is that you will learn how to increase to a positive value for your winning ratio, by using Delta indicator, or by using Exhaustion and Absorption, the cumulative delta volume divergences.
You will have the possibility to test the same indicator for Meta Trader 4 or Meta Trader 5, like the one I am using as example in the lessons, because I will offer a trial period for the students of this course. You will get more indications in the beginning of the course.
Within this free course, you will also see a live educational trading session, using the cumulative delta indicator.


Please fell free to contact me, if you have any questions or something is not clear regarding the course, or the cumulative delta indicator.


Don't Stumble Trading. Trade Safe!

Are you preparing for the CFA ESG/ Sustainable Investing Professional exam and aiming to clear it on your first attempt?. Each of the 9 modules includes 100 highly probable questions, carefully designed to mirror the actual exam pattern. This part-I consists of following 05 chapters/ modules (Chapters 1-5) as per the curriculum:

3. Environmental Factors
4. Social Factors

Why This Program Delivers
Designed to eliminate repeat attempts: We understand that retaking the exam strains both finances and mental resilience. This program was co‑created and peer‑reviewed by professionals who have sat, faced, and passed the exam. Every Qbank is engineered to replicate real exam pattern, cognitive load, and disclosure decision style so you internalize exam logic before test day and maximize your probability of a first‑attempt pass.
What This Program Delivers
A tightly exam-aligned prep path for the CFA Sustainable/ESG Investing exam that builds conceptual clarity, sharpens technical application, and boosts confidence in applying ESG principles across investment decisions and portfolio construction.
Why You’ll Succeed
1. 100% syllabus alignment: Content maps directly to the current exam blueprint, building the knowledge, skills, and practical fluency needed to integrate ESG into investment decision-making and portfolio construction.
2. Free access to chapter-wise summary notes: Enroll in the chapter-wise Qbanks (both parts) to unlock/receive chapter-wise summary notes — your essential “secret sauce” for quickly grasping key points from each chapter. (Pls visit our profile page and email us to receive the chapter-wise summary notes).
3. Realistic exam style: Questions replicate the certification’s format—concept recall, scenario-based evaluation, “best action” choices, and applied judgment in investment contexts.
4. Structured learning progression: Qbanks move from foundational concepts to advanced analytical integration, sharpening both speed and investment-grade insight.
5. Lean explanations: Concise, retention-focused rationales highlight what matters for applying ESG factors in real-world investing—no fluff.
6. Clear corrective insight: Every question includes a breakdown of the right answer so you can diagnose gaps, learn from mistakes, and reinforce sound investment reasoning.
Your Next Steps
START your CFA ESG/ Sustainable Investing practice exam today—tackle every question with confidence, sharpen your expertise, and ACE the exam on your first attempt.
Enroll both parts now for all 9 Chapters: 2025 CFA ESG & Sustainable Investing Exam Prep – Chapterwise Q-Banks (I & II).

"Ballin' on a Budget: A Financial Literacy Course for Student Athletes" is a comprehensive online course designed exclusively for high school seniors and college-level student athletes. This transformative course equips student athletes with the essential knowledge and skills to navigate the financial aspects of their athletic journey and beyond.
Through a series of engaging video lessons, interactive quizzes, and real-life examples, students will dive into key financial topics tailored to their unique needs. From understanding income management, banking, taxes, and credit to exploring the opportunities and challenges of Name, Image, and Likeness (NIL) rights, this course covers it all.
Students will gain practical strategies for effective budgeting, goal setting, and savings, ensuring they maximize their financial resources and plan for a secure future. They will also learn how to protect themselves against identity theft, build credibility, and separate personal and business finances.
With a strong emphasis on sports-related examples and scenarios, this course empowers student athletes to make informed financial decisions, capitalize on financial opportunities, and cultivate a respectable image both on and off the field.
By the end of this course, student athletes will have developed a solid foundation in financial literacy, enabling them to confidently navigate the financial challenges they may encounter during their athletic careers and beyond. Prepare to unleash your financial potential and take control of your financial game plan with "Ballin' on a Budget." Enroll now and secure a prosperous future both in and out of sports.

courses.title: Reserves Reports in 30 Minutes
courses.bio: A Quick Guide to Understanding Reserves Reports in the Oil and Gas Industry
requirements: No prior experience is required to enroll in this course
courses.description:
"Reserves Reports in 30 Minutes" is a focused online course designed to provide professionals in the oil and gas sector with an understanding of Reserves Reports. These reports, also known as the Report on Reserves Data by Independent Qualified Reserves Evaluator, play a crucial role in assessing a company’s reserves using discounted cash flow methods. They are essential for stakeholders like accountants, financial analysts, regulators, and investors to make informed business decisions.
The course covers key elements of reserves reports, including the different types of reserves (Proved 1p, Probable 2p, and Possible 3p), the structure of a reserves report, and the technical and financial data involved. Special emphasis is placed on understanding the discounted cash flow (DCF) model, reserve evaluation methods, and the importance of third-party independent evaluation.
Additionally, participants will learn how reserves reports influence financial statements, regulatory compliance, mergers and acquisitions (M&A), and financing decisions. By the end of the course, attendees will be equipped to interpret and apply reserves reports effectively, navigate common challenges, and utilize them in business contexts for decision-making and reporting. This course is ideal for professionals involved in accounting, financial analysis, M&A, corporate governance, and regulatory oversight in the oil and gas industry.
target_audience: This course is targeted at professionals involved in accounting, financial analysis, M&A, corporate governance, and regulatory oversight in the oil and gas industry.

Nathan and Danica:
Countries lived in: Canada, Mexico, Ireland, Nepal and India

Our monthly budget now in India: $200US

courses.description:
This course will cover corporate dividend policy.
We will include many example problems, both in the format of presentations and Excel worksheet problems. The Excel worksheet presentations will include a downloadable Excel workbook with at least two tabs, one with the answer, the second with a preformatted worksheet that can be completed in a step-by-step process along with the instructional videos.
Dividends represent earnings that a corporation distributes to owners. Dividends for a corporation can be compared do withdrawals from a sole proprietorship or partnership. However, there are substantial differences between a partnership withdrawal and a corporate dividend due to differences in the business structure.
A partner in a partnership generally has more control over the amount of draws they can take and when they can take them. Different partners may also draw different amounts at different times.
By contrast, a corporation must give uniform distributions of dividends to each class of shares, resulting in far less direct control by an individual shareholder to determine the amount of dividends or when they will be distributed.
The dividend distribution policy of a corporate can be very complex, involving many factors, including the life cycle of the company, the cash flow of the company, and the preferences of the shareholders.
A company that is in the growth phase of its life cycle is more likely to have smaller dividends, preferring to reinvest the money to grow operations. Shareholders who would like to invest over a longer time frame may like this policy because the increase in value of the company will increase the value of the shares.
A company in a mature phase of the life cycle may not have as much need to reinvest earnings and is more likely to distribute earnings to shareholders. Many investors like investing in dividend yielding companies because they receive a return on their investment in the form of dividends.
target_audience: Business students
Business professionals

courses.description:
If you work in insurance, you know that not every client conversation is easy. Denying a claim, explaining a premium increase, or communicating a policy change can be high-stakes and stressful. One wrong word can confuse clients, damage trust, or even cost a referral.
Our online insurance course gives you practical, real-world strategies to handle these conversations with confidence, clarity, and professionalism—without stress.


Why This Course Matters for Insurance Professionals


Deliver Claims Decisions Clearly – Explain approvals, denials, and adjustments so clients understand and trust your guidance.
Communicate Policy Changes Effectively – Make updates to policies or premiums clear without confusion or frustration.
Manage Emotional Responses – Stay calm, professional, and empathetic, even when clients are upset.
Protect Client Relationships – Turn tough conversations into opportunities for trust and loyalty.
Grow Your Career – Strengthen your professional reputation and referral network by handling challenging interactions well.


What You Will Learn


By the end of this course, you will be able to:


Explain claim decisions, underwriting outcomes, and policy changes clearly and professionally.
Respond to upset or confused clients without losing composure.
Solve problems, answer questions, and reduce conflict effectively.
Keep clients informed, satisfied, and confident in your guidance.
Turn difficult conversations into positive outcomes for both clients and your business.


Who Should Take This Course


This course is designed for insurance professionals at every level:

Claims Adjusters – Deliver claim decisions and manage client reactions with confidence.
Insurance Brokers – Maintain strong relationships while explaining complex policies.
Underwriters – Communicate approvals or denials clearly to agents and clients.
Customer Service Staff – Handle complaints and questions effectively.
Sales Agents – Explain policy changes, premium increases, or coverage options without losing trust.
Risk Managers – Present risk assessments and recommendations in a way clients understand and accept.


Looking for Team Training?


Consistency is key in insurance. When your team learns together, everyone communicates clearly, strengthens client relationships, and improves overall satisfaction.
Whether your team works in life insurance, health insurance, property & casualty, claims, underwriting, or risk management, this course prepares everyone to handle difficult conversations successfully.


Take Control of Difficult Conversations


You don’t have to dread high-stakes client interactions. Learn to communicate clearly, stay calm, and maintain trust, protecting relationships and your professional reputation every step of the way.


Enroll Now and Start Handling Difficult Conversations with Confidence!

requirements: 開業届を出している方
courses.description:
起業して、次のステージに行きたい！集客を強化したい！
そんなとき、国からの「補助金」を活用することができます。
・ホームページを作りたい！
・店舗や教室を改装したい！
・販売促進のために広告を出したい！
・顧客取引エリアを拡大したい！


この講座は、初めて「補助金」を活用する方でも、
遠回りせずに、「採択」されやすい書類を書けるようになる講座です。


しかも、１か月で書き上げて提出するところまでをゴールとしていて、
書類に書くための下準備になる「ワーク」もついています！


２０２０年の次回の補助金の締め切りは１２月１０日ですが、
今から準備をスタートすれば間に合います。




補助金と聞くと、「企業・法人さんが使うもの」と思うかもしれませんが、
サロン・教室・講師・士業などの
おひとり様起業家、個人事業主様にも使っていただけるものです。
もちろん、小規模の企業様も使っていただけます。






補助金としてもらえる金額は、最大５０万円～１００万円。


販売促進やPR活動、新しい機械等の投資、旅費などに使う予算のうち、
必要経費の２／３～３／４を国が補助してくれます。


例えば、４０万円のホームページを作るときに、
国からの補助を３／４もらうことで、
自己負担が１／４つまり、１０万円で済む！ことになるのです。




そんなこと知らなった！！！
いつか使ってみたい！
でも、国の補助金申請は難しそう・・・という方のために、
申請書の書き方を丁寧に、かつ、
「通りやすいポイント」とともに解説しています。


・補助金の全体像
・書類作成のスケジュールの考え方
・公募要領の要点の解説
・補助の対象となる費用、ならない費用の解説
・通りやすい書類の書き方
・普通は教えてもらえない、書類の「魅せ方」のポイント
・書類作成のための「ワーク」






初めての方でも、遠回りせずに、
「採択」されやすい書類を書けるようになる講座です。


実際に７名以上の補助金申請をサポートし、
商工会議所・中小企業診断士と何度もやりとりした
実績からたどり着いた、実践的な講座内容になっています。




＼　知らないと損！　／
＼　個人は、使えないものだという勘違い！　／
本当に、知っているか知らないかの差は大きいです。




さぁ、あなたも、小規模事業者持続化補助金に関する知識を得て、
１か月で申請書類を書き上げ、国の補助を受け、
ビジネスを飛躍させる一歩を踏み出してみませんか？
target_audience: ホームページ制作費や広告費の補助が欲しい方
起業をスピードアップさせたいと思っている方

補助金をいつか使ってみたい方
