Quem quer melhorar seus conhecimentos.

courses.title: Kurs Programi Finaciar ne Cloud Alpha: Certifikohu Online
courses.bio: Program trajnimi i plote. Meso si te perdoresh i pavarur programin Alpha dhe si t'a integrosh ate me programe te tjera.
objectives: Akses ne programin Alpha: Kerko krijimin e nje versioni DEMO
Kuptoni konceptet e Alpha-s. Krijoni ndermarrjen tuaj me konfigurimet baze.
Kuptoni çfare eshte nje sistem financiar dhe si e ndihmon biznesin tuaj.
Merrni nje pamje te pergjithshme te programit Alpha dhe mesoni pse duhet t'a zgjdhni ate per biznesin tuaj.
Kuptoni konceptin e perdoruesve dhe te drejtat ne module. Mesoni te krijoni nje perdorues te ri dhe te percaktoni te drejta te ndryshme per cdo Rol.
Artikujt: Krijoni nje produkt te ri ne Alpha. Njihni ndryshimin midis klasave te produkteve Inventar, Prodhim dhe Sherbim dhe menyres se si ato ndikojnë ne inventarin.

Shitjet: Kuptoni procesin e regjistrimit te shitjeve dhe llojet e dokumentave qe mund te perdorim per evidentimin e tyre. Celjen e kartelave te klienteve dhe regjistrimin e shitjeve per eksport dhe dokumentin e eksportit.
Blerja: Mesoni si te krijoni kartelat e furnitoreve dhe te punoni me regjistrimin e blerjeve. Regjistrimin e blerjeve te furnitoreve te huaj dhe fleten doganore te imporit.

Inventari: Kuptoni rrjedhën e përgjithshme të procesit të inventarit. Menaxhoni transferimet e produkteve në një vendndodhje në tjetrin. Percaktoni nje nivel minimal stoku te inventarit tuaj qe te informoheni se per cilat produkte duhet te rifurnizoheni.
Likuidimi i faturave: Njihu me tipet e dokumentave te likudimit. Meso si te likuidosh nje fature, detyrimin e furnitoreve, arketimin e klienteve dhe regjistrime te tjera me llogari kontabel.
Celja e bilancit fillestar: Regjistro manualisht gjendjet fillestare te llogarive dhe kartelave. Meso cilat zera duhen regjistruar me kartele dhe cilat me llogari.

Prodhimi: Mesoni krijimin e artikujve te llojt Prodhim, lidhjen me ose pa receptura. Regjistrimin e dokumentave si Prodhim me Porosi dhe Ekzekutim Prodhimi. Kuptoni si ndikon cdo regjistrim ne gjendjen tuaj te inventarit.
Asetet: Krijoni kartelat e Aseteve, regjistroni nje gjendjen fillestare apo faturen e tyre te blerjes dhe llogarisni amortizimin ne program.

Burimet Njerezore: Krijoni kartela te vecanta per cdo punonjes tuajin, evidentoni zerat perberes te pages Bruto dhe Neto. Regjistroni pagesen e detyrimeve per punonjesit me nje dokument te thjeshte likudimi.

Qendrat e Kostove: Menaxhoni ne menyre efikase perdorimin e resurseve tuaja dhe te ardhurat qe ju vijne nga cdo qender kostoje. Qendroni gjithmone te informuar per ecurine e cdo nen-njesie duke regjistruar dokumentat e Shperndarjes ne Qendra Kosto.
Importimi dhe Eksportimi i te dhenave: Perdor dokumenta Excel per te menaxhuar numrin e larte te te dhenave te biznesit tuaj.
Mbyllja e vitit ushtrimor: Gjenerimi i vitit pasardhes vetem nepermjet klikimit te nje butoni. Meso si te azhornosh llogarite ne monedhe te huaj dhe gjenerimin e raporteve financiare permbyllese.
Integrimi: Nese keni nje program shitje, nje CRM apo cdo aplikacion tjeter, mund t'a integrosh me programin Alpha ne cdo moment duke aplikuar disa konfigurimete thjeshta.
MOBI: Aplikacion mobile per regjstrimin e shitjeve, blerjeve, dokumentave te inventarit, lukuidimeve etj. I integrueshem me sistemin Alpha.

Introduction: Cfare do te perfitohet ne fund te kursit?
Konfigurimet Baze: Logimi ne program dhe rivendosja e fjalekalimit
OPSIONALE: Krijo nje llogari per testime
Celjet e Kartelave: Celja e arkave dhe e bankave
Celje te tjera: Celja e monedhave dhe konfigurimi i kursit
Regjistrimet: Regjistrimi i dokumentave blerje dhe shitje
Regjistrim i kthimit te blerjeve dhe shitjeve
Dokumentat e Arkes-Bankes(likuidimi me dhe pa fature)
Moduli i Aseteve: Gjenerimi i amortizimit fillestar nga blerja
Moduli i Prodhimit: Celja e artikujve te klases Prodhim
Regjsitrimi i EP pa receptura te lidhur artikuj

requirements: Nuk nevojiten njohuri te meparshme te programit Alpha
PC/Laptop
Akses ne internet
courses.description:
Qellimi kryesor i kursit "Programi Financiar ne Cloud Alpha" eshte te mesoje kedo, duke nisur qe nga nje fillestar, si te perdor programin financiar Alpha ne pak ore, pa terma te komplikuar teknik apo financiar.

Vetem ne pak kohe, ju do te jeni ne gjendje te perdorni Alpha-n per biznesin tuaj.

Nuk keni nevoje te keni njohuri teknike ose njohuri programesh finaciare per te perdorur Alpha-n per biznesin tuaj apo nese jeni te punesuar diku. Ky kurs do te mbuloje te gjithe modulet e programit,  nga aksesi ne Alpha e deri ne zbatimin e funksionaliteteve te avancuara ne pershtatje te cdo biznesi.
Ne fund te ketij kursi, do te keni te gjithe njohurite e nevojshme ne menyre qe te aplikoni Alpha-n per biznesin tuaj ose per biznesin e klientit tuaj.
Te njohesh programin financiar ne cloud Alpha perben nje avantazh ne boten e biznesit dhe karrieres, prandaj jemi te sigurte se koha qe do te kushtoni ne perfundimin e ketij kursi do te jete nje vlere e madhe per profesionin tuaj.
Vleresojme shume angazhimin dhe perkushtimin e treguar per te mesuar programin. Per te nisur kursin, klikoni butonin "Take this Course"  dhe bëhuni gati te mësoni programin financiar ne Cloud Alpha.
target_audience: Kushdo qe deshiron te mesoje bazat e programit Alpha
Kushdo qe nuk ka perdorur me pare nje program financiar
Kushdo qe eshte i interesuar per zhvillimin e nje karriere me programin Alpha
Biznese, perdorues te programit Alpha
Biznese te interesuar per te punuar me programin Alpha

courses.title: Grocery Couponing Secrets
courses.bio: How To Save Money on Groceries
objectives: The basics of maximizing grocery savings

Grocery Couponing Secrets: Part 1: What’s The Big Deal about Coupons?
Part 5: Using Digital Coupons and Rebates
Part 7: Final Thoughts on Maximizing Savings

requirements: None
courses.description:
"Grocery Couponing Secrets" discusses how to achieve maximum savings when shopping at the grocery store. The following topics will be discussed in detail.
• An introduction into the world of extreme couponing
- A bit about me and how I learned about couponing
- Why couponing is important
- How couponing has changed in the age of the internet
• How to save using store sales
- Types of store sales
- How to find sale circulars
- How to identify sale items using the internet
- How to take advantage of price matching
- Using Rain Checks
• How to save using store coupons
- How to find physical store coupons
- How to use the internet to find store coupons
- Using competitor's coupons
- How to stack coupons with store sales
• How to save using manufacturer coupons
- How to find physical store coupons
- How to use the internet to manufacturer coupons
- How to stack manufacturer coupons for maximum savings
• Using digital coupons, rebates, and mobile apps
- How to save using digital coupons
- How to save using rebate apps for mobile devices
- Other useful apps for grocery shoppers
• Putting it all together
- How to stack coupons and savings
- Timing your coupons use
- Couponing examples
• Final considerations for saving on groceries
- How to make and use a coupon binder
- Meeting coupon requirements
- Stocking up on discounted products
- When not to use coupons


About the Expert
John Longsworth began learning about couponing while working as a cashier at the local Scott’s Foods grocery store. He’s watched and learned the coupon game from his fellow cashiers and from the many extreme couponers that passed through his checkout lane. By studying the best couponers, he learned all the tricks of the trade.
Since then, he has mastered the art of couponing by combining old techniques with new savings opportunities provided by the internet and mobile devices. John can now regularly shave 33% of his grocery bill with hardly any effort, and more than twice that if he sets his mind to it.
target_audience: Grocery shoppers with no experience in couponing techniques

courses.title: Money School: Debt
courses.bio: How debt works, how to get out of bad debt fast, and how to stay out of it!
requirements: Access to a device for playing videos and suitable internet connection to play them
courses.description:
Welcome to Money School's course on debt - where you'll learn everything you wish you'd been taught about debt in school! We'll be covering:
how debt works,
why you might want debt, and why lenders want you to have it
the types of debt (good, bad, luxury)
if you're in debt: how to get out fast without debt consolidation
how to stay out of (bad) debt.
We decided to make this course freely available for three reasons:

Those who need it, can't afford it. It would feel bad to ask you to use a credit card when we'd prefer you paid it off. So we're taking away the excuses - now this training is free, you just need to commit your time to complete it.
Those who need it, can't become financially independent. Having large amounts of consumer debt makes financial independence (almost) impossible. We hope that by helping you get debt-free, you'll consider taking the next steps toward financial independence.
Young people need this knowledge. We want you to share this with the young people in your life - those not yet 18 years old - so they know how to avoid the woes of consumer debt. Imagine if you'd known how to manage debt BEFORE you got your first loan or credit card?
target_audience: Anyone interested in learning about debt, loans and credit
Anyone struggling with debt
Anyone considering debt consolidation

courses.title: Investigação de Fraudes e Auditoria Forense
courses.bio: Prevenir, dissuadir e detetar fraudes
objectives: Entenda os diferentes tipos de fraude que afetam as organizações
Desenvolver um programa antifraude abrangente
Conduzir e supervisionar uma investigação de fraude
Desenvolver recursos de auditoria forense
requirements: Tudo o que você precisa é de interesse no tema
courses.description:
A fraude ocupacional, cometida por funcionários das mesmas organizações vitimadas, leva 5% de seu faturamento bruto anual, MUNDIALMENTE, de acordo com estimativas da ACFE, Association of Certified Fraud Examiners. Por sua vez, o crime organizado gera 10% do PIB mundial por meio de inúmeros crimes, alguns deles em escala transnacional.
Diante desses números chocantes, é óbvio que as organizações públicas e privadas não podem ignorar o fenômeno da fraude e devem adotar medidas adequadas para combatê-lo.
Nesta atividade analisaremos o tema desde o seu início, compreendendo a gênese da fraude através da psicologia do fraudador, sua mudança através da inserção em uma estrutura corporativa, e as sucessivas medidas de prevenção, dissuasão e detecção que as organizações podem adotar para combater a fraude.
Em seguida, exploraremos em detalhes a metodologia de investigação de fraudes, os documentos que são gerados ao longo da investigação e o papel dos auditores forenses no processo.
Este é um curso inestimável para aqueles que desejam ter uma compreensão abrangente da fraude e maneiras eficazes de preveni-la, dissuadi-la e puni-la.
Em suma, é uma atividade tão necessária quanto interessante para quem deseja adquirir ou ampliar seus conhecimentos no combate à fraude em todas as suas formas. Sem dúvida, será um curso valioso que não decepcionará as expectativas de quem o fizer.
target_audience: Auditores e investigadores

courses.title: Administración de Nómina (Para México) Episodio 1
courses.bio: Conceptos con carácter obligatorio I
objectives: Aspectos legales de los descuentos que se aplican en nómina
Explicar la retención y entero de ISR por salarios
Elementos que se consideran para el cálculo correcto de aguinaldo
Factores para la determinación y cálculo de tiempo extra

Clase 1: Introducción a la Administración de Nómina

requirements: Solamente conocimientos básicos de algunos términos contables, fiscales y de seguridad social. No necesariamente se requiere experiencia en el área
courses.description:
Una de las claves para alcanzar el éxito en cualquier negocio o empresa, es realizar una correcta administración. Esto incluye los recursos financieros, humanos y materiales con los que se cuenta. Como parte de la atención que requieren tales recursos, surge la necesidad de pagar el salario al personal que se tiene contratado, con un proceso de nómina que puede ser tan sencillo o complejo como la organización lo determine. No importa el tamaño o actividad comercial, el pago de los colaboradores, pasa de necesario a convertirse en una obligación legal. Para ejecutarlo, es indispensable tener conocimiento de los diversos conceptos que se aplican e intervienen en el proceso. La importancia de conocer la naturaleza de cada partida va a influir en que se haga la aplicación adecuada, para dar como resultado un cálculo exacto. Cuando se tiene el contexto de los aspectos que hemos mencionado, también es posible cumplir con los lineamientos y obligaciones en materia laboral, fiscal y de seguridad social por parte de la empresa, y a su vez se hacen evidentes las condiciones que fueron acordadas con cada colaborador en sus contratos laborales, con base en las funciones que desempeñan.
La administración de nómina es una actividad que demanda atención constante, ya que cada año se presentan reformas a las leyes que rigen las obligaciones que se desprenden, ante las autoridades correspondientes como son: La Secretaría del Trabajo y Previsión Social, El Servicio de Administración Tributaria y el Instituto Mexicano del Seguro Social.
Además, esta actividad requiere el cumplimiento de características que otras áreas no tienen, de las que podemos mencionar: El pago con una determinada frecuencia, que puede ser semanal o quincenal en la mayoría de los casos. También el cálculo debe ser exacto, para que el colaborador reciba la justa remuneración por la prestación de sus servicios y a su vez, se calculen, retengan y paguen correctamente los impuestos que se derivan del tabulador salarial para cada uno de los empleados.
La dinámica de este curso es que se enseña a calcular correctamente ciertos conceptos de nómina y se hace énfasis en el fundamento legal que existe para llevarlo a cabo de esa forma. Se tiene un enfoque teórico - práctico. Primeramente, se indica que se tiene que hacer, después cómo se tiene que realizar y al final la razón que existe para llevarlo a cabo de determinada forma.
En muchas ocasiones se da por sentado el hecho de que el proceso de una nómina puede ser rápido, arrojando los mejores resultados. Esto es cierto, siempre y cuando quién se encuentra operando, cuente con los conocimientos necesarios para ello, donde resaltamos 3 leyes federales de nuestro país:
*Ley Federal del Trabajo. Nos indica cuáles son los conceptos son los que se tienen que pagar al existir una relación laboral, cuáles con las condiciones en las que debe hacerse y cuáles son sus limitantes y supuestos.
*Ley del Impuesto Sobre la Renta. Dicta la obligación para todo patrón o empresa del pago de los impuestos que se originan por el pago de un determinado concepto y su cálculo correcto, en el contexto de la nómina del impuesto sobre la renta, para retenerlo y posteriormente pagarlo.
*Ley del Seguro Social. Dentro de las obligaciones que marca, se encuentran las cuotas que la empresa debe pagar al IMSS por cada uno de los trabajadores que tiene dados de alta, dependiendo de tipo de prestaciones que entregue, lo que va a influir en el salario base con el cual se encuentran cotizando.
Por las razones anteriormente mencionadas, al proceso y administración de la nómina, es un tema que merece prioridad debido al alcance que tiene al interior de toda organización, debido al delicado tema del pago de salario, concepto y prestaciones que se otorgan a la plantilla, y por otro lado para cumplir con las obligaciones de la empresa ante instancias gubernamentales.
Este y los siguientes cursos de esta saga, pretenden exponer toda esta información de una forma amigable, clara, dando una explicación de las leyes a las que se hace referencia, acompañado de ejemplos prácticos que tiene el objetivo de facilitar la compresión, cálculo y ejecución de los diversos conceptos que se estarán analizando.
En mi experiencia profesional de 18 años como especialista de nómina, tuve la oportunidad de conocer y manejar diferentes softwares o programas informáticos que tienen la capacidad de realizar el cálculo de forma automática. Sin embargo, para verificar que dicho cálculo sea el correcto, para realizar la revisión de las cifras, se requiere conocer las mecánicas de cálculo para cualquier tipo de nómina o concepto que se utilice en la industria donde nos desenvolvemos. Para lograrlo, este curso te lleva paso a paso, para que adquieras los conocimientos y habilidades que se requieren para no solo operar, sino desarrollar la capacidad de asesorar en materia de nómina.
target_audience: Estudiantes que desean especializarse en el cálculo de nómina
Para auxiliares, analistas, ejecutivos, coordinadores y jefes que se desarrollan en áreas de Administración de Personal y Recursos Humanos
Para emprendedores, empresarios y patrones que desean conocer el contexto legal, obligaciones y procesos que involucran el pago de la nómina de sus colaboradores

courses.description:
Candidates preparing for this examination are tasked with the responsibility of evaluating business requirements and converting these requirements into fully operational business processes and solutions that align with industry best practices. These candidates play a pivotal role in the deployment and customization of applications to meet the specific needs of the business.
A thorough understanding of the common features and functionalities within Finance and Operations apps is essential for these candidates, along with the ability to configure and effectively utilize each of these features. Additionally, candidates should possess knowledge about how Finance and Operations apps seamlessly integrate with external systems and tools, such as the Power Platform. The management of application lifecycles using tools like Lifecycle Services (LCS) and other Microsoft platforms is also within the purview of these candidates.
Typically, individuals pursuing this exam tend to specialize in one or more feature sets of Finance and Operations apps, which may encompass areas such as finance, manufacturing, and supply chain management.
The Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations apps, including but not limited to Dynamics 365 Finance, Dynamics 365 Supply Chain Management, and Dynamics 365 Supply Chain Management, Manufacturing, offer a range of capabilities:
Automation and modernization of global financial operations.
Real-time performance monitoring, predictive analytics, and data-driven decision-making to drive business growth.
Strategic financial decision-making facilitated by artificial intelligence (AI), streamlining and automating financial processes, reducing operational costs, and mitigating global financial complexities and risks.
A Dynamics 365 for Finance and Operations Functional Consultant's role encompasses tasks such as conducting discovery, capturing requirements, engaging subject matter experts and stakeholders, translating requirements into actionable solutions, and configuring the relevant applications. These consultants leverage out-of-the-box capabilities, codeless extensibility, and seamless application and service integrations to implement solutions effectively.

courses.title: COSO basado en principios (marcos 2013 y 2017)
courses.bio: Evaluación e implementación
objectives: Conocer los principios del control interno y los sucesivos marcos relacionados
Identificar ventajas y limitaciones de cada marco de control interno
Conocer criterios de implementación de cada marco de control interno
Establecer criterios de evaluación de los distintos marcos de control interno
requirements: Interés y conocimientos básicos de control interno
courses.description:
Desde siempre, un elemento sustancial para el buen orden de las organizaciones, tanto públicas como privadas, conforme crecen y se tornan más complejas, es el establecimiento de un sistema de control interno. Este sistema de control interno sirve para estructurar funciones y procesos de manera funcional, prevenir la ocurrencia de fraudes y garantizar el debido reporte financiero.
Con el transcurso del tiempo y la ocurrencia de diversos incidentes que derivaron en quiebras y escándalos corporativos, el marco original de control interno que era una recopilación casuística y no documentada de mejores prácticas, entró en crisis.
Fue así que, en 1992 se estableció el marco COSO (siglas de Committee of Sponsoring Organizations) , promulgado por el esfuerzo conjunto de cinco prominentes organizaciones:
AAA – American Association of Accountants, Asociación Estadounidense de Contadores
AICPA – American Institute of Certified Public Accountants, Instituto Estadounidenses de Contadores Públicos Certificados
IMA – Institute of Managerial Accountants, Instituto de Auditores Gerenciales
FEI – Financial Executives Institute, Instituto de Ejecutivos Financieros
IIA – Institute of Internal Auditors, Instituto de Auditores Internos
Con el transcurso del tempo, este modelo mostró virtudes y limitaciones, dando lugar a la ulterior formulación de otros marcos alternativos que analizaremos en este curso:
· CoCo – Comitee of Canadian Organizations, Comité de Organizaciones Canadienses, en 1992
· COSO – ERM en 2004 ERM son siglas de Enterprise Risk Management. Administración de los Riesgos Empresariales
· En 2013 y 2017 se emitieron dos marcos de control interno BASADOS EN PRINCIPIOS, que son los actualmente prevalentes y cuya implementación detallada será el objeto de la última parte de este tan interesante como instructivo curso
target_audience: Auditores internos
Gerentes y directivos

You’re not alone. Many business owners and bookkeepers struggle to enforce credit terms—often because they don’t have a system that works before debt becomes a problem.
This short, powerful course gives you the tools and scripts you need to set boundaries, stay professional, and actually get paid—without burning bridges.

courses.title: Find Your Profit Formula
courses.bio: Set prices with confidence, stay profitable, and grow your business—no guesswork, no stress.
objectives: How to calculate selling prices for long-term profitability.
Master Break-even analysis for smarter decision making.
Turning cost and profit data into an action plan.
Tracking profitability with a KPI dashboard.

Mindset Shift: Why understanding cost and profit changes everything.
Understanding Your Costs: The Contribution Margin - Your Real Profit
Pricing for Profit: Setting Prices with the Profit Formula
Break-Even and Decision Making: Making Decisions Based on the Numbers
Your Action Plan: Business Profit Action Plan: Clear Targets
Business Profit Action Plan: Track and Review
Business Profit Action Plan: Adjust for Growth

requirements: No prior knowledge needed.
courses.description:
Pricing your products or services is one of the most important decisions you will make in business—yet many small business owners guess their prices or copy competitors without truly understanding if their pricing is profitable. This course will change that.
In Finding Your Profit Formula, you’ll learn how to confidently set prices that ensure your business not only survives but thrives. You’ll discover how to calculate your costs, determine your desired profit margins, and use proven formulas to establish selling prices that protect your bottom line.
You’ll gain a clear understanding of your break-even point—the exact number of units or services you need to sell to cover your costs—and how to use that knowledge to make better decisions about marketing, expenses, and growth strategies.
But we won’t stop at the numbers. You’ll learn how to turn your cost and profit data into a practical, easy-to-follow action plan that guides your day-to-day business decisions. Using scenario planning, you’ll be able to prepare for different market conditions and stay profitable even when things change.
Finally, you’ll build your own KPI (Key Performance Indicator) dashboard to track profitability over time. With tools like the Contribution Margin % metric, you’ll know exactly which products or services bring in the most profit and where to focus your energy.
Whether you’re launching a business or refining your pricing strategy, this course will give you the clarity, confidence, and tools to price for sustainable success.
target_audience: Small Business owners looking to take their business to the next level.
Anyone who wants to broaden their knowledge.

This comprehensive online course is designed to give students a thorough understanding of management accounting principles and practices. courses.description: This course is designed specifically for non-finance professionals and students who want to gain a solid understanding of how annual financial statements are produced and the internal controls that support them—within the context of International Financial Reporting Standards (IFRS) and similar regulatory environments. Whether you work in a business setting, government, or nonprofit organization, or you're just getting started in your studies, this course equips you with the practical knowledge needed to understand the financial reporting process. By the end of the course, you'll not only understand how financial statements are structured and used, but also how accounting systems and internal controls work behind the scenes. courses.description:
You would appreciate and understand the different concepts of Value of money- Present Value, Future Value , Real Value, Market Value, Book Value, Nominal Value, Exchange Value, Tax value. Essential concept for taking day-to-day decisions  in  money management.
Time value of money, in practical terms, empowers individuals to make more informed choices. It underscores the rationale behind prioritizing immediate returns over future ones, and it underscores the importance of discounting future cash flows to their present value
As Individuals you can make rational decisions regarding savings goals, investments, retirement planning, and more. Businesses can use it to evaluate the profitability of long-term projects, and governments can employ it to make prudent fiscal decisions.
When you are discussing current financial topics like interest rate changes, inflation, investment opportunities, or even government policies, your knowledge of the time value of money allows you to analyse these issues in a broader context. You can explain how changes in interest rates or inflation impact the value of money over time, and how this relates to various financial decisions.
Apply critical thinking skills to analyse and solve complex financial problems in Capital budgeting decisions. These topics are essential for navigating the financial landscape successfully.
Basic understanding of the different dimensions of value of money would  help you to  be confident enough to discuss  all  economic and political implications on our daily life.

\"Banderas rojas \"en el proceso de adqu: "Banderas rojas" en el proceso de adquisiciones

requirements: Conocimientos básicos de procesos investigativos
courses.description:
El fraude es un fenómeno que afecta de manera severa y creciente a las organizaciones públicas y privadas. Específicamente, el proceso de compras y contrataciones es extremadamente vulnerable a la corrupción, que es además el fraude más difícil de detectar y comprobar. Ello debido a su naturaleza “fuera de libros”, en la cual los tratos espurios no se reflejan más que de manera indirecta en la contabilidad de la organización (por ejemplo, por vía de sobreprecios).
En esta actividad analizaremos en detalle cuales son los elementos que conducen a incentivar o desalentar el fraude en los procesos de compras y contrataciones, así como identificar las vulnerabilidades que se registran en el proceso, las señales del accionar fraudulento y las mejores prácticas para la conducción de investigaciones sobre fraudes cometidos en el proceso de Compras y Contrataciones.
Proveeremos asimismo de herramientas y metodologías adecuadas para la prevención, disuasión y detección de fraudes en el proceso de Compras y Contrataciones de una manera ordenada y sistemática, y por medio del accionar interdisciplinario de profesionales de distintas disciplinas.
En resumen: proveeremos de un marco adecuado para la mitigación del fraude en el proceso de compras y contrataciones, así como para la mejoras en la transparencia y eficiencia de la gestión.
target_audience: Auditores internos y externos, responsables de la función de Compras

courses.title: Excel Accounting Problem
courses.bio: Learn How to Create an Accounting Worksheet Using Microsoft Excel from a Certified Public Accountant (CPA)
objectives: How to navigate Microsoft Excel or other computerized spreadsheet like Google Sheets
How to create an accounting system in Excel from a blank worksheet including a general journal, trial balance, general ledger, subsidiary ledgers and more
How to enter journal entries related to common transactions and list the data input forms often used to enter them into accounting software like QuickBooks
How to enter two months worth of data input into our accounting system
How to do two month of bank reconciliations, comparing the process to how accounting software like QuickBooks would accomplish the task
How to enter period end adjusting journal entries
Create financial statements

Customer Cycle, Sales Cycle, or Accounts: 1420 Credit Memo Refund Form & Bad Debt Expense Service Item
Add Opening Account Balances: 6383 Adjust Beginning Balances in Worksheet for Current Period Data Input
Month 1-Record Owner Investment, Purchas: 7020 Record Deposits from Owner and Loan
Month 1-Enter Transactions for Purchase: 7080 Cash Payment for Inventory Linked to Purchase Order P.O.

requirements: None
courses.description:
This course will walk through a comprehensive accounting problem using Microsoft Excel in a step-by-step process. You may also use another spreadsheet software like Google Sheets.
Learners will learn how to navigate Microsoft Excel as well as how to create a well-designed accounting worksheet, complete with a general journal, trial balance, general ledger, subsidiary ledgers for accounts receivable, accounts payable, & inventory, financial statements and much more.
Excel is a very good tool to learn accounting because it is much more transparent than a database program, like accounting software, QuickBooks being a common example of accounting software.
As we enter transactions into our Microsoft Excel worksheet, we will discuss how the data input would commonly be entered into accounting software like QuickBooks and what data input forms would normally drive the transactions.
The course will start out from a blank Excel Worksheet. We will build the outline for our accounting system from the blank spreadsheet.
For each new step in the process, you will have access to a downloadable Excel Workbook, containing at least two tabs, one with the answer, the new steps being completed, the other starting out where the prior presentation left off.
Therefore, you can complete the entire problem starting from one blank spreadsheet, or you can jump forward in the problem and rework any component of the problem by downloading the related worksheet at that point in the process.
After constructing the outline of our accounting worksheet, the first section will discuss the most common accounting transactions and the data input form often used in accounting software, like QuickBooks, to enter them, common data input forms including invoice, bill, deposit. . .
We will then start our comprehensive problem, constructing a new Excel worksheet and entering beginning balances into it, imagining that we had a prior accounting system which we are now converting to our new accounting system in Excel.
We will then enter two-months worth of data input. When entering the accounting data we will create the journal entry, post it to the trial balance, giving us a good look at which accounts are impacted, post to the general ledger, and make adjustments to any subsidiary ledgers needed.
We will also update the financial statements periodically.
For the second month of operations, we create a bit more complex trial balance, allowing us to calculate both the year-to-date numbers, including both months of data input, and the current period numbers, showing income statement accounts for just the second month of operations.
After entering two months of data input, we will process two bank reconciliations, using mock bank statements. As we construct our bank reconciliations, we will discuss how accounting software often accomplishes this task.
Next, we will adjust our worksheet to enter period end adjusting journal entries as well as reversing entries. For each adjusting entry we will consider the reasons for it and how to set up the accounting system so that our adjusting entries do not mess up the data input process in the accounting department.
After entering the adjusting entries we will construct our financial statements.
target_audience: Anyone who wants to learn Excel, real world practice problems being the best tool
Anybody learning accounting or bookkeeping
Anybody who uses accounting software like QuickBooks and wants to understand what the software is doing
Accounting students and professionals

courses.description:
ACCA is one of the fastest growing association, of Chartered Accountants of UK. In this course, we are providing one of the subject, (Management Accounting) of its first level called as Knowledge Level. Management accounting helps managers within a company make decisions. Also known as cost accounting, management accounting is the process of identifying, analyzing, interpreting and communicating information to managers to help achieve business goals. You'll develop knowledge and understanding of management accounting techniques to support management in planning, controlling and monitoring performance in a variety of business contexts. Overall aim is to develop knowledge and understanding of management accounting techniques to support management in planning, controlling and monitoring performance in a variety of business contexts. The syllabus for Management Accounting (MA)/(FMA), introduces candidates to elements of management accounting which are used to make and support decisions. The syllabus starts by introducing the nature, the source and purpose of management information followed by the statistical techniques used to analyse data. Then the syllabus addresses cost accounting and the costing techniques used in business which are essential for any management accountant. The syllabus then looks at the preparation and use of budgeting and standard costing and variance analysis as essential tools for planning and controlling business activities. The syllabus concludes with an introduction to measuring and monitoring the performance of an organisation.
On successful completion of this exam, candidates should be able to:
A Explain the nature, source and purpose of management information
B Explain and analyse data analysis and statistical techniques
C Explain and apply cost accounting techniques
D Prepare budgets for planning and control
E Compare actual costs with standard costs and analyse any variances
F Explain and apply performance measurements and monitor business performance.


In this course, you are going to study Chapter 1 - Accounting for Management and Chapter 2 - Sources of Data and analyzing data.

courses.title: Become a Certified Public Accountant : CPA Full Preparation
courses.bio: Complete, hands-on practice test to pass the CPA exam and becoming a Certified Public Accountant
courses.description:
A Certified Public Accountant (CPA) is an accounting professional who has met state licensing requirements to earn the CPA designation through educational training, experience and passing the CPA Exam.
The CPA is not a career path or job title, but a professional designation that can allow accounting professionals more flexibility and mobility in their career. Typically only licensed in one state, CPAs can become licensed in additional states based on reciprocity laws.
If you're looking to enter the world of business or finance, the CPA professional accounting credential can open doors and enhance your prospects.


Why should I become a CPA?


Prestige and respect
Once you’ve endured the rigorous journey to pass the CPA Exam and completed other requirements, you will belong to a distinguished group of accountants. Take pride in this accomplishment!
Career development
Certified Public Accountants have the potential for continued career growth, both within and outside of the CPA/accounting industry.
Career security
As CPAs remain high in demand, and as retiring CPAs leave the market, there is a growing number of job opportunities for newly licensed CPAs.
Job satisfaction
After earning the CPA designation, you’re most likely more qualified to perform highly-specialized tasks that may be more meaningful or interesting.
Money and benefits (CPA salary)
What is a CPA licensure worth? Depending on your specific skills, the average CPA accounting salary may be higher than other accounting professionals in the workforce.


Becoming a CPA can be an important milestone along your career path. The CPA credential can help open doors to an array of exciting and challenging jobs and leadership roles. You’ll find today’s CPAs working as internal auditors, IT managers, forensic experts, tax accountants, compliance officers, chief financial officers and CEOs of major corporations.
Moreover if you are a passionate Accounting student, Finance professional, auditor or accounting professional planning to enhance your career by obtaining the number one Accounting Certification in Demand for 2025, this Course is for you.


In this Preparation course we offers the Latest, Exclusive and the most Recurrent Questions & detailed Explanation by mastering the accounting language and understanding all accounting professional terms.  (New material has been added to this course recently in 2025)


Pass Your Exam on the First Try (Latest Exclusive Questions & Explanation)
Good Luck !

Section 5: Learn how to document the current state of your finance function

requirements: No requirements
courses.description:
Whether you're at the beginning of your finance transformation journey at work or you're new to the concept and eager to advance your career, this course is designed with you in mind. In today's fast-paced digital world, staying ahead in finance and accounting requires embracing change with confidence. This course will guide you step-by-step through the transformation process, helping you transition from traditional practices to modern, digital solutions. Whether you’re an experienced professional looking to sharpen your skills or a newcomer aiming to fill the skill gap in the job market, this course offers a practical, actionable path forward.
This course is the first in the "Mastering Finance Transformation: From Beginner to Expert" series, where we delve into various sub-functions and roles within finance and accounting. Throughout this series, you'll learn to leverage advanced tools and strategies specifically tailored to each role, ensuring you’re prepared for the future of finance.
You’ll gain an understanding of how the latest technology and tools—from automation and AI to cloud-based solutions—can enhance your work and inspire you to explore further advancements. You’ll also learn to balance innovative approaches with stability, ensuring a smooth transition in times of rapid change. Each lesson is designed to help you grasp the concepts deeply and apply them confidently in real-world scenarios.
By the end of this course, you’ll feel empowered to drive change, streamline processes, and contribute to a forward-thinking finance function. Join us to transform your skills and unlock new career opportunities—all at your own pace, with support at every step of the way.
target_audience: Every accountant or finance professionals wanting to grow their career
Anyone that is keen about personal development

courses.title: العلوم والمبادئ الأساسية للمهنة الإكتوارية
courses.bio: التطور التاريخي للمهنة الاكتوارية و المبادئ والعلوم التي تستند إليها
objectives: من هو الإكتواري وماهي طبيعة عمله ومهنته
استعراض التطور التاريخي للمهنة الإكتوارية منذ نشأتها وحتى الوقت الحالي
شرح المبادئ و المفاهيم والافكار العلمية الاساسية التي ترتكز اليها الدراسات الاكتوارية
بيان الفرق بين مبادئ العلوم الاكتوارية وبين معايير وقواعد ممارسة المهنة الاكتوارية
العلوم الأساسية والمفاهيم و الأفكار الثابتة التي تستند إليها الدراسات الإكتوارية
شرح معايير وقواعد ممارسة المهنة الإكتوارية و تغيرها تبعاً لتطور المهنة

ملخص السيرة الذاتية للمحاضر: نبذة تاريخية عن المهندس محمد سرطاوي

requirements: المعرفة بمبادئ علم الإقتصاد والرياضيات
المعرفة بمبادئ المحاسبة والدراسات المالية
courses.description:
غايات و أهداف البرنامج التدريبي


من هو الإكتواري وماهي طبيعة عمله ومهنته
استعراض التطور التاريخي للمهنة الإكتوارية (منذ نشأتها وحتى الوقت الحالي).
شرح المبادئ و المفاهيم والافكار العلمية الاساسية التي ترتكز اليها الدراسات الاكتوارية.
بيان الفرق بين مبادئ العلوم الاكتوارية وبين معايير وقواعد ممارسة المهنة الاكتوارية.
العلوم الأساسية والمفاهيم و الأفكار الثابتة التي تستند إليها الدراسات الإكتوارية (الاحصاء والاحتمالات والديمغرافية و الرياضيات والإقتصاد و غيرها).
شرح معايير وقواعد ممارسة المهنة الإكتوارية و تغيرها تبعاً لتطور المهنة.


المحاضر: م. محمد سرطاوى
حاصل على بكالوريوس في الهندسة (عام 1975) و دبلوم قصير في النظرية الإقتصادية من المعهد الإقتصادي/ جامعة كولورادو (عام 1983) ومهندس تكاليف معتمد (عام 1987).
يعمل مستشار اداري واكتواري ومدرب في مجال إعداد الدراسات الإكتوارية والإشراف عليها والتدريب لأنظمة التأمينات والضمان الإجتماعي والتقاعد العام والخاص وشركات التأمين منذ ما يزيد على 23 سنة ومازال.
كما وعمل لمدة 10 سنوات موظفا ومديرا لعدة دوائر ضمن الإدارة العليا للمؤسسة العامة للضمان الإجتماعي الأردني حيث ترأس لجنة الدراسات الإكتوارية ولجنة الموازنة المالية والعديد من اللجان الخاصة بإصلاح وتطوير أنظمة الضمان الإجتماعي والتقاعد وديمومة توازناتها المالية والتمويلية.
أكسبه العمل في الضمان الإجتماعي الأردني معرفة وخبرة معمقة بإحتياجات هذه المؤسسات في مجال الدراسات والخدمات الإكتوارية مما ميزه عن غيره من الخبراء الإكتواريين الذين عملوا كمستشارين /مقييمين إكتواريين من خارج مؤسسات التقاعد والضمان.
شارك في العديد من المؤتمرات والندوات المحلية والاقليمية والعالمية ونشر العديد من البحوث والدراسات والتقارير الفنية في المجال, كما درب في مجال الدراسات الاكتوارية لصندوق الضمان الإجتماعي الليبي و وزارة المالية الأردنية (دائرة التقاعد وغيرها) والندريب أثناء العمل وبناء القدرات الاكتوارية في الضمان الإجتماعي الأردني ومحاضرات في جامعه آل البيت والجامعة الأردنية
وألف كتابا تحت عنوان «تحليل وتقدير نكاليف المشاريع الاستثمارية» تم نشر الطبعة الاولى في الأردن من قبل دار ارام للنشر و التوزيع عام 1993.
target_audience: العاملون في مؤسسات الضمان و التأمينات الإجتماعية
العاملون في صناديق التقاعد العامة والخاصة والمدنية والعسكرية
العاملون في شركات التأمين العامة والحياة
العاملون في البنوك ومؤسسات التمويل والاستثمارات المالية
طلاب الإقتصاد والدراسات المالية
المهتمون بالمبادئ و المفاهيم والافكار العلمية الاساسية التي ترتكز اليها الدراسات الاكتوارية

courses.title: Rotina da Gestão de Custos
courses.bio: Gestão de Custos
objectives: Organização dos Custos empresariais.
Principais conceitos importantes na área de custos.
Ferramentas importantes para controle dos custos.
Principais métodos para sistema de Custos.

Módulo 1: Qual a sua importância na empresa
Separação dos gastos em custos e despesas
Módulo 2: Custo de produto e mercadoria vendida
Formação de preços de venda com base nos custos

requirements: Preferencialmente que já possua o 2º grau completo ou que atue na área de custos/financeira da empresa..
O curso é auto explicativo para a pessoa ter uma noção de como desenvolver os custos empresariais.
courses.description:
A análise de custos é uma das tarefas gerenciais mais importantes para garantir a saúde financeira de um negócio. Como o nome sugere, estou falando sobre um estudo minucioso dos gastos da empresa, considerando os desembolsos ligados à produção, vendas e administração. Com esse relatório completo, o gestor consegue avaliar se os recursos estão sendo utilizados de forma eficiente para gerar receita ou se é preciso cortar gastos ou investir mais em determinada atividade ou produto.
O curso tem como objetivo capacitar o aluno no aprofundamento e aplicação dos conceitos da gestão em custos. O aluno conhecerá como aplicar os conhecimentos abordados durante o curso na sua rotina diária, fazendo com que aprenda a melhor forma de gerenciar, tomar decisões, controlar os gastos e principalmente aprender a reduzir os custos da empresa. Veremos os principais métodos de custos e inclusive o rateio por centro de custos que é algo desenvolvido em algumas empresas para compartilhar a responsabilidade entre os demais setores.
Custos não posso dizer que é algo fácil a ser entendido, mas com muita determinação e assiduidade nas aulas o aluno consegue aprender de forma clara o assunto ali apresentado. O aluno após a conclusão do curso, irá atuar de forma mais efetiva sobre as estratégias empresariais nos estudos de implantação de custos. O curso tem como objetivo capacitar o aluno no aprofundamento e aplicação dos conceitos da gestão em custos.
target_audience: Destina-se a profissionais do mercado que atuam em departamento financeiro, área de vendas;
Estudantes
Profissionais da área administrativa

courses.title: Intensive Course on Banking and Credit
courses.bio: Practical Insights and Applications
objectives: Understand Core Banking Operations and Financial Systems
Apply Financial Analysis and Risk Management Techniques
Explore Modern Banking Products and Services
Implement Practical Solutions for Financial Challenges
requirements: Basic Understanding of Financial Concepts
Interest in Banking and Finance
Access to a Computer or Mobile Device
Willingness to Engage and Apply Learning
courses.description:
In today’s rapidly evolving financial landscape, a deep understanding of banking operations and credit management is crucial for anyone looking to succeed. Whether you’re an aspiring professional, a seasoned expert, or simply someone eager to understand the financial world, this course is designed to provide you with the comprehensive knowledge and practical skills you need.
"Intensive Course on Banking and Credit: Practical Insights and Applications" is an immersive learning experience that covers the fundamental concepts of banking and finance while focusing on real-world applications. This course will equip you with the tools to navigate the complexities of the financial system, analyze financial data, manage risk, and understand modern banking products and services.
What You’ll Learn:


Core Banking Operations: Gain an in-depth understanding of how banks operate, including key financial instruments, regulatory frameworks, and the role of central banks.
Financial Analysis and Risk Management: Develop the skills to analyze financial statements, assess financial health, and apply risk management strategies to minimize potential losses.
Modern Banking Products and Services: Explore the latest banking innovations, including digital banking, fintech, and customer relationship management, and understand how these services are integrated into the banking ecosystem.
Real-World Applications: Apply your knowledge through case studies and practical exercises that simulate real-world financial challenges, helping you develop strategic financial solutions.
Who Should Enroll:
This course is ideal for aspiring banking and finance professionals, current industry practitioners looking to enhance their skills, entrepreneurs and business owners seeking financial knowledge, students of finance and economics, and anyone with a keen interest in understanding the banking and finance sector.
Why Take This Course?
Comprehensive Coverage: The course offers a broad yet detailed exploration of banking and finance, ensuring you gain a well-rounded understanding of the industry.
Practical Focus: Emphasis on real-world applications ensures that you can immediately apply what you learn to your career or personal financial management.
Whether you’re looking to advance your career, make informed financial decisions, or simply deepen your understanding of banking and finance, this course will provide you with the practical insights and knowledge you need to succeed. Enroll today and take the first step towards mastering the world of banking and finance!
target_audience: Aspiring Banking and Finance Professionals
Current Banking and Finance Professionals
Entrepreneurs and Small Business Owners
Students and Academics

courses.title: ACCA AAA (INT) Question Practice 25marks- Reporting
courses.bio: Kilmister (Past exam question Mar/Jun 19)
objectives: Learn how to approach a Section B question based on real exam example.
Refresh knowledge on Reporting- one of the most important topic in AAA exams.
What to do to make your exam marker happy and generous when marking your paper
See how the structure of the answer should be.

Introduction: b) Report to Those Charged With Governance -analysis
b) Report to Those Charged With Governance - answer

requirements: Students should be familiar with Audit Reporting, although there will be a reminder in the part a of the question.
courses.description:
This is a question practice of past exam B section question, where I will show you how to plan, execute and pass this type of question.
It has been confirmed that one of Section B question will always be relating to completion, review and reporting, therefore students should be familiar with this area of sylabus.
The question is named Kilmister from Mar/Jun 2019 exam paper and it is a great study example as it requires knowledge on audit report elements and content as well as ability to spot issues that should be reported to Those Charged in Governance.
The Advanced Audit and Assurance (AAA) exam is around a third knowledge-based and a sixth application-based question, that test a candidate's ability to apply knowledge and concepts. For this reason students should predominately focus on question practice as they prepare for their exam session.
Past exam rates show that AAA exam pass rate is between 30% and 35% - you need to make sure you are one of those three out of ten people who succeed. And by practicing with me you can achieve it.
The exam lasts 3h 15 min, which means you have 1.95 min per point, therefore 25 mark question should take you maximum of 49 minutes.
Lets get started!
target_audience: ACCA students preparing for ACCA Advanced Audit & Assurance (AAA) exam

courses.title: البرنامج المحاسبي الشامل
courses.bio: من الصفر في الحسابات لـ إعداد القوائم المالية
objectives: هتكتسب القوة و المهارة و الخبرة في مجال المحاسبة المالية
تأسيس النظام المحاسبي للشركات التي ليس بها نظام محاسبة
هتتعلم تعمل قيود محاسبية لكل العمليات مهما كانت بدون ما تكون حافظ قيود ( ودي أهم مهارة هتخليك من أقوي المحاسبين في المهنة )
هتتدرب علي الدورة المحاسبية بالكامل من أول القيد حتي إعداد القوائم المالية بإتقان
هتشتغل بـ إيدك عمليات المحاسبة كأنك محاسب في الشركة ودا بيديلك الثقة و الخبرة
هتشتغل و هتبني التسجيلات المحاسبية للتشغيل الخاص بشركتك من مشتريات و مبيعات و هتسجلهم بطريقة الجرد الدوري و الجرد المستمر
هتعالج المصروفات و هتعرف تفرق ما بين مصروف التشغيل و مصاريف التسويق و المصاريف العمومية
هنتعلم التسويات الجردية اللي بتتعمل في نهاية كل شهر أو نهاية كل سنة من مقدمات و مستحقات
هنتعلم الفرق بين أساس الإستحقاق و الأساس النقدي و إمتي نشتغل بكل طريقة فيهم
هتتعلم إزاي تسوي العهد بأنواعها المختلفة وكمان تراقب عليها
هتشتغل علي الأصول الثابتة الشروط الخاصة بيها و قيد شراؤها و إزاي تحسب تكلفتها
هنتعلم و نشتغل علي طرق الإهلاك الأربعة الخاصة بالأصول الثابتة و إمتي نستخدم كل طريقة
هنتعلم إزاي نقيس إضمحلال قيمة الأصول الثابتة و معالجاتها المحاسبية
هنشتغل علي معالجة المخصصات و إزاي أقيس المخصص و أسجلة إمتي
تسوية فروق العملة و القيود الخاصة بها في نهاية كل شهر او سنة
إعداد ميزان المراجعة و الفرق بين ميزان المراجعة بالمجاميع و الأرصدة
إعداد قائمة الدخل و إيضاحاتها المتممة
إعداد قائمة المركز المالي و إيضاحاتها المتممة طبقا لمعايير المحاسبة الدولية
جميع المهارات المحاسبية تطبق بشكل عملي و طبقا لـ معايير المحاسبة الدولية
في نهاية البرنامج الشامل ستمتلك القدرة علي تأسيس و إمساك حسابات شركة بالكامل بمفردك
ستمتلك القدرة علي إجتياز جميع المقابلات الشخصية التي تطلب محاسب لدية خبرة حتي خمس سنوات في سوق العمل
علي مدار الورشة سيتم تطبيق كل عملية علي برنامج محاسبة مصمم علي الإكسيل علشان نضمن التطبيق العملي و الشيت دا تقدر تستخدمة في شركتك بعد التدريب عليه

التشغيل: سياسة تسعير الوارد اولا يصرف اولا
الأصول الثابته و إهلاكتها: مقدمه الوحده الرابعه - الأصول الثابته و إهلاكاتها

requirements: البرنامج لا يتطلب أي معرفة سابقة بعلم المحاسبة لأنه يبدأ من البداية و حتي المستوي المتقدم
courses.description:
البرنامج المحاسبي الشامل ( ورشة المحاسب المالي  + ورشة رئيس الحسابات  )


من حقك تبقي محاسب قوي ، ومش خايف من عدم قدرتك علي أداء المهام المطلوبة منك ، ومن حقك يتنقلك خبرات
اللي سبقوك في المجال وعلشان كل دا من حقك تم تصميم البرنامج المحاسبي الشامل هينقلك كل الخبرات اللي تخليك قوي و متمكن

تعالي نشوف هنشتغل إيه مع بعض

بنشتغل مع بعض علي كل ما يخص مجال المحاسبة المالية من الصفر .. بداية من القيد المحاسبي وبنوصل معاك لأكتساب خبرة ومهارة رئيس الحسابات

هنوفرلك الخبرة في أقل وقت ونأهلك لسوق العمل وهتكون محاسب عندك القدرة إنك تمسك حسابات شركة لوحدك وبندربك عملي علي كل اقسام الحسابات

فى البرنامج المحاسبى الشامل
( هنعلمك ازاى تعمل دورة محاسبية كامله بكل خطواتها من بداية القيد المحاسبي حتي إعداد القوائم المالية ( دخل و مركز مالي
و اللي شغلك عليهم  بيبقي واحد من أسرار قوتك  كـ محاسب
هتشتغل علي شجرة الحسابات وهيبقي عندك القدرة  علي تأسيس شجرة حسابات لجميع أنواع الشركات مثل( صناعي - تجاري - مقاولات - إستيراد )

التطبيق عملي علي مستندات شركات حقيقية
عشان كدا المحاضر في ورشة البرنامج المحاسبي الشامل هو أ.محمد ريان " محاسب قانوني وخبير ضرائب "
قام بتدريب أكثر من 10000 محاسب علي مستوي الوطن العربي خلال الـ 10 سنوات الأخيرة

التطبيق عملي علي طبقا لـ معايير المحاسبة الدولية
" IFRS " طبقا لأخر تحديث في المعايير

وسيتم إلحاق أي تحديثات تتم بالمعايير الدولية بالورشةو عمل تحديث مستمر لها حتي يتمكن كل محاسب من أعضاء البرنامج المحاسبي الشامل من متابعة التحديثات العالمية الخاصة بعمله كـ محاسب مالي




ستضعك هذة الورشة في مقدمة صفوف المحاسبين الأقوياء المتسلحين بالمهارات العلمية الدولية والخبرات العملية  علي مستوي الوطن العربي
target_audience: خريج جديد
محاسب خبره في جزء معين في الحسابات
أصحاب الأعمال

courses.title: VİOP Vadeli İşlemler Eğitimi
courses.bio: VİOP işlemi nasıl yapılır?
objectives: Viop piyasası nedir?
Viop tanımları
viop forex ve coin de nasıl trade yapılır?
Trade psikolojisi ve püf noktaları.
Viop işlemlerinde stratejisi oluşturma.
Doğru yerde işleme giriş-ekleme-çıkış nasıl olmalı!
Senaryo kurma
Formasyonlarla işlem
Seans içi deneyimler
Kripto piyasasında da işe yarayacak strateji ve indikatörler

Kapsam ve içerik: Viopta işlem gören sözleşmeler ve Başlangıç Teminatları
Formasyonlarda İşlem: İkili Dip ve İkili Tepe Formasyonları
Matriks İdeal ve Tradingwiev de tarama v: MATRİKS İÇİN ARSİ İND. VE AYAZTARAMALI TÜFEK TARAMALARI
İDEAL İÇİN ARSİ İND. VE AYAZTARAMALI TÜFEK TARAMALARI
FX PLUS İÇİN ARSİ İND. EKLEME
MATRİKS-MATRİKS IQ-İDEAL-TRADİNG İÇİN AYOT İNDİKATÖR VE KULLANIMI

requirements: Teknik analiz ve grafik okuma bilgisi yeterlidir.
Viop da anlık veri önemlidir. Bunun için Matriks, Tradingwiew, İdeal gibi platformlar önem arz eder.
courses.description:
Endeks ya da viopta sözleşmesi olan herhangi bir grafiği açtığınızda kısa, orta ya da uzun vade de viopta işlem açma konusunda kesin kararlar verebileceksiniz. Basit bir dil ve görsellerle herkesin anlayabileceği uygulamalı örneklerle pekiştirerek sizlere viop konusunda püf noktaları ve trade psikolojisi hakkında tüm bilgi ve tecrübelerimi aktaracağım. Kurstan sonra büyük bir öz güvenle başarının anahtarını sizde çevireceksiniz. Teknik analize hakimiyeti olan her birey viop vadeli işlemlerle aynı zamanda yakın-orta-uzun vadeli spot yatırımlarını da hedge ederek portföyünün zarar görmesini de engelleyebilir. Eğitimde bu konuyu örnekli açıklamalarla göreceksiniz. Kripto ya da forex platformlarında çift yönlü işlemlerde dahi bu eğitimin faydalarını göreceksiniz. sizlere eğitimde kendi strateji ve psikolojim ile nasıl trade ettiğimi anlatacağım.
Borsa' da eğer iyi derecede teknik analiz bilgisine sahip olunursa, doğru yatırımlar yaparak, kazanç sağlanabilirsiniz...
içerikte öğreneceğiniz konular


Normal Hisse Senedi ile VİOP İşlemi Arasındaki Kazanç Farkı
Borsa İstanbul' da yer alan Türev Piyasaları
VİOP (Vadeli İşlem Ve Opsiyon Piyasası)

Teminat nedir? Margin Call nedir?
VİOP' un avantajları

Kazanç Hesaplamaları
İşlem Sonrası Komisyon Hesaplamaları
Short İşlemi (Açığa Satış) Nedir?
Long işlemi nedir?
Yatırımcılar İçin Önemli Uyarılar
Riskten Korunmak İçin Yapılan Hedge Nedir?  Nasıl Yapılabilir?
VİOP' ta Day Trade canlı İşlem örnekleri
Verimli Trade İçin Trade psikolojisi

courses.description:
This course provides a compact introduction to the topic of CSRD (Corporate Sustainability Reporting Directive) and serves as an essential starting point for employees who are in the research phase of CSRD or for employees who need an initial understanding of the topic. We begin with a thorough explanation of the historical development and then move on to the legal obligation of reporting. An important part of the course is an excursion into the EU Taxonomy, which briefly and concisely highlights the significance and comprehensive impact of this topic.

In the further course, we provide a detailed overview of CSRD and particularly focus on the European Sustainability Reporting Standards (ESRS). All relevant technical terms are explained in detail throughout the course to ensure a solid understanding. Additionally, the materiality analysis is introduced, and its significance for CSR reporting is explained.
At the end of the course, some official documents are presented to give participants a real insight into the practical implementation of CSRD. This course thus provides a solid foundation for further engagement with CSRD and imparts a comprehensive understanding of the most important concepts and requirements in this area.
Enjoy the course and best of luck in implementing CSRD. Further courses on the topic of sustainability reporting are still under discussion.
target_audience: People in companies that need to get a first understanding of what CSRD means and what work needs to be done accordingly

courses.title: IFRS 13 Fair Value Measurement and Disclosures
courses.bio: Master IFRS 13: Fair Value Measurement and Disclosure
objectives: Understand Fair Value: Learn the definition and significance of fair value in financial reporting.
Master Fair Value Measurement Approaches: Understand the different approaches to measuring fair value, including market, income, and cost methods.
Apply Fair Value Hierarchy: Gain knowledge on the fair value hierarchy and the use of observable and unobservable inputs.
Enhance Disclosure Skills: Learn the disclosure requirements related to fair value measurements to ensure transparency and compliance with IFRS.

IFRS 13: 1 Specific Asset or Liability- Unit of Account vs. Unit of Valuation
4Fair Value of Financial Liability and Equity Instrument

requirements: Basic Accounting Knowledge is preferable.
courses.description:
This course provides an in-depth understanding of International Financial Reporting Standard 13 (IFRS 13), which establishes a framework for measuring Fair Value and requires disclosures about fair value measurements.
In this course, you will learn the definition of Fair Value and the key principles outlined in IFRS 13. We will explore the various approaches to fair value measurement, including the Market Approach, Income Approach, and Cost Approach, and understand how to apply these methods in real-world scenarios.
The course will also cover the hierarchy of fair value inputs, emphasizing the importance of using observable inputs whenever possible and the implications of using unobservable inputs. You will learn how to determine the fair value of different asset classes and liabilities, along with the specific requirements for disclosures related to fair value measurements.
Additionally, we will discuss practical examples and case studies to illustrate the application of IFRS 13 in diverse industries. You will engage in interactive activities to reinforce your learning and gain insights into common challenges faced during fair value assessments. By the end of the course, you will have gained practical skills and knowledge to accurately apply IFRS 13 in financial reporting. This course is ideal for Accounting Professionals, Finance Managers, and students pursuing a career in Financial Reporting, Valuation, and Compliance.
target_audience: Accounting and Finance Professionals as well as students from ACCA, CIMA, CA, ICAEW,, CAT BBA, MBA and others studying Financial Accounting under IFRS.

requirements: No prerequisites.
courses.description:
Are you ready to take the big step toward independence? Our course, "How to Financially Move Out of Your Parent's House," is here to guide you through the process of setting up a life of your own without the stress of financial surprises. We’ll start by helping you organize your finances before living alone, showing you how to create a realistic budget, control monthly expenses, and avoid the dreaded “phantom bills” – those unexpected costs that can creep up if you’re not prepared. From rent and utilities to groceries and transportation, we’ll cover every detail to ensure you’re ready for this exciting chapter.
One of the key decisions when moving out is deciding whether living with friends is the right choice for you. We’ll explore the pros and cons of shared living arrangements and how to set boundaries and budgets to ensure a smooth experience. Beyond that, we’ll show you why investments are your best friend, not something to fear. Learn how even small steps in investing can help you build a secure financial future while keeping your current needs in check. We’ll also dive into creating an emergency reserve, teaching you how to set aside funds to handle unexpected challenges without jeopardizing your financial stability.
To top it all off, the course is packed with practical life hacks you need to be self-sufficient, from meal planning on a budget to handling basic home maintenance and managing utilities. We’ll share proven strategies to help you stay on top of your finances and avoid common pitfalls, so you can confidently navigate life on your own terms. Whether you’re just starting to plan your move or looking to refine your independence, this course equips you with the tools to succeed!
target_audience: Young adults interested in leaving home and living independently from their parents.

requirements: El único requisito es interés por el tema
courses.description:
El fraude ocupacional, cometido por los colaboradores de las mismas organizaciones victimizadas, se lleva el 5% de su facturación BRUTA anual, A NIVEL MUNDIAL, según estimaciones de la ACFE, Association of Certified Fraud Examiners. Por su parte, el crimen organizado genera un 10% del PBI MUNDIAL a través de numerosos delitos, algunos de ellos a escala trasnacional.
Vistas estas impactantes cifras, resulta obvio que las organizaciones públicas y privadas no pueden desentenderse del fenómeno del fraude, y deben adoptar medidas idóneas para combatirlo.
En esta actividad analizaremos el tema desde su inicio, entendiendo la génesis del fraude a través de la sicología del defraudador, su cambio a través de la inserción en una estructura corporativa, y las sucesivas medidas de prevención, disuasión y detección que las organizaciones pueden adoptar para combatir los fraudes.
Exploraremos luego en detalle la metodología de investigación de fraudes, los documentos que se generan a lo largo de la misma y el rol de los auditores forenses en el proceso.
En resumen, se trata de una actividad tan necesaria como interesante para quienes quieren adquirir o ampliar sus conocimientos en materia de combate al fraude en todas sus modalidades. Sin duda alguna que resultará un curso valioso que no defraudará las expectativas de quienes lo tomen
target_audience: Auditores, abogados criminalistas y directivos de empresa

Course Overview:
Welcome to "Accounting Mastery for Business Managers," a comprehensive journey designed exclusively for today's dynamic business environment. This course demystifies the complexities of both financial and management accounting, delivering it through the lens of practical business management. With a strong emphasis on analytical skills and managerial decision-making, our curriculum guides you through the intricacies of financial statements, cost control, and strategic planning. You'll emerge from this course not just with theoretical knowledge, but with the ability to apply critical accounting techniques and principles directly to real-world business scenarios.


What You'll Learn:
Through engaging modules and interactive case studies, you'll:
Master the accounting cycle and foundational principles essential for generating insightful financial statements, including nuances between accrual and cash accounting.
Dive deep into the mechanics of financial reporting, learning to decode and leverage information on cash flows, profitability, asset management, and liquidity to drive business success.
Explore the strategic role of management accounting in steering cost control, cost management, and business planning, employing advanced techniques like job costing, process costing, and activity-based costing.
Apply sophisticated cost and management accounting tools in decision-making, using break-even analysis, capital budgeting, and inventory management to choose the best course of action.
Analyze and critically evaluate a company's financial health and operational efficiency through hands-on interpretation of balance sheets, income statements, and cash flow statements.
Become proficient in working capital management, understanding its sources, uses, and optimization strategies for enhanced business operations.
Utilize a toolkit of financial ratios for a comprehensive analysis of liquidity, solvency, and operational efficiency, and employ standard costing for variance analysis and performance measurement.


Who This Course Is For:
This course is meticulously designed for business managers, entrepreneurs, and professionals seeking to deepen their accounting knowledge and apply it to manage and grow their businesses effectively. Whether you're aiming to refine your financial decision-making, enhance your analytical skills, or simply gain a solid grounding in both financial and management accounting principles, this course will empower you to achieve your goals.

courses.title: Certified Airline Revenue Management Specialist
courses.bio: The essential course for a analyst with keen eye for optimising finance for an airline
objectives: Explain the need for airline revenue management
Identify the pricing utility and disutility in airline revenue management
Differenciate between revenue and yield management
Configure seats based on capacity, yield and revenue

Introduction: Introduction to pricing and revenue optimization
Game Changers in the Airline Revenue Man: Differences between full fare carriers and low-cost carriers
Practical application of Revenue, Yield: RM, YM or LM which is best? Calculation for results.

requirements: Any graduate with basic mathematical skills and good communication skills.
courses.description: Businesses employ revenue management as an analytical procedure, especially in the services sector such as hospitality and aviation. Its objectives are to forecast service demand, predict client behaviour, and maximize revenue. Revenue management uses analytics and data analysis to project client demand. Businesses can modify their strategy by knowing when and how clients are likely to make service purchases. Knowledge of revenue management will assist you in modifying prices in response to shifts in consumer demand. This could entail setting various rates for peak and off-peak periods or implementing dynamic pricing, which modifies prices in real-time. Revenue management aims to achieve income maximization while satisfying client needs. It will help the learner control inventory as all service sectors, such as golf courses, hotels, and airlines, hold significant inventory. Matching the pricing with the demand can help increase revenue. The course will help learners balance the maintainability of profits while providing competitive prices to clients. Ideally, this course will help you explore consumer behaviours by utilizing pricing-related strategies, identify demand and supply and how they affect revenue management, and identify peak and off-seasonality in determining configuration pricing. The course also requires the learners to be aware of competitors and their strategies to suggest the best fares for their clients.
target_audience: Entry level professionals who have a williness to work in the revenue management department

courses.title: Critical thinking for insurance assessors
courses.bio: Applying the stages of critical thinking to the report writing process
objectives: Critical thinking process
Report writing
Insurance claim assessment process
Investigation process
Bloom's Taxonomy
requirements: Interest in insurance claim assessment
courses.description:
Do you want to be great at what you do? The one thing that can give you the edge, gain the advantage, set you apart and make you more effective in your role is to think critically!
Then I welcome you to my course on critical thinking, developed for insurance assessors and applicable to all forms of insurance assessment. This is a valuable tool for the processing of information and has been adapted from Blooms Taxonomy and in this course is applied to the important skill of report writing.
Report writing involves the steps of collecting facts, interpreting facts, asking questions about the facts and their interpretation, potentially looping back and finally reaching a conclusion.
The above steps are summarized within the report as Findings, Discussion and Conclusion (summary and recommendation).
We explore the stages of critical thinking and how they can be used to ensure that the evidence and facts and information collected for the assessment or investigation of insurance claims is interpreted holistically and reported on in a way that ensures all loose end are tied up and all conflicts are addressed.
The stages include knowledge, comprehension, application, analysis, synthesis and evaluation and each step strives to take you deeper into the cognitive analysis of the claim.
There are so many examples shared throughout the course and these illustrate how to use each stage of critical thinking to maximize the information you have collected and ensure that no holes can be poked in your reasoning.
Every claims assessors is as good as their last report and this is why we focus on the report writing process and share so much information about how to optimize your time management and organization around this skill a well as how to integrate it in such a way that it can be used as your investigation log.
target_audience: Medical assessors
Insurance assessors
Loss adjustors
Investigators
Insurance adjustors

courses.title: ¿Cómo elaborar un Flujo de Caja?
courses.bio: Importante herramienta de planificación financiera
objectives: Importancia del Flujo de Caja
Estructura y calendarización de los ingresos y egresos
Criterios para la administración de la liquidez
Elaborar el flujo de caja de cualquier negocio

Detalles del Flujo de Caja: ¿Qué se necesita para elaborar un flujo de caja?

requirements: Conocimientos básicos de excel
Interés en aprender a elaborar una herramienta básica
courses.description:
Uno de los aspectos más importante de la empresa es el seguimiento, manejo y control de la liquidez, este constituye, el eje fundamental para que la empresa se mantenga operativa y genere beneficios a los accionistas.
La herramienta central para este fin, es el Flujo de Caja, a través de su formulación podrás realizar una planificación del movimiento del efectivo, determinarás los tiempos donde la liquidez será positiva o negativa y tendrás la oportunidad de tomar medidas para calendarizar de la mejor manera el efectivo con mayor esfuerzo de ventas, cobranzas o financiamiento con tus proveedores o acreedores financieros.
Dentro del curso conocerás la estructura del flujo de caja, tendrás ejercicios de ejemplo y conforme vamos avanzando, realizarás casos de manera que vayas logrando el manejo del formato y lo traslades a la realidad de cualquier negocio.
Al finalizar el curso, tendrás el panorama completo para preparar el flujo de caja y alcanzar el balance más adecuado de los ingresos, egresos y el saldo razonable para una gestión eficiente de la liquidez.
Importante será desarrolles el paso a paso de los casos, la pericia para elaborar el flujo se tiene con la práctica y siempre tendrás con cada caso la retro alimentación para que puedas detectar y pulir tus conocimientos.
target_audience: Estudiantes de cualquier especialidad
Emprendedores
Público en general

courses.description:
Get the personal finance tools that enable you to use the complicated credit, debt, cash flow management, saving, investing, and real estate systems to your advantage.
Learn to Manage Your Money
Building and managing your credit score
Using credit cards
Taking out and managing personal loans
Personal budgeting
Saving and investing
Buying real estate
Learn to Master the Financial Tools that Many of Us Were Never Taught
Your ability to use modern financial tools and systems is a crucial ingredient for a successful and happy life. Credit scores, credit cards, student loans, mortgages, tax-deferred investment accounts, and financial instruments like index funds, mutual funds, ETFs, stocks, and bonds are fundamental to existence in our modern world. The topics in this course are relevant to people in all developed economies.
Ignorance is an expensive choice and there are plenty of organizations who would be happy to keep taking advantage of people who can’t navigate these systems. In this financial empowerment series you won’t get bombarded with boring math formulas. You’ll have fun. Let’s take on the system together.
Four Core Skills as the Heartbeat of Your Financial Future
Perfect for smart people who are starting to work, save, and build wealth, through this financial empowerment course you’ll learn how to use credit and debts, how to manage your cash flow, how to save and start investing, how to buy real estate in your name, and more.
Starting with a section on building, managing, and using your personal credit and managing debts, you’ll learn how to use master some of the financial systems that we interact with on a daily basis. By understanding the different levers in credit, interest rates, and debt many people will be able to instantly apply their learnings to save thousands of dollars or more... quickly.
After mastering credits and debts, the series will take you into the Eazl Cash Flow Dojo where you’ll learn more about income and expense management. You’ll have an opportunity to put your learning into practice immediately by developing a snapshot of your personal cash flow.
Once you’ve mastered the use of credit, loans, and cash flow you’ll work on developing an investor’s mindset. You’ll learn how to use tools like ETFs, index funds, and tax-deferred accounts as tools for growing your wealth. The series will address core investing principles like the risk/reward relationship, asset diversification, and speculation vs. investing.
You’ll learn how to acquire real estate and use mortgage loans in the final section of the series. Complete with Eazl’s proprietary Home Buying Cheat Sheet, you’ll learn how to build your real estate acquisition team, how to negotiate with sellers of properties, how to get a good deal on a mortgage, and how to lower the transaction costs associated with real estate acquisition.
Those who complete the course will receive a verifiable certificate and everyone who participates will have access to a suite of support resources from the team at Eazl.
target_audience: This course is for people who have questions about how to use credit, debts, mortgages, personal budgets, and investment accounts
