courses.title: Presentations & Public Speaking for Financial Professionals
courses.bio: Deliver Compelling Financial Presentations with Clarity, Confidence, and Impact
objectives: Mastering Presentation Structure
Visual Storytelling with Data
Confident and Engaging Delivery
Expertly Handling Q&A

Foundations of Effective Financial Prese: Understanding your audience: Identifying their needs and knowledge levels
Defining your core message: What do you want your audience to take away?
Outlining your presentation: Developing a logical and compelling flow.
Mastering Visual Aids: Choosing the right charts and graphs: Simplifying complex data.
Designing visually appealing slides: Principles of layout, colors, and fonts.
Avoiding visual overload: Keeping your slides clean and focused.
Incorporating animations and transitions with purpose.
Delivery & Presence: Body language and vocal delivery: Projecting confidence and professionalism.
Pacing and pausing: Techniques for emphasis and clarity.
Creating a conversational tone: Engaging with your audience.
Overcoming stage fright: Strategies to manage anxiety and nervousness.
Mastering the Q&A: Anticipating questions: Preparing for common inquiries.
Responding clearly and concisely: Avoid jargon and ambiguity.
Handling difficult questions: Maintaining composure and professionalism.
Turning objections into opportunities: Reframing challenges.
Presentations in a Virtual World: Optimizing your setup: Lighting, camera, and audio considerations.
Adapting your delivery style: Maintaining engagement in the virtual format.
Utilizing virtual presentation tools: Whiteboards, polls, and annotations.
Troubleshooting technical challenges: Anticipating and addressing common issues.
Practice & Refinement: The importance of practice: Simulation and rehearsal methods.
Recording and self-evaluation: Pinpointing areas for improvement.
Seeking feedback: Getting insights from mentors or peers.

requirements: No Strict Prerequisites: While a basic familiarity with financial concepts is helpful, the course will provide the necessary foundation for presenting financial data effectively.
Flexible for Beginners: The course starts with foundational modules covering presentation structure and visual aids, ensuring beginners can build essential skills.
Growth Mindset Encouraged: The focus is on developing presentation skills through practice, feedback, and refinement. Even experienced presenters can benefit from honing their techniques.
courses.description:
Transform the Way You Communicate Financial Information
In the world of finance, numbers are only half the story. The ability to present complex data, analyses, and recommendations in a way that's clear, persuasive, and engaging is essential for success. Whether you're an accountant explaining financial results, an analyst presenting market insights, or a CFO pitching a strategic plan, your presentation skills can make or break your message.
This comprehensive course is designed to empower finance professionals to become masterful presenters. You'll learn how to structure your presentations for maximum impact, harness the power of storytelling, and use visual aids to make complex data easily digestible.
You'll discover the secrets to confident delivery, overcoming anxiety, and projecting a professional image. The course will equip you to handle even the toughest Q&A sessions with poise and turn objections into opportunities. In addition, you'll gain specialized techniques to master the unique challenges of virtual presentations.
This isn't just about learning presentation theory; it's about transformation. Through practice, personalized feedback, and a structured improvement plan, you'll elevate your presentation abilities and achieve greater influence within your organization.
Key Benefits:
Communicate financial concepts with clarity and persuasiveness.
Create visually stunning slides that simplify complexity.
Deliver presentations with charisma and confidence.
Handle questions and objections like a seasoned professional.
Excel in the world of virtual presentations.
target_audience: Accountants: Whether you're presenting financial statements to stakeholders, explaining tax regulations to clients, or pitching proposals, this course will help you convey information with clarity and persuasiveness.
Financial Analysts: Enhance your ability to present complex analyses, market insights, or investment recommendations to both colleagues and clients in a way that drives decision-making.
Finance Managers: Master the art of presenting budgets, forecasts, and performance reports to executives, ensuring your message resonates and drives action.
CFOs and Finance Executives: Elevate your presentations for board meetings, investor pitches, or internal strategic communications, solidifying your leadership influence.

courses.title: Introduction To Microfinance
courses.bio: Benefits of microfinancing, Introduction to microfinance, How to get funding for a startup business etc.
objectives: Introduction to microfinance
Benefits of microfinance
How to start a money lending business
How to get funding for a startup business
Introduction to microcredit
requirements: Desire to learn more about microfinance
No special requirement
courses.description:
Microfinance is a financial service that many financial institutions provide to an individual or a group of individuals who get excluded from traditional banking services. Many microfinance bodies offer small portions of working capital loans as credits. There are many microfinance institutions providing individuals with direct money transfers, insurances and savings accounts. The major focus of these institutions is to provide financial services to women and the poor in rural areas so that they can grow their businesses. Microfinance can help small businesses, entrepreneurs and individuals by providing savings accounts with zero minimum balance and insurance at lower rates and premium.
The major feature of the lines of credit and loans under microfinance is that collateral is rarely required. Many microfinance institutions offer collateral-free financial services to businesses and individuals. Generally, the borrowers in microfinance are small businesses or individuals with low income. The purpose is to provide financial assistance to people who do not have access to easy banking solutions and small businessmen or entrepreneurs. Sometimes in rural areas, due to lack of source of income, small businesses compromise with their basic requirements. This can directly affect the profits and revenue.  Microfinancing institutions are responsible for providing financial services to businesses and entrepreneurs to remove poverty. By providing support to the lower sections and underdeveloped parts of the society.
target_audience: Borrowers, trade associations, microfinance agencies, associations, women traders, business people, rural community, banks, institutions, governments, regulatory agencies, students, economies, general public etc.

courses.title: A Beginner's Guide to Life Insurance in the United States
courses.bio: Basic Facts About the 10 Most Popular Types of Life Insurance Available in the US
requirements: No prior knowledge of Life Insurance is needed.
An elementary knowledge of widely used financial terms (in the US) is recommended but not required
courses.description:
A Life Insurance policy can serve as both a financial investment and a tool that ensures the financial well-being of loved ones in case of loss of income. This course simplifies the complexities of each of the 10 types of Life Insurance policies that are discussed, and it considers both the advantages and disadvantages inherent in each of the 10 different types of Life Insurance policies. Included are colorful photos and profiles of people who would benefit most from each of the 10 types of Life Insurance. Also included is a quiz following each discussion of one of the 10 types of Life Insurance, and this helps facilitate the process of learning and remembering new subject matter.


A discussion of Riders describes an additional option that may be available with the purchase of a Life Insurance policy; this option may increase the financial value of the policy.


In the tradition of professionals that offer a Free Consultation, this course is being offered at no charge so that the student who is completely unfamiliar with Life Insurance may acquire fundamental knowledge of this financial product.


The 10 types of Life Insurance policies discussed in the course are listed below:
1. Whole Life Insurance
2. Term Life Insurance
3. Renewable Term Life Insurance

courses.title: Cards,PCI DSS and digital payments
courses.bio: Different types of card transactions, regulations and other payments
objectives: PCI DSS
card transactions
Payment transactions

Cards: card present and card not present transactions

requirements: No Prerequisites
courses.description:
The Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS) is a set of security standards designed to ensure that ALL companies that accept, process, store or transmit credit card information maintain a secure environment.
The Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS) is an information security standard for organizations that handle branded credit cards from the major card schemes.
The PCI Standard is mandated by the card brands but administered by the Payment Card Industry Security Standards Council. The standard was created to increase controls around cardholder data to reduce credit card fraud.
Self-Assessment Questionnaire (SAQ) — smaller volumes
external Qualified Security Assessor (QSA) — moderate volumes; involves an Attestation on Compliance (AOC)
firm-specific Internal Security Assessor (ISA) — larger volumes; involves issuing a Report on Compliance (ROC)
There are a number of types of payment cards, the most common being credit cards, debit cards, charge cards, and prepaid cards. Most commonly, a payment card is electronically linked to an account or accounts belonging to the cardholder. These accounts may be deposit accounts or loan or credit accounts, and the card is a means of authenticating the cardholder. However, stored-value cards store money on the card itself and are not necessarily linked to an account at a financial institution.

courses.description:
限られた経営資源を最適配分して、利益を最大化したい
部門間の不公平感が出ない業績評価の方法を知りたい
月次P/Lを組織マネジメントに活かしたい


このような要望を持つ管理職やリーダーの方は、非常に多いことと思います。


いい加減に業績を管理していると、組織を誤った方向に導いてしまいます。
また、数値の示し方ひとつで、社員のモチベーションを低下させ、組織を崩壊させてしまうこともあります。


組織をマネジメントする立場の方であれば、自社の現状を正しく把握し、より高い業績目標を達成するために、ナビゲートする責任があります。当然、威圧的にプレッシャーをかけても、良い効果は生まれません。


ではどうすればいいのか？


それに答えてくれるのが「業績管理会計（マネジメント・コントロール）」です。


業績管理会計は、管理会計の中でも業種を問わず適用可能な概念で、あらゆる業種で実務的に活用されています。
優れた企業や優秀なビジネスパーソンは、業績管理会計を駆使して、社員をスマートにナビゲートしています。


この講座では、予算管理の方法や、組織形態に適した損益管理法、複数プロダクトの評価と意思決定への活用法、などが学習できます。


有名企業の事例を交えながら分かりやすく解説しますので、管理会計の基礎知識に不安がある方や、業績管理の実務経験がない方でも、安心して受講できます。


＜コースの全体像＞
予算管理

組織形態

courses.description:
Mastering Payroll, Salary Structuring & Labour Compliances is a comprehensive program designed for professionals who want to build expertise in payroll management, HR payroll processes, and labour law compliance. Whether you are an HR professional, finance executive, entrepreneur, or someone preparing for a payroll certification, this course equips you with the practical skills and regulatory knowledge needed to handle payroll with confidence and accuracy.
The course begins with the fundamentals of payroll, allowances, and deductions, gradually advancing to salary structuring, leaves tracking, and loss of pay management. You’ll gain in-depth knowledge of statutory compliances including Provident Fund (PF), Employees’ State Insurance (ESIC), Professional Tax, and Labour Welfare Fund, which are essential for compliance management in India.
We also cover advanced topics such as TDS on salary, challans, and return filing, CTC structuring, and relief under section 89. With practical sessions on PF portal registration, ECR filing, and ESI filings, you’ll develop hands-on expertise in statutory compliance workflows.
In addition, the program explores full and final settlements, case studies, and the latest trends in payroll for gig workers, interns, and contract employees—preparing you for modern workforce management.
While the focus is on Indian payroll laws, the course also introduces global best practices, including insights into payroll compliance and international regulatory compliance frameworks, making it valuable for professionals managing cross-border payrolls.
By the end of this course, you will not only strengthen your technical skills in payroll processing and compliance management but also position yourself for career growth in human resources, finance, and compliance roles.
target_audience: HR professionals who want to gain expertise in payroll management, salary structuring, and labour law compliance.
Payroll executives and managers looking to upskill, earn payroll certification, and stay updated with the latest regulatory compliance practices.

courses.title: Services and Operation Costing
courses.bio: UK ACCA FMA/MA Chapter 7
objectives: Students who wish to study ACCA FMA/MA subject
Students who wish to study about Services and Operation Costing
Students who wish to study about Alternative Costing Principles
requirements: None
courses.description:
ACCA is one of the fastest growing association, of Chartered Accountants of UK. In this course, we are providing one of the subject, (Management Accounting) of its first level called as Knowledge Level. Management accounting helps managers within a company make decisions. Also known as cost accounting, management accounting is the process of identifying, analyzing, interpreting and communicating information to managers to help achieve business goals. You'll develop knowledge and understanding of management accounting techniques to support management in planning, controlling and monitoring performance in a variety of business contexts. Overall aim is to develop knowledge and understanding of management accounting techniques to support management in planning, controlling and monitoring performance in a variety of business contexts. The syllabus for Management Accounting (MA)/(FMA), introduces candidates to elements of management accounting which are used to make and support decisions. The syllabus starts by introducing the nature, the source and purpose of management information followed by the statistical techniques used to analyse data. Then the syllabus addresses cost accounting and the costing techniques used in business which are essential for any management accountant. The syllabus then looks at the preparation and use of budgeting and standard costing and variance analysis as essential tools for planning and controlling business activities. The syllabus concludes with an introduction to measuring and monitoring the performance of an organisation.
On successful completion of this exam, candidates should be able to:
A Explain the nature, source and purpose of management information
B Explain and analyse data analysis and statistical techniques
C Explain and apply cost accounting techniques
D Prepare budgets for planning and control
E Compare actual costs with standard costs and analyse any variances
F Explain and apply performance measurements and monitor business performance.


You will study chapter 10 - Services and Operation Costing and Chapter 11 - Alternative Costing Principles
target_audience: Students who wish to study ACCA FMA/MA subject
Students who wish to study about Services and Operation Costing
Students who wish to study about Alternative Costing Principles

requirements: No prior experience is needed in Internal Auditing, you'll learn everything in the course.
courses.description:
دورة شاملة ومتكاملة في التدقيق الداخلي!
الدورة مناسبة للجميع وبالأخص:
1) حديثو التخرج الباحثون عن بداية قوية في مجال التدقيق الداخلي.
2) الأشخاص الجدد في المجال الذين يحتاجون إلى أساس متين لفهم العمليات والممارسات.
3) المتقدمون لامتحان شهادة المدقق الداخلي المعتمد (CIA) الباحثون عن التحضير الأمثل لتحقيق النجاح.

ما يميز هذه الدورة عن غيرها من الدورات انه تم التركيز على التطبيق والجانب العملي، حيث تتضمن عدد كبير من الأمثلة والحالات العملية التي يتم شرح المادة من خلالها.

تقدم هذه الدورة شرحًا وافيًا لأساسيات ومفاهيم التدقيق الداخلي وأدوات عملية وتقنيات حديثة لتطبيقها في الحياة العملية. كما انها تقدم تغطية شاملة للمفاهيم المطلوبة لامتحان شهادة المدقق الداخلي المعتمد.

تتكون الدورة من 8 أقسام رئيسية مصممة بشكل متسلسل، حيث تبدأ من المفاهيم البسيطة الرئيسية وتتقدم نحو المواضيع المتقدمة والأكثر تعقيدًا. وتغطي الدورة معظم جوانب المادة التحضيرية لامتحان الـCIA الجزء الأول، حيث تم تصميم أقسام الدورة بشكل يتماشى مع أقسام المادة التحضيرية لامتحان الـCIA، مما يساعد الأشخاص على التحضير الجيد لهذا الامتحان، وبالأخص الجزء الأول منه (Part1).

تتناول الدورة المواضيع التالية:
1) المفاهيم الأساسية للتدقيق الداخلي.
2) المعايير والأطر العالمية والدولية حسب المعهد الدولي للتدقيق الداخلي (IIA).
3) شرح لمفاهيم إدارة المخاطر وتقييم المخاطر والرقابة الداخلية والضوابط الرقابية بأنواعها المختلفة وطرق التعامل معها والاستجابة لها.
4) التدقيق الداخلي المبني على أساس المخاطر
5) توضيح للأدوات والطرق التي يمكن استخدمها في تقييم وتحليل المخاطر والضوابط الرقابية.
6) أمثلة عملية ونماذج وأسئلة وسيناريوهات تحاكي واقع مهنة التدقيق الداخلي اليومي.

objectives: Ön Muhasebe departmanı, işleyişi, iş prosedürleri ve uygulamaları hakkında detaylı bilgi edineceksiniz

İyi bir Ön Muhasebeci olmak için ileri seviye bilgiler edineceksiniz.
Ezberden sıyrılıp işin iç işleyişi hakkında başka yerde duyamayacağınız özel ve kıymetli bilgiler edineceksiniz.
Gelir - Gider raporları hakkında bilgiler edineceksiniz.
Günlük - Haftalık - Aylık raporlamalarda neler yer alır bunlar hakkında bilgiler edineceksiniz.
Çek - Senet gibi kıymetli evraklar hakkında bilgiler edineceksiniz.
Cari hesaplar çok kapsamlı ve detaylı hakkında bilgiler edineceksiniz.

requirements: Programlama yazılımlarına bu modülde ihtiyacımız yok. Bilmeniz gereken tüm iş prosedürlerini öğreneceksiniz.
courses.description:
Ön Muhasebe eğitiminde, öğrencilerin mevzuata uygun olarak ön muhasebe işlemlerini yapma ile ilgili bilgi ve becerilere sahip olmaları hedeflenmektedir. Programın uygulanmasında ağırlıklı olarak mesleki yeterlilik kazandırmaya yönelik yöntem ve teknikler uygulanmaktadır. Ön muhasebe; işletmenin parayla ifade edilen işlemlerini yani, işletmenin nakit parası, stokları, müşterileri, çekleri, senetleri, banka hesapları gibi temel unsurlarının kayıtlarını ve bunların hareketlerini takip etmek için kullanılır.
Ön Muhasebe departmanında görev alacak personelin, bu eğitimde yer alan konu başlıklarına hakim olması, iş süreçlerini başarılı bir şekilde yürütmesine olanak tanır.
Konuların bazıları excel formatları üzerinden aktif örneklerle birlikte anlatılmaktadır. Bunun amacı, öğrenicinin konuyu daha hızlı ve etkin bir şekilde öğrenmesinin amaçlanmasından dolayıdır. Konular içerisinde yer alan örnekler, iş hayatında yaşanmış, gerçek, ve deneyimlenmiş çalışmalardır. Bu nedenle bu eğitimin, özellikle bu mesleğe yeni adım atan öğreniciler için çok faydalı olacağı görüşündeyim.
Bu eğitimi başarıyla tamamlayanlar; Muhasebe, finans departmanlarında ön muhasebe işlemleri yapabilir, şirket ve işletmelerin muhasebe birimlerinde "Muhasebe Uzman Yardımcısı" / "Ön Muhasebe Uzmanı" olarak çalışabilirler. Ön muhasebe eğitimi almanın en işe yarar yönlerinden biri de farklı iş pozisyonlarında bu yetkinliğinizle öne çıkmanızdır. Örneğin; yönetici asistanlığı, eğitim danışmanlığı ve halkla ilişkiler iş ilanlarında da ön muhasebe bilgisi istenebiliyor. Eğer ön muhasebe bilerek bu iş pozisyonlarına başvurursanız emin olun öne çıkma olasılığınız çok daha yükselecektir.
Eğitimler esnasında not alınmasını öneriyorum.
Başarılar dilerim.
target_audience: Ön Muhasebe biriminde görev almak isteyen yeni mezun adaylar

courses.bio: Fundamental Accounting, Auditing ,Taxation, Financial Accounting 101 level, Financial management, Bookkeeping, Tax, VAT

courses.description:
Fundamental course in Accounting, Auditing and Taxation 2.0
Accounting is an essential aspect of every business, regardless of its size or industry. It serves as the foundation for financial stability, providing insights into a company's financial health and aiding in decision-making processes.
Accounting plays a crucial role in any organization by ensuring accurate financial records are maintained. It helps businesses track their income, expenses, assets, and liabilities, providing a clear picture of their financial position. Moreover, accounting enables businesses to comply with legal and regulatory requirements, assists in tax planning, and facilitates effective budgeting and forecasting.
In today's rapidly evolving business landscape, organizations face numerous challenges when it comes to maintaining accountability and transparency. One crucial tool that helps address these challenges is auditing. Auditing serves as a systematic review and evaluation process that ensures the accuracy and reliability of financial records, internal controls, and compliance with regulations.
Taxation is an essential aspect of any modern society, serving as a critical source of revenue for governments to fund public goods and services. While the concept of taxation might seem straightforward, it is a complex system with various components and implications.
In this fundamental 101 course, I would like to teach the major topics:
1. Introduction and importance of Accounting, Auditing and Taxation
2. Types, Scope of Accounting, Auditing and Taxation
3. How to measure financial accounting for reputed businesses
4. Supporting factors of Auditing and how to audit client's accounts

courses.title: Accounting for Funds: Private Equity
courses.bio: Private Equity Fund Economics and Financial Reporting
objectives: Understand the difference between private equity and hedge funds
Learn common fund structures
Understand the economics of private equity

Course and Professor Introduction: Quick Brush Up on Your Accounting
Key Concepts: Difference between VC, private equity, and hedge fund
Fund Organization: Fund Participants: Investors - Accredited vs. Institutional
Financial Statements: Capital Call and Funding a Deal
Financials Updates: Opex and Income Entries
Deal #03 - 30% Investment Stake in EduTech Corp
Capital Redemption: Return of Capital and PnL
Course Updates: How to find financial statements of publicly traded PE firm

requirements: Basic to intermediate understanding of general accounting
Basic to intermediate understanding of U.S. GAAP
Basic understanding of finance
Basic understanding of capital markets
courses.description:
In this course we explore private equity funds as an alternative asset class. We look at key concepts about fund formation, fund economics (i.e. how funds make money), key participants in fund activities, and the financial reporting process. Also, we pay close attention to how management and performance fees are calculated, as well as NAV.
Furthermore, we use an example of EducAfrica Asset Management (fictitious private equity firm), to show the typical fund structures, main actors in the fund organization and operation, deal sourcing process, underwriting approach, and general deal flow. Nonetheless, a great portion of the course is dedicated to explaining key journal entries and how they impact the financial statements.
Below follows the course outline:
Funds key concepts (i.e. private equity, hedge fund)
Difference between a private equity and a hedge fund
How private equity funds are set-up (stand alone fund, master-feeder, parallel, etc.)
Legal entities and preferable jurisdictions
Team members and service providers (management, advisory board, attorneys, accountants, fund administrator, custodian, etc.)

Net asset value calculation
At the end of this course, students should be able to comprehend the process of private equity formation, their economics and operations, as well as financial reporting for this asset class.

Marisa's very recent and intense plant medicine experience removed suffering from herself and her ancestors. She was also challenged but she overcame the programming and coding that put her on the matrix.  She feels it has shifted her energy and DNA to a brand new state of being.
The study of consistency
The 21-day rule originates in the 1960's pop psychology book Psycho-Cybernetics. The book states that it takes a minimum of 21 days for an old mental image to dissolve and for a new one to be created.
There is a more recent study of 96 people published in The European Journal of Social Psychology.  These findings reveal that it takes an average of 66 days to form a habit. But in the study, the actual number of days ranged from 18 to 254 days. So it can take a very short or a very long time. The moral of the story is that your changes need to be done consistently to get maximum, lasting results.

courses.description:
Jeżeli stawiasz pierwsze kroki w samodzielnym życiu i jesteś przed zakupem nieruchomości to KONIECZNIE powinieneś się zapoznać z wideo. W przypadku, gdy zamierzasz zmienić nieruchomość, a poprzedni zakup przeprowadził za Ciebie pośrednik nieruchomości to dowiesz się jak OSZCZĘDZIĆ przy zakupie nieruchomości.


Zanim zrobisz rozeznanie ofert dostępnych nieruchomości na sprzedaż, powinieneś poznać od kuchni całą procedurę zakupu nieruchomości co wpłynie bezpośrednio na:


Zredukowanie kosztów transakcji zakupu.
Zminimalizowanie czasu jaki trzeba poświęcić na wszystkie obowiązkowe sprawy związane z zakupem.
Skrócenie całego procesu zakupu nieruchomości.
Wykluczenie, niektórych kosztownych elementów istniejących przy zakupie.
Uniknięcie straty.


Nie daj się naciągnąć


W sytuacji, gdy brakuje Nam wiedzy z danego zakresu łatwo jest Nami  manipulować i wmawiać, że coś jest dla Nas obowiązkowe. Dlatego, należy  uniknąć tego, że ktoś wykorzysta na Naszą niekorzyść brak Naszej wiedzy i  doświadczenia.
A z pewnością doświadczenia na samym początku brakuje, dlatego koniecznie zapoznaj się z materiałem wideo, który przedstawia podejście praktyczne osoby z doświadczeniem przy zakupie nieruchomości.


W materiale wideo omówione zostały najważniejsze kwestie:
Co zrobić w przypadku zakupu nieruchomości na kredyt.
Jak sprawdzić nieruchomość przed zakupem.
Wiarygodne i rzetelne źródła potwierdzające stan prawny nieruchomości.
Jak znaleźć bank, który udzieli kredytu na zakup.
Jakie zapisy zawrzeć w umowie, żeby się zabezpieczyć.
Najważniejsze elementy umowy zakupu.
Z czyjej pomocy musisz skorzystać obowiązkowo.
Formalności przed zakupem.
Jaką wybrać formę płatności za nieruchomość.
Jak sprawdzić nieruchomość po zakupie.
Na co zwrócić uwagę przy odbiorze nieruchomości.
Obowiązki kupującego, obowiązki sprzedającego czyli w czyim zakresie jakie czynności powinny zostać wykonane.
Formalności po zakupie nieruchomości.
Czas trwania całego procesu zakupu.
Przebieg całej procedury, czyli w którym momencie co załatwić.


Tak naprawdę wszystko co powinieneś wiedzieć przed zakupem nieruchomości dostępne dla CIEBIE, zebrane w jednym miejscu na wideo.


Dostęp do materiałów otrzymujesz za opłatą, ponieważ jest tak, że człowiek  jeśli coś otrzymuje za darmo to nie szanuje tego. Wiem po sobie, że jak za  coś zapłacę to podchodzę z większym zaangażowaniem do tematu. A to  właśnie od Twojego zaangażowania i skupienia zależy czy osiągniesz  sukces.


Po zapoznaniu się z materiałem wideo cały proces zakupu nieruchomości nie będzie już dla Ciebie żadną tajemnicą i będziesz potrafić samodzielnie:
Przejść przez całą procedurę związaną z zakupem nieruchomości.
Wyeliminować niepotrzebne koszty.
Skrócić cały czas trwania procedury zakupu.
Wykonać wszystkie czynności jakie są obowiązkowe dla kupującego.
Ustrzec się od najczęściej popełnianych błędów przy zakupie.
Określić potencjalne zagrożenia.
Zabezpieczyć się w przypadku pojawienia się niesprzyjających okoliczności.
Oszacować koszty transakcji.
Analizować podstawowe akty prawne.
Analizować stan prawny nieruchomości.
Samodzielnie sporządzić umowę przedwstępną.
Korzystać z darmowych źródeł, które pomagają przy podjęciu kluczowy decyzji podczas zakupu.


Zawsze możesz skorzystać z pomocy biura nieruchomości lub pośrednika obrotu  nieruchomości. Wyręczy Nas z tego wszystkiego jednak należy wiedzieć, że  pobierze za to sowite wynagrodzenie i w przypadku pojawienia się problemów uniknie całej odpowiedzialności.


A i tak przy zakupie nieruchomości jest szereg obowiązkowych kosztów
związanych z całą procedura zakupu. Także za jedyne 70zł możesz zredukować koszty zakupu do minimum i przejść przez cały proces samodzielnie z sukcesem.
target_audience: Osoby przed zakupem nieruchomości pierwszej i kolejnej w swoim życiu
Dla chcących kupić mieszkanie
Chcący kupić dom
Dla kupujących nieruchomości

courses.title: Comprendre la Gestion des Sinistres en Assurance IARD
courses.bio: Notions de bases en Assurance : valeur d'achat, valeur acquise, étapes de la gestion du sinistre, réassurance.
objectives: Découvrir les bases de l'Assurance IARD
Découvrir les principes de la gestion des sinistres
Connaitre les notions de bases de la Gestion des Sinistres
requirements: Aucun, juste de la bonne volonté
courses.description:
Bonjour et Bienvenue,
Les Assurances apparaissent souvent comme un monde opaque et mystérieux pour qui n'est pas un initié. Pourtant, c'est un domaine passionnant qui mérite d'être compris, ne serait-ce que pour son rôle fondamental qui est la protection des personnes qui y ont recours. C'est pourquoi, il nous a paru opportun de présenter des cours simples et clairs, qui permettront à ceux qui les prendront, d'avoir une meilleur compréhension du monde de l'Assurance et de son fonctionnement.
Ce cours fait partie d'un bloc que nous présentons sur les Assurances en général, et sur les Sinistres en particuliers. Ce sont des formations riches et denses qui transmettent aux auditeurs, un condensé d'informations claires.
Il arrive après le module "Comprendre les Assurances IARD", et avant " Le processus de réclamation sinistres en Assurances" et " l'Indemnisation Sinistres en Assurances".
Nous abordons durant ce cours, les sujets suivants :
- Les principales notions de Gestion de Sinistres telles que : Le sinistre en Assurances, la valeur d'Achat, la déclaration du sinistre, l'expertise...
- Les étapes du traitement du Sinistre en Assurance
et plusieurs autres notions qu'il est bon de comprendre pour cerner au mieux les sinistres selon les risques concernés.


À qui ce cours s'adresse-t-il ?
Cette formation est à destination des :
Etudiants
Acteurs clés de l'Assurance. En particuliers aux Gestionnaires et rédacteurs Sinistres
Acteurs des services Production et techniques d'assurance IARDT
Toute personne projetant une reconversion professionnelle dans le domaine de la Gestion du sinistre ou de l'Assurance IARD en général
Toute personnes désirant comprendre l'indemnisation sinistre


Y a-t-il des exigences ou prérequis pour ce cours ?
Aucune - juste une volonté d'apprendre !
Merci et j'espère vous voir participer à cette formation dès maintenant !
target_audience: Etudiants
Toute personne intéressée par une carrière en Gestion des Sinistres

courses.title: LA BOLSA DESDE CERO: Instrumentos de inversión
courses.bio: Comenzá a dar tus primeros pasos en la bolsa de manera segura.
objectives: Todos los instrumentos de inversión
Dar los primeros pasos en la bolsa de valores
Conceptos teóricos del mercado
Tutorial de cada instrumento de inversión
Tips prácticos de inversión
Aprender a operar en la bolsa con fluidez

Inicio: Presentación e introducción al curso [LA BOLSA DESDE CERO]
El mercado y las bolsas de valores
Cheques de pago diferido: Cómo invertir en un cheque de pago diferido [Práctico]
Obligaciones negociables: Cómo licitar una obligación negociable o un bono [Teórico-Práctico]
Cómo comprar una ON en el mercado secundario [Práctico]
Bonos públicos: Cómo comprar un bono en el mercado secundario [Práctico]
Fondos comunes de inversión: Cómo suscribir y rescatar un FCI [Práctica]
Cómo saber que tiene un FCI [Teórico-Práctico]
Acciones bursátiles: Cómo funciona el panel de cotizaciones [Teórico]
Cómo comprar o vender acciones, bonos y cedears [Práctico]

requirements: NO se requiere NINGÚN tipo de conocimiento previo, el curso es desde cero.
GANAS de APRENDER y prestar ATENCIÓN.
courses.description:
¿Conoces solo el plazo fijo y ahorrar dólares para cuidarte de la devaluación? Termina de una vez por todas con eso y comienza a invertir en la bolsa de valores, vas a encontrar varios instrumentos al alcance de tu mano, para que tus ahorros crezcan mucho más a lo largo del tiempo y provoquen un cambio en tu vida financiera.
Desde qué empecé a invertir, mi vida cambió en todos los aspectos y se volvió mucho mas fácil alcanzar mis metas personales, quiero que eso mismo te ocurra a ti.
Pero por algún lado hay que empezar y es por ese motivo que cree este curso llamado "LA BOLSA DESDE CERO"  donde te enseño desde lo más básico para que adquieras todo el conocimiento necesario y puedas empezar de una manera mucho más sencilla y rápida en el mundo de las inversiones.
Aprenderás herramientas como cauciones, obligaciones negociables, acciones, fondos comunes de inversión y muchas cosas más. Te voy a enseñar cómo y en qué ocasiones utilizarlas para sacarles el mejor provecho, todo de una manera super simple y detallada para que sea fácil de entender si nunca escuchaste nada de la bolsa ni del mercado.
¡ Sumate ya mismo a esta enorme comunidad de más de 150.000 personas !
target_audience: Personas sin conocimiento del mercado que quieran comenzar a invertir.
Personas que quieran dar sus primeros pasos en la bolsa de valores.
Personas con muy poco conocimiento del mercado que quieran comenzar a invertir.
Personas que buscan mejorar su situación financiera.

courses.title: Finance for Engineers - Comprehensive
courses.bio: فهم أساسيات المالية وتطبيقاتها للمهندسين في بيئة العمل
objectives: تفهم ومعرفة المفاهيم والمبادئ والمصطلحات المالية والمحاسبية، تبسيط واستخدام المحاسبة المالية لغير المحاسبين.
قراءة وتفهم التقارير والقوائم المالي.
دعم مهارات تحليل ونقد القوائم المالية.
استخدام التحليل الأفقي والتحليل الرأسي للقوائم المالية.
استخدام النسب والمؤشرات المالية في التحليل المالي.
requirements: لا يوجد متطلبات، الدورة للمبتدئين.
courses.description:
مرحباً بكم في دورة "المالية للمهندسين"، التي صممت خصيصاً لتلبية احتياجات المهندسين في اكتساب فهم شامل للمفاهيم والمبادئ المالية والمحاسبية، سواءً كنتم من غير العاملين في هذا المجال أو تسعون لتطوير مهاراتكم المالية لدعم قراراتكم الهندسية. تبدأ الدورة بجزء أساسي يُوضح مفاهيم المحاسبة المالية مثل الأصول، الالتزامات، حقوق الملكية، الإيرادات، والمصروفات، كما يُقدم كيفية قراءة وتفسير التقارير والقوائم المالية وأهميتها في اتخاذ القرارات ذات الطابع المالي. ومن ثم، ننتقل إلى الجزء المتقدم الذي يُعزز مهارات التحليل المالي بتشخيص الحالة المالية للمشروعات والتنبؤ بالأزمات المالية، ويدعم إدارة رأس المال العامل بكفاءة من خلال فهم مكوناته واستخدامه الأمثل، إلى جانب تقييم جدوى الأفكار الاستثمارية ودراسات الجدوى. كما تُغطي الدورة أساسيات التخطيط والرقابة باستخدام أنظمة التكاليف والموازنات التقديرية. تُعد هذه الدورة جسرًا مهمًا يربط بين المعرفة الهندسية والمهارات المالية الاستراتيجية، مما يمنحكم القدرة على اتخاذ قرارات مدروسة تسهم في تحقيق الأداء المالي المتميز والنجاح المستدام في بيئة العمل.

_______________________________________________________________________________________________________

تهدف الدورة الأساسية الي شرح وتبسيط بعض المفاهيم والمبادئ والمصطلحات المالية والمحاسبية للمهندسين كي يتمكنوا من الحصول على تفهم أفضل عند قراءة القوائم المالية وأيضا عند مناقشة تلك المفاهيم والمصطلحات مع الماليين، وهو الأمر الذي يمثل دعما للمهندس حال تكليفه باتخاذ قرار له أثر مالي.

تلي تلك الدورة الأساسية دورة متقدمة:
الهدف من هذه الدورة هو تزويد المهندسين بمجموعة شاملة من المهارات والأدوات المالية المتقدمة، بدءًا من التحليل المالي لتشخيص الحالة المالية والتنبؤ بالأزمات، مرورًا بإدارة رأس المال العامل وتقييم جدوى المشاريع الاستثمارية، وصولاً إلى اكتساب أساسيات التخطيط والرقابة باستخدام أنظمة التكاليف والموازنات. برأيي، تُعد هذه الدورة جسرًا حيويًا بين المعرفة الهندسية والمهارات المالية، مما يمكّن المشاركين من اتخاذ قرارات مالية دقيقة واستراتيجية تساهم في تعزيز الأداء المالي والنجاح المستدام في بيئة العمل.

courses.title: PLAN For Your Debts
courses.bio: This is a comprehensive course designed to equip you with the essential knowledge and skills to manage financial risks.
objectives: Manage their own loans with strategies
Identify the types of debts and interest
Demonstrate the operations of loan and interest
Construct a strategy for debt management plan
Compare and contrast types of debts
Enhance debt management plan

What Is Debt And Interest?: Introduction To PLAN For Your Debts
Debt Management & Strategies: How to pay off debts strategically?

requirements: Basic English conversations knowledge required.
Possess basic computer literacy. For example, ability to use Microsoft Word or Excel.
courses.description:
PLAN FOR YOUR DEBTS
BY VINCENT CHEAH, CFP


Rationale
• Malaysian national debt had surged about 48 times from 1978 to today, which constitutes about 65.6% of Malaysian Gross Domestic Product (GDP).
• Bankruptcy had been on the rise due to personal financing debts and loans with most people filed for bankruptcy are among those aged 25 to 34.
• Understanding debts and solving them are important to ensure that people have financial freedom.


Objective
The objective of this programme is to equip participants with the knowledge and skills to understand the operations, periods and clearing of debts in a systematic manner to enhance the value of money.


Competency Standard
There are no relevant competency standards but the references are
• Code of Conduct from the Financial Planning Association of Malaysia (FPAM)
• Code of Conduct from the Malaysian Financial Planning Council (MFPC)
• Guidelines from Agensi Kaunseling & Pengurusan Kewangan (AKPK)
• Guidelines from Personal Financing by the Central Bank of Malaysia
• Guidelines from each banking institution on loans, personal loans and credit card’s Product Disclosure Sheets


Learning Outcome
At the end of this programme, the participants will be able to:
• Manage their own loans with strategies (L4 – Analysis, L5 - Synthesis)
• Identify the types of debts and interest (L1 – Knowledge)
• Demonstrate the operations of loan and interest (L3 - Applying)
• Construct a strategy for debt management plan (L5 – Synthesis)
• Compare and contrast types of debts (L4 – Application)
• Enhance debt management plan (L6 – Evaluation)
target_audience: Anyone aged 18 years old and above
Anyone who wants to learn about debts
Anyone who wants to manage debts

objectives: Master GPT4 Data Analysis Tool for Advanced Data Analysis and Visualization

GPT4 Advanced Data Analysis Demo 3 - PO Solution

Financial Statement Analysis with GPT 4 - Demo 1
Financial Statement Analysis with GPT 4 - Demo 1 - PO Solution
Financial Statement Analysis with GPT 4 - Demo 2
Financial Statement Analysis with GPT 4 - Demo 2 - PO Solution

Product Reviews Sentiment Analysis - Practice Opportunity Analysis

requirements: No prerequisite, Access to ChatGPT Plus (GPT4) is required.
courses.description:
Dive deep into the world of financial analysis with ChatGPT.
This course offers a robust exploration of the foundational and advanced concepts integral to finance, including:
Data Visualization: Understand and interpret stock data effectively
Capital Asset Pricing Model (CAPM): Grasp the intricacies of risk and return in financial markets.
Portfolio Optimization: Learn the art of maximizing returns while minimizing risks.
Monte Carlo Simulations: Delve into the probabilistic forecasting of financial outcomes.
Time Value of Money: Master the principles that underpin the value of money over time.
Beyond the basics, this course also delves into advanced features, such as:
Advanced Data Analysis Tools: Equip yourself with cutting-edge tools for in-depth financial analysis.
ChatGPT Plugins: Discover the power of plugins to enhance ChatGPT's capabilities.
GPT 4 Overview: Get acquainted with the latest advancements in the GPT series.
Whether you're an absolute beginner, a seasoned financial analyst, or a professional looking to harness the potential of AI, this course is tailored to empower you. Learn how to automate tasks and leverage the unparalleled power of AI in your daily financial endeavors.
All you need is a computer, an internet connection, access to ChatGPT and GPT 4, and a cup of coffee or tea!
I hope you enjoy the course and find it informative and engaging!
target_audience: AI enthusiasts
Data and Financial Analysts who want to leverage the Power of AI to transform their work
AI Beginners

courses.description:
This course will introduce you to a wide variety of calculations and related concepts that are used by financial market participants in a  wide variety of applications - calculating prices, rates of return, and yields for example. These concepts and more will be discussed.
This course consists of 15 modules, broken out into 3 sections:
Interest Rate Conventions and Time Value of Money
Debt Security Pricing
Bond Yields and Rates of Return
The course contains approximately 2 and a half hours of video content, and supplementary PDF files of the instructor's presentation are included to help participants follow along.
More about this course and Starweaver
This course is led by a seasoned capital markets industry practitioner and executive with many years of hands-on, in-the-trenches financial markets sales, trading and analysis work. It has been designed, produced and delivered by Starweaver. courses.description:
We are glad to bring you a course to learn how to Manage and Internal Audit Function.
This course is ideal for current and prospective Internal Audit Seniors, Managers, Directors and Chief Audit Executives - anyone who is currently managing an internal audit function or who one day wants to.
The course will give you the knowledge and tools necessary to manage an internal audit function, from how to perform the strategic and operational management of an internal audit function, to how to plan based on risks, communicate performance, follow standards and ethical principles, establish organizational independence, staff the function and ensure quality.


It is taught by Adrian Resag, an experienced and qualified Chief Audit Executive and Chartered Internal Auditor, who has decades of experience managing global internal audit functions.


The course covers:
Internal Audit Operational Management
Learn how to manage the operations of an internal audit function and what policies and procedures to put in place.

Ethical Principles

Internal Audit Staffing

Quality Assurance and Improvement

courses.description:
Kurs içeriği sıfırdan başlayanlar için çok faydalı.
TradingView ve YouTube kanalımda güncel grafik incelemelerine başladık arkadaşlar.
İletişim için Instagram veya Twitter üzerinden ulaşabilirsiniz
Bu kurs slaytlardan ve sözel bilgilerden oluşmamaktadır. Baştan sona her enstrümanı uygulamalı olarak sizlere anlatmak istedim. Akılda kalması için sizlere konuları anlatırken bir yandan aşamalı olarak formasyon oluşumlarını çizerek gösterdim. Uygulamalı anlatımın bu kurs konusu olan teknik analiz için daha faydalı olduğuna inanıyorum.
Hangi piyasada yatırım yaparsanız yapın öncelikle herkesin kendi stratejisi olmalı. Bu stratejileri temel ve teknik analiz yöntemleriyle elde edebilirsiniz. Önemli olan sizin nasıl bir yatırımcı olduğunuz. Uzun vadeli bir strateji mi takip etmek istiyorsunuz ya da kısa vadeli işlemler mi yapmak istiyorsunuz? Bu soruları kendinize sorduktan sonra size en uygun olanını seçip ilk adımı atmış olacaksınız.
Kısa vadeli işlemlerde risk her zaman daha fazladır. Uzun vadeli işlemlerde ise durum tam tersidir. Ama unutmayın risk düştükçe beklediğiniz kar oranı da düşecektir. O yüzden önemini vurguladığımız nasıl bir yatırımcı olmak istediğiniz burada devreye giriyor.
Uzun vadeli işlemlerde temel analizi iyi bilmek gerekir, kısa vadeli işlemlerde ise dersimizin konusu olan teknik analizi iyi bilmek gerekir. Kısa vadeli işlemlerde yüksek riski azaltmak ve doğru hamleler yapmak adına teknik analize hakim olmalısınız. Teknik analiz yöntemiyle zararınızı ve karınızı öngörme şansınız olacaktır. Geçmiş fiyat hareketleriyle gelecekteki fiyat hareketlerini tahmin etmek ve kendimizi olumlu veya olumsuz durumlara hazırlamak bizi bilinçli bir yatırımcı yapacaktır. Teknik analizle işlem yapan biri niye zarar ettiğini veya niye kar elde ettiğini bilir. Zaten niye kazandığını bilmeyen bir yatırımcı daha sonrasında kaybetmeye mahkum olacaktır. Teknik analiz sayesinde bilinçli ve kontrollü işlemler yapma fırsatı elde edeceksiniz.
En temel bilgilerden ileri seviye denilebilecek harmonik formasyonlara kadar her enstrüman kursta mevcut, aşamalı şekilde öğrene öğrene bu kursu tamamladığınız an teknik analize hakim olacaksınız arkadaşlar. Bu kurstan sonra öğrendiklerinizle işlem yaparak başarı elde edeceğinize inanıyorum. Bu kursta aldığınız bilgiler sonrasında kendinizi geliştirmeye devam etmenizi tavsiye ederim.
Kurs içeriğindeki konular hakkında aklınızda kalan bir yer , herhangi bir sorunuz olduğu zaman lütfen bana ulaşın. Aldığınız eğitimden sonuna kadar verim alın. Bende en iyi verimi alabilmeniz için 7/24 yardımcı olacağım arkadaşlar.
target_audience: Borsa İstanbul ve Kripto piyasasında işlem yapanlar

Teknik analiz yöntemiyle işlem yapmak isteyenler

Nesse curso você vai aprender como utilizar a HP 12C de uma forma simples, dinâmica e bem prática, desde as operações mais simples até cálculos financeiros até análises de projetos e estatísticas,
Para você que está cursando, economia, administração, contabilidade, ou trabalha no mercado financeiro e ainda não domina essa maravilhosa ferramenta esse curso é ideal para você.
Esse curso também vai ser bem legal para quem esta estudando para a certificação CEA , com esse curso você vai saber fazer os cálculos que são exigidos nas provas.
Minha vida ficou bem mais fácil depois que comecei a dominar a calculadora HP 12 C, quando estou visitando um cliente e tiro minha amiga inseparável HP12 C do bolso , o cliente fica mais seguro , pois essa calculadora é uma forma de falar eu sei do que estou falando e vou te provar com números.
Hoje atuando como assessor de investimentos eu uso a HP 12C todos os dias e posso garantir que essa calculadora me ajuda muito, desde somar um montante de um patrimônio até fazer médias ponderadas ou calcular desvio padrão de uma série histórica.
Com a HP12 sua vida ficará mais fácil e você passará muito mais confiança aos seus clientes , colegas de trabalho ou até mesmo seus superiores, venha estudar um pouco essa maravilhosa ferramenta.
target_audience: Alunos de Administração de Empresas, economia e contabilidade, profissionais do mercado financeiro e estudantes de certificações CPA 10, CPA20, CEA , Ancord entre outros.

requirements: Basic understanding of accounting challenges.
Commitment to personal and professional growth within the accounting field.
courses.description:
Boost your mental agility and elevate your accounting performance—see a 30% increase in productivity in just 6 weeks.


Embark on a transformative journey designed specifically for accounting professionals seeking to elevate their mental acuity and professional performance. Our comprehensive course, "Peak Performance Accountants: Mastering Mental Agility for Financial Professionals," offers a deep dive into the art and science of mental reconditioning tailored for the unique challenges faced in the accounting industry.
Discover cutting-edge psychological techniques and evidence-based practices that will empower you to sharpen your cognitive functions, manage stress effectively, and maintain emotional balance even during the most demanding financial periods.
Through a blend of theoretical knowledge and practical exercises, you will learn to harness the power of mental resilience, boost your productivity, and achieve a healthier work-life balance, ultimately leading to sustained professional success and personal fulfilment.
This course is more than just a training program; it's an investment in your most valuable asset — your mind. Join us to unlock your full potential and redefine what it means to be a high-performing accounting professional in today's fast-paced financial world.
Taking the "Peak Performance Accounting: Mastering Mental Agility for Financial Professionals" course can result in numerous benefits and outcomes for students. Here are 10 excellent advantages that participants can expect:


1. Enhanced Focus and Concentration: Students will learn techniques to improve their attention span and concentration, which will enable them to handle complex financial tasks with greater accuracy and efficiency.


2. Improved Decision-Making Skills: The course will provide tools for better decision-making, allowing students to make more informed and strategic choices in their work, reducing the risk of costly errors.


3. Increased Resilience to Stress: Participants will acquire strategies to manage and mitigate stress, helping them to remain calm and composed during tax season, audits, or other high-pressure situations.


4. Greater Emotional Intelligence: Students will develop skills to understand and manage their emotions, as well as those of others, leading to improved workplace relationships and client interactions.


5. Advanced Problem-Solving Abilities: The course will teach problem-solving frameworks that accountants can apply to navigate and resolve complex financial challenges creatively and effectively.


6. Boosted Productivity: By mastering mental agility, students can expect to see a noticeable increase in their productivity, as they learn to work smarter, not harder.


7. Better Work-Life Balance: With tools to manage workload and stress, students will be able to achieve a healthier balance between their professional responsibilities and personal life, leading to overall life satisfaction.


8. Prevention of Burnout: By implementing the course's techniques, students can avoid the common pitfall of burnout, staying motivated and energised in their careers over the long term.


9. Enhanced Professional Reputation: As students become more proficient and effective in their roles, they can expect to build a reputation as reliable and skilled professionals, which can open doors to career advancement.


10. Personal Growth and Self-Improvement: Beyond professional development, the course encourages introspection and self-improvement, leading to personal growth that transcends the workplace.


The transformation for a student taking this course will manifest in both tangible career benefits—such as promotions, increased client satisfaction, and a more robust professional network—and intangible life improvements, including greater personal happiness, improved mental health, and a more profound sense of purpose and fulfilment in their career and life overall.
target_audience: This course structure aims to provide a comprehensive learning experience that is both engaging and relevant to accounting starters and professionals looking to improve their mental performance and wellbeing.

courses.description:
Welcome to Buying, Building, and Living Off the Grid. This is a free three-part course on how to buy, build, and live on seller-financed rural land. By taking this course you will learn the basics of seller financing, online land dealers, off the grid living, and building the land. At the end of this course, you will know whether buying land online with seller financing is right for you.


You can consume the material in any order you wish, skipping around or watching, listening, and reading the small 15 minute modules in order. And, there is no login required. Enjoy learning!


Traditionally, real estate is purchased with traditional bank financing. A bank lends you money to pay for a property (almost always one with an existing home, or one well on its way to being built), and then you make payments for a period of usually 30 years. The theory, or at least the hope, is that the home’s value will go up, and you can either refinance or sell at a profit, perhaps trading up to a bigger house.


In the emerging ’20s, we can expect continued social and economic impacts from the COVID-19 pandemic. Political turmoil has created uncertainties about urban and suburban areas and their ability to thrive, not to mention the vast array of tax and spending proposals being contemplated at all government levels.


Millions of people dream of striking out and enjoying a simpler, slower pace of life in the country, but many don’t know where to begin. If you want to reconnect with nature, live like your forefathers, and free yourself from the chaos of the modern world, how can you find and purchase the right land to build on?
target_audience: Those interested in Seller Financing ,Real Estate
Those interested about Off The Grid Living, Building in their Own Property

Χαίρομαι πολύ, που θέλετε να γίνετε Μαγνήτες Αφθονίας! Θα απελευθερώσουμε όλα τα Εμπόδια και θα κάνουμε νέες, Θετικές Εγγραφές στο Υποσυνείδητο μας, που θα ορίσουν την νέα μας Πραγματικότητα! Θα μεταμορφωθούμε σε Μαγνήτες Αφθονίας! requirements: 損益計算書の基本的な読み方（不安のある方は『【初心者向け】いちばんわかりやすい決算書の読み方講座』の受講をお勧めします）

courses.description:
自前で対応すべきか？外注すべきか？
受注すべきか？断るべきか？
最新設備を導入すべきか？既存のものを使い続けるべきか？
より力を入れて売るべき商品はどれか？切り捨てる商品はどれか？


ビジネスでは、意思決定を迫られるシーンが多数あります。
「意思決定の成否がビジネスの成功と失敗を左右する」といっても過言ではありません。


このような意思決定の連続の中で、
あなたは的確かつスピーディに正しい判断ができるでしょうか？


意思決定会計のフレームワークを理解していないと、
その場の感情や思い込みで、誤った意思決定をしてしまう恐れがあります。


ビジネスリーダーたるもの、冷静なジャッジで組織を正しい方向に導かなくてはなりません。
時には、事業撤退という非情な決断を下さなければないこともあります。


本コースは、意思決定会計のうち、比較的短期の意思決定をテーマとした内容となります。


現場レベルの責任者（管理職・リーダー）が、
所与の条件下で最大の利益を獲得するためには、
どのような会計データをどのように比較検討すればいいのかが学べます。


基礎的な内容からスタートし、徐々に実践的な内容に段階を踏んで進めますので、
意思決定会計について全く無知であっても大丈夫です。


ビジネスシーンで想定される様々なケースを用意しましたので、
一緒に事例問題を解きながら、正しい意思決定手法を体得しましょう。


※最適なセールスミックスが一発で算出できる簡単フォーマット（Excelファイル）が無料でダウンロードできます！
（Microsoft Excel 2010以降のバージョンを前提に解説しています）
target_audience: 会計数値をもとに合理的な意思決定ができるようになりたい方

提案力を高めたいコンサルタント・営業担当者
高い成果を出したいプロジェクトマネージャー
より高い管理会計思考を身につけたいビジネスパーソン

courses.title: Extreme Couponing for Busy Women
courses.bio: A Busy Woman’s Guide to Extreme Couponing
objectives: Learn how to coupon despite busy schedule

Extreme Couponing for Busy Women: Part 3: How to Find the Deals
Part 6: Couponing Tips To Save Money

requirements: none
courses.description:
So many people show an interest in learning to coupon every day, but they tell themselves that they just do not have the time. This audiobook is not only going to teach you how you can get started couponing, but how you can do so in whatever time you have available in your busy schedule - even if it is only a couple of hours a week.
You will learn:
How to get started couponing
How to save the most money in as little time as possible
Where to get coupons
How to find the best deals without spending your precious time scouring flyers for them
Tips that will help you save the most money
And so much more
By the time that you finish listening to this audiobook, you will know everything that you need to start couponing as early as today - without spending 40 hours a week searching for deals.
Couponing should be something you enjoy, not another full-time job. For that reason, this audiobook tell you how you can reduce your family's grocery bill by up to 90 percent in only a few hours each week.
About the expert: Brandy Morrow is a busy mother of three who runs her own freelance business. While still ensuring that her house runs properly, she ensures that every meal is prepared at home using healthy ingredients, works out one hour each day, and finds the time to coupon in order to save as much as she can. Brandy started couponing four years ago, when her interest was piqued by the show Extreme Couponing on TLC. Brandy is a self-taught couponer who is passionate about teaching others how to save money. Brandy believes that when we focus on saving the money we earn, we have a huge impact on our own quality of life. Brandy regularly donates items that she purchases with coupons and helps local families that are in need with care packages.
target_audience: Busy women
